anya-e0806n0:15_0: Icceva manavasesa mattano bhayādyūpaddavopaghābhakarasāmatthiya yogena sakalajjhattikabāhiyantarāya
anya-e0806n0:15_1: nivāraṇa madhippetasiddhi visesa mabhikaṅkhiya ratanattaya visayabhūtaṃ taṃsādhane
anya-e0806n0:15_2: kantanidāna bhūtassa ālokiyayātisayaguṇavisesayuttassa mahato pyatimahanīyassa ratanattayassa
anya-e0806n0:18: Vacanato attano gurupūjā purassaraṃ pañcikāvivaraṇaṃ pathi’yā pañcikā’tiādinā katapaṭiññattā sampati mahādayotiādino ganthassa sādhujanavaṇṇanaṃ vaṇṇanamārabhissāma.
anya-e0806n0:19_0: Nanu ca vuttiganthassa vaṇṇanāyaṃ katābhiniveso-yamācariyoti kathamihānadhikate mahādayotiādike
anya-e0806n0:19_4: parisamāpanatthaṃ. Vacīpaṇāmo panettha sotūnampi yathāvuttatthanipphādanako ācariyenāpyaya
anya-e0806n0:19_6: vacīpaṇāmoti kāyappaṇāmo manopaṇāmo ca. Na kato, ganthakattusandassanaṃ ganthassa
anya-e0806n0:19_9: vīmaṃsāpubbakārīnaṃ payojano pālambhapubbikā satthe pavattatīti sotujanasamussāhanaṃ
anya-e0806n0:20: Sabbasseva hi satthassa, kammassāpi ca kassaci;
anya-e0806n0:22: Nanu satthappayojanānaṃ sambandhopi vattabbo idamassa payojananti yato–
anya-e0806n0:27: Taṃ vuttantogadhattā na, bhinno vutto payojanāti.
anya-e0806n0:28: Payojanappayojanampana sāmatthiyaladdhabbaṃ sayamācariyena “ko pana saddalakkhaṇassa ajānane doso”tiādinā vuttanayena viññātabbaṃ.
anya-e0806n0:29_2: vipulatthagā hiṃ anākula’nti ca imehi ganthārambhaphalaṃ sotujanasamussāhanañca,
anya-e0806n0:29_4: saṃvaṇṇīyati vivaritvā vitthāretvā kathīyati attho etāyāti saṃvaṇṇanābhi katvā, tampana
anya-e0806n0:29_5: vivaritvā kathanaṃ saddānusāsanasatthasannissayattā abhidheyyo nāma samuditena satthena
anya-e0806n0:30_0: Ayampanettha avayavattho-yoti aniyamavacanaṃ dhammarājasaddā pekkhāya cettha pulliṅgatā,
anya-e0806n0:30_1: tenettha vuccamānaguṇavisesā dhārapuggalavisesanidassanaṃ, dayati dukkhaṃ apanetvā
anya-e0806n0:30_2: paresaṃ sukhaṃ dadāti, dayīyati vā sappurisehi gamiya(ti sa) santāne pavattīyati,
anya-e0806n0:30_3: dayati vā paradukkhaṃ hiṃsati, dayati vā paradukkhaṃ gaṇhāti taṃvasena attano hadayakhedaṃ
anya-e0806n0:30_5: appaccayo, visayamahantatāya mahatī pasatthā vā dayā assāti mahādayo, visesana samāse
anya-e0806n0:30_7: kammakilesehi janitāti janā sattaloko, iminā khīṇāsavāpi saṅgayhanti tesampi diṭṭhadhammikasukhavihārasaṅkhāta
anya-e0806n0:30_8: hitassa dānato, janānaṃ samūho janatā tassā hitāya abhivaḍḍhiyā sakalavaṭṭa dukkhanissaṭanibbānasukhabhāgiyakaraṇāyāti
anya-e0806n0:30_9: vuttaṃ hoti, assaca’sampūraya’nti iminā’dukkhamanubhavī’ti iminā ca sambandho, sambodhīti
anya-e0806n0:30_10: ettha saṃsaddo sāmanti imamatthaṃ dīpeti, tasmā saṃsayameva anaññabodhito hutvā cattāri
anya-e0806n0:30_11: saccāni bujjhati paṭivijjhati etāyāti sambodhi, saṃpubbā budhadhātuto “i”iti ṇvādi
anya-e0806n0:30_13: vadanti, sampāpayatīti sampāpakaṃ, sambodhiyā sampāpakanti chaṭṭhīsamāso, kinti dhammajātaṃ
anya-e0806n0:30_14: dhammasaddenettha pāramidhammā pañcamahāpariccāgādayo ca adhippetā, tepi hi attānaṃ
anya-e0806n0:30_15: dhārentaṃ dhārenti sambodhi sampāpanasāmatthiyayogena parepi dhārenti nāmāti dhammāti
anya-e0806n0:30_16: vuccanti, ‘dhara=dhāraṇe’iccasmā khīsu, viyādisuttena ṇvādi(ko) mappaccayo, dhammānaṃjātaṃ,
anya-e0806n0:30_17: dhammāevavā jātaṃ, sambodhisampāpakañca taṃ dhammajātaṃ ceti visesanasamāso, ‘sampūraya’nti
anya-e0806n0:30_18: massetaṃ kammaṃ, sampūrayanti payogasampattiyogā dīpaṅkara (pāda)mūle hatthopagatampi
anya-e0806n0:30_21: sammā pūrento vaḍḍhento vuḍḍhiṃ virūḷhaṃ vepullaṃ gamentoti vuttaṃ hoti, hetuyevedamapi
anya-e0806n0:30_22: dukkhānubhavanassa, mahādayatā panassa paramparahetu, duṭṭhu khanati kāyikaṃ assādanti’dupubbā
anya-e0806n0:30_23: khanismā’ “kvī”ti (5-4) kvi, dukkhaṃ kāyikadukkha vedanā, kīdisanti āha-’anantarūpa’nti,
anya-e0806n0:30_24: sabhāvavacano yaṃ rūpasaddo “piyarūpa”ntiādīsuviya, te ca dukkhasabhāvā (anantā)
anya-e0806n0:30_25: anantakāraṇānaṃ vasena, tasmā anantaṃ rūpaṃ sabhāvo assāti anantarūpaṃ, taṃ dukkhaṃ
anya-e0806n0:30_26: anubhavī vindī, kimivāti āha-‘sukhaṃ vā’ti, suṭṭhu khanati kāyikaṃ ābādhanti sukhaṃ,
anya-e0806n0:30_28: sadhammattaṃ siyo pamā”ti, kiṃ vuttaṃ hoti “aniṭṭhānubhavanasabhāvāyāpi dukkhavedanāya
anya-e0806n0:30_30: dukkhampi samānaṃ taṃ sukhamiva vindī”ti. Kathamaññathā vaṭṭadukkhato sakalalokassa
anya-e0806n0:30_31: samuddharaṇaṃ siyāti, athavā sukhamiva sukhaṃ vindanto viya anaññavindiyamapi tādisaṃ
anya-e0806n0:30_32: dukkhaṃ sakalalokahitāva hitamanatāya vindīti attho, tenāha ‘akhinnarūpo’ti, akhinnaṃ
anya-e0806n0:31_0: Taṃ dhammarājanti yoti aniyamaniddiṭṭhassa vuttaguṇavisesādhāra puggalassaniyamanavacanaṃ,
anya-e0806n0:31_1: dhammena rājati no adhammenāti vā, attanā paṭividdhassa sāmibhāvena dhammassa rājā
anya-e0806n0:31_2: sāmīti vā, attanā paṭivijjhiyamāne dhamme paṭivijjhantova tattha rājati dippatīti
anya-e0806n0:31_3: vā, parūpakāravasena tadatthāyeva paṭipannattā paresaṃ dhammaṃ rājeti pakāsetīti
anya-e0806n0:31_4: vā dhammarājā, taṃ dhammarājaṃ namitvāti sambandho, namassitvāti attho, kīdisanti
anya-e0806n0:31_5: āha-‘jitamāravīraṃ sudhanta sovaṇṇanibha’nti. Tattha māro ca so vīrocāti māravīro
anya-e0806n0:31_6: jito vidtedhastabalo māravīro nāti jitamāravīro, taṃ, kiñcāpi devaputtakilesābhisaṅkhāramaccukkhandha
anya-e0806n0:31_7: mārā-nena jitā eva, tathāpi vīrasaddasannidhānena devaputtamāre gahite taṃvijayā
anya-e0806n0:31_8: aññepi jitā eva nāma hontīti viññeyyaṃ, suṭṭhu dhantaṃ dhamitaṃ uddharitaṃ sudhantaṃ,
anya-e0806n0:31_9: suvaṇṇameva sovaṇṇaṃ, sudhanta ca taṃ sovaṇṇañca, tasseva nibhā sobhā asseti samāso,
anya-e0806n0:31_10: athavā sudhantañca taṃ suvaṇṇaṃ ceti samāse tassidanti “ṇo”ti (4-34) ṇappaccaye “majjhe”ti
anya-e0806n0:31_11: (4-126) majjhavuddhiyaṃ sudhantasovaṇṇaṃ paṭimārūpaṃ, tena nibho sadiso, taṃ.
anya-e0806n0:33: Hetu phalaṃ parattho ca, sabbopi thutisaṅgaho;
anya-e0806n0:35_1: dhammarājena tenāpi pūjanīyassa dhammaratanassa nipaccakāraṃ dassetuṃ‘dhammañca mohandhatamappadhaṃsi’nti
anya-e0806n0:35_2: āha, tattha ca saddo ‘dhammañca namitvā’ti namassitvā (potthake) namassanakriyāya
anya-e0806n0:35_3: dhammaṃ sampiṇḍeti, kimbhūtanti āha, ‘mohandhatamappadhaṃsi’nti, muyhatīti moho=aññāṇaṃ,
anya-e0806n0:35_4: andhayati samatthacakkhuviññāṇaparihānenāti andhaṃ, andhañca taṃ tamañceti andhatamaṃ=bāḷhatimiraṃ,
anya-e0806n0:35_5: mohoyeva taṃsadisatāya andhatamanti mo handhatamaṃ, taṃ padhaṃseti pakārena nāseti
anya-e0806n0:35_6: sīlenāti mohandhatamappadhaṃsī, pasaddassapakāsanatthaṃ hitvā pakāratthasseva gahaṇato pariyattiyā saha–
anya-e0806n0:37: Cattāri atha nibbānaṃ, dhammā lokuttarā navāti.
anya-e0806n0:38_0: Vuttanavalokuttarammo gahitāti viññātabbaṃ, aññathā arahattamaggova gayheyya, kasmā
anya-e0806n0:38_1: panettha mohasseva pahānaṃ vuttaṃ, netaresanti tammūlakattā sabbakilesānaṃ, tappahānasmiñhi
anya-e0806n0:39_0: Evaṃ dhammaratanassa namakkāraṃ dassetvā idāni tadādhārabhūtasaṅgharatanaṃ namassituṃ
anya-e0806n0:39_1: ‘saṅghaṃ tathā saṅghaṭitaṃ guṇehī’ti vuttaṃ, tattha tathāsaddo samuccaye vā, vacoyuttiyaṃ
anya-e0806n0:39_2: vā, vacoyuttipakkhe ca saddo ānetvā sambandhitabbo, kilesādayo saṃhanati hiṃsatīti
anya-e0806n0:39_3: saṅgho, saṃpubbato hanatismā kvimhi “kvimhi ghoparipaccasamo hī”ti (5.100) hanassa
anya-e0806n0:39_4: gho, kilesahiṃsanañcettha tadaṅgādivasena gahitaṃ, guṇehīti sāmaññaniddesato sammutisaṅghena saddhiṃ
anya-e0806n0:40: Cattāro ca paṭipannā, cattāro ca phaleṭhitā;
anya-e0806n0:42: Vuttaaṭṭhaariyapuggalā gayhanti, guṇehīti lokiyalokuttarehi sīlādiguṇehi, saṅghaṭitanti saṃhataṃ.
anya-e0806n0:43_1: ratanattayassa paṇāmaṃ dassetvā idāni gantha kattādiyathāvuttatthopadassana pubbaṅgamamattanā
anya-e0806n0:43_2: samārabhitabbaṃ gantha karaṇaṃ paṭiññātukāmo’yo iddhimantesū’tiādimāha, tattha ‘yo’ti
anya-e0806n0:43_3: imassa ‘tannāmadheyyenā’ti iminā sambandho, etāya sattā ijjhanti iddhā vuddhā ukkaṃsagatā
anya-e0806n0:43_4: hontīti iddhi=iddhividhādayo lokiyā lokuttarā ca sā etesamatthīti iddhimanto, tesu
anya-e0806n0:43_5: iddhimantesu, iddhimantānaṃ mahāsāvakānaṃ majjheti attho, mahattappattoti mahattaṃ
anya-e0806n0:43_6: mahantabhāvaṃ gato, tannāmadheyyenāti tasseva nāmadheyyamassāti tannāmadheyyo, tena,
anya-e0806n0:43_7: tapodhanenāti muninā, kiṃ vuttaṃ hoti- “etadaggaṃ bhikkhave mama sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ
anya-e0806n0:43_8: iddhimantānaṃ yadidaṃ moggallāno”ti bhagavatā iddhimantesu etadagge ṭhapito mahāmoggallānatthero
anya-e0806n0:43_9: nāma yo dutiyo aggasāvako… (tena samānanāmadheyyenāti) tamapadisanto-yamācariyo anuddhatabhāvena
anya-e0806n0:43_10: ujunākkamena nāmādikamavatvā vaṅkavuttiyā attano moggallānoti nāmaṃ mahāsāmiṭṭhānantarappattiṃ
anya-e0806n0:43_11: kālocitapaññā veyyattiyaṃ buddhasāsanopakāritādiñca vibhāveti. ‘Yaṃ racita’nti sambandho,
anya-e0806n0:43_12: racitanti kataṃ, kinti āha saddasattha’nti, saddasatthaṃ nāma sutta, saddalakkhaṇabyākaraṇādyaparanāmadheyyaṃ,
anya-e0806n0:43_14: etenā’ti saddalakkhaṇanti ca ‘byākarīyanti saddanipphādanavasena kathīyanti etenā’ti
anya-e0806n0:43_15: byākaraṇanti ca vuccati, aparampana vutyādi tadupakaraṇabhāvena saddasatthaṃ saddalakkhaṇaṃ
anya-e0806n0:43_16: byākaraṇanti ca vuccatīti daṭṭhabbaṃ, anunanti tabbisesanaṃ, asesalakkhiyopasaṅgāhakabhāvena
anya-e0806n0:43_17: vattabbassāparassābhāvā sampuṇṇanti attho, athāti anantaratthe nipāto, saddasattharacanānantaranti
anya-e0806n0:43_18: attho, tasseti saddasatthassa, vutti ca samāsā katāti sambandho, suttaṃ vivarīyati
anya-e0806n0:44_0: Tassāpīti vuttiyāpi, saṅgahetvā saddavasena saṅkucitaṃ viya katvā khipanaṃ saṅkhepo,
anya-e0806n0:44_1: tassa nayo kamo saṅkhepanayo, tena, bhovāti yo saddasatthassa vuttiyā ca kattā so
anya-e0806n0:44_2: eva, idāni suttavuttiracanānantaramavasarappatte imasmiṃ kāle, samārabheyya sammā
anya-e0806n0:44_3: ārambhaṃ kareyya bahunnaṃ kriyākkhaṇānamādibhūtaṃ kriyākkhaṇamanutiṭṭheyya, kinti
anya-e0806n0:44_4: saṃvaṇṇanaṃ, saṃvaṇṇīyati attho etāyāti saṃvaṇṇanā, pañcīyati vipañcīyati byattī
anya-e0806n0:44_5: karīyati vutti attho etāyāti vā, taṃ pañcayatīti vā laddhanāmapañcikā, taṃ.
anya-e0806n0:45_0: Evamattanā karaṇīyasatthampaṭijānitvā tadanantaraṃ “dve me bhikkhave paccayā sammādiṭṭhiyā
anya-e0806n0:45_1: uppādāya (katame dve) parato ca ghoso (ajjhattañca) yoniso manasikāro”ti vacanato
anya-e0806n0:45_2: sammāsavanapaṭibaddhā sabbāpi sāsana (ppaṭi) sampattīti sāsanappaṭipattiyā byākaraṇassa
anya-e0806n0:45_3: mūlakāraṇattā taṃ savane sādhujane niyojento ‘taṃ sārabhūta’ntiādimāha, tattha tanti
anya-e0806n0:45_4: yasaddavirahepi adhikatattā saṃvaṇṇanaṃ parāmasati, taṃ suṇantū’ti sambandho, sādhūti
anya-e0806n0:45_6: anaññamanā hutvā sakkaccaṃ suṇantūti attho suvaṇṇabhājane nikkhittasīhavasāviya avinassamānaṃ
anya-e0806n0:45_7: katvā hadaye ṭhapanavasena, sakkaccasavanameva hi sotūnamatthāvahaṃ hotīti, santoti
anya-e0806n0:45_8: savanakriyāya kattāro dasseti, tathā sātisayabyākaraṇaṃ… tathāvidhā eva sappurisā
anya-e0806n0:45_9: sādhukaṃ sotukāmā hontīti, kimbhūtanti āha ‘sārabhūta’ntiādi, bhūtasaddo ettha “bhūtasmiṃ
anya-e0806n0:45_10: pācittiya’ntiādīsu viya vijjamānattho, phegguttābhāvena apariccajanīyatāya sāro thiraṃ
anya-e0806n0:45_11: so attho byañjanañca assā atthīti sārā ca sā bhūtāca, atha vā lokiyalokuttaraguṇātisayasādhanekasādhanabhāvato
anya-e0806n0:45_12: seṭṭhaṭṭhena sārañca sā bhūtācāti sārabhūtā, taṃ gantho yevettha saṅkhepito, attho
anya-e0806n0:45_13: pana nayaggāhitatāyapi sabbathā dassitoyevāti vipulaṃ atthaṃ gaṇhātīti vipulatthagāhī,
anya-e0806n0:45_14: taṃ, vidhīyamānavaṇṇanākkamavisesena byākulassa vaṇṇanākkamassa nirasanato natthi
anya-e0806n0:45_15: ākulaṃ kiñci assāti anākulaṃ, taṃ, iminā ca kaccāyanavuttivaṇṇanāsu na tathābhāvaṃ dasseti.
anya-e0806n0:46_3: māgadhānaṃ saddānaṃ idanti māgadhikaṃ, māgadhikaṃ saddalakkhaṇanti visesana samāso,
anya-e0806n0:46_4: viracayitukāmoti kattukāmo, ratiṃjanetīti ratanaṃ, ramayatī ra tayatī (potthake)
anya-e0806n0:46_5: ti (vā) ratanaṃ anappaccayena, athavā yaṃ loke cittīkatādikaṃ ratananti vuccati,
anya-e0806n0:46_6: idampi taṃ sadisatāya ratananti vuccati, tathācāhu–
anya-e0806n0:49_0: Buddhādīnametamadhivacanaṃ, tayo avayavā assāti tayaṃ, samudāyo, ratanānaṃ tayaṃ
anya-e0806n0:49_1: ratanattayaṃ, avayavavinimmuttassa pana samudāyassa abhāvato tīṇi eva ratanāni vuccanti,
anya-e0806n0:49_2: paṇamanaṃ paṇāmo, ratanattayaguṇaninnatā, paṇamanti etāyāti vā paṇāmo, paṇāmakriyānipphādikā
anya-e0806n0:49_3: kusalacetanā, ratanattayassa paṇāmoti chaṭṭhīsamāso, abhidhīyati paṭipādīyatītyabhidheyyo
anya-e0806n0:49_4: samuditena satthena vacanīyattho, yena ca yo paṭipādīyati so tassa attho hotīti,
anya-e0806n0:49_5: so ca pakatippaccayādivibhāgakappanāya saddānaṃ saṅkharaṇaṃ, saddasatthena hi saddasaṅkharaṇameva
anya-e0806n0:49_7: catthasamāso, tassa sandassanaṃ attho yassāti aññapadattho, kintaṃ vākyaṃ, tā vāti
anya-e0806n0:49_8: vākyālaṅkāre, nanucevamadhikatattepi abhidheyyamattamevadassetabbaṃ siyā kiṃ vācāpaṇāmena,
anya-e0806n0:49_9: kāyamanomayenāpi puññāti sayappattiyā abhisamīhitatthasiddhi hotevāti codanaṃ manasi
anya-e0806n0:49_10: nidhāya vacīpaṇāmassa paratthasannissayatañca tasseva vibhāgena payojanañca dassetumāha-
anya-e0806n0:49_11: ‘tattha’iccādi, guṇasaddo ettha “sataguṇā dakkhiṇā pāṭikaṅkhā”tiādīsu viya ānisaṃsaṭṭho,
anya-e0806n0:49_12: guṇānamānisaṃsānaṃ anukūlaṃ anuguṇaṃ, hetumantavisesanametaṃ, padhānabhāvaṃ nītaṃ
anya-e0806n0:49_13: paṇītaṃ atiuttamanti attho, atīsayena paṇītaṃ paṇītataraṃ, cittassasantānaṃ pabandho
anya-e0806n0:49_14: cittasantānaṃ, paṇītatarañca taṃ cittasantānañca, anuguṇañca taṃ paṇītataracittasantānañcāti
anya-e0806n0:49_15: visesanasamāso, tappaṇāmakaraṇena anuguṇa…pe… santānaṃ yesanti aññapadattho, tesaṃ,
anya-e0806n0:49_16: yathā te sotāro ratanattayassa paṇāmakaraṇena puññātisayappaṭilābhā anekānisaṃsātisayappaṭilābhānukūla
anya-e0806n0:49_17: cittasantānatāya padhānataracittasantānā honti, tathā pavattānanti adhippāyo, idampi
anya-e0806n0:49_18: adhigatā…pe… ntarādhānantīmesaṃ hetubhāvena tiṭṭhati, adhigatā pattā aneke bahū ānisaṃsavisesā
anya-e0806n0:49_19: āyu vaṇṇasukhabalapaṭibhānādayo yesanti viggaho, visositā sukkhāpitā antarāyā bhayādayo
anya-e0806n0:49_20: ajjhattikā bāhiyā vā yesaṃ tathāvidhānaṃ sotūnaṃ, etepi abhi,pe,ddhatthanti iccassa
anya-e0806n0:49_21: hetū, abhisamīhitassa anuṭṭhitassa kataniṭṭhitassa ganthassa avabodhoyeva phalaṃ,
anya-e0806n0:52_0: Vacanato paratthova sappurisehi kattabbo, paratthe sampādite pana sakattho sampannova
anya-e0806n0:52_1: nāma siyāti manasi katvā āha- ‘etadevā’tiādi. Kāyamanosamācaraṇena sampajjamānañca
anya-e0806n0:52_2: vacīsamācaraṇena sampajjatevāti aneneva vākyena viññāyatīti avagantabbaṃ, buddhi
anya-e0806n0:52_3: pubbā yasmiṃ karaṇe taṃ buddhi pubbaṃ, taṃ sīlena karontā buddhipubbakārino, abhidheyyassa
anya-e0806n0:52_4: adhigamo jānanaṃ pubbo yassa so abhidheyyādhigamapubbako, avatāro pavatti, ekadesadassane
anya-e0806n0:52_5: “samuddo diṭṭho”ti viya ekadesepi samudāyavohāradassanato pacchima pādenāti vuttaṃ,
anya-e0806n0:52_7: saṅkharaṇaṃ, sādhanaṃ byākaraṇaṃ, taṃ lakkhaṇaṃ sabhāvo assāti sādhiyasādhanalakkhaṇo,
anya-e0806n0:52_8: sādhiyassedaṃ sādhanaṃ, sādhanassa cedaṃ sādhiyanti evamassedambhāvahetusabhāvo sambandhoti
anya-e0806n0:52_9: vuttaṃ hoti, payojanaṃ abhidheyyasaddopadassitaṃ saddasaṅkharaṇaṃ, tattha sambandhassantogadhattaṃ…
anya-e0806n0:52_10: sādhiyopadassanamukhena sādhanassāpi dassitattā nissayopadassanato, ussukkaṃ sammāvāyāmaṃ,
anya-e0806n0:56_0: Vuttaaṭṭhadhammasamannāgatena abhinīhārena samannāgatā hutvā yathāvutte pāramitādayo
anya-e0806n0:56_1: dhamme pūretvāti attho, āgatāti sattattiṃsabodhipakkhiyadhammānubrūhanena āgatā,
anya-e0806n0:56_2: idhāti imasmiṃ loke, āgatāti pattā uppannā, tathāgatoti yathā sampati jātā te bhagavanto
anya-e0806n0:56_3: sattapadavītihārena gatā, tathā ayampi uttarābhimukhaṃ gatoti attho, muhuttajātovāti
anya-e0806n0:56_4: sampatijāto eva, jātasamanantaramevāti vuttaṃ hoti, vikkamīti agamāsi, satta padāni
anya-e0806n0:56_5: gantvāna disā vilokesīti idaṃ “dhammatā esā bhikkhave sampati jāto bodhisattā samehi
anya-e0806n0:56_6: pādehi patiṭṭhahitvā”ti eva mādikāya pāḷiyā sattapadavītihārūpariṭhitassa sabbadisānuvilokanassa
anya-e0806n0:56_7: vuttattā vuttaṃ, disā vilokesi samantatoti idampana ‘samehi pādehi phusī vasundhara’nti
anya-e0806n0:56_8: etassa anantaraṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ… pādehi vasundharāphusanānantarameva dasadisāvalokitattā, aṭṭhaṅgāni nāma–
anya-e0806n0:59_0: Vuttāni aṭṭhaṅgāni, tathāgatoti imasseva visuṃ atthapariyāyaṃ dassetuṃ ‘athavā’tiādimāha,
anya-e0806n0:59_1: ariyena setunāti samathavipassanāsaṅkhātena uttamena maggena, evamādinātiādisaddena
anya-e0806n0:59_2: tesaṃ tesaṃ dhammānaṃ sabhāvasarasalakkhaṇaṃ tathaṃ āgato yathāvato adhigato’yegatyatthā
anya-e0806n0:59_3: te buddhyatthā, ye buddhyā te gatyatthā’titathāgatoti evamādiṃ saṅgaṇhāti, tatthatatthāti
anya-e0806n0:59_4: tesu tesu dīghāgamādīsu, tathāgatabhāvoti tathāgatoti bhavanaṃ nipphatti namassanakiriyābhisambandhāti’namassitvā’ti
anya-e0806n0:59_5: ettha namassanakiriyāya abhisambandhā iminā tathāgatādīnaṃ kammattaṃ vibhāveti, namassanakiriyāvisesanattāti
anya-e0806n0:59_6: ‘namassitvā’ti namassanaṃ katvāti vuttaṃ nāma siyāti namassananti vuttanamassanakiriyāya
anya-e0806n0:59_7: visesanattā, bodhiyāti bodhivuccati catūsu maggesu ñāṇaṃ, taṃ bhagavā ettha pattoti
anya-e0806n0:59_8: (bodhi, tassā) bodhirukkhassāti attho, mūleti mūlasamīpe “yāva majjhanhike kāle chāyā
anya-e0806n0:59_9: pharati nivāte paṇṇāni patanti etāvatā rukkhamūlaṃ”tiādīsu viya, nanu aññepi khīṇāsavā
anya-e0806n0:59_10: ‘aggamaggene’ccādinā vakkhamāna nayena nipphannā evāti anuyogaṃ manasikatvā vuttaṃ
anya-e0806n0:59_11: ‘saheva vāsanāyā’ti, na hi bhagavantaṃ ṭhapetvā aññe saha vāsanāya kilese pahātuṃ
anya-e0806n0:59_12: sakkonti, etena aññehi asādhāraṇaṃ bhagavato arahattanti dasseti, teneva iddhasaddassa
anya-e0806n0:59_13: atthaṃ dassento’tepi hi’ccādikaṃ vakkhati, kāpanāyaṃ vāsanā nāma pahīnakilesassāpi
anya-e0806n0:59_15: pilindavacchassa vasalasamudācāranimittaṃ viya’, aggamaggenāti arahattamaggena, sabbakilese
anya-e0806n0:59_16: rāgādike, arahattaṃ aggaphalaṃ, sammuti upapattidevabhāvato aññena visuddhi devabhāvenātinipphannattā
anya-e0806n0:60_1: paricīyanti seyyattikehīti guṇā kappaccayena, tepīti sāvakapaccekabuddhāpi, hi saddo
anya-e0806n0:60_2: hetumhi, yasmā aggaṃ…pe… anūnaguṇā, tasmāti attho, sabbaññutādīnantiādikaṃ tesaṃ
anya-e0806n0:60_3: sabbaññubuddhehi ūnaguṇatāya hetuvacanaṃ, keci ‘siddho middhaguṇo assāti siddhamiddhaguṇanti
anya-e0806n0:60_4: duṭṭhamatthaṃ parikappetvā vākyamidaṃ dūsenti, te pana ‘middho nāma koci guṇo natthī’ti
anya-e0806n0:60_5: ca, ‘tathāgato nāma middha guṇo na hotī’ti ca, ‘tādiso ce siyā na ñāṇanissitapūjā
anya-e0806n0:60_6: pakatopayoginī bhavatī’ti ca ajānitvā vadatha tumhehi vatvā uyyojetabbā, maṅgalatthañcetthādo
anya-e0806n0:60_8: ca, dhammasaṅghānampīti iminā avayavena viggahepi samudāyassa samāsatthattā aññapadatthasamāsoyaṃ
anya-e0806n0:60_10: visesanabhūtānampi aññapadatthassa padhānattā, kiriyātisambandho vagamyate dhammasaṅghānaṃ
anya-e0806n0:60_13: āgamananti puttopi āgatoti patīyate, tatthāti niddhāraṇe sattadhī, attānanti dhammaṃ
anya-e0806n0:60_14: dasseti, dhārenteti attani ṭhapente pavattente uppādente, cattāropi apāyā sāmaññavasena’apāye’ti
anya-e0806n0:60_15: vuttā, kilesavaṭṭa kammavaṭṭa vipākavaṭṭavasena tayo vaṭṭā, tesu dukkhaṃ, tasmiṃ,
anya-e0806n0:60_16: dhāretīti vuttadhāraṇaṃ nāma atthato apāyādinibbattakakilesaviddhaṃsanaṃ, tañca yathārūpaṃ
anya-e0806n0:60_18: navannampi, te samadhigamahetutāya dhammoyeva nāmāti ‘dasā’tiādi vuttaṃ, tattha kāraṇamāha-
anya-e0806n0:60_20: sīlena ariyāya ca diṭṭhiyā samānabhāvena, ariyānañhi sīladiṭṭhiyo maggenāgatattā
anya-e0806n0:60_21: sabbathā samānāva, tena te yatthakatthaci ṭhitāpi sahagatāvāti saṃhatoti imasmiṃ
anya-e0806n0:60_22: atthe saṅghoti padasiddhi daṭṭhabbā, adhippetavasena panetaṃ vuttaṃ, lokiyasīladiṭṭhiyā
anya-e0806n0:61_0: Atha kete saddā, yesamidaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ bhāsissanti paṭiññātanti āha-‘saddā ghaṭapaṭādayo’ti,
anya-e0806n0:61_1: ādisaddena rukkhādayo, nanu santi meghasaddasamuddasaddādayopīti na niratthakānamidhānupayogittā,
anya-e0806n0:61_2: ye lokasaṅketānurodhenātthappakāsakā tesaṃ sātthakāname vidaṃ lakkhaṇanti, apica
anya-e0806n0:61_3: ‘saddā ghaṭapaṭādayo’ti vadanto vedikānaṃ viya unti ñatthi (potthake) ādīnaṃ anupubbīniyamāvatthānamasambhavā
anya-e0806n0:61_4: tadanukkamena nipphādiyamānanampi saddānaṃ lokiyattānabhivattanañca bodhetīti daṭṭhabbaṃ,
anya-e0806n0:61_5: nu tattha pakāsakatthaṃ saddassa samudāyavasena vā siyā paccekavaṇṇavasena vā, tattha
anya-e0806n0:61_6: yadi paccekavaṇṇā pakāsayeyyuṃ, ghaṭasadde ghakāroyeva ghaṭatthaṃ, pakāsayeyya, tathā
anya-e0806n0:61_7: cāññesamakārādīnamanattha katā siyā, atha samuditā pakāsayeyyuṃ, tadā vaṇṇānamuccāraṇānantaravināsittā
anya-e0806n0:61_8: samudāyoyeva na siyā, tathā sati katha matthaṃ saddo pakāsayatīti ce kamena sotacittādigahitakkhara
anya-e0806n0:61_9: pāḷiyā ca yo saddoti viññeyyo sātthako cittagocaro, cittagocarassāpi saddassa pana
anya-e0806n0:61_10: bālajanappabodhāya kappanāmattena pakatyādivibhāgato, na sabhāvenānvākhyānaṃ, tenāha-‘pakatyā’di
anya-e0806n0:61_11: ādi, nanu goiccādisādhusaddaniyame sati gotādayo asādhu saddāti viññāyanti gantabbamagganiyame
anya-e0806n0:61_12: agantabbamaggo viya, gotādi asādhusaddaniyame vā goiccādayo saddā sādhavoti agantabbamagganiyame
anya-e0806n0:61_13: gantabbamaggo viya, kiṃ saddānamanvākhyānenā tidamāsaṅkiya payojanamāha- ‘lakkhaṇābhidhānaṃce’ccādi,
anya-e0806n0:61_15: asati lakkhaṇābhidhāne, sakkatādītiādisaddena pākatādiṃ saṅgaṇhāti, bahuvidhattaṃ
anya-e0806n0:61_17: (4-121) māgadhānaṃ idanti atthe “ṇo”ti (4-34) ṇappaccaye māgadhā māgadhanti ca padanipphatti
anya-e0806n0:61_18: veditabbāti dassetumāha- ‘magadhesmi’ccādi, magadhesu viditātiādino adhippāyaṃ vivaritumāha-
anya-e0806n0:61_19: ‘idaṃ vuttaṃ hotī’tiādi, tattha idanti idāni vakkhamānaṃ māgadhaṃ…pe… hotīti etaṃ
anya-e0806n0:61_20: vuttaṃ hotīti magadhesu…pe… lakkhaṇaṃ māgadhanti vadatā pakāsitaṃ hotīti attho, hisaddo’magadhesvi’ccādinā
anya-e0806n0:61_21: vuttaṃ samatthayati, lakkhaṇaṃ visesayatāti saddalakkhaṇa saddassa uttarapadatthappadhānattā
anya-e0806n0:61_22: māgadhanti iminā lakkhaṇaṃ visesayatā byavacchedayatā vuttikārena, atthatoti sāmatthiyato,
anya-e0806n0:61_23: sadde ca visesito hotīti saddalakkhaṇasaddo māgadhe eva saddeeva (potthake) byavacchedito
anya-e0806n0:61_24: hoti, ayametthādhippāyo ‘magadhesu viditā māgadhāti sadde gahetvā tesamidaṃ māgadhanti
anya-e0806n0:61_25: māgadhasaddena yasmā saddalakkhaṇasadde lakkhaṇaṃ visesitaṃ, tasmā saddalakkhaṇasadde
anya-e0806n0:61_26: saddo yadi amāgadho kathaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ māgadhaṃ siyāti sāmatthiyā saddopi visesito
anya-e0806n0:61_27: hotī’ti, nanu māgadhanti lakkhaṇassa māgadha saddasambandhittajhāpanato saddalakkhaṇanti
anya-e0806n0:61_28: ettha saddasaddassa niratthaka tāpatti hotīti, na hoti gammamānatthassa saddassa
anya-e0806n0:61_29: payogampati kāmacārattā saddalakkhaṇasaddassa vā samāsatthe niruḷhattā “tatridaṃ
anya-e0806n0:61_30: sugatassa sugatacīvarappamāṇa”ntiādīsu viya, kopanātiādisaddalakkhaṇanti iminā abhidheyyasaṅkhātapayojanassa
anya-e0806n0:61_31: dassitattā tappayojanapucchanaparā codanā, vuccateccādi parihāro, yathā sabbathāttaparahitakāmena.
anya-e0806n0:62: Piyo ca garu bhāvanīyo, vattā ca vacanakkhamo;
anya-e0806n0:64: Vuttehi tato parehi ca pasatthatarehi guṇavisesehi samupetaṃ guruṃ.
anya-e0806n0:67_2: tathā aviññātaṃ saddalakkhaṇamanenāti aviññātasaddalakkhaṇo puggalo, hisaddo avadhāraṇe,
anya-e0806n0:67_3: so ‘dhammavinayesu kusalo na hotī’ti ettha daṭṭhabbo, kusalo dakkho na hoti, tattha
anya-e0806n0:67_4: dhammavinayesu suttantātābhidhammasaṅkhātesu dhammesu ceva vinaye ca, kasmā–
anya-e0806n0:68: Yo niruttiṃ na sikkheyya, sikkhanto piṭakattayaṃ;
anya-e0806n0:70_0: Vacanato, ayametthādhippāyo “yathā vuttanayena sambhūtapada byāmohavasena padatthepi
anya-e0806n0:70_1: byāmohasambhavato suttantopadassitāya diṭṭhiviniveṭṭhanāya ca abhidhammāgate nāmarūpaparicchede
anya-e0806n0:70_2: ca vinaya niddiṭṭhe saṃvarāsaṃvare ca akosallaṃ siyā”ti, yathādhammanti dhammavinaya
anya-e0806n0:70_3: saddassa yo-ttho vinayasuttābhidhammasaṅkhāto, tassa so-ttho, tadanatikkamena, paṭipajjitumasakkontoti
anya-e0806n0:70_4: tatthatattheva vuttāsu adhisīla adhicitta adhipaññāsikkhāsu pavattituṃ asamattho,
anya-e0806n0:70_5: kusalo pana samattho paññāvisesālokapaṭilābhato, vuttaṃ hi–
anya-e0806n0:71: Yāva tiṭṭhanti suttantā, vinayo yāva dippati;
anya-e0806n0:72: Tāva dakkhanti ālokaṃ, sūriye abbhuggate yathāti.
anya-e0806n0:73: Paṭipattinti paṭipajjīyatīti paṭipattīti yathāvuttaṃ tividhampi paṭipattiṃ, virādhetvāti nāsetvā, nassati hi paṭipatti tesuyevā ko sallatamagatattā, tathā cāhu–
anya-e0806n0:75: Tamo bhavissati loke, sūriye atthaṅgate yathāti.
anya-e0806n0:76_0: Saṃsāradukkhasseva bhāgī hoti… yathāvuttā-nukkamapariccāgena anurūpapaṭipattiyā paṭilabhitabbattā
anya-e0806n0:76_1: adhigamavisayassa visathattā (potthake) yo gakkhemassa, vuttañhi tassānulomapaṭipattimūlakattaṃ–
anya-e0806n0:77: Suttante rakkhite sante, paṭipatti hoti rakkhitā;
anya-e0806n0:78: Paṭipattiyaṃ ṭhito dhīro, yogakkhemā na dhaṃsatīti.
anya-e0806n0:79_0: Etāvatā aviññātasaddalakkhaṇassa sakatthaparihāniṃ dassetvā idāni sakatthasampattimūlikā
anya-e0806n0:79_1: paratthasampattīti tadabhāvā tādiso puggalo paresampi paccayo bhavituṃ na sakkotīti
anya-e0806n0:79_2: dassetuṃ ‘nacā’tiādi vuttaṃ, patiṭṭhāti dhāraṇaṃ, tañcettha tesaṃ tesaṃ kula puttānaṃ
anya-e0806n0:79_3: dhammavinayasikkhāpanaṃ taṃtaṃ kammato nittharaṇādi ca, tadubhaya mevā-nhasaṅgikaṃ
anya-e0806n0:79_4: patiṭṭhaṃ, mukhyabhūtampana tammūlake suparisuddhasīle patiṭṭhāpanameva, tadupakaraṇattho
anya-e0806n0:79_5: sikkhāpanādi, idha pana taṃ sādhanabhūto puggalo upacārato patiṭṭhāti gahetabbo,
anya-e0806n0:79_6: hisaddo yathāvutta samatthanatthe nipāto, saddalakkhaṇaññūyevāti avadhāraṇampana
anya-e0806n0:79_7: tesu tabbidūyeva samatthoti dassanatthaṃ pakaraṇavasena vuttaṃ, attano pana suguttasīlakkhandhavirahena
anya-e0806n0:79_8: kadāci koci yathāvuttānaṃ patiṭṭhābhavituṃ na sakkoti… tammūlakattā saddhammaṭṭhitiyā
anya-e0806n0:79_9: saparapatiṭṭhā bhāvassa ca, teneva vinayadhare ānisaṃsaṃ dassentena bhagavatā tappadhānaṃ
anya-e0806n0:79_10: tappamukhaṃva katvā “pañcime bhikkhave ānisaṃsā vinayadhara puggale, katame pañca
anya-e0806n0:79_11: attano sīlakkhandho sugutto hoti su rakkhito, kukkuccapakatānaṃ paṭisaraṇaṃ hoti,
anya-e0806n0:79_12: visārado saṅgha majjhe viharati, paccattthike sahadhammena suniggahitaṃ niggaṇhāti,
anya-e0806n0:79_13: saddhammaṭṭhitiyā paṭipanno ca hotī”ti vuttaṃ, atthānurūpanti attano vacanīyassatthassa
anya-e0806n0:79_14: vācakattena yogyaṃ, byañjanānurūpanti attano vācakassa vacanīyattena yogyaṃ, parivāsādīsūtiādisaddena
anya-e0806n0:79_15: abbhānādiṃ saṅgaṇhāti, taṃtaṃkammanti parivāsādikaṃ taṃtaṃkammaṃ, aññoti asaddalakkhaṇaññū,
anya-e0806n0:79_16: na kevalamanena sakatthaparatthāva nāsitā, atha khoti vidho saddhammopi nāsitoyevāti
anya-e0806n0:79_17: vatthumāha ‘ajānanto panā’tiādi, ayathāpaṭipajjamānoti saddalakkhaṇaññunā yathā yena
anya-e0806n0:79_18: pakārena atthānurūpaṃ byañjane byañjanānurūpañca atthe paṭipajjitabbaṃ, tathā appaṭipajjamāno,
anya-e0806n0:79_19: tathā ca vakkhati– tathā hi so saddalakkhaṇa majānanto’tiādi. Tividhampi saddhammanti
anya-e0806n0:79_21: pariyattisaddhammo nāma, terasa dhutaguṇā cuddasa khandhakavattāni dve asīti mahāvattānīti
anya-e0806n0:79_22: ayaṃ paṭipattisaddhammo nāma, cattāro maggā cattāri ca phalāni ayaṃ adhigamasaddhammo
anya-e0806n0:79_23: nāma, tathāhiccādinā vuttamatthaṃ samattheti, tampi pāḷiyā thirīkātuṃ ‘vuttaṃ heta’ntiādimāha,
anya-e0806n0:79_24: tattha dhammāti hetū, saddhammassāti yathāvuttassa tividhassa saddhammassa, padabyañjananti
anya-e0806n0:79_25: padañca byañjanañca taṃ, tattha padaṃ nāma syādyantaṃ tyādyantañca, byañjīyati attho
anya-e0806n0:79_26: etenāti byañjanaṃ-vākyaṃ athavā pajjate gamyate attho etenāti padaṃ-syādyantādi,
anya-e0806n0:79_27: vākyaṃva byañjanaṃ, sithiladhanitādipadamevavā vuttanayena byañjananti padabyañjanaṃ,
anya-e0806n0:79_28: taṃ, dunnikkhittaṃ duṭṭhu nikkhittaṃ ṭhapitaṃ virādhetvā kathitaṃ, attho ca dunnītoti
anya-e0806n0:79_29: dunnikkhittattāyeva padabyañjanassa tabbacanīyopi duṭṭhuviññāto hoti, vuttapaṭipakkhatoti
anya-e0806n0:79_31: bhāvappadhāno hi ayaṃ niddeso,ttappaccayalopo vā, na hi attāva attanā veditabboti yuttanti.
anya-e0806n0:80_0: Tadevantiādinā yathāvuttaṃ nigametvā saññāvidhāne payojanaṃ dasseti, tanti hetvatthe
anya-e0806n0:80_1: nipāto, yasmā saddalakkhaṇassa jānanaṃsāni saṃsaṃ tasmāti attho, evanti nidassanatthe
anya-e0806n0:80_2: nipāto, evaṃ sappayojananti sambandho, tadevanti vā nipātasamudāyo yaṃ, vuttena pakārenetyasmiṃ
anya-e0806n0:80_3: atthe vattate. Nanuca saññīnaṃ saññānaṃ vattabbatte “aādayo titālīsavaṇṇā”tiādīnaṃ
anya-e0806n0:80_4: vākyānaṃ visuṃvisuṃ mahantattā kuto lāghavaṃ satthassāti maññamāno ‘tathāhi’ccādinā
anya-e0806n0:80_5: saññāvidhāne lāghavasabbhāvaṃ samattheti, hotevāti avadhāraṇena katthaci parasatthe
anya-e0806n0:80_6: viya no na hotīti dasseti, paṭipattilāghavampi cettha hoteva, tathāhi “vaṇṇaparena
anya-e0806n0:80_8: pucchitvā jānitabbā assa, tato saññā-vaseyā, tatossa saññāti saññāsaññīvivecanaṃ
anya-e0806n0:80_9: tadanuṭṭhānanti paramparāpekkhāya bhavitabbaṃ paṭipatti gāravābhāvā. Idāni saṅkhepato
anya-e0806n0:80_10: satthakkamaṃ dassetumāha-evaṃ tāvi’ccādi, tāvāti paṭhamaṃ, upayujjamānattāti byāpāriyamānattā,
anya-e0806n0:80_11: visayo gocaro yatthete syādayo vidhī yante, saha visayenāti savisayā, paṭhamaṃ karīyatīti
anya-e0806n0:80_12: pakati yato syādayo vidhīyante, saha pakatiyāti sappakatikā, liṅgādikanti ādisaddena‘salabhacchāya’miccādo
anya-e0806n0:80_13: ekattādi, liṅgebhavā liṅgikā-itthividhayo, ekatthībhāvo samāso, tena, sāmaññato samānattā,
anya-e0806n0:80_14: samānattantuṇādivuttiyā “rājādivisiṭṭhe purisā doviya’vasiṭṭhādivisiṭṭhe apaccādimhi atthe pavattanato.
anya-e0806n0:86_1: sātthakattamassa dassetuñca ‘na tāva…pe… sātthakattā’ti vuttaṃ, ummattakādivākyamiti
anya-e0806n0:86_2: ‘dasa dāḷimā, cha apūpā, kuṇḍamajājinaṃ, palālapiṇḍo’iccādikaṃ, avayavatthāna maññamaññanāti
anya-e0806n0:87_0: Atha aādyādisaddānaṃ sādhuttānvākhyānāya idaṃ vacanamiccādivikappantarasambhave kathaṃ
anya-e0806n0:87_1: niyamo vuttiyaṃ vuttenatthena sātthakattamiccāsaṅkiya tesamihānupayogittaṃ kamena
anya-e0806n0:87_3: vuttiyaṃ vakkhamāno attho yassa taṃ tathā vuttaṃ, sādhūnaṃ sādhusaddānaṃ anusāsanaṃ
anya-e0806n0:87_4: ākhyānaṃ attho payojanaṃ yassa tanti viggaho.
anya-e0806n0:88_1: sādhuttānusāsanassa dassanato, lakkhaṇantarena sādhubhāvassa anvākhyātattāti āpubbādāiccasmā
anya-e0806n0:88_2: “dādhātvī”ti (5-45) ippaccaye ākāralope ca ādīti aādiyesanti aññapadatthasamāse yomhi
anya-e0806n0:88_3: “yosu jhissa pume”ti (2-93) ‘ṭe aādayo’ti, tayo ca cattālīsā cāti cattha samāse “tadaminādīni”ti
anya-e0806n0:88_4: cata lopeca rasse ca titālīsāti, ‘vaṇṇa-vaṇṇane’iccasmā “bhāvakārakesva ghaṇa ghakā”ti
anya-e0806n0:88_5: (5-44) appaccayeyomhi ṭādese vaṇṇāiti ca sijjhanato, payoganiyamatthanti titālīsavaṇṇasaddesu
anya-e0806n0:88_6: paresu eva aādisaddo payujjīyatīti evaṃ payoganiyamatthaṃ, ayampi vikappantara sambhāvanā
anya-e0806n0:88_7: “abhūtatabbhāve karāsabhūyoge vikārā cī”ti (4-119) payoganiyamassā jhāyamānassa diṭṭhattā,
anya-e0806n0:88_8: ṭhānyādesatthanti aādisaddassa ṭhāne titālīsavaṇṇasaddā ādesā honti tesaṃ vā so iti,
anya-e0806n0:88_9: tadanurūpāyāti ṭhānyādesānurūpāya chaṭṭhī vibhattiyā, atoyevāti agamāgamianurūpāya
anya-e0806n0:88_10: chaṭṭhiyā abhāvato yeva, agamāgami bhāvatthanti aādisaddassa titālīsa vaṇṇasaddā
anya-e0806n0:88_11: āgamā honti tesaṃ vā so iti, etesupi saṅkā, “yavāsare” (1-30) “suña sassa”iti (2-53)
anya-e0806n0:88_12: ādesāgamānaṃ dassanena, āgama liṅgābhāvatoti ukāra kakāra makārānaṃ abhāvato, visesanavisessa
anya-e0806n0:88_13: bhāvatthanti titālīsavaṇṇasaddānaṃ aādisaddo visesanaṃ, te vā tasse-ti, etthāpi saṅkā
anya-e0806n0:88_15: saddalakkhaṇena saddasaṅkharaṇassa pakatattā vuttaṃ, tattha kāraṇamāha- ‘rūpavisesūpa
anya-e0806n0:88_16: lakkhaṇābhāvā’ti, rūpavisesassa upalakkhaṇa nimittaṃ tassaabhāvāti attho, na hi visesana
anya-e0806n0:88_17: visessabhāve paṭipādite aādyādisaddānaṃ rūpavisesassa saṅkharaṇaṃ kataṃ siyāti, yadi
anya-e0806n0:88_18: esova saddasaṅkharaṇanti gayheyya, tathā sati ‘nīluppala’miccādīnampi vattabbatā
anya-e0806n0:88_19: āpajjeyyāti nāssa tadattha tāpi sambhāvīyate, loke sīhaguṇassa mānavake dassanato
anya-e0806n0:88_20: upacārena ‘sīho-yaṃ mānavako’ti tagguṇajjhāropopi dissati, tadatthampetaṃ na hotīti
anya-e0806n0:88_21: dassanatthaṃ ‘tagguṇajjhāropanatthampetaṃ na hotī’ti vuttaṃ, tassa aādisaddassa,
anya-e0806n0:88_22: tesaṃ titālīsavaṇṇasaddānaṃ vā guṇo aādittādi, tassa ajjhāropanaṃ-titālīsavaṇṇasaddesu
anya-e0806n0:88_23: vā aādisaddeyeva vā āropanaṃ, tadatthampetaṃ suttaṃ na hotīti attho, tattha kāraṇamāha-
anya-e0806n0:88_25: yathāvutta vikappantarābhāve ubhayatthamidaṃ siyā, tattha paribhāsatthaṃ na hoti…
anya-e0806n0:91_0: Mariyādattho ettha ādisaddoti āha-‘ādimariyādā bhūto’ti, upalakkhaṇattāti upalakkhiyamānānamākārādīnaṃ
anya-e0806n0:91_2: kāriyenāti vaṇṇasaññābhavanādinā, na gunnampi ānayanaṃ bhavati..gunnamupasajjanīya
anya-e0806n0:91_3: bhūtattā aññapadatthasseva padhānattā, saññāyā bhāveti akārassa vaṇṇasaññāya abhāve,
anya-e0806n0:91_6: yogavibhāgena, itarathā byañjanaparasseva rassatte dassite titālīsaiti abyañjane
anya-e0806n0:91_7: padaṃ na sampajjeyyāti viññāyati, itarītarayogacatthe bahuvacanena bhavitabbanti
anya-e0806n0:91_8: āha-‘ekavacanampanā’tiādi, vippaṭipatti aññathābhāvo, rassa e okārehi tecattālīsakkharānanti
anya-e0806n0:91_9: sambandho, e okāre hīti sahatthe tatiyā, sakkatānusārenāti sakkate “sandhi yakkharānaṃ
anya-e0806n0:91_10: rassā na santī”ti vuttassa anusārena, kocīti sā sanappasādakacoḷiyabuddhappiyācariyaṃ
anya-e0806n0:91_11: dasseti, na hiccādiṃ vadato-yamadhippāyo ‘rassāivāti ivasaddo sādhammopamājotako
anya-e0806n0:91_12: vā siyā vedhammopamājotako vā, yadi tāva vedhammopamājotako, rassadhammassa e okāresva
anya-e0806n0:91_13: sambhavā tesaṃ dīghakālappavattito te dīghāyeva siyuṃ, yadi pana sādhammopamājotako,
anya-e0806n0:91_14: tesu rassadhammassasambhavā rassakālappavattito rassāeva te siyunti ‘etthātiādīsu
anya-e0806n0:91_15: e okārānaṃ uccāraṇakālakataṃ rassattameva hotī’ti, rassakālavantoyevāti evasaddo
anya-e0806n0:91_16: sogate vaṇṇavinimmuttassa kālassevābhāvā vaṇṇānañca paccakkha siddhattā pamāṇasiddhaṃ
anya-e0806n0:91_17: pāramatthika me okārānaṃ rassakālavantataṃ dīpeti, atthāti vadato panāyamadhippāyo
anya-e0806n0:91_18: ‘etthātiādīsu yadi ekārādayo dīghāeva saṃyogapubbattā rassāva siyuṃtathā sati atthāti
anya-e0806n0:91_19: etthāpi dīghova ākāro saṃyogapubbattārasso iva uccatīti āpajjeyya, tasmā uccāraṇakālakatova
anya-e0806n0:91_20: rassadīghabhāvo gahetabbo’ti, kaccāyanavuttivaṇṇanā ñāso, taññāpaneti bahiddhā aññesamakkharānaṃ
anya-e0806n0:91_21: ñāpane, payojanābhāvāti tena sādhetabbassa kassaci iṭṭhassa abhāvamāha, kimettha
anya-e0806n0:91_22: samudāye vākyaparisamatti, udāhu avayaveti āha- ‘pacceka’nti, aññathā ‘rukkhā vana’ntiādīsu
anya-e0806n0:91_23: viya samudāye vākyaparisamattiyaṃ “iyuvaṇṇā jhalā namassante” (1-9) iccādikaṃ na
anya-e0806n0:91_24: sijjhatīti, paccekaṃ vaṇṇā nāmahontīti akāro vaṇṇo nāma hoti ākāro vaṇṇo nāma hotītiādinā,
anya-e0806n0:91_25: avayaveccādinā vuttiyaṃ avuttepi ‘pacceka’nti vacane sadiṭṭhantaṃ kāraṇamāha, diṭṭhantopanīto
anya-e0806n0:91_26: tyattho sukhena paṭipattuṃ sakkāti, ettha hi paccekanti avuttepi devadatto bhojīyatūtiādinā
anya-e0806n0:91_27: paccekaṃ bhuñjikiriyā parisamāpīyate, tenāha-‘na coccate’ iccādi, athavā samudāyepi
anya-e0806n0:91_28: vākyaparisamā pattiyaṃ sati samudāye pavattā saddā avayavesupi vattantīti ‘samuddekadesadassanepi
anya-e0806n0:91_29: samuddo diṭṭho, khandhekadesa bhūtāyapi paññāya paññākkhandhotiādīsu viya na doso,
anya-e0806n0:91_30: teneva vuttiyaṃ ‘pacceka’nti na vuttaṃ, vaṇṇasaddassa guṇādyanekatthattepi pakaraṇato
anya-e0806n0:91_31: akārādayovettha vuccantīti āha-‘vaṇṇīyati’ccādi, pakaraṇatopi attho vibhajjate, vuttaṃ hi–
anya-e0806n0:94_0: Nanu jhalādisaññā viya lahusaññaṃ akatvā kasmā gurusaññā katāti codanaṃ manasi nidhāya
anya-e0806n0:94_1: ruḷhi anvatthavasena dvippakārāsu saññāsu jhālāti ruḷhi saññātthābhāvena vohārasukhamattapayojanā,
anya-e0806n0:94_2: anvatthasaññā pana tappayojanāpi hoti tadaññappayojanā pīti dassetumāha- ‘eva’miccādi,
anya-e0806n0:94_3: vaṇṇīyatī attho etehīti vuttamatthaṃ anugatā anugatatthā vaṇṇasaññā taṃ, saddādhigamanīyassāti
anya-e0806n0:94_4: saddena viññātabbassa, vaṇṇaṃ mūlamassāti vaṇṇamūlako-attho, tassa bhāvo vaṇṇamūlakatā,
anya-e0806n0:94_5: atthassa vaṇṇamūlakataṃ sādheti ‘sāpi’ccādinā, vaṇṇaṃ rūpaṃ sabhāvo etesanti vaṇṇarūpāni-padāni,
anya-e0806n0:94_6: samudāyo pādānaṃ rūpamassāti samudāyarūpaṃ vākyaṃ, vibhatyantamatthajotakaṃ padaṃ,
anya-e0806n0:94_7: padasamudāyo vākyaṃ, sabbañcetamupacārena vaṇṇasaddavacanīyattaṃ gacchati vaṇṇamayattāti
anya-e0806n0:94_8: sabbopi sammutiparamatthabhedabhinno attho vākyādhigamanīyo vaṇṇeneva viññāyati nāma
anya-e0806n0:94_9: tasmā yathā vuttamattha visesadassanaṃlahusaññāya na sakkāti tadatthamakārādīnaṃ
anya-e0806n0:94_10: gurubhūtā vaṇṇasaññā katāti adhippāyo, sammuti saṅketavasena pavatto vohāro, paramattho
anya-e0806n0:94_11: sanibbāno pañcakkhandho. Ubhohi panetehi bhinno tatiyo koṭṭhāso nāma natthi, tathāca vuttaṃ–
anya-e0806n0:95: Duve saccāni akkhāsi, sambuddho vadataṃ varo,
anya-e0806n0:100_0: “Ādayo titālīsa vaṇṇā” “titālīsādayo vaṇṇā”ti vā vattabbanti na tathā sati sandiddhaṃ
anya-e0806n0:100_1: suttaṃ siyāti, nanu satthādo maṅgalavacanena bhavitabbaṃ, akāro paṭisedhatthopi hotīti
anya-e0806n0:100_2: (na) satthādo siddhasaddassopahitattā, atha hotva pubbā jhālādi saññā, saddasādhanamattappayojanattā
anya-e0806n0:100_3: pana sabbavidhānassa pubbācariya saññāvālametthāti kiṃ punāpi vaṇṇādisaññāvidhānena
anya-e0806n0:100_4: ganthagārava karaṇenāti saccametaṃ, pubbācariyesu pana gāravaṃ tadanugamanañca dīpetuṃ
anya-e0806n0:100_5: kāci saññāyopyanvākhyāyante, yajjevaṃ saṃyogasabbanāmalopādayopi saññā pubbācariyehi
anya-e0806n0:100_6: vuttā vattabbāti nanu bho vuttamevāmhehi’kāci saññāyo ākhyāyante’ti, kintadākhyānadvārena
anya-e0806n0:100_7: bhavatā tāpi viññātuṃ na sakkāti, kesañci sātthakattopi pativaṇṇamatthānupaladdhito
anya-e0806n0:100_9: hotevākārādito vibhatti, lopena niddiṭṭhattā panassā assavanaṃ sannikaṃsavacanicchābhāvā
anya-e0806n0:100_10: saṃhitāyāniddeso, anukkamoti ādonissayā sarāvuttā, tato nissitā byañjanā, saresupi
anya-e0806n0:100_11: ekaṭṭhāniyā akārādayo bahuttā paṭhamaṃ vuttā ṭhānānukkamena, tato dvijā ṭhānānukkamena,
anya-e0806n0:100_12: tesupi rassāva lahuttā paṭhamaṃ vuttā, tato dīghā, byañjanesupi vaggā bahuttā ṭhānappaṭipāṭiyā
anya-e0806n0:100_13: paṭhamaṃ vuttā, tato yakārādayo, vaggesu ca aghosā paṭhamaṃ vuttā, tato ghosā, tesu
anya-e0806n0:100_14: ca sithilā paṭhamaṃ vuttā, tato dhanitā, tatthāpi appakattā dvijā pañcamā vuttā,
anya-e0806n0:100_15: tato yaralavā ghosabhūtā ṭhānānukkamena, tato dhanitā sakāraha kārā, tesupihakāro
anya-e0806n0:100_16: kesañci orasopi hotīti dvijattā pacchā vutto, kehici “laḷānamaviseso”ti dvinnamavisese
anya-e0806n0:100_17: vuccamānepi lipibhedena ṭhānabhedena ca bhinnattā ḷakāro visuṃ akkharabhāvena gahito,
anya-e0806n0:100_18: sopi ghosabhāvena ṭhānānukkamenaca hakārato paraṃ vutto niggahītaṃ pana sarattādisabbavinimmuttattā
anya-e0806n0:100_19: sabbapacchā vuttanti akārādīnamayamanukkamo, imassevānukkamassa manasi vipassa vattamānattā
anya-e0806n0:100_20: titālīsāti gaṇanāparicchedassa dassitattā ca ‘niggahītantā’ti vuttiyaṃ vuttaṃ, pakataṃ
anya-e0806n0:100_21: sādhusaddānvākhyānaṃ, na vaṇṇīyate, ti saddasaṅkharaṇa saṅkhāta mukhyappayojanābhāvā,
anya-e0806n0:100_22: kiñcāpi na vaṇṇīyate, amhehi pana kathamakārādīnamayamanukkamo uppannoti sissānaṃ
anya-e0806n0:100_23: kaṅkhā vicchedappayojanampati anukkamasaddassa atthakathanabyājena vaṇṇito yevāti,
anya-e0806n0:100_24: karīyante uccārīyante etenāti karaṇaṃ, tattha jivhāmajjhaṃ tālujānaṃ, jivhopaggaṃ
anya-e0806n0:100_25: muddhajānaṃ, jivhaggaṃ, dantajānaṃ sesānaṃ sakaṭṭhānaṃ karaṇaṃ, payatti payatanaṃ,
anya-e0806n0:100_26: tampana vaṇṇuccāraṇato abbhantaro bāhiyo ca ussāho, tattha abbhantarapayatanaṃ-saṃvutattamakārassa,
anya-e0806n0:100_27: vivaṭattaṃ sarānaṃ sakārahakārānañca phuṭṭhattaṃ vaggānaṃ, īsaṃphuṭṭhattaṃ yaralavānaṃ,
anya-e0806n0:100_29: payojanasambhavā āha-‘ṭhānampanā’tiādi, tiṭṭhanti ettha uppattivasena vaṇṇāti ṭhānaṃ,
anya-e0806n0:100_30: “e onama vaṇṇe”ti (1-37) sutte vaṇṇeti kathanameva vaṇṇasaññākaraṇe payojanaṃ, yathāvuttamatthamaññatra
anya-e0806n0:100_32: kvattho kasmiṃ sutte payojanaṃ taṃ dasseti “sarolopo sare”ccādī’ti evamādinā attho
anya-e0806n0:100_33: daṭṭhabbo, ñāpeti vaṇṇalopanti ñāpakaṃ, kasmā pana’so cemināva ñāpakena siddho’ti
anya-e0806n0:100_34: vuccati nanu ‘tadaminādīni”ti (1-47) suttaṃ dissatīti, (saccaṃ) tathāpi pakārantaroyampi
anya-e0806n0:100_35: vaṇṇalope dassitoti viññātabbaṃ, evasaddo pana ‘yadi ñāpakena vaṇṇalopo siyā so imināva
anya-e0806n0:102_0: Nanu aādayoti paṭhamantenuvattante kathamettha’tatthā’ti sattamīniddiṭṭhatāti āha-‘tañcā’tiādi,
anya-e0806n0:102_2: sambajjhamāne cādhāratthena bhavitabbanti ādhāratthavasena sattamī vibhattiyā parivattanenāti
anya-e0806n0:102_3: attho, atthavasā sattamiyā vipariṇāmasambhavāyevasutte avijjamānepi‘tatthā’ti vuttiyaṃ
anya-e0806n0:102_4: vuttaṃ, ādodasannamanaññatthapavattisambhavato tesaṃ aādayo visayabhāvenapi sakkā
anya-e0806n0:102_5: parikappetunti vuttaṃ-‘tesu visayabhūtesū’ti, niddhāraṇatthopi yujjateva… vaṇṇasamudāyato
anya-e0806n0:102_6: tadekadesabhūtāna mādo vaṇṇānaṃ dasasaṅkhyāguṇena niddhāriyamānattā, ādimhi dasa
anya-e0806n0:102_7: vaṇṇāti vutte avuttānampi avassaṃ vattabbānaṃ ūnapūraṇatthamajjhāhāro hotīti vuttaṃ-
anya-e0806n0:102_8: avaṭṭhitā niddiṭṭhā vā’ti, ekādīna maṭṭhārasantānaṃ saṅkhyānaṃ saṅkhyeyye vattanato
anya-e0806n0:102_9: āha-‘dasasaṅkhyāya paricchinnattā’ti, gayhupagānaṃ rassae ovaṇṇānampi kaccāyane viya
anya-e0806n0:102_10: apariccāgā anūnā, agayhupagānaṃ tadaññesaṃ kesañci sarānaṃ pariccagā anadhikā, dasasaddassa
anya-e0806n0:102_11: saṅkhyeyya vuttittā dasannampi adhikatavaṇṇānaññattā vuttaṃ-‘dasannampī’tiādi, sayaṃ
anya-e0806n0:102_12: pubbā’rāja=cittiyaṃ’tīsmā kvimhi antalope samāse ca tadaminādittā niruttinayena vā
anya-e0806n0:102_13: sarasaddo nipphajjatīti, ‘sara-gatihiṃ sācintāsu’ iccasmā appaccayena vā nippajjatīti
anya-e0806n0:104_0: Teti’ādo’ti sattamyantattā apare dve parāmasati, heṭṭhā viyāti heṭṭhā vuttaṃ atthavasā
anya-e0806n0:104_1: vibhattivipariṇāmaṃ upameti, atova viññāyamānatthavasena tesu’ti vuttaṃ, tesuti pana
anya-e0806n0:104_2: niddhāraṇattavivacchāyaṃ tampi sambhavatīti tesaṃ vaṇṇānaṃ majjhe dvedveti dvisaṅkhyāya
anya-e0806n0:104_3: niddhāraṇatthopi veditabbo, vicchāyaṃ vutti yassa so vicchāvutti-dvisaddo, vicchāvuttitā
anya-e0806n0:104_4: cāssa savaṇṇattaguṇena dvinnaṃ (‘byāpitu) miṭṭhattā, kamenāvaṭṭhiteti iminā akārādivaṇṇappabandhassa
anya-e0806n0:104_5: anādikālasiddhaṃ kamasiddhattamāha. Nanu samānā vaṇṇā savaṇṇātyanvatthe savaṇṇasadde
anya-e0806n0:104_6: sati kataṃ rassadīghānaṃ savaṇṇasaññā siyā… asamānattā etesanti, netadatthivaṇṇappabandhassa
anya-e0806n0:104_7: kamasiddhattā vacanabalenevāsamānānampi hotevāti, nevampi vattuṃ yuttaṃ“dvedve savaṇṇā”ti
anya-e0806n0:104_9: Tiṭṭhanti ettha vaṇṇā cittajattepi abhibyatti vasenāti ṭhānaṃ kaṇṭhādi, tena katanti
anya-e0806n0:104_10: samāso, kaṇṭhatātu iti catte pāṇyaṅgattā napuṃsakattaṃ. Pañcamehi vaggapañcamehi.
anya-e0806n0:104_11: Antaṭṭhākīti vaggānamante tiṭṭhantīti antaṭṭhā, tāhi, yuttassāti brahmacariyā, guyha’ntiādīsu
anya-e0806n0:104_12: yuttassa. Kecīti aniyamena vuttaṃ, te pana–
anya-e0806n0:106: Oraso iti viññeyyo, kaṇṭhajo tadasaṃyuto”ti vadanti.
anya-e0806n0:108_0: Vattateti atthavasā vibhattivipariṇāmena vattate, nanu cetyādicodanā, nesadosoccādi
anya-e0806n0:108_1: parihāro, dosābhāve kāraṇa māha-‘yoyo…pe… patīyate’ti, vuttaṃ samatteti-‘nahi’ccādinā,
anya-e0806n0:108_2: nanu ca pubbasaddo yamekattā ekaṃ pubbamācikkhati na sakalanti kathaṃ “pubbo’ti vutte
anya-e0806n0:108_3: yoyoti ñāyati ‘yoyo pubbo’ti ca vutte ‘tesu dvīsu’ti ettha’dvīsu dvīsu’ti idaṃ kathaṃ
anya-e0806n0:110_0: Sesamiccādinā‘tesu dvīsūti savaṇṇasaññakesu dvīsu’ iccādi kamatidissati. Lahusaññā
anya-e0806n0:110_1: rassassa, saṃyogapubbassa rassassa dīghassa ca gurusaññā na vattabbā… uccāraṇavasenevānvatthasaññāti
anya-e0806n0:112_2: karaṇe anappaccaye rūpaṃ, napuṃsakattampissāvagamayituṃ ‘upakārakānī’ti vuttaṃ, byañjanattaṃ
anya-e0806n0:112_3: diṭṭhantena phuṭayati ‘yathā’iccādinā, yathā odanassupakārakāni sūpādīni byañjanāni,
anya-e0806n0:112_4: tathā sarānamupakārakānīti adhippāyo, byañjanampana addhamattikaṃ, vuttaṃ hi–
anya-e0806n0:117_0: Sajātyapekkhāya samudāyavācittepi kādayotī anuvattanato vaggasaddena kakhagaghañādayova
anya-e0806n0:117_1: gayhanti, pañca parimāṇamassa pañcakovaggo, “tamassa parimāṇaṃ ṇiko cā”ti (4-41)
anya-e0806n0:117_2: ko, sutte ādibhūto pañcasaddo pañcasaṅkhyāparicchedaṃ kurumāno māvasānānaṃ vaggānaṃ
anya-e0806n0:117_3: bahuttaṃ gametīti ‘pañcakā’ti vuttaṃ, vaggāti bahuvacanato paccekanti viññāyati,
anya-e0806n0:117_4: vajjenti yakārādayobhi vaggā, paṭhamakkharavasena pana kavaggādivohāro.
anya-e0806n0:119_0: Anekatthattā dhātūna muccāraṇatthopettha gaṇhātīti nipubbā tato kammanti ttappaccaye
anya-e0806n0:119_1: ññimhi pādisamāse dīgheca rūpaṃ dassento ‘rassā’tiādīmāha, pīḷanatthato niggahanaṃ
anya-e0806n0:119_2: niggaho, ‘i-ajjhena gatīsu’iccasmā kattari kammani-iti vattabbaṃ, itaṃ uccāritanti
anya-e0806n0:119_3: attho ttappaccaye itaṃ, niggahena itanti amādisa māse rūpaṃ dassento ‘karaṇaṃ niggahena
anya-e0806n0:121: Catthasamāsoti itarītarayogadvandasamāso. Atteti muni saddādivacanīye atthe, namatītīmassetaṃ kammaṃ,
anya-e0806n0:123: Taṃ sabbatthe namanato, viduṃ nāmanti tabbidū.
anya-e0806n0:124_1: syādyantapakatirūpanti paccayā paṭhamaṃ karīyatīti pakati, sā eva rūpanti pakatirūpaṃ,
anya-e0806n0:124_3: padaṃ padaṃ pati paṭipade, paṭipadaṃ niyuttaṃ pāṭipadikaṃ. Visesanenāti sutte ‘namassante’ti
anya-e0806n0:124_4: vuttena ivaṇṇuvaṇṇānaṃ visesanena. Ākhyātassāti pacatiādino. Ādimajjhavattinoti inda
anya-e0806n0:124_5: udakasaddādīnaṃ ādo, pakhumādīnaṃ majjheca vattino. Padesesūti “jhalā sassa no”ti
anya-e0806n0:124_6: (2-83) ādikesu suttappadesesu, aniṭṭhapasaṅga (saṅkaṃ) nivattetīti sambandho, aniṭṭhappasaṅgonāma
anya-e0806n0:124_7: nāmāti (potthake) pacati-inda (udaka pakhuma) saddādīna manta ādimajjhabhūtaivaṇṇādīnaṃ
anya-e0806n0:124_8: jhalasaññā vidhāya tato parāsaṃ sādi vibhattīnaṃ “jhalā sassa no”ti (2-81) ādīhi
anya-e0806n0:124_9: ‘no’ ādesādimhi kate ‘pacatino, indano, udakano, pakhumano’tiādi rūpappasaṅgo, nanucādiādi
anya-e0806n0:124_10: codanā. Vattabbanti sutte vattabbaṃ. Byāsaniddesenāti asamāsaniddesena. Tadayuttantiādi
anya-e0806n0:124_11: parihāro, tanti taṃ codyaṃ, satihītiādinā ayuttattaṃ samattheti, dvīsuttaresu yogesūti
anya-e0806n0:124_12: uparimesu “pitthiyaṃ” “ghā”ti dvīsu suttesu. Itthiyanti idanti “pitthiya”nti sutte
anya-e0806n0:124_13: itthiyanti idaṃ padaṃ. Vaṇṇavisesanaṃ siyāti “pitthiya”nti sutte ‘iyuvaṇṇā’ti anuvattanato
anya-e0806n0:124_14: ‘itthiyaṃ ivaṇṇuvaṇṇā’ti evaṃ ivaṇṇu vaṇṇā “gho”ti sutte ‘itthiyaṃ ā’tievaṃ avaṇṇassa
anya-e0806n0:124_15: ca visesanaṃ bhaveyya. Vaṇṇavisesane virodhamāha ‘evañce’ccādi, nāmassanteti asamāsaniddese
anya-e0806n0:124_16: tvavirodhamāha- ‘byāse’ccādi. Sakkānāmavisesanaṃ kātunti dvīsu suttesu itthiyantiādinā
anya-e0806n0:124_17: vakkhamānakkamena. Nāmassa anto nāmantoti samāsassa uttarapadatthappadhānattā samāse
anya-e0806n0:124_18: guṇībhūtassa nāmassa itthiyanti idaṃ visesanaṃ kātuṃ na sakkāti adhippāyo, vacanamantarenāti
anya-e0806n0:126: Kokilā kumudānī vo, pasevante vanaṃ jalaṃ” (260).
anya-e0806n0:129_0: Itthiyaṃ nāmassāti ca, ante ivaṇṇuvaṇṇāti ca vutte tesamā dhārādheyyasambandho ādheyyassādhāre
anya-e0806n0:129_1: pavattiṃ vinā na sambhavatīti ajjhāhāravasena ‘vattamānā’ti vuttiyaṃ vuttaṃ. Ivaṇṇu
anya-e0806n0:129_2: vaṇṇāti apekkhiya‘visesīyantī’ti bahuvacanametaṃ sambandhassa purisādhīnatāya nāmantīminā
anya-e0806n0:131_0: Itthiyaṃ nāmassanteti ca vattate. Heṭṭhā sabbattha saññino niddisiya saññāya niddiṭṭhattā
anya-e0806n0:131_1: tattha viya visuṃ saññino paṭhamamaniddese asanto viyāti dosalesamālambiya codayati
anya-e0806n0:131_2: nanhace’tyādinā. Tattha setoti vijjamānassa saññino. Kāriyenāti saññākāriyena. Pariharati
anya-e0806n0:131_3: ‘nāyaṃ doso’tiādinā. Pacchāvuttamattenāti “ghā”ti sutte kāriyino ākārassa pacchā
anya-e0806n0:131_4: vuttamattena. Nacāti ettha casaddo vattabbantarasamuccaye, aparampi kiñci vattabbamaniyamarūpamatthīti
anya-e0806n0:133: Āsaddo ābhimukhye, anabhimukhamabhimukhaṃ katvā lapanaṃ kathanamāla panaṃ, tasmiṃ ālapane, ālapanatthe vihito sīti attho.
anya-e0806n0:138_0: Vacanārambhayojanamāha–‘yaṃ visesanabhāvene’ccādi, yanti aniyamena “ato yonaṃ ṭāṭe”ti
anya-e0806n0:138_1: (2-43) ādīsu atotiādikaṃ visesanabhāvena vattumicchitaṃ parāmasati, tenāti vise sanattenu-pādiyamānena
anya-e0806n0:138_2: yaṃ saddaniddiṭṭhena atotiādikena karaṇabhūtena, yathākathañcitabbatoti ādo majjhe-nte
anya-e0806n0:138_3: vā sabbhāvato yenakenaci ākārena abhedopacārena akārādivisesanavato nāmādino, tadantatthanti
anya-e0806n0:138_4: taṃ atotyādi visesanamante, nādo na majjhe yassa taṃ tadantaṃ, taṃ attho payojanaṃ
anya-e0806n0:138_5: yassāti aññapadattho, vattāyattāti vattuno āyattā… attāvāttano vacane padhānanti,
anya-e0806n0:138_6: tassāti vattuno, sāti vacanicchā, payogānusā renāti jinavacanānusārena, itīti kāraṇatthe
anya-e0806n0:138_7: nipāto, iminā kāraṇenāti attho, na sabbatthappasaṅgoti saṃhitādividhimhi sabbattha
anya-e0806n0:138_8: tadanta vidhippasaṅgo na hoti, tathāhi “saro lopo sare”ti (1-26) ettha saroti visesanabhāvena
anya-e0806n0:138_9: vacanicchāya sabbhāve saroti tatrā’dīnaṃ visesananti yathākathañcisarādisaramajjhasarantānaṃ
anya-e0806n0:138_12: ‘ime’tiādinā vattabbatā āpajjeyyāti payogaṃ nānusaṭā nāmasiyunti na sabbattha tadanta
anya-e0806n0:138_14: ca yathāyogamavagantabbaṃ, vuttiyaṃ “ato yonaṃ ṭāṭe”ti suttodāharaṇaṃ dassitaṃ, “narā
anya-e0806n0:140_0: Vacanaphalamupadasseti‘yatthe’ccādinā, yattha yasmiṃ “saro lopo sare”tyādike sutte,
anya-e0806n0:140_1: sattamiyāti ‘sare’tiādinā sattamiyā, yassāti sarotiādinā niddiṭṭhassa, kāriyaṃ lopādi,
anya-e0806n0:140_2: sambandhā visesāti saretyādo opasilesikamadhikaraṇaṃ, tañcopasilese bhavamadhikaraṇaṃ
anya-e0806n0:140_3: pubbassa vā paraṃ siyā parassa vā pubbanti pubbaparopasi lesassāvisiṭṭhattā pubbaparānaṃ
anya-e0806n0:140_4: sambandhassa avisesā, parassāpīti na kevalaṃ pubbasseva, satītyasmiṃ atthe jotanīye
anya-e0806n0:140_5: sattamī saṃsattamī santasaddassa samādesena, sattañcetyādivacanamevaṃ sati ghaṭate,
anya-e0806n0:140_6: santi vā santasaddatthe pādi, sutte avuttepi vuttiyaṃ ‘niddese’ti vacane kāraṇamāha-sattañcā’tiādi,
anya-e0806n0:140_7: niddesamantarena sattaṃ na sambhavatīti sambandho, sattamiyā niddese satiyeva taṃ
anya-e0806n0:140_8: sambandhāya sattāya sambhavo, aññathā kimaññantassā patiṭṭhāti adhippāyo, pubbasaddassa
anya-e0806n0:140_9: sambandhisaddattā kinnissāya pubbattamiccāha-‘sattami’ccādi, tanti “saro lopo sare”ti
anya-e0806n0:140_10: suttaṃ, ukārassāti ‘veḷu’iccatra ukārassa, pubbassa…pe… karitvā taṃmanasikatañcodanaṃ
anya-e0806n0:140_11: dassetumāha-‘tamaha’nti ccāditi evamettha sājjhāhāro sambandho veditabbo. Pubbassāti
anya-e0806n0:140_12: sattamī niddiṭṭhato pubbassa, anantarassāti abyavahitassa, vuttaṃ kiñci natthīti
anya-e0806n0:140_16: byavahitepi payogadassane byavahitepi kāriyaṃ pappotī”ti bhassakārādayo vaṇṇenti,
anya-e0806n0:140_17: iha tādisavacanābhāvena vaṇṇādi byavadhānepi siyā”ti, sareccādiparihāravacane-dhippāya
anya-e0806n0:140_18: mubbhāvayati ‘yadipi’ccādinā, mathurāya pāṭaliputtakassa cāntarāḷe gāmādīnaṃ sabbhāvā
anya-e0806n0:140_19: byavadhānepi pubbasaddassa pavattiyā diṭṭhantamāha-‘mathurā’ iccādi, yasmā sareti
anya-e0806n0:140_20: opasilesikādhāre sattamyantaṃ padaṃ, tasmā byavadhāne saralopo na hotīti evaṃ saṅkhepabyākhyānena
anya-e0806n0:140_21: vuttiya mattho veditabbo, na kevalaṃ sareti etthevāti āha- ‘kāriye’ccādi, opasilesikeyevādhāre
anya-e0806n0:140_22: bhavatīti seso, kāraṇamāha-‘vatticchānhavidhānato saddassā’ti, vattuno yā icchā vacanicchā
anya-e0806n0:140_23: tassā anutūlena vidhānato atthassa kathanatoti attho,yena hi yamatthaṃ vattātidhātumicchati
anya-e0806n0:140_24: satīpyabhidhānasā matthiye na tato-ññamatthaṃ saddobhidadhātītyadhippāyo, vatticchā
anya-e0806n0:140_25: vasāye kāraṇamāha’vatticchāpi’ccādi, vattuno suttakārassa icchā vatticchā, kathamupadesato
anya-e0806n0:140_27: ato vakkhamānakāraṇā upadesato vasīyateti sambandho, kintaṃ kāraṇa miccāha-‘yasmā’iccādi,
anya-e0806n0:140_28: anvayasaddenettha gurupārampariyo-padeso vivacchito, yasmā kāraṇā anvayo gurupārampariyo
anya-e0806n0:140_29: padeso gurukulamupagamma pañhakaraṇādinā anvicchīyate gavesīyati, ato kāraṇā guruparamparā
anya-e0806n0:140_31: sāmatthiyampi vuccatetiseso, laghunopāyena saddānamupalakkhaṇe pavattīti byavahitanivattiyā
anya-e0806n0:140_32: vacanantaraka-raṇamanupannaṃ, upapannaṃ vacanantarakaraṇaṃ, tassa ca opasilesikādhāra
anya-e0806n0:140_33: mantarena aññathānupapattiyā ādhāravisesappaṭippattīti idamettha sāmatthiyaṃ, ādhārantareccādinā
anya-e0806n0:140_34: yathāvuttaṃ sāmatthiyaṃ vibhāveti, ādhārantarepīti sabbattha pāṭho dissati, pasaṅgābhāvato
anya-e0806n0:140_35: atthanta-renāpi ādhārantarepi opasilesikādhārepi vacanantarappasaṅgo siyāti sambandhasambhavā
anya-e0806n0:140_36: opasilesikādhāranissayanepi ānisaṃso na dissatīti samuccayatthenāpi natthi payojananti
anya-e0806n0:140_37: vajjetabbo yampi saddoti, nanu kimevaṃ vaṇṇīyate pubbasseveti vacana mevopasilesikamadhikaraṇaṃ
anya-e0806n0:140_38: viññāpayati… tattheva pubbaparatta sambhavāti yomaññate, tassesā kappanā na saṅgatāti
anya-e0806n0:140_40: ‘gaṅgāyaṃ ghoso’ti vutte ghoso gaṅgāyaṃ pubbo vā paro veti gammamānattā sāmīpikepyadhikaraṇe
anya-e0806n0:140_41: pubbaparattassa sambhavāti attho, etāvavuccateti pubbasseva hoti na parassāti ettakameva
anya-e0806n0:140_42: vuccate, tathāca vakkhati-‘kinta’ntiādi, adhikaṃ byavahitanivutyādi na vuccateti
anya-e0806n0:140_43: sambandho, ādisaddenettha chaṭṭhīpakappanā gahitā, chaṭṭhīpakappanāpi sāmattiyā katāti
anya-e0806n0:140_47: ‘tasmātyuttarassa chaṭṭhī niddiṭṭhe pubbassa chaṭṭhīti pubbassa kāriyittapaṭipādanayoggo
anya-e0806n0:140_48: chaṭṭhī tabbodhakapade bhavatityattho, eva dhuttarassetu vi. ujjotaṭīkā ti chaṭṭhīpakappanaṃ
anya-e0806n0:140_49: paṭipādenti ‘yasmiṃ sutte chaṭṭhīniddeso natthi, tattha chaṭṭhīpakappanāyathā siyā’ti,
anya-e0806n0:140_50: idha pana vacanantarābhāvepi yattha chaṭṭhīniddeso natthi, tattha sāmatthiyeneva
anya-e0806n0:140_52: paṭipajjateti sambandho, kāriyayo ganti kāriyasambandhaṃ, yathā “vagge vagganto”ti
anya-e0806n0:140_53: etthānuvattamānaṃ niggahīta’ntidaṃ chaṭṭhīyantaṃ viññāyate, kathaṃ vaggetesā sattamyakatatthā
anya-e0806n0:140_55: sattamiyaṃ pubbasse’ti tathetyavagantabbaṃ. Etāva vuccateti vutte idanti na viññāyateti
anya-e0806n0:140_56: āha ‘kinta’ntiādi, yadāhiccādinā pariyāyapasaṅgakkamaṃ dasseti. Kimidamuccate pariyāyappasaṅge
anya-e0806n0:140_57: niyamatthaṃ vacananti nanu pubbaparānaṃ yugapaduppattiya mācariyavacanappamāṇenāppaṭipattiyaṃ
anya-e0806n0:140_58: vijjhanatthaṃ vacananti kasmā nocca teccāha- ‘yugapadupasiliṭṭhāna’ntyādi, yugapadupasiliṭṭhānamasambhavoti
anya-e0806n0:142_0: Avadhibhāvenāti ‘ato’ccādinā avadhittena, yassāti yo ādino, kāriyanti ‘ṭāṭe’ādikaṃ,
anya-e0806n0:142_1: pubbaparāpekkhattenāvisesāti yathā- ‘gāmā devadatto’ti vutte so tato pubbo parogeti
anya-e0806n0:142_3: (2-41) vuccamāne ato pubbesaṃ yonaṃ athavā paresanti pubbaparāpekkhattenāvadhibhāvassāvisesāti
anya-e0806n0:142_4: maññate, pure viyātyanena sattamiyanti ettha vuttaṃ niddesavacane kāraṇamatidisati,
anya-e0806n0:142_5: vuttiyaṃ ‘narānamere’ti ettha apavādavippaṭisedhe satiparattā ṭāṭeādesānaṃ pavattiṃ
anya-e0806n0:142_6: “ādissā”ti ettha vaṇṇayissāma, atha kimiminā vacanena nanu yato yattha pañcamī niddeso
anya-e0806n0:142_7: tattha sabbattha “mānubandho sarānamantā paro” (1-21) tyato ‘paro’tyanuvattetuṃ sakkāti
anya-e0806n0:142_9: tato pubbesaṃ pasaṅgoyeva natthīti, netadatthi, paroti tyanuvattamānaṃ ‘ato’ti pañcamyantena
anya-e0806n0:142_10: sambajjhamānaṃ na koci vāretā atthīti parato-kārato pubbesampi yonaṃ ṭāṭeādesā pappontīti
anya-e0806n0:142_12: kiṃ ‘narānare’ tyudāhaṭanti ce, nesadoso, aññadatthaṃ kārīyamānamihā-pyatthavantaṃ
anya-e0806n0:142_13: hotīti, pubbako parihāroti byava hitanivattiyā pubbasutte vutto “saretopasilesikādhāro”ti
anya-e0806n0:142_14: parihāro, na sambhavatīti iha sattamiyā abhāvā na sambhavati, vacanānantaranti pāṇiniyānaṃ
anya-e0806n0:142_17: Anantaretivacanā paccāsattiyā nissayanaṃ viññāyate, katatthatāyāti vacanā jātiyātyāha-
anya-e0806n0:142_18: ‘paccāsatyā jātiṃ sannissāyā’ti jātiṃ sannissāya paccāsatyā karaṇabhūtāya nivattimāheti
anya-e0806n0:142_20: jātipadatthoceha nissīyateti dasseti, na hi kevalaṃ jātiṃ nissāya byavahitanivatti
anya-e0806n0:142_21: vattuṃ sakkā, tathāhi yadettha paccāsattiñāyo na nissito, tadā byāpanañāyena byavahite
anya-e0806n0:142_22: cābyavahite cāsajjatīti jātiyā nissayane satyapi byavahitepi byāpyamānā jāti kena
anya-e0806n0:142_23: nivārīyate nāpi kevalaṃ paccāsattinnissāya byavahitanivatti vattuṃ sakkā, tathāhyasati
anya-e0806n0:142_24: jātisannissayena byattinissīyate, byattiyañca padatthe paṭilakkhiyaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ pavattatīti
anya-e0806n0:142_25: paccāsatti ñāyanissayanepyabyavahitampati yaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ bhinnaṃ tadabyavahite pavattaṃ,
anya-e0806n0:142_26: yampana byavahitampati bhinnaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ, tañca vacanappamāṇato mābhavatvassa byatthatāti
anya-e0806n0:142_27: byavahitepi pavattate, tasmā ubhopi nissāya nīyāti. Visayadassanappasaṅge visayidassanamatthabyattikāraṇanti
anya-e0806n0:142_29: jātilakkhaṇoti abyavahitattajātisabhāvo, ‘osadhyo’ti ettha sakāre akārā parassa dhakārena
anya-e0806n0:142_30: byavahitassa yossa viyāvasesānampi sabbhāvato vuttaṃ-‘yoppabhutīna’nti, jāti sāmaññaṃ,
anya-e0806n0:142_31: yāvati visayeti gavādike yattake visaye, kāmacārato visaya parisamattiyā diṭṭhantamāha-‘taṃ
anya-e0806n0:142_32: yathe’ti, bhojayetīti ettha bhojayeitīti padacchedo, katohi jātyattho kasiṇoti yasmā
anya-e0806n0:142_33: sakalo brāhmaṇa jātisaṅkhāto attho parisamatto, tasmāti attho, idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti-
anya-e0806n0:142_34: ‘yāva diṭṭhambhojaye’ti vutte vuttena (potthake) santāya sāmaññavutti brāhmaṇasaddappayogasāmatthiyā
anya-e0806n0:142_35: paccekambhojanakiriyā katā nāma hoti, yato kasiṇopi jātyattho parisamatto nāmāti.
anya-e0806n0:142_36: “Byañjane dīgharassā”ti (1-33) sutte byañjaneti sattamī pubbassa dīghādividhimhi
anya-e0806n0:142_37: caritattā “saramhā dve”ti (1-34) ettha saramhāti pañcamyaka tatthā, tato pañcamīniddesassa
anya-e0806n0:142_38: balīyattaṃ, tato “sattamiyaṃ pubbassa” “pañcamiyaṃ parassā”ti dvinnaṃ parassa samuṭṭhāpane
anya-e0806n0:142_39: ‘byañjane’ti sattamī parassa kāriya yogitāya atthato vibhattivipariṇāmena chaṭṭhībhāvena
anya-e0806n0:142_40: pariṇamatī… dvinnaṃ suttānaṃ vippaṭisedhe parassa balī yattāvāti etādisasāmatthiyasabbhāvato
anya-e0806n0:144_0: Kiñci antassa sampattanti yaṃ ṭānubandhamanekavaṇṇaṃ na hoti, taṃ “chaṭṭhiyantasse”
anya-e0806n0:144_2: ṭānubandhamanekavaṇṇañca kāriyaṃ sabbassa pattaṃ. Yadantabhāvikāriyaṃtyādinā vacanaphalamupadassento
anya-e0806n0:144_3: ‘chaṭṭhīyantasse’tīmassāpavādo yaṃ yogoti dasseti, tassāyama pavādo hotu ṭānubandhādikāriyaṃ
anya-e0806n0:144_9: dasasadde-ntassa pattopi tadapavādattā “ādissā”tiādibhūtassa dakārassa hotīti āha ‘dakārassaro’ti.
anya-e0806n0:146_1: pāṇininā-antassa padassa vākyassa vā mābhavī’ti, iha tvanatthakaṃ vaṇṇaggahaṇaṃ byavacchejjābhāvāti
anya-e0806n0:146_2: dassetumāha-‘so ce’ tyādi, nanu brahmassāti visesanatthena vattumicchito mahābrahmasaddo
anya-e0806n0:146_4: pappoti, tathā sati ‘na hi chaṭṭhī niddiṭṭhassa antaṃ padaṃ vākyaṃ vā sambhavatī’ti
anya-e0806n0:146_5: kasmā vuttanti, vuccate- na visesanatthenākkhepamattena mahābrahmasaddo chaṭṭhī niddiṭṭho
anya-e0806n0:146_6: nāma bhavatīti na brahmasaddassa sabbassādesappasaṅgo, mahābrahmasadde vā brahmasaddo
anya-e0806n0:148_4: vajjane nīvāraṇe, panayane vā vattateti apodyante ussaggalakkhaṇāni vajjīyante nīvārīyante
anya-e0806n0:148_6: suttassa apavādo antāpavādo, ussajjate nivattīyatyapavādenetyussaggo, ussaggāpavādakkamo
anya-e0806n0:150_1: bravīti, paccekamabhisambandhoti so ṭakārānubandho cādesotiādinā, kassa sabbassa
anya-e0806n0:150_3: anubadhyate payoge asuyyamānepi payojanavasenānusarīyatītyanubandho, upadese yevopalakkhiya
anya-e0806n0:152_1: ādyantasaddānaṃ niyatavayavavācittā avayavassa cāvayavināmantarenā sambhavato sāmatthiyāvayavī
anya-e0806n0:152_2: lakkhīyati, chaṭṭhiyātyanuvuttito vāvayavāvayavisambandhesā chaṭṭhī, tāya niddiṭṭhassātyayamattho
anya-e0806n0:152_4: na dosā bhavantīti, atoyevāti tadavayavācittatoyeva, taggahaṇeneti avayavaggahaṇena,
anya-e0806n0:152_5: katākatappasaṅgittāti otte katepi akatepi vukāgamassa pasaṅgato, bhūyattattā hi ottassa
anya-e0806n0:152_6: bhūggahaṇe sati katepi otte vukāgamena bhavitabbamakatepi tatova “katākatappa saṅgī
anya-e0806n0:152_7: yo vidhi sanicco”ti niccattā ottaṃ bādhitvā vukāgamo hoti, atha vukāgame pacchā tena
anya-e0806n0:154_0: Yadiniddhāraṇe chaṭṭhī antassāvisesitattā avisesena yato kutoci antato bānubandho
anya-e0806n0:154_1: paro siyā, na hi dutiyaṃ saraggahaṇamatthi, yenānto visesīyateccāha-‘niddhāraṇa’miccādi,
anya-e0806n0:154_3: rundhatītetthadhakārassā numitassa maṃ na hotīti dīpeti, samāna jātiyasseva loke
anya-e0806n0:154_4: niddhāraṇappatīti hoticcāha-‘tathā hi’ccādi, yathā’kaṇhā gāvīnaṃ sampannakhīratamā’ti
anya-e0806n0:154_5: vutte avisesitattepi kaṇhāya kaṇhāgāvīyeva patīyate, tathehāpi sarānaṃ majjhe antātyantattena
anya-e0806n0:154_6: niddhāriyamāno samānajātiyo saroyeva patīyate, tena sarānaṃ yevāntāparo bhavissatīti
anya-e0806n0:154_7: bhāvo, visesanattoti “ñilatasse”ti (5-163) sutte assāti vutte ayameveti niyamābhāvā
anya-e0806n0:154_8: yassakassaci akārassa ñippatti, tenāniṭṭhappattīti lānusaṅgisseva assāti lassa yaṃ
anya-e0806n0:154_9: visesanattaṃ taṃ attho payojanamassa “kattarilo”ti (5-18) lakārassāti visesanattho
anya-e0806n0:156_0: Paroti vattate, so cāññādhikyaiṭṭhādyanekatthopi idha iṭṭha vācī daṭṭhabbo, kammabyatihāreghaṇiti
anya-e0806n0:156_2: (5-44) sāmaññena vihitattā vippaṭisedhananti atthe ghaṇi vippaṭī sedho, tenāha-‘sāmaññe’ccādi,
anya-e0806n0:156_5: loke virodhavācittena pasiddhattamāha ‘tathā hi’ccādinā, kathampana pamāṇabhūtassācariyassa
anya-e0806n0:156_6: vacanesu aññamaññavirodho sambhavatīccāsaṅkiya ubhinnaṃ sāvakāsatte sati sambhavati
anya-e0806n0:156_8: aññamaññenānakkante apariggahiteti vuttaṃ hoti, anubhayatāginīti yo visayekadeso
anya-e0806n0:156_9: ubhayanna bhajate tasmiṃ anubhayabhāgini visayekadese, sāmaññavisayo dvinnaṃ vidhīnaṃ
anya-e0806n0:156_10: sādhāraṇo visayo, tattha pavattippasaṅge sati soca vippaṭisedho jāyatīti sambandho,
anya-e0806n0:156_11: iminā vippaṭisedhassa visayo pavattippasaṅgo visayavisayīnamabhedena sutte ‘vippaṭisedho’tivuttoti
anya-e0806n0:156_12: ‘dvinna’miccādinā vuttigantho racitoti dīpeti, paro hotī tividhidassitoti iminā yadi
anya-e0806n0:156_13: niyamo-bbhūpagato siyā, tadā ‘parovahotī’ti vadeyyāti dasseti, pāṇiniyā hi jātiyaṃ
anya-e0806n0:156_14: padatthe sakimeva lakkhaṇaṃ pavattatīti caritatthattā visayantare dvinnampi lakkhaṇānamappavattiyaṃ
anya-e0806n0:156_15: paraṃ pacchimaṃ kāriyanti vidhyatthamidaṃ vacanaṃ, byattiyantu padatthe latvādīnamiva
anya-e0806n0:156_16: pariyāyappasaṅge niyamatthanti paṭipannā, idha pana jātiyaṃ byattiyañca dvinnampi
anya-e0806n0:156_17: suttānamappavattiyameva vidhyatthamevidaṃ vacanaṃ, na niyamatthampīti paṭipādetumāha-‘tathāhi’ccādi,
anya-e0806n0:156_18: kāmacārato parisamāpīyateti sambandho, kāmato parisamāpanañcetissā sabbasmiṃ attano
anya-e0806n0:156_19: gocare avicchedabyāpanena pavattisabbhāvato. Kathampanekassāpi pavatti na bhaveyyātyāsaṅkiya
anya-e0806n0:156_21: tatoyeva pamāṇaṃ, abhimatakāriyavidhāne liṅgabhāvena saddikānumatattā(tesaṃ) vidhīnaṃ
anya-e0806n0:156_22: vidhāyakañca tasmāti attho. Pamāṇattā dvinnampi appattiyaṃ kāraṇamāha-‘anubhayabhāgimhi’ccādi,
anya-e0806n0:156_23: yato laddhāvakāsā tato samānabalāti, itisaddo hetumhi, viruddhācāti ettha itisaddaṃ
anya-e0806n0:156_24: datvā ‘anubhayabhāgimhi…pe… viruddhācāti dvinnaṃ vacanānaṃ pamāṇattā ubhinnampi appavattīti
anya-e0806n0:156_25: sambandho veditabbo. Samānabalānaṃ dvinnaṃ lokepi virodhittaṃ ekakkhaṇeyeva ubhinnampi
anya-e0806n0:156_26: kāriye appavatti ca dissatīti diṭṭhantamāha ‘lokece’tyādi, ettha ca pessassa (a)virodhatthino
anya-e0806n0:156_27: kāriye appavattiriva appavattiyeva (potthake) samānabalāna mubhinnaṃ vacanānaṃ kāriye
anya-e0806n0:157_1: vaṇṇito, tassāyuttattamupadassento āha ‘nacāpi’ccādi, bhinnavisayattāti dvinnaṃ vidhīnaṃ
anya-e0806n0:157_2: bhinnavisayattā. Abhinnavisayatte hi pariyāyakappanā yuttimatī, atoca latvādīnamabhinnavisayattampaṭipādayitumāha-
anya-e0806n0:157_4: sabbadhātupariggahena, yattha yasmiṃ dhātvatthekadese pavattā samānā pavattā santo
anya-e0806n0:157_5: laddhāvakāsā siyuṃ tassekadesassa parihārenāpi pariccāgenāpi na vidhīyanteti sambandho,
anya-e0806n0:157_6: latvādīna mekakkhaṇe asambhavā ekasmiṃ kate satītaravacanāna mānatthakyappasaṅgāca
anya-e0806n0:157_7: pariyāyena bhavantīti yantaṃ yuttanti sambandho. Ihāti imasmiṃ yugapadippattiyaṃ,
anya-e0806n0:157_8: iha tathābhāvassa kāraṇamāha-‘sāvakā…pe… vacana’nti, tatthāti yugapadippattiyaṃ.
anya-e0806n0:157_9: Jātiyampadatthe “punappasaṅgavijānanā siddhaṃ, vippaṭisedhe yaṃ bādhitaṃ tambādhitamevā”tīmāsamubhinnaṃ
anya-e0806n0:157_10: paribhāsanampavattiṃ paṭipādento āha- ‘parasmiṃ ce’tyādi, parasminti iṭṭhe, paribhāsanampana
anya-e0806n0:157_12: satiparamiṭṭhaṃ paṭhamaṃ hoti, hontena tena yadītarassa nimittopaghāto na kato tadā
anya-e0806n0:157_13: tassāpi punappasaṅgo tassa vijānanā siddhanti, vippaṭisedhe yathāvutte sati paṭhamaṃ
anya-e0806n0:157_14: hontena yaṃ suttaṃ bādhitaṃ tassa punappavattiyā yadi nimittaṃ natthi taṃ bādhitameve’ti.
anya-e0806n0:157_15: Byattiyampi vidhyatthamevidaṃ vacanaṃ, na niyamatthanti dassetumāha-‘byattiya’miccādi,
anya-e0806n0:157_16: evaṃ maññate ‘byattiyaṃ paṭilakkhiyaṃlakkhaṇappavattiyaṃ dvinnaṃ sādhāraṇaṃ ṭhānampati
anya-e0806n0:157_17: yāni vacanāni bhinnāni tesampi niravakāsattena tulyabalattā dvinnampaṭipattiyevasiyā,
anya-e0806n0:157_18: natu pariyāyappasaṅgo’ti. Byattiyampi yathāvuttānaṃ paribhāsānaṃ pavatti vuttavidhinevāti
anya-e0806n0:158_0: Jātiyampadatthe “vattamāneti anti, si tha, mi ma, te ante, se vhe, e mhe”ccādīnaṃ
anya-e0806n0:158_1: lakkhaṇānamekamekatthepi vattamāneti anti, vattamāne si tha iccādīnaṃ vākyekadesānaṃ
anya-e0806n0:158_2: gacchaticcādo gaccha siccādo ca lakkhiye sakimpavattiyā sabbasmiṃ sake visaye paṭhama
anya-e0806n0:158_3: majjhimapurisekavacanajāti parisamattāti caritatthattā tumhe gacchathāti ettha dvīhi
anya-e0806n0:158_4: dvinnaṃ purisāna mekakkhaṇe pavattiyaṃ na kassaci, byattiyampi paṭilakkhiyaṃ lakkhaṇāni
anya-e0806n0:158_5: bhijjantīti sādhāraṇaṃ ṭhānaṃ patibhinnehi lakkhaṇehi dvinnampekatthe-kakkhaṇe pavattiyaṃ
anya-e0806n0:158_6: na kassaci, tathā vuttanayeneva tiṇṇaṃ purisānamekakkhaṇe pavattiyanti sabbathā appavattiyaṃ
anya-e0806n0:158_7: sampattāyaṃ vacanamidaṃ, paro hotīti majjhimuttamaṃ bhavatīti adhippāyena ‘yathe’ccādinā
anya-e0806n0:158_9: manaṃ bhoseti-yato vippaṭisedhavisayamevedaṃ na hoti, kuto yato “vattamāneti anti”ccādippabhutīnaṃ
anya-e0806n0:158_10: vattamāneti anticcādīhi vākyekadesehi niddiṭṭhānameva pubbaparacchakkānaṃ purisavacanavisesavidhāyakena
anya-e0806n0:158_12: tīminā vākyāvayavena tumhāmhasesesu payujjamānesu appayujjamānesu vā yathākkamaṃ
anya-e0806n0:158_13: pubbacchakkānaṃ paracchakkānañca majjhimuttamapaṭhamānaṃ paccekaṃ dvedve vacanāni
anya-e0806n0:158_14: yathākkamaṃ bhavantīti ‘gacchatha gacchāmā’ti ettha ekakkhaṇe pavattiyeva natthi,
anya-e0806n0:158_15: dvinnampana sāvakāsāna mekakkhaṇe pavattiyeva hi vippaṭisedhoti, tathāpi vuttanayena
anya-e0806n0:158_16: vippaṭisedhappakappanāpi sakkā kātuntīdamudāhaṭaṃ siyāti daṭṭhabbaṃ, imissā pana
anya-e0806n0:158_17: paribhāsāya nirākulappavatti “ādissā” tīmissā vuttanayena veditabbā, katākatappasaṅgī
anya-e0806n0:158_18: yo vidhi, so nicco, yotvakateyevāyamaniccoti vuttaniccāniccesu antaraṅgabahiraṅgesu
anya-e0806n0:158_19: cātulyabalattā nāssa yogassa byāpāro, tathāhi niccāniccesu niccameva balavanti niccāniccānamatulyabalatā,
anya-e0806n0:160_1: saṅketo”ti sāmaññena vuttepi “bhāsissaṃ māgadhaṃ saddalakkhaṇa”nti saddalakkhaṇā
anya-e0806n0:160_3: lakāro udāharaṇaṃ, pakatiyādi samudāyassātiādivākyassa sāppāyamatthaṃ vivarituṃ ‘evamaññate’ccādi
anya-e0806n0:160_4: vuttaṃ, keci saddasatthakārāti pāṇiniṃ sandhāyāha, vacananti “tassa lopo”ti (1-3-9)
anya-e0806n0:160_5: vacanaṃ, payogāsamavāyitāti kattāiccādippayoge asamavāyitā appayogitāti adhippāyo,
anya-e0806n0:160_6: evampissa lopo vaseyo… anupubbo bandhivināsatthoti āhu uccāritapadhaṃsittā anubandhyate
anya-e0806n0:162_0: ‘Atenā’ti (2-108) ettha atoti rassabyattiniddeso vā siyā rassajātiniddeso vā sakalanissayabyāpī
anya-e0806n0:162_1: atthajāti niddesovā, tattha rassabyattiniddese sati buddhasiddhādīsu yatthakatthaci
anya-e0806n0:162_2: akāro gayhateti neṭṭhappasiddhi… kesañci asijjhanato, rassa jātiniddese pana buddhasiddhādisabbākārantānaṃ
anya-e0806n0:162_3: lakkhaṇikagavādyakā rantānañcākāro gayhatīti sabbathā iṭṭhappasiddhi, nāñño dīgho
anya-e0806n0:162_4: byattantarattāti nāniṭṭhappatti ākārato nāssenābhāvā, tasmā atoti rassajātiniddese
anya-e0806n0:162_5: nissite sabbamidamiṭṭhaṃ nipphajjatīti nātthajāti nissīyate, na rassabyattica, “yuvaṇṇāname
anya-e0806n0:162_6: oluttā”ti (1-29) ādīsu pana rassabyattiyā rassajātiyā vā niddese ‘tassedaṃ nopeti’ccādīsu
anya-e0806n0:162_7: eoādikamiṭṭhaṃ katthaci bhaveyya, na sabbattha, sabbattha vā bhaveyya ‘vāteritaṃ
anya-e0806n0:162_8: samonā’tiādīsu byattanta rattā, tasmā sabbathā iṭṭhappasiddhiyā ittajātyādi nissīyate,
anya-e0806n0:162_9: athavā vaṇṇuccāraṇampati kesañci vaṇṇuppattiṭṭhānānaṃ uccanīcatadubhaya saṃhāravasena
anya-e0806n0:162_10: vaṇṇavisesuppatti dassanato tesaṃ vasena rassa byattiniddese rassajātiniddese vā
anya-e0806n0:162_11: vuttanayena iṭṭhāniṭṭhappattiyaṃ sabbathā sabbathā iṭṭhappasiddhiyā ittajātyādi nissīyate,
anya-e0806n0:162_12: tattha vaṇṇa parena savaṇṇaggahaṇaṃ niyamituṃ vacanamidamāraddhanti ‘sabbatthevā’tiādinā
anya-e0806n0:162_13: vacanārambhaphalamāha, sabbatthevāti sabbasmiṃyeva suttappadese. Nanu sayañcāti vuttepi
anya-e0806n0:162_14: pariyattaṃ, na hyaññaṃ rūpā sayamatthi, aññaṃ vā (saya)to rūpanti siddhepyevaṃ sati
anya-e0806n0:162_15: atthettha paro koci visesoti ñāpetuṃ sañca rūpa’nti vuttikāro āhāti sambandho, rūpassa
anya-e0806n0:162_16: visesitabbattā ‘sañca rūpa’nti vuttiyaṃ niddisīyamānattā ca rūpanti viññāyatīti ‘sañca
anya-e0806n0:162_18: aññathāti aññenappakārena saṃrūpaggahaṇāya apisaddābhāveti adhippāyo, aññapadattheti
anya-e0806n0:162_19: aññapadattha samāsavisaye, guṇībhūtassāti appadhānabhūtassākāre kārādino, samāsena
anya-e0806n0:162_20: vuttattā padhānatū tattepi guṇo bhavati aññapadattho-kārekārādi vidhāya kattā, vidhīyamāno
anya-e0806n0:162_21: savaṇṇova padhānaṃ… idamatthitāya tappavattiyāti. Nanu vuttiyamapisaddassātthaṃ vadatā
anya-e0806n0:162_22: sayañceti vattabbaṃ, “tathā sayamattanī”ti nighaṇḍuto sayañca-ttākārekārādiñca gayhatītyamattho
anya-e0806n0:162_23: sambhāvīyatīti codanampanasi nidhāya ‘sañca rūpa’nti vadanto sādhippāyāruḷhaṃ kiñci
anya-e0806n0:162_25: saṃsaddo, tathāttattaniyesupī”ti nighaṇḍuvacanato ‘sa’nti attāpi gayhati, ko so saddarūpaṃ
anya-e0806n0:162_26: sādhāraṇaṃ, ‘sa’nti attaniyampi, kintaṃ saddāna masādhāraṇaṃ saddarūpaṃ, tathā sati
anya-e0806n0:162_28: rūpa’nti, etañca idantīminā sambandhitabbaṃ, asādhāraṇanti asādhāraṇaṃ saddarūpaṃ,
anya-e0806n0:162_29: sati sambhave byabhicāre ca visesanassa sātthakatāya asādhāraṇanti rūpaṃ visesatā
anya-e0806n0:162_30: sādhāraṇassāpi sambhavo vuttoyeva nāmāti āha-‘duvidhaṃ hi’ccādi, kintaṃ sādhāraṇamasādhāraṇañcarūpanti
anya-e0806n0:162_31: sāmaññena rūpaṃ niddisitumāha-‘tatthā’tiādi, tatthāti niddhāraṇe sattamī, saddānanti
anya-e0806n0:162_32: sātthakaniratthakānaṃ yesaṃkesañci saddānaṃ, taṃtaṃ saddattādīhi tesaṃtesaṃ buddha
anya-e0806n0:162_33: aiādīnaṃ saddānaṃ saddattādi, ubhayattha ādisaddena attho saṅgahito, tena sādhāraṇaṃ
anya-e0806n0:162_34: saddarūpamattharūpaṃ tathā-sādhāraṇanti catubbidhaṃ saṃrūpanti dasseti, catūsupi
anya-e0806n0:162_36: sādhāraṇarūpassa pariccāgena, upādiyanto rūpameva saddassasaṃ, nātthoti ca dassetīti
anya-e0806n0:162_37: sambandho, ca saddo panettha ‘idaṃ dassetī’ti heṭṭhā vuttaṃ samuccinoti, asādhāraṇassevopādiyane
anya-e0806n0:162_38: kāraṇamāha-‘tanta’miccādi, itaranti ye saṃkesañci saddānaṃ saddattādi, parassāpīti
anya-e0806n0:162_39: aññassa yassakassaci saddassāpi, iti idaṃ, patitaṃ pasiddhaṃ, ettha pana itisaddo
anya-e0806n0:162_40: hetumhi, yasmā idaṃ yathāvuttaṃ pasiddhaṃ tasmā pubbācariyaparamparāyāgato padesato
anya-e0806n0:162_43: vasenāti āha-‘saddasse’ccādi, āsannaṃ…saddato saddabhāvasā naññattā, vipariyayatoti
anya-e0806n0:162_44: vipariyāsena anāsanna bhāvenāti attho, cakkhuvisayopi hi attho kathaṃ sotavisayasaddassa
anya-e0806n0:162_46: apariccajanīyattā, idampi niccasambandhitte kāraṇavacanaṃ, taṃ saddarūpaṃ, niccasambandhīti
anya-e0806n0:162_47: nirantarasaṃyogī, vipariyayatoti heyyattā, tathāhiccādinā atthassa heyyattaṃ bodheti,
anya-e0806n0:162_48: aparaṃ kāraṇamāha-‘asādhāraṇañca rūpaṃ’tyādinā, sādhāraṇo pariyāya saddānaṃ, paccetabbattāti
anya-e0806n0:162_49: viññātabbattā, idāni kāraṇattayaṃ samodhānetvā imehi kāraṇehi rūpameva saddassa saṃnāma,
anya-e0806n0:162_50: nātthoti niyametvā dassetuṃ ‘tadeva’ntiādi āraddhaṃ, tadevanti yasmā evaṃ, taṃ tasmāti
anya-e0806n0:162_51: attho, sarūpappadhāneti “gossā vaṅa” (1-32) tyādo gossātyādike sarūpappadhāne.
anya-e0806n0:164_0: Ntusutiyā jantvādīnampi “ntantūnaṃnto yomhi paṭhame” (2-215) tyādinā gahaṇappasaṅge
anya-e0806n0:169_1: vinā ādhārantare gahite sati vacanantaraṃ suttantaraṃ vinā byavahitanivatti kātuṃ
anya-e0806n0:169_2: na ca sakkāti sambandho, kecīti buddhappiyācariyādayo dasseti, te hi yadi vaṇṇena
anya-e0806n0:169_3: kālena vā byavadhānepi sandhi bhaveyya tadā sareti nimittasso pādānaṃ niratthakaṃ
anya-e0806n0:169_4: bhaveyyāti sareti nimittopādānasāmatthiyenānena vaṇṇādibyavadhāne no sandhīti maññamānā
anya-e0806n0:169_5: ‘nimitto’ccādikaṃ vākyamāhu, tadayuttanti tehi’nimitto’ccādinā yaṃ vuttaṃ, taṃ ayuttanti
anya-e0806n0:169_6: attho, ayuttatte kāraṇaṃ byabhicārasabbhāvena sāmatthiyābhāvoyevāti byabhicārandassetvā
anya-e0806n0:169_8: saccaṃ, sumanā bhavantu athopi’tyādo vaṇṇakālabyavadhāneyeva, atha kho ‘ete na saccena
anya-e0806n0:169_9: suvatthi hotū’tyādo avasāne ‘pamādo maccuno padaṃ’ tyādo anta bindu saṅkhātanimittantare
anya-e0806n0:169_10: vā kāriyābhāvepi nimitto pādānassa sātthakatoti apisaddassattho, sātthakatoti bhāvappaccayalopena
anya-e0806n0:169_11: bhāvappadhānavasena vā vuttaṃ, sātthakattatoti vuttaṃ hoti, aññathā nimittopādānameva
anya-e0806n0:169_12: sātthakaṃ nāmāti ‘nimitto pādānassa sātthakato’ti na yujjati, ayametthādhippāyo ‘avasāne
anya-e0806n0:169_13: nimintare vā kāriyābhāvena byabhicārasabbhāvā aññathānupapattilakkhaṇaṃ sāmatthiyaṃ
anya-e0806n0:169_14: natthi, nimittantubyavadhānepi catthi, yathā’dārunimittaṃ vanopasaṅkamana’nti tasmā
anya-e0806n0:169_15: vaṇṇakālabyavadhānepi sareti nimitte sati lopakāriyaṃ pappote vā’ti. Luppatīti ‘tatrime’ccādinā
anya-e0806n0:169_16: kathanakāle na dissatīti attho, adassanamattameva hi lopo, aññathā ‘tatrā’disaddarūpābhāvappattiyā
anya-e0806n0:169_17: atthappatīti kārittamesaṃ na siyāti, paṭhamāya niddiṭṭho… vuttattā kammassa, sarassāti
anya-e0806n0:169_18: vadeyya… bhāve khādippaccayena avuttakammattā, ihāti iminā satthantare bhāvasādhanavasena
anya-e0806n0:169_19: gahaṇaṃ vibhāveti, gantha lāghavo… sarassa lopoti vā lopaṃ pappotīti vā avattabbattā,
anya-e0806n0:169_20: saroti paṭhamāya niddiṭṭhattā saro lopo nāma hotīti saṅkāpi siyāti āha-‘na ce’ccādi,
anya-e0806n0:169_21: ihāti imasmiṃ sutte, honticcādopi pubbasaralope hanticcādikampi siyātyāsaṅkiyāha-‘soce’ccādi,
anya-e0806n0:169_22: ussaggato āgato sambhūto tassa vā ayaṃti ossaggiko pubbalopo, tassa bhāvo ossaggikattaṃ,
anya-e0806n0:169_23: ossaggikattā pubbalopassa kāriyantarehi paralopādīhi apavādavidhīhi ābādhito eva,
anya-e0806n0:169_24: so ca pubbalopo hotīti sambandho, “paro kvacī”ti (91-27) kvaciggahaṇena pubbaparalopānaṃ
anya-e0806n0:169_25: tulyabalattābhāvā yathā gamappattito paralopassāpavādarūpattaṃ, ajjhāsiteti paviṭṭhe,
anya-e0806n0:169_26: na hoti… paralopāpavādena bādhitattā, tehīti paralopādīhi, sabbathā muttavisayo saddhindriyanti,
anya-e0806n0:171_0: Itisaddo idamatthe, kvaci lopanīyo hotīti idaṃ vacanaṃ dīpetīti sambandho, kinti
anya-e0806n0:171_1: āha-‘payogānusārita’nti, kassāti āha-‘kāriyassa paralopassā’ti, kena hetunāti āha
anya-e0806n0:171_2: ‘kvaciggahaṇenā’ti, katthāti āha-‘iha imasmiṃ sutte’ti, tenāti tena payogānusāritādīpanena,
anya-e0806n0:171_3: yathāpayoganti āgamapayogānatikkamena, niccaṃ pakkhevā paralopo siyāti honticcādo
anya-e0806n0:171_4: niccaṃ, latāvātiādīsu pakkhe vā paralopo bhaveyya, evaṃ maññate “kasminti atthe kvāti
anya-e0806n0:171_6: kvacisaddo-yaṃ yathāgamaṃ niccamaniccamasantañca vidhiṃ dīpeti, tattha honticcādiko
anya-e0806n0:171_7: nicca pakkho paralopasseva visayo, latāvātiādiko aniccapakkho ubhayasādhāraṇattā
anya-e0806n0:171_8: pubbalopassāpi visayoti iminā niccaṃ pakkhe vā paralopo hoti, asantapakkho pana saddhindriyantiādiko
anya-e0806n0:171_9: pubbalopasseva visayo sabbathānena pariccattattā”ti, tīsupi cetesu pana pakkhesu
anya-e0806n0:171_10: niccāniccapakkhesu yevassāpavādarūpatā… pubbalopassa sabbathā honticcādo nivārakattā
anya-e0806n0:171_11: vā vidhāyakattā vā paralopassa, na tvasantapakkhe… pubbalopasseva sabbathānena dinnā
anya-e0806n0:171_12: vasarattā, lokaggotiādi tu kvacisaddassa payogānusāritā dīpakattā nicce asantevāpi
anya-e0806n0:171_13: vidhimhi dīpite paralopena vā nipphajjatīti neṭṭhabyāghāto, evaṃ tāva kvaciggahaṇe
anya-e0806n0:171_14: sabbathāniṭṭhaparihārena iṭṭhappasiddhi siyā, tadabhāvekathanti tadabhāve virodhamāha-‘aññate’ccādi,
anya-e0806n0:171_15: pariyāyena bhavantīti kvaciggahaṇābhāve ‘paro’ti suttaṃ siyā tathā sati suttadvayamekavisayaṃ
anya-e0806n0:171_16: tulyabalañca siyā, tattha vippaṭisedhābhāvā pamāṇabhūtānamācariya (vacanā)naṃ niratthakatā
anya-e0806n0:171_17: mā bhavīti vārena bhavantīti attho, itīti iminā pariyāyabhavanakāraṇena, pakkheyeva
anya-e0806n0:171_18: siyāti latāvātiādīsu pubbalope pariyāyappavatte pariyāyena paralopassāppavattito
anya-e0806n0:171_19: latāvāti pakkheyeva paralopo bhaveyya, honticcādo niccaṃ na siyāti sambandho, tañcāti
anya-e0806n0:171_20: taṃ pariyāyabhavanañca, kho vākyālaṅkāre, paṭipadanti padampa dampati hoti, nekadesaparihārenāpi,
anya-e0806n0:171_21: tenāha ‘na katthacī’ti, iminā idaṃ dīpeti “sabbattha vikappappasattiyā hanti, saddhandriyaṃtyādikaṃ
anya-e0806n0:171_23: evamidaṃ yathāvuttaṃ vikappavidhānaṃ saddalakkhaṇaññūhi nevābhimatanti attho, tameva
anya-e0806n0:171_24: sādheti ‘paralopo hi’ccādinā, athā niccapakkhe vā paralope kate-nena pariccattaṭṭhāne
anya-e0806n0:171_25: ussaggappavattiyā latāva latevāti rūpadvayaṃ sampajjati tasmā payogānusāritādīpakena
anya-e0806n0:171_26: kvacisaddeneva honti saddhindriyaṃ latāva latevāti payoga sambhavopi, tathāpi aniccapakkhe
anya-e0806n0:171_27: latāivāti tatiyarūpappasiddhiyā pariyāyena bhavitabbanti parikappeti ‘nanu cetyādinā,
anya-e0806n0:171_28: atha “paro kvacī’ti kvaciggahaṇe sati apa(vādarūpa)ttā kathampariyāyappavattīti manasi
anya-e0806n0:171_29: nidhāyāniccapakkhe pariyāyappavattidīpanatthaṃ “na dvevā”ti suttitanti apavāde rūpattayepi
anya-e0806n0:171_31: sutteneva pariyāyassāpi dīpitattaṃ sādheti, sā ca ekatthappavatti pariyāyaṃ vinā
anya-e0806n0:171_32: na sambhavati… ekakkhaṇe pavatyasabbhāvāti adhippāyo, nanu ca kvacābhāve pariyāyappavattiyaṃ
anya-e0806n0:171_33: yathāvutta dosassevāppasaṅgato mā hotu pariyāyo, bhinnavisaye pana pubbaparalopappavattiyā
anya-e0806n0:171_34: “na dvevā’ti nisedhe lateva latāva latāivāti rūpattayaṃ nipphajjatīti codanaṃ manasi
anya-e0806n0:171_35: nidhāyāha-‘nace’ccādi, tattha dosamāha-‘tathā ca sati’ccādinā, katthaci demiccādo
