anya-e0806n0:171_36: niccaṃ pubbalopasseva, katthaci honticcādo niccaṃ paralopasseva, vikappena vā katthaci
anya-e0806n0:171_37: yathodakaṃ yathāudakaṃ tyādo pubbalopasseva katthaci itipi iccapiccādo paralopasseva
anya-e0806n0:171_38: katthaci lateva latāva latāivāccādo pariyāyenubhayalopasseva dassanatoti sambandho,
anya-e0806n0:171_39: etthaca itipīti vavatthitavibhāsatta dīpanena kvacisaddena paralope kate-ññatra pubba
anya-e0806n0:171_40: lope sampatte “na dvevā”ti etthānuvattamāna kvacānubhāvena niccaṃ nisedhe iccapicceva
anya-e0806n0:171_41: bhavati. Sambajjhati tesu tesu suttesu. Paricchedoti kammatthavasena ādhāravasena
anya-e0806n0:173_0: Tatthacāti casaddena bhavitabbaṃ, tathā ca sati aññoññānajjhāsi taṃ yathodakaṃ yathāudakaṃtyādi
anya-e0806n0:173_1: itipi iccapiccādica saṅgahitaṃ bhavatīti, pubbalope paralope ca pariyāyena sampatte
anya-e0806n0:173_2: dvinnampi pakkhe abhāve sati kathamidaṃ yujjatīti codeti‘yajjeva’miccādinā, yajjevanti
anya-e0806n0:173_3: hi ayaṃ nipātasamudāyo aniṭṭhāpādanārambha vattate, evañce gayhatīti attho, tadeti
anya-e0806n0:173_4: atthato viññāyati, niccaṃ sandhikāriyābhāve kāraṇamāha-‘upasilesā bhāvato’ti, tadeva
anya-e0806n0:173_5: samattheti īdisesu hi’ccādinā, vattumiṭṭhattāti iminā sannikaṃso vaṇṇāna maddhamattakālabyavadhānā
anya-e0806n0:173_6: paccāsatti, sannikaṃsassetassa vacanicchāyaṃ satiyeva sandhikāriyaṃ hotīti dīpeti,
anya-e0806n0:173_7: upasilesābhāvo vāti upasilesābhāvo eva bhavati, nāññathāti adhippāyo, tadabhāvecāti
anya-e0806n0:173_8: tassa upasilesassa abhāve ca, sandhikāriyābhāve kāraṇamāha-‘kālantarena byavadhānā’ti,
anya-e0806n0:173_9: kālantarenāti ubhayattha ṭhitavaṇṇāna muccāraṇakālato aññena majjhappatitakālena,
anya-e0806n0:173_10: sandhi hoteva… sannikaṃsavacanicchāvasena upasilesabhāvato, buddha vīra atthurājaputtaṃ
anya-e0806n0:173_11: ajarāmaroti chedo, yadipi sabbampetaṃ yajjevaṃtyādinā vuttaṃ kvaci saddappabhāveneva
anya-e0806n0:173_12: sijjhati, tathāpi pakāro-yampi satthe yojetabbo vāti dassetuṃ vutto.
anya-e0806n0:175_0: Nanu sutte ‘luttā’ti pañcamī niddesā ‘paresa’nti hotu, ‘yathākkamaṃ’ti tu vacanābhāve
anya-e0806n0:175_1: kathaṃ yathākkamantīdaṃ vuttanti āha-‘same’ccāti, samā saṅkhyā gaṇanā yesu te samasaṅkhyā-uddesino
anya-e0806n0:175_2: anudesino ca, uddisanaṃ paṭhamaṃ niddisanaṃ uddeso, anudisanaṃ pacchā kathanaṃ anudeso,
anya-e0806n0:175_3: uddeso anudeso esamatthīti uddesino anudesino, tesaṃ samasaṅkhyānamuddesīnaṃ anudesīnañca,
anya-e0806n0:175_4: ivaṇṇuvaṇṇāhi uddesino dve, e okārā anudesino ca dveti uddesīnamanudesīnañca ṭhānyādesānaṃ
anya-e0806n0:175_5: samasaṅkhyā siyā, satiyañca tassaṃ yathākkama mādasā vidhīyante, lokato siddhimupadasseti
anya-e0806n0:175_6: ‘tathāhi’ccādinā. Ava…pe… e oti paresaṃ mataṃ, vippaṭipattīti viruddhā paṭipatti
anya-e0806n0:175_7: paṭijānanaṃ, pare “satipi heṭṭhā vāggahaṇe‘kvacāsavaṇṇaṃ lutte’ti sutte kvaciggahaṇakaraṇato
anya-e0806n0:175_8: avaṇṇe eva lutte asavaṇṇo vidhi hoti, tato idha na hoti diṭṭhupādāna”nti vadanti,
anya-e0806n0:175_9: kvacīti adhikāro idha na hoti mahussavo mātūpaṭṭhānanti, patisaddo ādhārattho, tena
anya-e0806n0:175_10: samānādhikaraṇo urasaddopīti urasminti nicca samāsattā asakapadena viggahe kate “asaṅkhyaṃ
anya-e0806n0:175_12: ettha pana yuvaṇṇānanti saṃsāmi samīpasamūha vikārāvayavādīsu ṭhānyādesasambandhe
anya-e0806n0:175_13: chaṭṭhī, tasmā ivaṇṇuvaṇṇānaṃ ṭhāne e oādesā hontīti attho, ṭhānampana tidhā apakaṃso
anya-e0806n0:175_14: nivatti pasaṅgo ceti, tattha gunnaṃ ṭhāne assā sambandhīyantu bajjhantu (jinindabuddhi)
anya-e0806n0:175_15: ti apakaṃso ṭhānasaddassattho, “semhassa ṭhāne kaṭukamosadhaṃ dātabba”nti nivatti
anya-e0806n0:175_16: “dabbhānaṃ ṭhāne sarehi attharitabba”nti pasaṅgo, tesu idha paṭhamadutiyā na yujjanti…
anya-e0806n0:175_17: niccattā saddatthasambandhassa apanayanavināsā na yujjantīti, tatiyo tu (yujjati)…
anya-e0806n0:175_18: sutte atthābhidhānāya ivaṇṇuvaṇṇānaṃ pavattippasaṅge tadatthābhidhānāyeva eoādesā bhavantīti.
anya-e0806n0:177_0: “Sattamiyaṃ pubbasse”ti (1-14) pubbassa kāriyavidhānato sattamī niddiṭṭhassa paratā
anya-e0806n0:177_1: viññāyatīti vuttiyaṃ ‘pare’ti vuttaṃ, evamuparipi, parehi iccassa ajjhiṇamutto’ti
anya-e0806n0:177_3: abbhakkhānanti abbhuggabho imināva siddhanti “abbho abhī”ti ca na vattabbaṃ, iti+assa
anya-e0806n0:177_4: iti ṭhite paralopoti dassanatthaṃ ‘iti assa paralopo’ti āha, anvagamātiādīsu niccaṃ.
anya-e0806n0:181_2: avavādese pubbasaralope dīgheca gavāssaṃ, gavacchanti niccaṃ. Idaṃ kathaṃ sijjhatīti
anya-e0806n0:181_3: sambandho, idanti yathariveccādikaṃ, kiṃ vinā sijjhatīti āha-‘evādissā’tiādi, evassa
anya-e0806n0:181_4: ādiekāro evādi, tassa, riādesamantarenāti sambandho, casaddo aṭṭhānappayutto, rassavidhānañcāti
anya-e0806n0:181_5: yojanīyo, katepi tasminti tasmiṃ sutte vihite ca, na sijjhatīti evādissa riādeso
anya-e0806n0:181_6: na katoti katvā vuttaṃ, bhusaṃ+evāti (pana) ṭhite mahāvuttinā evādissa iādese rūpasiddhi
anya-e0806n0:183_0: Rassadīghānanti sutte avutte kathaṃ rassadīghānanti labhati uddesinoti āha-‘dīghassā’tiādi,
anya-e0806n0:183_1: dīghassāti rassassāti ca ṭhānasambandhe chaṭṭhī, paccāsatyāti ṭhānaso paccāsatyā,
anya-e0806n0:183_2: idañca nissaya vasena vuttaṃ, nissayakaraṇameko satthāgato ñāyoti, idha niccaṃ-vītināmeti
anya-e0806n0:185_0: Ṭhānasambandheti ṭhiti ṭhānaṃ pasaṅgo, sambandhanaṃ-sambandho, ṭhānyādesabhāvalakkhaṇo
anya-e0806n0:185_1: ṭhāneyoganimittabhūto sambandho ṭhānasambandho tasmiṃ, dve rūpāni hontīti iminā na
anya-e0806n0:185_2: sarūpappadhānoti dassitaṃ hotīti sambandho, hetumāha-‘bahuvacananiddesā’ti, dve rūpānihontītyādi
anya-e0806n0:185_5: ekavacanameva ( ) (pana) (potthake) hotī”ti, iminā ca-tthappadhāno-yaṃ niddeso na
anya-e0806n0:185_6: sarūpappadhānoti dasseti, adhipatipaccayo adhipatippaccayoti aniccaṃ, idha na hoti
anya-e0806n0:185_7: idha modatīti, taṃ khaṇanti ettha ekaṅgavikalaṃ paccudāharaṇanti saramhā parattābhāvā na dvittaṃ.
anya-e0806n0:187_0: Tabbagge tatiyapaṭhamāti kasmā vuttaṃ catuttha (dutiya) saddehi vaggakkharesveva
anya-e0806n0:187_1: gayhamānesu tathā niddeso yutto, na hi catunnampūraṇo catuttho dvinnampūraṇo dutiyoti
anya-e0806n0:187_2: akkharāyeva vuccantīti āsaṅkiya ‘vināpī’tiādimāha, akkhare akkharavisaye catutthādi
anya-e0806n0:187_3: vohāro karīyamāno vaggaggahaṇaṃ vināpi vaggakkhareyeva ruḷho pasiddhoti sambandho,
anya-e0806n0:187_4: hetumhi itisaddo, yato evaṃ, tasmā kāraṇā ‘tabbagge tatiyapaṭhamā’ti vuttanti adhippāyo,
anya-e0806n0:187_5: tabbaggeti catutthadutiyā yasmiṃ, tasmiṃyeva vaggeti attho, paccāsattīti pati āpubbā
anya-e0806n0:187_7: yathāyogganti catutthakkhare catutthassa tatiyo dutiyakkhare dutiyassa paṭhamoti
anya-e0806n0:187_8: evaṃ yoggamanatikkamma, dhassa dabhāvoti imināva pubbassa dhassa dattamupalakkheti,
anya-e0806n0:187_9: tathā yasattheroti. Theroti ettha ekāro vaggakkharo na hotīti tasmiṃ tavaggadutiyakkharassa
anya-e0806n0:187_10: tassa to paṭhamo na hoti. Panthoti ettha tavagga dutiyakkharena thakārena tabbaggabhūte
anya-e0806n0:187_11: nakāre satīpi na so tabbaggadutiyakkharoti na tassa paṭhamo to, ettha nigghoso nighosotiādi
anya-e0806n0:189_0: Itisaddo-nukaraṇaṃ. Nipātassa pakativiyā-nukaraṇaṃ bhavati, anukaraṇañca dvidhā asādhusaddarūpaṃ
anya-e0806n0:189_1: sādhusaddarūpanti, tesu bhāravāhako koci tena pīḷito ‘aho bhāro’ti vattabbe sattivekallā
anya-e0806n0:189_2: ‘aho bāla’ iccāha, taṃsamīpavattī ‘kimayamāhe’ti kenaci puṭṭho samāno ‘aho bāla iccayamāhe’ti
anya-e0806n0:189_3: vadati, idhamasādhusaddarūpaṃ, itīti pana sādhusaddarūpaṃ, tasmā tato-nukāriyenātthena
anya-e0806n0:191_0: Nanu “vitisseve vā”ti (1-36) votyanuvattiya avaṇṇe eonaṃ vo hotīti ca sakkā viññātuṃ,
anya-e0806n0:191_1: tathā sati ‘avaṇṇe kvaci vo hotī”ti vattabbaṃ ‘ahoti vā’ti kasmā vuttanti codanamāsaṅkiyāha-‘okārassapi’ccādi,
anya-e0806n0:191_3: puna okāro ṭhānibhāvena niddisitabbo na siyāti adhippāyenāha, na nimittanti eonaṃ
anya-e0806n0:191_4: vakārādesatthaṃ avaṇṇo kāraṇaṃ na hotīti attho, aññathāti avaṇṇassa nimittatte, okāraṃ
anya-e0806n0:191_5: na paṭheyyāti sambandho, makārāgame’yāca kamāgate aggamakkhāyatī’ti, sve bhavanti
anya-e0806n0:191_6: viggayha tanappaccaye taddhitavuttiyaṃ vibhattiyā “ekatthatāyaṃ”ti (2-119) lope akārādese
anya-e0806n0:191_7: dīgheca syādimhi svātanaṃ dvitte hiyyattanaṃ. Svātanantiādīsu niccaṃ, idha nahoti
anya-e0806n0:193_0: Katha‘māgamo hotī’ti vuttaṃ yadi niggahītamāgamo siyā sutte āgamaggahaṇena vā bhavitabbaṃ
anya-e0806n0:193_1: ña-ma-kādya nubandhavisesena vā tyāsaṅkiyāha-‘asati pi’ccādi, āgamāvasāye kāraṇamāha-‘ādesattāyogā’ti,
anya-e0806n0:193_2: ādesattāyogo kathaṃ viññāyati ccāha-‘ṭhāniniddesābhāvato’ti, tathā sati āgaminiddesābhāvā
anya-e0806n0:193_3: āgamattampi na siyāti codeti ‘yajjeva’miccādinā, na-iti codanaṃ paṭikkhipitvā tassa
anya-e0806n0:193_4: āgamattameva sādhetumāha-‘tassā’tiādi, tassāti niggahītassa, rassānuppavattito rassasarameva
anya-e0806n0:193_5: anugantvā pavattito, ayamevattho vuttiyampi dassitoyevāti vattumāha-‘etadeve’ccādi,
anya-e0806n0:193_6: purimā jātīti visesanasamāsekate rasse ca bindvāgamo, paranimittassāniddiṭṭhattā
anya-e0806n0:193_7: bahusadde-ntassa bindvāgame bahuṃ, satipi payogānusārittadīpakassa kvacisaddassāpi
anya-e0806n0:193_8: vavatthitavibhāsatte vāsaddassāpi tādisattasseva paṭipādakatta sabhāvaṃ dassetuṃ
anya-e0806n0:193_10: anurodhena lakkhaṇappavattikā vibhāsā vavatthitavibhāsā, abhedena tu vādhikāro vavatthita
anya-e0806n0:193_11: vibhāsā, tassā bhāvo vavatthitavibhāsattaṃ, tasmā, idha na hoti idha modati, imasmiṃ
anya-e0806n0:193_12: ṭhāne āgamattappakāsako ṭhāninidde sābhāvā ādesattāyogasaṅkhāto kāraṇaviseso samattho,
anya-e0806n0:193_13: tassa bhāvo sāmatthiyaṃ-atthabala-maññathānupapattilakkhaṇaṃ, sacāti so āgamo ca.
anya-e0806n0:195_0: Lopasaddassa bhāvasādhanamattameva sādhetumāha-‘tene’ccādi, lopoti yadi kammasādhano
anya-e0806n0:195_1: siyā tadā tena samānādhikaraṇaṃ katvā upari “parasaro”ti suttamārabhīyeyyāti byatirekamāha
anya-e0806n0:197: Tvaṃsi tvamasīti vikappo, idha na hoti tāsāhaṃ.
anya-e0806n0:199_0: Nanu vaggevaggantoti ettakeyeva vutte yasmiṃ (kismi)ñci vaggakkhare pare binduno
anya-e0806n0:199_1: yokoci vagganto aniyamena bhaveyya tathā sati aniṭṭhampi siyātyāsaṅkiya paccāsattiṃ
anya-e0806n0:201_0: Nanu saddattā byabhicārittā evassa tāva saddo hotu, saṃyato, saṃhitoti saddekadesabhūtānampi
anya-e0806n0:201_1: sambhavā tepi gahe tabbā siyunti ‘yaevahi saddesu’ti yahīnampi kathaṃ saddavohāro
anya-e0806n0:203: Yasadde pubbasutteneva saṃssapyādese siddhe so ( ) (tassa) (potthake) ya kāramatteyeva pare saṃsseva (yathā) siyāti suttamidamāraddhaṃ.
anya-e0806n0:205_0: Ṭhāninamāsilissa gacchati pavattatīti āgamo nāma, ko-yamettha ṭhānīti āha-‘sarassāti,
anya-e0806n0:205_1: sutte anuvattassa ca avijjamānattā ‘sarassā’ti kuto labbhatīti codeti ‘nanu ce’tyādinā.
anya-e0806n0:205_2: Āgamasutiyā vanādīnaṃ ṭhānisutiyā abhāvepi sāmatthiyā byañjanassa vā āgamo siyā sarassa
anya-e0806n0:205_3: vā, yadi byañjanassa vā siyā (na) “padādīnaṃ kvacī”ti (5-92) suttita mācariyena,
anya-e0806n0:205_4: tasmā tadeva ñāpeti ‘saro yevettha ṭhānī bhavitumarahatī’ti. Vuccateccādinā parihāramāha,
anya-e0806n0:205_6: (1-48) ye dassa jo “vaggala sehite”ti (1-49) (yassa jo) nipajjanaṃ, mānantatyādīsūti
anya-e0806n0:205_8: adhikārā, paccayantareti mānantatyādīto aññasmiṃ paccaye, kaccāyanena ‘atippagokhotāvā’ti
anya-e0806n0:205_9: sādhanatthaṃ “kvaci o byañjane”ti okārāgamo gakārāgamo ca suttantarena vihito, taṃ
anya-e0806n0:205_10: pakārantarena sādhetuṃ vuttiyaṃ-‘atippago kho tāvā’ti yaṃ vuttaṃ taṃ dassetuṃ ‘atippā’tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0806n0:207_0: Dvādayo aṭṭhārasantā bahuvacanantāti ‘chakī’ti vattabbe ‘chā’ti ekavacanaṃ na yujjatīti
anya-e0806n0:207_1: codeti ‘nanucā’tiādinā, pariharati naccādinā, neti ‘chaḷo’ti ayutto-yaṃ niddeso na
anya-e0806n0:207_2: hotīti attho, chasaddassa anukaraṇattā chasaddānukaraṇattā, heṭṭhā vuttasādhusaddarūpā
anya-e0806n0:207_4: attho vidhinisedharūpo yassa taṃ pariccattattaṃ, ettha pana chasaddena chasaṅkhyāviseso
anya-e0806n0:207_5: pariccatto, abhidhāyato hotīti iminā chasaddassa anukāriyenātthenātthavantatthamāha,
anya-e0806n0:207_6: ekavacanantassa niddeso kato… chasaddavacanīyassa chassa ekattā, anukāriyassāti ekādino
anya-e0806n0:207_7: saṅkhyā saddassa tadaññassa vā yadanukāriyamekādikaṃ tadaññaṃ vā saddarūpaṃ tassa.
anya-e0806n0:207_8: Saṅkhyādivisesanti ekattādisaṅkhyāvisesaṃ tadaññaṃ vā, “yomhi dvinnaṃ duve dve”ti
anya-e0806n0:207_10: tabbācakaṃ dvinnanti bahuvacanaṃ, atha ‘ḷañi’ti kasmā na vuttaṃ evañhi sati ñānabandhattāḷakāro
anya-e0806n0:207_12: vidhīyamāno ḷakāro cha saddā parassādissa āgamattā…pe… hotīti sambandho, antāpavādenāti
anya-e0806n0:207_15: iminā ḷassekavaṇṇattā antāpavādena “ādissā”ti sutte na ādyanto viyekopi saroti sarassādissa
anya-e0806n0:207_17: parassa sampattaṃ kāriyaṃ ekavaṇṇattā “chaṭṭhiyantassā”ti (1-17) antassa sampattaṃ
anya-e0806n0:207_18: “ādissā”ti (1-16) ādivaṇṇassa pappotī”ti. Ādibhūtova hotīti asatipi ñakāre āgamaggahaṇānuvattiyā
anya-e0806n0:207_19: āgaminaṃ saraṃ avināsento tassa ādyavayavabhūtova hotīti attho, lakāraṃ karonti “yavamadanataralācāgamā”ti
anya-e0806n0:207_20: suttena, tanti lakārakaraṇaṃ ubhinnamavisesavacanañca ayuttataṃ dasseti ‘tesampi’ccādinā,
anya-e0806n0:207_22: saññāyaṃ. Avisese laḷānaṃ nānattābhāve, pākaṭo vāti iminā sutilipibhedassa paccakkhasiddhatandasseti,
anya-e0806n0:207_23: tattha hi sotaviññāṇavīthiyā laḷānaṃ visuṃvisuṃ gahaṇaṃ suti, taṃtaṃ desavāsīnaṃ
anya-e0806n0:207_24: lekhā va vatthānaṃ lipi, tesaṃ bhedo sotacakkhuviññāṇagayhattā paccakkhasiddho, chaḷabhiññāti
anya-e0806n0:209_0: Issa attaṃ nipātanā, dakāro pana “mayadā sare”ti (1-44), padantarenātiādīti iminā
anya-e0806n0:209_1: aññena padena, sādhūni bhavantīti vutti pāṭhassa atthaṃ vattuṃ ‘sādhūni bhavantīti
anya-e0806n0:209_2: nipātanato’ti āha, tattha kāraṇamāha-‘ya’miccādi, appattassa pāpanampattassa paṭisedho
anya-e0806n0:209_3: ca nipātanaṃ, tesaṃ idha pāṭhāti tesaṃ tathā icchantānaṃ idhāti nipātassa imasmiṃ
anya-e0806n0:209_4: tadaminādisutte pāṭhā, uddhassa udūti uddhaṃ khamassāti aññapadatthasamāse uddhaṃkha
anya-e0806n0:209_5: iti ṭhite uddhaṃsaddassa uduādeso, asa-bhojane iccasmā “kvacaṇa’ iti (5-41) suttena
anya-e0806n0:209_6: aṇpaccaye asasaddo nipphajjatīti āha-‘pisitamasanā’ti “kvacaṇa” iti mahiyaṃ ravatīti
anya-e0806n0:209_7: ṭhite imināva gaṇanipātanena samāse kate mayūrasaddo nipphajjatīti dassetumāha ‘mahisaddasse’ccādi,
anya-e0806n0:209_8: assa tadaminādigaṇassa āgatigaṇattā evamaññepīti sambandho, vuttanti pāṭhaseso. Dīghanikāyādīsu pañcasu nikāyesūti–
anya-e0806n0:212_0: Vuttesu dīghāgamādīsu pañcasu nikāyesu, ñātabbāti vaṇṇā gamādidvārena jānitabbā,
anya-e0806n0:212_1: pañcavidhaṃ pañcappakāraṃ niruttamuccateti sambandho, nibbacanaṃ niruttaṃ, napuṃsake
anya-e0806n0:212_2: bhāve tto, atthakathanavākya pubbakamuccāraṇamiccattho, tadabhidhāyi satthamapyabhidhāne-bhidheyyo
anya-e0806n0:212_3: pacārā tadatthatāya vā niruttamuccate, vuttanirutti lakkhaṇena…pe… veditabbāti iminā
anya-e0806n0:212_4: niruttasatthe ye saddā paṭipadaṃ nipphādiyanti tesamidaṃ sāmaññena nipphādananti
anya-e0806n0:212_5: dīpeti, dvāre niyutto dovārikoti ettha ṇike dakāravakārānaṃ majjhe okārāgamo, hiṃsismāti
anya-e0806n0:212_7: nijakoti ettha jakārassa yakāre niyako. Atha vaṇṇavikāroti vuttattā javaṇṇassa yādese
anya-e0806n0:212_8: niyakādayo tāva sijjhantu, susānādayo kathaṃ chavapadādivikārattā susānādīnanti āha
anya-e0806n0:212_10: nirutta’nti saṅkhyāniyamo na yujjeyyāti bhāvo. Yogo sambandho, tathāhiccādinā dhātussa
anya-e0806n0:212_12: Mayūroti ettha ravati mayūrarāve eva vattate, na sāmaññena ravanakiriyāmatteti bhāvo.
anya-e0806n0:214_0: Vaṇṇamattasse vāti vaṇṇasāmaññasseva, mattasaddo ettha sāmañña vacano. Yakārassaca
anya-e0806n0:214_1: cādesoti sambandho, dayakārānaṃ jattantissa iminā, yassa “vaggalasehi te”ti (1-49)
anya-e0806n0:216_0: Yantaṃ saddānaṃ niccasambandhittepi pakkantavisayattā taṃsaddo yaṃsaddaṃ nāpekkhatetyāha-‘teti
anya-e0806n0:216_1: anantara’iccādi, taṃ saddo hi pakkanta visayo tathā pasiddhavisayo anubhūtavisayo
anya-e0806n0:216_2: ca yaṃsaddaṃ nāpekkhate, yathā ceso yaṃsaddannā pekkhate, taṃ sabbaṃ mahāsāminādhikāyaṃ
anya-e0806n0:219: Etissā gāthāya amhehi vitthāritanayena gahetabbaṃ, yathā rahanti sakammākammadhātūnamanurūpaṃ.
anya-e0806n0:221_0: Kiñcāpīdaṃ idaṃkiñcāpi (potthake) vikappanatthaṃ katanti heṭṭhimena ni(nnāna)ttaṃ
anya-e0806n0:221_1: viññāyati, tathāpi iminā vākārena vikappova, heṭṭhime pana kvacādhikārā hakārantadhātuto
anya-e0806n0:221_2: dhyaṇpaccaye mehyaṃ, dohyaṃ sinehyaṃ, lehyantipi bhavatveva.
anya-e0806n0:223_1: ādiyatītyādīti kammasā dhanocāyamādisaddo, soyamattho sumaṅgalappasādaniyā khuddasikkhā
anya-e0806n0:223_2: ṭīkāya‘ādito upasampannā’ti ettha amhehi vuttanayena veditabbo, saṃyujjatīti saṃyogo-ekatrāvaṭṭhitabyañjanā.
anya-e0806n0:225_0: Yaṃvattateti vuttivacanaṃ nikkhipitvā tassa atthaṃ vattumārabhate ‘sambhavāpekkhāye’ccādi,
anya-e0806n0:225_1: yaṃvattateti ca sutte avijjamānepi gammamānatthassa saddassa payogampati kāmacāroti
anya-e0806n0:225_2: vuttiyaṃ vuttaṃ, yasaddassāniyamatthavuttittepi padavākyato nāññaṃ sambhavati vicchāyamābhikkhaññe
anya-e0806n0:225_3: ca vattamānanti āha ‘sambhavāpekkhāyapadaṃ vākyaṃvā’ti, sambhavatīti sambhavo-padaṃ
anya-e0806n0:225_4: vākyaṃ vā, tasmiṃ apekkhāya padaṃ vākyaṃ vā vattateti sambandho, vattateti vicchāyamābhiññe
anya-e0806n0:225_5: cātthe vattate, nanu padassa vākyassa vā visuṃyeva dabbādayo atthā, taṃ kathamida
anya-e0806n0:225_6: metasmiṃ vattudhamme kiriyādhamme ca vicchābhikkhaññatthe vattateti anuyogaṃ sandhāyāha-‘visayabhāvenā’tiādi,
anya-e0806n0:225_7: vicchāya vattudhammassa kiriyādhammassa cābhikkhaññassa visayo padaṃ vākyaṃ vā… anaññatthavuttivasena
anya-e0806n0:225_8: tatthappavattiyā, taṃ vasenaca, abhidhāyakattena ceti gocarattena pakāsakattena cāti
anya-e0806n0:225_9: attho, yaṃvattateti ajjhāhaṭassa yanti paṭhamantassa vibhattivipariṇāmaṃ dasseti
anya-e0806n0:225_10: (tassāti) ādinā, iminā idaṃ dīpeti “yajjapi ‘vicchābhikkhaññesvi’ tyatra chaṭṭhīnoccārīyate,
anya-e0806n0:225_11: tathāpi chaṭṭhīpasiddhi hoteva, kathaṃ dve iccādesaniddesā ādeso ca sambandhīnamapekkhate,
anya-e0806n0:225_12: ‘vicchābhikkhaññesū’ti cātthaniddeso, na cātthassādesena sambandho upapajjate, tasmā
anya-e0806n0:225_13: vicchābhikkhaññesu yaṃ padaṃ vākyaṃ vā vattate tassa dve bhavanticcevaṃ chaṭṭhīyattho
anya-e0806n0:225_14: sakkā vattu”nti, dve rūpāni hontīti dassitaṃ hotīti sambandho, saddarūpe saṅkhyayyeti
anya-e0806n0:225_15: dutiyā bahuvacanantaṃ paṭipādayamānoti ettha paṭipādanakiriyāya sambandhenopadiṭṭhaṃ,
anya-e0806n0:225_16: “vākyantaraṭṭhopi saddo tadaññasmimpi sambandhamupayātī”ti dvisaddoti idaṃ upari
anya-e0806n0:225_17: vākyadvayepyupayujjati ‘dvisaddo vutto, dvisaddo na sarūpappadhāno’ti, atha sarūpappadhāno
anya-e0806n0:225_18: kasmā na vuttoti āha-‘bahuvacanena niddesā’ti, atha dveti sāmaññena vuttattā padavākyānaṃ
anya-e0806n0:225_19: ṭhāne dvibbacanaṃ vā siyā, tānevā vattantīti dvippayogo vā, tathā sati ‘yaṃvattate
anya-e0806n0:225_20: tassā’ti kasmā paṭhamameva nissāya vuttiyaṃ vivaraṇaṃ katanti āha-‘evañcā’tiādi,
anya-e0806n0:225_21: idāni dvippayogapakkhassa sadosattā agahitabhāvaṃ dassetumāha-‘yadātvi’ tyādi, tusaddo
anya-e0806n0:225_22: pubbasmā pakkhā visesassa padassako visesanattho (potthake), tattha hi dve dverūpa
anya-e0806n0:225_23: (potthake) saddarūpānyādisīyante, iha tu sova saddo dvirāvattate, āvuttī saṅkhyeyyāti
anya-e0806n0:225_24: evaṃ maññate “dvisaddo-yaṃ “ādasahi saṅkhyā saṅkhyeyye vattante”ti vacanato saṅkhyeyyavacano,
anya-e0806n0:225_25: tasmeha saṅkhyeyyaṃ saddarūpaṃ vā siyā āvutti vā, iccapi niddeso tadubhayamapekkhiya
anya-e0806n0:225_26: napuṃsakaliṅgena vā siyā itthiliṅgena vā, tattha yadā napuṃsakaliṅgena niddeso, tadā
anya-e0806n0:225_27: saddarūpāni saṅkhyeyyāni bhavanti, yadā tu itthiliṅgena, tadā saddassāvuttī uccāraṇalakkhaṇā
anya-e0806n0:225_28: kiriyā saṅkhyeyā bhavanti, tato cettha āvuttīapi saṅkhyeyā hontī”ti, tadā dvippayogo
anya-e0806n0:225_29: dvibbavacananti esa pakkhoti ayamettha bhāvo” yadā dve āvuttiyo vidhīyante tadā dvippayogo
anya-e0806n0:225_30: dvibbacanante sopekkho, (atra ṭhānyādesabhāvo natthi) natuṭṭhāne dvibbacanapakkho
anya-e0806n0:225_31: (potthake) āvutti hi kiriyā, tassā ceha saddo sādhanaṃ, na ca kiriyāya sādhanassa
anya-e0806n0:225_32: ca ṭhānyādesabhāvo upapajjate, tasmā yadāvuttī vidhīyante, tadā dippayogo dvibbacanante-so
anya-e0806n0:225_33: pakkho bhavatī”ti, ayampi pakkho pāṇinīyehi pariggahīto, tadayuttaṃ dosaduṭṭhattāti
anya-e0806n0:225_34: sandassayamāha-‘so pane’tyādi, te hi dutiyampi pakkhamabbhupagamma upacāramattato
anya-e0806n0:225_35: bhedo, vatthutotvabhedo vāti ponopuññena taṃ sādhenti. Kathampana sadosattaṃ yenāyaṃ
anya-e0806n0:225_36: na gahitotyāha- ‘tathāhi’ccādi, ṇyo nasiyāti “tassa bhāvakammesu tta tā ttana ṇya
anya-e0806n0:225_37: ṇeyya ṇiya ṇiyā”ti (4-59) bhāve vidhīyamāno ṇyo dvippayogapakkhe saddabhedasabbhāvā
anya-e0806n0:225_38: puna puneti samudāyasabhāvato punapuna bhāvoti atthe punapuna samudāyato na bhaveyyāti
anya-e0806n0:225_39: attho, na kevalaṃ ṇyova, atha kho ekapadantogadhānaṃ sarānaṃ sarānamādibhūtassukārassa
anya-e0806n0:225_40: bhavanto okāropi “sarānamādissā yuvaṇṇassā eo ṇānubandhe”ti (4-124) na siyā, “manādyāpādīnamomaye
anya-e0806n0:225_41: ca “iti (3-59) okāro pana pakkhadvayepi hoteva… uttarapadassa nimittabhāvena gahitattā,
anya-e0806n0:225_42: pubbapakkhepi hi dve saddarūpānyevādisīyanteti hoteva pada bhedo, vakkhati hi ‘satīpi
anya-e0806n0:225_43: attagate bhede’ti. Nanu āvuttidhammabheda saddassupacarito bhedo, sarūpato tvabhedova,
anya-e0806n0:225_44: aññathā āvuttiyeva na siyā, ekassa hi vatthuno āvutti hoticcāha‘nāntarene’ccādi,
anya-e0806n0:225_45: aññatheti upacarito bhedo na sabhāvatoti ce, kāriyambhavatīti evi na sakkā vattunti
anya-e0806n0:225_46: sambandho, sabhāvato tvabhedo vāti upacārābhāvena vatthuto vijjamānabhedamavadhārayati,
anya-e0806n0:225_47: aññathāti yadi bhedo siyā, āvuttiyeva na siyāti etthāyamadhippāyo “yadi sabhāvatova
anya-e0806n0:225_48: bhedo bhinnassa pana kathamāvutti siyā”ti, ṭhānisadisattāti “ṭhānīviyādeso”ti paribhāsamupalakkheti.
anya-e0806n0:226_0: Kiriyāyātiādīsu sahatthe tatiyā… kiriyādīhi dabbādyatthānaṃ vattu kattu byāpanicchāpavattito,
anya-e0806n0:226_2: bhinnaṃ nāma hotīti āha-‘anekappakārayutte’ti, bahuvacananiddesato vuttaṃ hotīti
anya-e0806n0:226_3: sambandho, tenāti yena bahuvacananiddesena sakiṃ byāpanicchā jotīyati tena karaṇabhūtena
anya-e0806n0:226_4: hetubhūtena vā, kamena byāpitumicchāyaṃ jātiādīnañca byāpitumicchāyanti sambandho,
anya-e0806n0:226_5: tattha ayañca gāmo ramaṇīyo ayañca gāmo ramaṇīyoti kamena byāpitumicchā, ettha kiñcāpi
anya-e0806n0:226_6: ramaṇīyaguṇena gāmadabbayogo atthi, tathāpi gāmānaṃ guṇena yogo, sabbo gāmo ramaṇīyoti
anya-e0806n0:226_7: bāhullena, natthi sākallena kamena (potthake) byāpitumiṭṭhattanti sakalabyāpanicchāyābhāvoti
anya-e0806n0:226_8: na dvibbacanaṃ, evamupari yojetvā attho daṭṭhabbo, sampanno yavoti sampannaguṇena
anya-e0806n0:226_9: yavajātiyā byāpitumicchā, ekatthā jāti, anekattha nissayā vicchā ekatthājāti, ekamatthaṃ
anya-e0806n0:226_10: ñāpayissāmīti jātisaddo payujjate ane katthanissayāca vicchā, anekatthaṃ saññāpayissāmīti
anya-e0806n0:226_11: vicchāpayujjate-ti mahābhasse, sobhanaṃ dhavakhadiranti sobhanaguṇena dhavādidabbānaṃ
anya-e0806n0:226_13: visaddo panettha byāpanatthoti āha-‘byāpituṃ sambandhitu’nti, sāti vicchā, vattudhammoti
anya-e0806n0:226_14: ‘rukkhaṃrukkha’miccādikaṃ yo vadati, tassa vattuno dhammo… icchālakkhaṇassa dhammassa
anya-e0806n0:226_15: tappaṭibaddhattā, saddoti rukkhamiccādiko, tassa saddassa yaṃ rūpaṃ atta bhāvo, tameva
anya-e0806n0:226_16: paccāsatyā “sutānumitesu sutasambandhova balavā”ti vicchā bhikkhaññesu vattamānassa
anya-e0806n0:226_17: sutasseva tassa rūpassa paccāsannabhāvato dvisaṅkhyā yuttaṃ dvisaṅkhātāya saṅkhyāya
anya-e0806n0:226_18: ‘rukkhaṃ rukkha’miccevaṃ yuttaṃ atidisīyate sutte dveiccanena, dvibbacanasseva dvibbacanameva
anya-e0806n0:226_19: (potthake) hi dvisaṅkhyāyuttatā, atha katamekavacanantassa dvibbacanaṃ, tathāhi sabbeyevetettha
anya-e0806n0:226_20: vicchāyaṃ dvittehyabhidhayanteti bahattā bahuvacanaṃ pappoti, ekavacanantu na sijjhati
anya-e0806n0:226_23: vakkhamānanayena bahuvacanantappayogeneva vicchātthajotanato na tattha dvībbacanaṃ
anya-e0806n0:226_24: siyā, bhavitabbañca dvibbacane (na, e) kavacanattamantarena na cātthi dvibbacanāvakā
anya-e0806n0:226_25: soti patīti balāvagato yo-ttho, tassa atthassa aññathānupapattilakkhaṇaṃ sāmatthiyaṃ
anya-e0806n0:226_26: atthasāmatthiyaṃ, atthasāmatthiyā ekavacanantassa dvībbacananti sambandhā, kiriyādiyoganti
anya-e0806n0:226_27: kiriyāguṇādi sambandho, mantvāti byāpitumicchāyantīmassa pubbakiriyāvacanaṃ, abhisaṃharitvāti
anya-e0806n0:226_28: ekatokatvā. Saddassa tādisatthapaccāyakatte sāmatthiyaṃ saddasatti saddassa. Yugapadādhikaraṇatāyaṃ
anya-e0806n0:226_29: sahavacanicchāyaṃ bahuvacanappavattiyeva, na tattha dvibbacananti dassetumāha-‘atoyeve’ccādi,
anya-e0806n0:226_30: ato yevāti bahuvacanantassa saddasattiyā vicchājotanato dvibbacanābhāvāyeva, evamaññate-
anya-e0806n0:226_31: ‘idha pana yogapajjaṃ duvidhaṃ saddayogapajjaṃ atthayogapajjañca, tattha kiñci sātthakānaṃ
anya-e0806n0:226_32: saddayogapajjamatthayoga pajjaṃ na sambhavatīti, yugapadi adhikaraṇaṃ dhavādi attho
anya-e0806n0:226_33: yassa sodhavakhadirapalāsasaddo yugapadādhikaraṇo, tassa bhāvo tathā, tassañca sati,
anya-e0806n0:226_35: taṃ sahavacanicchāyanti iminā dassitanti tassaṃ sahavacanicchāyañca sati, sobhanā
anya-e0806n0:226_36: dhavakhadirapalāsā sobhanā rukkhāti sobhanaguṇayogepi bahuvacaneneva vicchājotanato
anya-e0806n0:226_37: dvibbacanābhāvoti, sobhanaṃ dhavakhadiranti pana satīpi saddayogapajje samāhārattā
anya-e0806n0:226_39: sobhanaṃ dhavakhadiranti saddānaṃ sakiṃ byāpanicchāyābhāvā na dvibbacananti heṭṭhā vuttaṃ.
anya-e0806n0:227_0: Vāttikakārena “ānupubbiye dve bhavantīti vattabba”nti (8-1-1-vā) vuttaṃ, tadāha-‘ānupubbiyepi’ccādinā,
anya-e0806n0:227_2: vuttivākyassa vivaraṇamāha. Gāmajātiyā tulyajātiyānaṃ disā desādibhedena bhinnānamiva
anya-e0806n0:227_3: gāmānaṃ, na ettha vicchā, mūlamaggaṃ vā hi mukhya mekameva… heṭṭhuddhabhāgantarābhāvenekattā,
anya-e0806n0:227_4: yenupariyadho bhāgāpekkhāya katamūlaggabyapadesena bhinnajātiyā mūlaggabhāgā, te
anya-e0806n0:227_5: bhinnajātiyā, na ca bhinnajātiyānaṃ vicchā hoti, na hi gogoti vutte (vāhīka)gatā
anya-e0806n0:227_6: vicchāvagamyateti ācariyajinindabuddhinā ānupubbiye vicchāyābhāvaṃ paṭipāditaṃ, taṃ
anya-e0806n0:227_7: vighaṭayituṃ ‘yadi hi’ccādinā yaṃ vuttiyaṃ vuttaṃ, taṃ vipañcitumāha- ‘yathe’ccādi,
anya-e0806n0:227_8: nasanniviṭṭhoti na patiṭṭhito, natthīti vuttaṃ hoti, yassūparibhāgo atthi tampi mūlanti
anya-e0806n0:227_9: mūla byapadesassāpekkhā katattamāha, ubhayanti mūlamaggañca, tathā aññepi mūlaggabhāgāti
anya-e0806n0:227_10: iminā mūlaggabhedānaṃ heṭṭhā viya gahaṇe sati bahuttamāha, pubbakathitenāti ‘rukkhādīnaṃ
anya-e0806n0:227_11: bāhullenā’tiādinā pubbe vuttanayena, idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti “mūlādīnaṃ bāhullena thūlādi
anya-e0806n0:227_12: guṇayogammantvā sattamīvibhattiyuttena mūlādisaddasahitena sabba saddena mūlādikamatthamabhisaṃharitvā
anya-e0806n0:227_13: sabbasmiṃ mūle thūlā sabbasmiṃ agge sukhumāti evaṃ (vattuno) byāpitumicchāyamekavacanantassa
anya-e0806n0:228_0: Jeṭṭhānaṃ vicchāsambhave sabbakaniṭṭhassa jeṭṭhattābhāvānuppaveso na siyāti ānupubbiyamattavacanicchāyaṃ
anya-e0806n0:228_2: vighaṭīyati ‘jeṭṭha’ miccādinā, kaniṭṭhopi pavesīyatīti kaniṭṭhassapi vicchāsambhavamāha,
anya-e0806n0:228_3: tattha kāraṇamāha-‘yatheva hi’ccādi, parassāti majjhimassāti ettha visesanaṃ, kaniṭṭhassāpi
anya-e0806n0:228_5: vatticchādibandhaneti vattuno icchā nibandhanaṃ kāraṇamassāti samāso, vatthusabhāve
anya-e0806n0:228_6: vatthu tatthe, abhiniveso pavatti, nābhisambhuṇāti na pappoti.
anya-e0806n0:229_0: “Sakatthe vadhāriyamāne nekasmiṃ dve bhavantīti vattabba”nti (8-1-12-vā) vāttikakārena
anya-e0806n0:229_1: vuttaṃ, tadāha ‘sakatthe’iccādi, atthappakāraṇādyanapekkhassa padassa atthe sakatthe
anya-e0806n0:229_2: avadhāriyamāne ettakameveti gammamāne anekasmiṃ diyyamāne dvibbacanamiṭṭhaṃ mataṃ
anya-e0806n0:229_3: pāṇiniyānanti attho, ayampanesamadhippāyo ‘māsakaṃ māsakaṃ imamhā kahāpaṇā bhavantānaṃ
anya-e0806n0:229_4: dvinnaṃ dehī tyatra dve eva māsā dātumicchitā, kahāpaṇaṃ nāma–
anya-e0806n0:230: Cattāro vihayo guñjā, dveguñjā māsako bhave;
anya-e0806n0:232_0: Vuttavidhinānekamāsakasamudāyo, tattha na sabbe kahāpaṇa sambandhino māsā dānakiriyāya
anya-e0806n0:232_1: byāpitā, dveyevāti netthattha vicchāti yathāvuttavattabbena dvibbacana”nti, taṃ dassetvāti
anya-e0806n0:232_2: taṃ dvibbacanodāharaṇaṃ dassetvā, paṭipādayituṃ vicchāyameva dvittaṃ dassetuṃ… māsakaṃ
anya-e0806n0:232_4: dvibbacanaṃ, tathāhyato dviruttā vicchāva gamyate”ti, saddantaratoccādikaṃ kimāsaṅkiya
anya-e0806n0:232_5: vuttanti āha‘dehī’tiādi, avadhāraṇe patīyamāneti kahāpaṇasambandhini bahumhi māsakasamudāye
anya-e0806n0:232_6: māsakadvayanicchaye viññāyamāne sati, avisesena sāmaññena māsānaṃ dehīti dānakiriyāya
anya-e0806n0:232_8: ‘padene’ccādi, ettha padenāti māsakamiccanena padena, imamhā kahāpaṇāti idamettha
anya-e0806n0:232_9: saddantaraṃ, katābhisaṅkharaṇassāti māsakaṃ māsakamiccevaṃ nipphāditassa, saddantaratoti
anya-e0806n0:232_10: iminā padantarayogo gahitoti āha-‘padantarena yogato’ti ayametthādhippāyo “dvittakaraṇakāle
anya-e0806n0:232_12: dvittaṃ, tadanu pana imamhā kahāpaṇātisaddantarasambandhe sati yadi kahāpaṇasambandhya
anya-e0806n0:232_13: na vasesamāsakavicchā pariggayhati tadā imassa kahāpaṇassāti chaṭṭhiyā bhavitabbaṃ,
anya-e0806n0:232_14: imamhā kahāpaṇāti pana avadhipañcamīniddesato kahāpaṇato dvayameva gahetvā bhavantānaṃ
anya-e0806n0:232_15: dvinnaṃ dehīti imamhā kahāpaṇāti saddantaratovadhāraṇaṃ gamyate”ti.
anya-e0806n0:233_1: vuttaṃ, tadāha-‘pubbapaṭhamānaṃ miccādi, pubbapaṭhamānaṃ pubbapaṭhama saddānaṃ atthātisayo
anya-e0806n0:233_2: yo atthassa pakaṃso, tassa vacanicchāyaṃ, sabbapaṭhamabhāvasaṅkhāta atthātisayamattāva
anya-e0806n0:233_3: vacanicchāti na ettha vicchāti tesamadhippāyo, vikasanakiriyāya pākakiriyāyāti vuttepi
anya-e0806n0:233_5: tyādo, pubbaṃ pubbaṃ vikasanaṃ karonti, paṭhamaṃ paṭhamaṃ vacanaṃ karontīti kiriyāvisesanavasena
anya-e0806n0:233_6: attho daṭṭhabbo, pubbāti matā paṭhamābhimatāti iminā pubbapaṭhamabhāvenābhimatānaṃ
anya-e0806n0:234_0: “Ḍatara ḍatamānaṃ samasampadhāraṇāyamitthīnigade bhāve dve bhavantīti vattabba”nti
anya-e0806n0:234_1: (8-1-12-vā) vuttaṃ, ettha itthiliṅgasaddo itthiliṅgayogā itthīti vutto, nigadyateneneti
anya-e0806n0:234_2: nigado, itthī nigado yassa so itthinigadobhāvo, tasmiṃ itthīnigade bhāve, tadāha-ratararata
anya-e0806n0:234_3: mantāna’miccādi, itthiliṅgeti itthiliṅgaṃ yassa so itthiliṅgobhāvo, tasmiṃ itthiliṅge
anya-e0806n0:234_4: bhāve vattamānānaṃ ratararatamantānaṃ dvibbacanamabhimatanti sambandho, kasmiṃ visayeti
anya-e0806n0:234_5: āha-‘samasampadhāraṇa visaye’ti, samena aḍḍhatādinā guṇena ime ubho aḍḍhā itvevaṃ
anya-e0806n0:234_6: rūpā sampadhāraṇā nirūpanā avabodho samasampadhāraṇā, sāeva visayo, tasmiṃ sati,
anya-e0806n0:234_7: aḍḍhatāya bahuvidhattābhāvā kiriyādiyo gābhāvā ca natthettha vicchāti tesamadhippāyo,
anya-e0806n0:234_8: pucchiyamānāti iminā ime ubho’ iccādīnaṃ pucchāvākyataṃ dasseti.
anya-e0806n0:235_1: ponopuññasaṅkhātakiriyā dhammassa dhanasameva visayattaṃ dīpeti, atisayavisiṭṭhanti
anya-e0806n0:235_2: iminā papacatisaddepakāro pakaṃsattha jotako upasaggoti dasseti, hividhimhīti’lū-cchedane’iccasmā
anya-e0806n0:235_3: vidhimhi hippaccayo “pañhapattanāvidhīsu”ti (6-9) iminā suttenāti attho, ossāti “yuvaṇṇānameopaccaye”ti
anya-e0806n0:235_5: paccayo ce vidhīyate, tadā papacatiiccatra viya ābhikkhaññe vidhīyamānena paccayeneva
anya-e0806n0:235_6: ābhikkhaññatthassa pakāsitattā na dvibbacanena bhavitabbanti dasseti, yadā tu bhusaṃ
anya-e0806n0:235_7: punappunaṃ pacatīti vacanicchā tadāpi papacatīti bhavatyeva.
anya-e0806n0:236_0: Iha imasmiṃ udāharaṇe, ābhikkhaññe iccevāti iminā anukaraṇamattamevetaṃ natthetthābhikkhaññanti
anya-e0806n0:236_1: pāṇiniyā suttantarena dvittampaṭipādenti, natthettha tādisena vacanena payojanaṃ,
anya-e0806n0:236_3: kiriyampati vattatīti bhavanakiriyāmatī vuttīti (potthake) kiriyādhammaṃ ponopuññamettha
anya-e0806n0:236_4: atthevā”ti, teneva vakkhati-‘paṭapaṭā bhavatīti ābhikkhaññe dvibbacana’nti, anitisminti
anya-e0806n0:236_5: itisadde avijjamāne, rāppaccayoti paṭhamaṃ dvitte kate pacchā rāppaccayo, rāppaccayamakatvāpi
anya-e0806n0:236_6: pakārantarena sādhetumāha- ‘athavā’ iccādi, dīgho niccanti paṭhamaṃ dvitte paṭapaṭakarotīti
anya-e0806n0:236_7: ṭhite niccaṃ dīgho, paṭapaṭā karotīti ettha nipphattiṃ dassetvā idāni paṭapaṭāyatīti
anya-e0806n0:238: Ekassa ekassa iti ṭhite pubbavibhattiyā lutte saṃhitāyañca katāyaṃ ekekassa, evaṃ matthakena matthakenāti ṭhite matthaka matthakenāti.
anya-e0806n0:240: Aññaṃ aññanti ṭhite iminā vibhattiyā lope akārassa “tadaminā” (1-47) dinā okāre aññoññantipi hoti.
anya-e0806n0:244: Kvaci pavatyappavatti, kvacaññaṃ kvaci vā kvaci;
anya-e0806n0:250_1: atettha vutyanukūlāya pañcikāya vā bhavitabbaṃ, pañcikānu kūlāya vuttiyā vā, na cettha
anya-e0806n0:250_2: dvinnamaññoññānukūlatā dissati, tathāhi vuttiyaṃ-‘ekānekatthesu vattamānato nāmasmā’ti
anya-e0806n0:250_3: ettakameva pakativisesanavasena vuttaṃ, pañcikāyantu tabbisesana vasena ca paccayatthavisesanavasena
anya-e0806n0:250_4: ca attho dassito, tadeva mubhinnannāññamaññānukūlatā dissati, tato ettha yathā dvinnamaññoññānukūlatā
anya-e0806n0:250_5: sampajjati, tathā byācikkhissāma “yadi panettha vutyānukūlā pañcikā bhaveyya paccayatthapakkho
anya-e0806n0:250_6: jahitabbo siyāti ‘te…pe… ekānekatthesu’ti ca, tena…pe… yojaniya’nti ca etesaṃ jahitabbatāya
anya-e0806n0:250_7: bahupāṭhavilopo āpajjati, yadi pana pañcikānukūlā vutti bhaveyya vuttiyaṃ kiñcimattaṃ
anya-e0806n0:250_8: pakkhipitabba mattameva siyāti bahuvilopāpatti (na) hotīti etesaṃ dvedve honti ekāne
anya-e0806n0:250_9: katthesu vattamānato nāmasmā’ti vuttiyā bhavitabba”nti, evañhi sati satthantarenāpi
anya-e0806n0:250_10: saha ghaṭate, sutte ‘dvedvekānekesu nāmasmā’ti vuttattā ‘ekānekesū’ti idaṃ paccayavisesanaṃ vā yujjati
anya-e0806n0:251_0: Pakativisesanavasena vā yadetaṃ paccayavisesanaṃ, tadā sāmatthiyā ekānekesūti pakativisesanampi
anya-e0806n0:251_1: labbhati, tattha sāmatthiyamattha balaṃ, tathāhyekādīsu bhavantā pakativāccānamevekattādiabyati
anya-e0806n0:251_2: rittaatthamattādīrūpānaṃ jotakā syādayo kathamekattādīsu vattamānato nāmasmā aññato
anya-e0806n0:251_3: siyunti yathāvuttanāmavisesākkhepo, tathā itthiṇādippaccayādīnampi pana pakativisesānupādānepi
anya-e0806n0:251_4: yato dhātvādi vāccottho natthi, sāmatthiyā tato, dhātutyādyantehi tyādyanta vāccehi
anya-e0806n0:251_5: (potthake) na honte vittipaccayā, tathā ṇādipaccayāpi… vibhatyantā vidhānato, yadetampakativisesanaṃ
anya-e0806n0:251_6: tadāpi sāmatthiyeneva ekattādīsu vattamānato nāmasmā tajjotanāya bhavantā syādayo
anya-e0806n0:251_7: kathamaññattha honti asambhavāti ekānekesu dvedveti labbhati, athavā sarūpena avuttampi
anya-e0806n0:251_8: sāmatthiyenekānekatthesūti gammamānaṃ vuttameva hotīti katvā‘tecā’tiādikaṃ vuttanti
anya-e0806n0:251_9: gahetabbaṃ, ekānekesu vattamānato nāmasmāti kimatthaṃ asatvabhūtāya kiriyāyekattādisambandhābhāvā
anya-e0806n0:251_10: kriyatthāca tyādīhi yevekattādīnaṃ vuttattā tyādyantehi ca na bhaveyyunti payojanantaramāha-‘yampanā’tiādi,
anya-e0806n0:251_11: pañcakanāmatthassādhippetabhāvo cettha pakkhassetasseva yuttattā. Tathāhi saṅkhyākammādayo
anya-e0806n0:251_12: nāma vāccassa dabbassa dhammo sakattho-pasajjano ca saddo dabbeyeva vattate… dabbeyevānyanayādivohārā,
anya-e0806n0:251_13: tattha dabbavācinā saddena dabbadhammānamabbhantarīkaraṇanti nāyuttametaṃ nāmena
anya-e0806n0:251_14: pañcannamabhidhānaṃ, vibhattiyo pana jotikā, itthipaccayā ca itthiliṅgassa, tathā
anya-e0806n0:253: Samavetaṃ vade liṅgaṃ, saṅkhyaṃ kammādikammi ceti.
anya-e0806n0:254_0: Ekānekesu syādīnaṃ yathākkamaṃ dassetuṃ ‘tenā’tiādi vuttaṃ, tenāti yena pañcako nāmattho
anya-e0806n0:254_1: adhippeto ekādīsu ca atthesu jo-tanīyesu syādayo vidhiyissanti tena, sabbatthāti
anya-e0806n0:254_3: honti tathāpi ekādayo saṅkhyāya paricchinne atthe vattanti na saṅkhyāmatte, saṅkhyāya
anya-e0806n0:254_4: sambhavābhāvā saṅkhyeye bhavatīti na saṅkhyāpi syādīnamattho”ti (na) kevalaṃ sakattha
anya-e0806n0:254_5: dabbādiyeva syādīnamattho na bhavati, api tu saṅkhyāpītyapisaddattho, anena saṅkhyā
anya-e0806n0:254_6: vibhatyattho catukko nāmatthotyayampakkho nirākato pañcako nāmatthoti dassane saṅkhyākammādīnaṃ
anya-e0806n0:254_7: vibhattiyo jotikā honti, tiko nāmatthoti dassane tu saṅkhyākammādayo vibhattivāccā
anya-e0806n0:254_8: honti, idāni adhippetapañcakanāmatthe sakatthādikaṃ sarūpato dassetuṃ ‘tatthā’tiādimāha,
anya-e0806n0:254_9: tattha sakattho visesananti sarūpādi yaṃ kiñci visesanattena vattumicchitaṃ taṃ sakattho
anya-e0806n0:258: Bhāvābhāvasabhāvo yo, so guṇo nigguṇo mato.
anya-e0806n0:261_0: Idāni sarūpādino visesanassa sakatthabhāvaṃ jātyādivisesassa dabbabhāvañca dassetuṃ
anya-e0806n0:261_2: ettha pana goti jātimattavācini gosadde payutte gosaddo jātimattamāheti so jātiṃ
anya-e0806n0:261_3: viseseti nāma. Yaṭṭhiādisaddehi yaṭṭhiādisahacaritā upacārato gahitāti yaṭṭhiādidabbehi
anya-e0806n0:261_4: yaṭṭhiādisahacaritā purisā visesīyantīti āha-‘dabbampi dabbantarassa visesanabhūtambhavatī’ti,
anya-e0806n0:261_5: yaṭṭhiyopavesayāti yaṭṭhisaddavacanīya yaṭṭhidabbavisiṭṭhe purise pavesayāti attho,
anya-e0806n0:261_6: kuntepavesayāti etthāpi esevanayo, yathāvuttacatubbidhasakatthato paropi atthi sakatthoti
anya-e0806n0:261_7: āha-‘katthacī’tiādi, sambandhanimittoti sambandho nimittaṃ kāraṇaṃ paccayappavattiyā
anya-e0806n0:261_8: assa paccayassa soti samāso, ettha hi daṇḍo assa atthīti assāti sāmino purisassa
anya-e0806n0:261_9: saṃsaṅkhātadaṇḍādidabbena sahayo sassāmisambandho, sopi paccayassa nimittaṃ, tathā
anya-e0806n0:261_10: ca vakkhati-‘daṇḍapurisasambandhā daṇḍīti paccayo’ti, (kiri)yā padatthassāpi visesanattena
anya-e0806n0:261_11: sakatthabhāvo jātipadatthādīnaṃ vutta ṭhāneyeva vattabboti pācakoti ettha kiriyākārakasambandhasaṅkhātaṃ
anya-e0806n0:261_12: parābhimataṃ sakatthampi paropadesenopadisitukāmo idha sambandhasakatthassa vuttaṭṭhāneyeva
anya-e0806n0:261_14: pañcamaṃ nāmasaṅkhātamatthaṃ dabbapadatthena saṅgahetvā jātiguṇakiriyādabbānīti hi
anya-e0806n0:261_15: catubbidho nāmattho, nāmampi anvattharuḷhivasena duvidhaṃ pumitthinapuṃsaka liṅgavasena
anya-e0806n0:261_16: tividhampi catubbidhaṃ hoti… yathāvutte catubbidhe atthe namati, te vā attani nāmetīti
anya-e0806n0:261_17: iminā kāraṇena. sāmaññaguṇa kiriyāyadicchāvasenāññathāpi catubbidhattaṃ nāmassa vadanti,
anya-e0806n0:261_18: tatthāpi yadicchānāmassa dabbanāmeneva saṅgaho veditabbo, itthattaṃ esāti pasiddhimā
anya-e0806n0:261_19: attho, yampanātiādinā vuttamevatthaṃ sādheti ‘tatthe’ccādinā, abhidhāyakattena jotakattena,
anya-e0806n0:261_20: ikārantatoti munisaddato, aññathāti ikārantato na bhavati ce, atoti ādesa bhavanato
anya-e0806n0:261_21: phalaṃ dassitaṃ na siyāti sambandho, vuttiyaṃ ‘evaṃ kumārī kumāriyo’tiādīsu evanti
anya-e0806n0:261_22: yathā pulliṅge ikārantato syādīnamudāharaṇamanādesatthaṃ vuttaṃ evamitthiyampi anākārantatoti
anya-e0806n0:261_23: dasseti, upalakkhaṇaṃ cetaminī-nī-ū-ti-paccayantādīnaṃ, asati…pe… vacaneti iminā
anya-e0806n0:261_25: (1-4-104) iti hi tesaṃ suttaṃ, tassattho ‘syādīnaṃ tyādīnañca vibhattisaññā hotī’ti,
anya-e0806n0:261_26: bhavantīti anvatthavasena vibhattisaddavacanīyāni bhavanti, so (yevattho) vibhatticcanena
anya-e0806n0:261_27: vibhajīyatīti vibhatti, kamme ktippaccayantoyaṃ vibhatti saddoti dasseti, kathampanetesu
anya-e0806n0:261_28: syādīsu vibhajīyaticcassa vākyatthāssānugamo yenevaṃ vuccaticcāsaṅkiya yena yathā
anya-e0806n0:263_0: Vuttiyaṃ kattukiriyāyāti kattusādyatāya taṃ sambandhiniyā kattukammaṭṭhāyapi duvidhāya
anya-e0806n0:263_1: kiriyāya, anekatthattā dhātūnaṃ karoti ettha sambandhanatthoti āha-‘karīyati abhisambandhīyatī’ti,
anya-e0806n0:263_2: yaṃkiñci padattharūpaṃ sambajjhatīti attho, iminā cānvatthavasenevāyaṃ kammavohāro
anya-e0806n0:263_3: siddhoti dasseti, sabbakārakānampi pana kiriyāsambandha sabbhāvepi kiriyābhisambandhīyamānatteneva
anya-e0806n0:263_4: yaṃ vattumicchitaṃ tadeva kammaṃ viññeyyaṃ, kattādi kattu kiriyāyābhisambandhīyamānattepi
anya-e0806n0:263_5: kattādittavacanicchāyeva kammaṃ na hoti… yasmā vacanicchāyeva kārakāni bhavanti,
anya-e0806n0:263_6: evaṃ sabbakārakānampi kārakantarappattiyaṃ tadabhāvo yathāyogaṃ vattabbo, vākyekadesenetyanena
anya-e0806n0:263_7: “dvedvekā”dino vākyassa “kamme dutiyā”iccādino ca ekavākyattaṃ sūceti, pakaraṇassa
anya-e0806n0:263_8: mahāvākyarūpattā vippakaṭṭhānipi vākyāni ākaṅkhādisabhāve aññamaññasambandhānubhavanenekavākyabhāvampaṭīpajjante, vuttī hi–
anya-e0806n0:266_1: tyādinopi dvinnaṃ pūraṇiyā dutiyāti sakkā voharituṃ, tathāpi syādīnaṃ dukeyeva dutiyātatiyā
anya-e0806n0:266_2: ruḷhīti natyādīnaṃ dukāni dutiyādisaddena gayhanti, visiṭṭhesūti kammādinā visesitesu,
anya-e0806n0:266_3: tividhaṃ kammanti sakasamayappasiddhiyā kammassa tividhattamāha, aññe tu sattavidhamicchanti, kathaṃ–
anya-e0806n0:271: Tattha icchitādīni upariyevāpi bhavissanti, tatreccādinā tividhaṃ kammaṃ sarūpato dasseti, tattha nibbattikammameke-nekadhā parikappenti, tadiha pakāsayissāma–
anya-e0806n0:272: Satī-satī vā pakati, na yattha pariṇāminī,
anya-e0806n0:274: Asantaṃ jāyate yaṃ vā, yaṃ santamappakāsati,
anya-e0806n0:276_0: Ayamettha attho “kaṭavikārassa kāsasaṅkhātā vijjamānā pakati pariṇāminī kaṭavikārampati
anya-e0806n0:276_1: pariṇamantī yatthappayoge na nissīyate… kaṭaṃ karotītettha kevalamatthāvagamamattassa
anya-e0806n0:276_2: vattumicchitattā kāseti asuyyamānattā ca, pakatiyā tu suyya mānatte vikāriyaṃ siyā,
anya-e0806n0:276_3: teneva kāse kaṭaṃ karoti, taṇḍule odanaṃ pacatīti dvayattho karoti pacati ca, tasmā
anya-e0806n0:276_4: kāse karoti taṇḍule pacatīti vikārīyati, kaṭaṃ karoti odanampacatīti nibbattī yatīti
anya-e0806n0:276_5: attho, asatī vā pakati avijjamānattāyeva yattha na nissīyate… (yathā) (potthake)
anya-e0806n0:276_6: ( ) saṃyogaṃ janayati vibhāgamuppādayatīti saṃyogavibhāgānaṃ kassāpi pakatiyā avikārattā
anya-e0806n0:276_8: avijjamāna (pakati) kaṃ vā kāriyaṃ nibbattikammaṃ nāmāti eko, aññesamaññathāti vatvā
anya-e0806n0:276_9: tandasseti ‘asanta’miccādinā, yaṃ asantamavijjamānaṃ jāyate, tannibbattikammaṃ, yathā
anya-e0806n0:276_10: sukhaṃ janayati buddhimuppādayatīti, santaṃ vijjamānameva vā kevalamappakāsitapubbaṃ
anya-e0806n0:276_11: yaṃ uppattiyā abhibyattiyā vā pakāsati, tampi nibbattikammaṃ, yathā puttaṃ vijāyatisāmaññamabhibyañjayatī”ti,
anya-e0806n0:276_12: tadevaṃ kesañci matena anissitapakatikaṃ avijjamānapakatikanti duvidhaṃ nibbattikammampi
anya-e0806n0:276_13: aññesammatena asantaṃ jāyamānaṃ santamappakāsamānanti duvidhaṃ nibbattikammampītisabbampi
anya-e0806n0:276_14: aṭṭhitapubbameva jāyatītyasato jānanā na byatiriccaticcāha-‘asato jananaṃ karīyatī’ti,
anya-e0806n0:279_0: Kiñci vikāriyaṃ kammaṃ pakatiyā kāraṇassa ucchedena sambhūtaṃ, yathā kaṭṭhaṃ bhasmaṃ
anya-e0806n0:279_1: karotīti kaṭṭhassāccantaparāvatti parāvattiyā (potthake), kiñci pana guṇantarānamuppattiyā,
anya-e0806n0:279_2: yathā suvaṇṇaṃ kaṭakaṃ keyuraṃ vā karotīti evaṃ dvīdhā sā vikati hotīti attho, na
anya-e0806n0:279_3: vibhāvīyanteti na gamyante, sā patti‘pāpīyati visayīkarīyatī’ti katvā.
anya-e0806n0:281: Dassanā vānumānā vā, sā pattīti pakittitā.
anya-e0806n0:282_0: Yattha kiriyākato kiriyāsampādito viseso atisayo koci nāvagamyate nappatīyate dassanā
anya-e0806n0:282_1: vā paccakkhappamāṇena anumānappamāṇena vā yathā nibbattivikatīnamatisayo paccakkhānumānā
anya-e0806n0:282_2: vagamanīyo, tatra hi nibbattiyaṃ visesasiddhiratipasiddhā… atthalābhākhyassa visesassāvijjamānassa
anya-e0806n0:282_3: kiriyākattā, vikāriye ( ) (eva) (potthake) tu kvaci paccakkhavisayo… kaṭṭhaṃ ḍahatīti
anya-e0806n0:282_5: pasādayati veti visiṭṭhamukhavaṇṇādikāriyānumeyyattā rosādino, evaṃ yattha na visesasiddhi
anya-e0806n0:282_6: api tu pattimattaṃ, sā pattīti pakittitā kathitā, ādiccampassati dhammamajjhetīti
anya-e0806n0:282_7: ayamettha attho, kathañcarahi asantassa santassa (potthake) pattikammassa kiñci (akaronta)ssa
anya-e0806n0:282_8: kārakattaṃ, na hi kiñci akarontaṃ kārakambhavitumarahatīti uccate-
anya-e0806n0:285_0: Atra daṭṭhuṃ sakkā iti dassane khamatā ābhāsopagamo visayattopagamo visayattopagamanaṃ
anya-e0806n0:285_1: byatti ceti evamādayo visesā yathāyogaṃ pattikammassa kiriyānipphattiyaṃ icchitā,
anya-e0806n0:285_2: tato tassa kārakattanti attho, ādiccaṃ passatīti ettha hi ādicco daṭṭhuṃ sakkā, tatova
anya-e0806n0:285_4: tathā ññatrāpyādisaddagahitavisesavasena kiriyāsiddhito kārakattaṃ veditabbaṃ, nanu
anya-e0806n0:285_5: vikāriyampi nibbattikammameva… tena rūpenāsatoyeva jananato, pattikammampi kiriyāsambandharūpenāsantameva
anya-e0806n0:287: Tatra yampetaṃ ghaṭate, yathā patīti saddatthāvattānato.
anya-e0806n0:288_0: Visesānupādānatoti “kamme dutiyā”ti sāmaññena vuttattā vuttaṃ. Karīyati kaṭo, kato
anya-e0806n0:288_1: kaṭo ccevamādīsu tyādippabhutīhi atihitakammādinissayesupi ekattādīsu dutiyādayo
anya-e0806n0:288_2: papponti niyamābhāvā, tathāhi pañcake nāmatthe kaṭādivacanīyassa sambandhī kammādyattho,
anya-e0806n0:288_3: tyādippabhutīti anabhi hitassa saṅkhyākhyassāparassa vibhatyatthassābhidhānāya abhihitesupi
anya-e0806n0:288_4: kaṭādīsu kammādīsu dutiyādayo siyunti pāṇiniyā “kamme dutiyā”ccādīsu (2-3-2) “anabhihite”ti
anya-e0806n0:288_6: jotanāyābhihitesu dutiyādayo siyuṃ, tike pana saṅkhyākammādayo vibhatti vacanīyā,
anya-e0806n0:288_7: tattha yajjapi kammādino paccayenābhidhānaṃ, tathāpyekattādayo nābhihitāti tassa
anya-e0806n0:288_8: saṅkhyākhyassāparassa vibhatyatthassāti dhānāya abhihitesupi kammādīsu dutiyādayo
anya-e0806n0:288_10: āha-‘tatridaṃ siyā’tiādi, tatra tasmiṃ dutiyādi vibhattividhāne idaṃ codyaṃ siyā,
anya-e0806n0:288_11: kinti āha-‘pañcake’iccādi, anabhihitakammādinissayesuti anabhihitā kammādayo nissayā
anya-e0806n0:288_12: yesamekattādīnaṃ, tesūtyattho, dutiyādayo vibhattiyo yathā siyunti jotanāyābhidhānāya
anya-e0806n0:288_13: cāti yujjamānavasena attho veditabbo, abhihitakammādinissayesupīti apisaddena anabhihitakammādinissayamekattādiṃ
anya-e0806n0:288_14: samuccinoti, āsaṅkiyāti pubbakiriyāya vuttanti aparakiriyā veditabbā, pañcake tike
anya-e0806n0:288_15: cā bhihitakammādinissaye sekattādīsu dutiyādippattimāsaṅkāvasena dassetvā catukkavādīnampi
anya-e0806n0:288_17: pāṭipadikattho tappaṭipajjane kammādayo vibhattivacanīyā, tadā ‘anabhihite kamme’tiādinā
anya-e0806n0:288_19: yadā panāyaṃ pakkho ‘saṅkhyā vibhattivacanīyā’ti tadā “kamme dutiyā” tyevamādayo
anya-e0806n0:288_20: niddesā visayasandassanamattāyeva veditabbā”ti, sabbathāti pañcakatikavādīnaṃ catukkavādīnañca
anya-e0806n0:288_22: napuṃsake bhāve kto, na vijjate byatirittaṃ byatireko bhedo yassa taṃ abyatirittaṃ,
anya-e0806n0:288_23: abyatibhinnanti attho, saddatthato sakatthato abyatirittaṃ atthamattaṃ atthasāmaññaṃ
anya-e0806n0:289_0: Kiñcāpi vuttiyaṃ tabbādiṇādisamāsehi abhihitamavuttaṃ, tathāpi tehi abhihitepyevameva
anya-e0806n0:289_1: daṭṭhabbanti nidassento āha-‘eva’miccādi, kara-karaṇe karīyitthāti kato‘kto bhāvakammesu’ti
anya-e0806n0:289_2: (5-56) kamme kto, satikoti ettha kītoti kammatthe “dissantaññepi paccayā”ti (4-120)
anya-e0806n0:289_3: iko, kammatāgamyate kitappaccayādīnaṃ kamme vihitattā, evañca dhuhi kimekamudāharaṇaṃ
anya-e0806n0:289_4: dattamācariyene tyato āha- ‘udāharaṇa’iccādi, anabhihiteti vacanaṃ vināpīti vacanaṃ
anya-e0806n0:289_5: vinā evāti avadhāraṇe-apisaddo, sambhāvanevā, yadyabhihitehi vacanaṃ vināpi dutiyādīnamappavatti
anya-e0806n0:289_6: bhaveyya, vacanasabbhāve tu kathāyeva natthīti attho, evañca panettha dutiyādīnamabhihite
anya-e0806n0:289_7: pasaṅgābhāvo jānitabbo “paccate odano, kato kaṭoccādopi yadi dutiyādayo siyuṃ paṭhamāvidhānassāvakāso
anya-e0806n0:289_8: na bhaveyya tato sāmatthiyānabhihiteyeva kammādo dutiyādayo sakiriyā (yaṃ tada)bhibyattiyā
anya-e0806n0:289_9: bhavissanti, paṭhamevatvabhihite”ti, na nuca paṭhamāyākārakamavakāso rukkho pilakkhoti
anya-e0806n0:289_10: rukkho pilakkhoti kriyāpadaṃ na sūyateti vibhatyantarassappatti maññatebhassāpadīpa
anya-e0806n0:289_11: kimidamuccate akārakanti yadya kārakaṃ nedampayogamarahati tato yattha visesakiriyāna
anya-e0806n0:289_12: massavanaṃ tattha padatthasahacaritāya sattāya patītiyā ‘rukkho atthi pilakkho atthī’ti
anya-e0806n0:289_13: apekkhīyatīti kārakattaṃ rukkhādīna mattheveti attheveti ññataṃ vatthuṃ paraṃ patipādayituṃ
anya-e0806n0:289_14: saddo payujjate ññaṇañca satoiti yatra kriyāpadantarassa appayogo tatra ussaggato
anya-e0806n0:289_15: sattā patītitutthīti kriyāpadānusaṅgara kattari tatiyappasaṅgaranavakāsā paṭhamā
anya-e0806n0:289_16: tyattho-bhassapadīpa, na ca uccaṃ nīcaṃtyadhikaraṇavācitte vācikā nipātassa atthītyanena
anya-e0806n0:289_17: natthi sambandhoti uccamatthītyādheyyasseva kattuttaṃ nādhārassātya kārakattamādhārassātyavakāso-tthi
anya-e0806n0:289_18: paṭhamāyāti “paṭhamāvidhā nassāvakāso na bhaveyyā”ti yathāvutto-yaṃ hetu asiddhoti
anya-e0806n0:289_19: ca sakkā vattuṃ, asaṅkhyato paṭhamātyavatvā “paṭhamāttha matte”ti (2.39) sāmaññavidhānato
anya-e0806n0:290_0: Yañcāti casaddo vattabbantarasamuccaye aparampi kiñci vattabbamatthīti attho, yañca
anya-e0806n0:290_1: phalaṃ maññateti sambandho, yadetthāna bhihitādhikāro natthi tadā yathā ‘kato kaṭo’ccatrattena
anya-e0806n0:290_2: kammassābhihitattā dutiyā na hoti tathā ‘kaṭaṃ karoti vipulaṃ dassanīya’nti kaṭasaddato
anya-e0806n0:290_3: uppannāya dutiyāya (vipulādigatassa) kammassā bhihitattā vipulādīhi visesanehi dutiyā
anya-e0806n0:290_4: na siyā, tato tyādi tabbādiṇādisamāsehi kammassāna bhihitattamattevāti vipulādīhipi
anya-e0806n0:290_5: dutiyāvidhānasaṅkhātaṃ anabhihite”ti (2-3-1) anabhihita vacanassa adhikāre yañca
anya-e0806n0:290_6: phalaṃ cintayatīti attho, yuttassātimassa attho sambandhassāti, paccekaṃ karotyabhisambandhatāyāti
anya-e0806n0:290_7: ‘kaṭaṃ karoti vipulaṃ karoti dassanīyaṃ karoti’ccevaṃ paccekaṃ paccekaṃ karotissābhisambandhatāyāti
anya-e0806n0:290_8: attho, kammatā atthīti seso, evaṃ maññate-“kaṭaṃ karomīti pavatto vipulaṃ karomī
anya-e0806n0:290_9: dassaniyaṃ karomīti ca pavattovāti vipulādīnampi paccekaṃ kammatā attheva, tatthekassābhidhāne
anya-e0806n0:290_10: parekassa sukhamavalokayantīti tadabhidhānāyapi dutiyā bhavissatī”ti, pakārantarāvatāro
anya-e0806n0:290_11: nācariye noparodhitoti tampi panettha dassayissāma-“kaṭasaddā uppajjamānā dutiyā
anya-e0806n0:290_12: kaṭajāti kammamabhihitavatī, na vipulādiguṇakammaṃ, tato tadabhidhānāya ca dutiyāyeva
anya-e0806n0:290_13: bhavati, athavā kaṭova kammaṃ, taṃ sāmānādhikaraṇyena vipulādīhipi dutiyā bhavissati,
anya-e0806n0:290_14: kaṭaṃ karoti vipulo dassanīyoti hi vuccamāne vipulādayo kattusamānādhikaraṇatāyeva
anya-e0806n0:290_15: patīyeyyuṃ tasmā kaṭasaddasāmānādhikaraṇyampaṭipādayatā vassamettha dutiyā karaṇīyā”ti.
anya-e0806n0:290_16: Nanvemiccādicodyaṃ, evanti evaṃ guṇayuttassa kammatāya sati, pappotīti kaṭa kamme-bhidhāniye
anya-e0806n0:290_17: (kato) ti ktappaccayassa katattā udārādito karotyabhisambandhā dutiyā pappotīti attho,
anya-e0806n0:290_18: evaṃ maññateccādi parihāro, avayavena kammaṃ na vadatīti sambandho, avayavenāti visuṃvisuṃ,
anya-e0806n0:290_19: kiñcarahīti āha-‘sabhāvato sabbaṃ kammaṃ vadatī’ti. Hotu kāmaṃ udārāditopi vuttena
anya-e0806n0:290_20: vidhinā paṭhamā, katasaddato kā pavattatīti āha-‘katasaddato pi’ccādi, antobhūto
anya-e0806n0:290_21: antogadho nāmassa saddassa attho yasmiṃ kammalakkhaṇattheso attho kammalakkhaṇo abhihito
anya-e0806n0:290_22: kathito sampanno sampajjatīti attho, nanu ‘kato kaṭo’ccādo sabhāvato sabbakammavuttiyā
anya-e0806n0:290_23: antobhūtanāmatthavuttiyā cātthamatte hoti sabbattha paṭhamāti ‘kaṭaṃ karoti uḷāraṃ
anya-e0806n0:290_24: sobhanaṃ dassanīya’nti kaṭāditopi uppannāya dutiyāya kammassābhihitattā uḷārādīhi
anya-e0806n0:290_25: paṭhamāppasaṅgo siyāti abhihitābhidhānappasaṅgopagataṃ codanaṃ manasi nidhāyāha-‘kaṭādisaddo
anya-e0806n0:291_1: icchitatame kammasaññaṃ vidhāya nibbatyādikesutīsu kammesu dutiyā vidhīyate pāṇinīyehi,
anya-e0806n0:291_2: icchitatamattañca tadatthattā kiriyāya, odanaṃ pacati gāvumpayo dohatityādo(hi) odanādyatthā
anya-e0806n0:291_4: vibhattiṃ vidhāya dutiyābhimatāti sambandho, puna payādinipphattinimittaṃ yaṃkiñci
anya-e0806n0:291_5: dohanādikiriyā yuttaṃ karaṇādirūpena akathitaṃ gavādikamicchitaṃ kārakaṃ, tatthāpi
anya-e0806n0:291_6: “akathitañcā”ti (1-4-51) kammasaññaṃ vidhāya teneva dutiyā vidhīyate, tadupadassetumāha-‘upayujjamāne’ccādi,
anya-e0806n0:294_1: gavādi, apubbavidhimhi apādānādhikaraṇādi pubbasaññā vidhānābhāve, vidhāne hi māṇavakā
anya-e0806n0:294_2: maggaṃ pucchati, rukkhā phalānyavacinātyādi yathārahaṃ bhavati, guṇāsattanti guṇena
anya-e0806n0:294_3: sattaṃ sambandhī, guṇasaddenettha padhānasādhanaṃ dhammādikaṃ vattumicchitaṃ padhānasādhanañhi
anya-e0806n0:294_4: kiriyāyopakārakamupakāriyaṃ padhānabhūtaṃ kiriyamapekkhiya guṇo bhavati, co-nuttasamuccaye,
anya-e0806n0:294_5: padhānantu dhammādino pavattiyā tadatthattā, upayujjamānañca taṃ payopabhuticeti
anya-e0806n0:294_6: visesanasamāsaṃ katvā upayujjamānapayoppabhutino nimittanti chaṭṭhīsamāso, pabhuti
anya-e0806n0:294_7: saddena gavādino gahaṇaṃ, ādisaddena gomantādino, dutiyenādi saddena adhikaraṇādino,
anya-e0806n0:294_8: catutthena vinayādino, vidhānanti dutiyā vidhānaṃ, dutiyāvidhānamabhimatanti yojanīyaṃ.
anya-e0806n0:294_10: dutiyā” (2-3-2) tyaneneva dutiyā vidhīyate, tandassetumāha-‘yene’ccādi, “tathā yuttañcānicchita”ntīmassa
anya-e0806n0:297_2: kamma saññā siddhāti tattha “kamme dutiyā”ti dutiyā vidhīyate, tandasseti’nevicchitanānicchitasmā’iccādi,
anya-e0806n0:297_3: rukkhamūlaṃ nevicchitaṃ pubbamanabhimatattā, nāpyanicchitaṃ appaṭikūlattā, gāmagamena
anya-e0806n0:297_4: hyassa tapparatā, rukkhamūlopasappanantu pasaṅgāgatanti rukkhamūlānampi kiriyābhisambandho attheva, atrāpi-
anya-e0806n0:300_1: ajādayo tvicchitatamā, ādisaddena ‘pattheti gāvuṃ purisaṃ dvijo’tyādayo saṅgahitā,
anya-e0806n0:300_2: nayatinī=pāpuṇane, vahati vaha=pāpuṇane, harati hara=haraṇe, jayatiji=jaye, sabbatthaleca
anya-e0806n0:300_3: ette ayādese ca rūpaṃ, daṇḍa=daṇḍane curādittā ṇimhi rūpaṃ, atha “adhisīṭṭhāsānaṃ
anya-e0806n0:300_4: kammaṃ”tyādinā (1-4-46) tena tena kammasaññaṃ vidhāya ‘paṭhaviṃ adhisessatī’ti ādo
anya-e0806n0:300_5: (tattha) tattha “kamme dutiyā”ti (2-3-2) dutiyā vidhīyate tehi tehi sattha kārehi,
anya-e0806n0:300_7: āha-‘adhipubba’iccādi, yāya vatticchāya dutiyā siyā tāya vatticchāya kammatā kathaṃhināmāti
anya-e0806n0:300_8: sambandho, neva upalabbhantīti kadācikassaci siyāti sambandho, payatitabbanti suttantaramārabbhanīyaṃ,
anya-e0806n0:300_9: tatthevaṃ kiṃ bhavato manasi dosadhijambhanenāti attho, dhammeti etthāpi evaṃ saddaṃ
anya-e0806n0:300_10: yojetvā attho veditabbo, yathā ādhāre kammavacanicchā, tathehāpi ādhāravacanicchāti
anya-e0806n0:300_11: attho, tenevāha-‘dhammeti ādhāravacanicchā’ti, dhamme abhinivisateti sambandho, evaṃsaddasamānatthattā
anya-e0806n0:300_12: tathā saddassa tadatthānusāreneva viññāyatīti tathāsaddassa attho visuṃ na vutto,
anya-e0806n0:300_13: pānañca ācāroca pānācāraṃ, taṃpānācāramassa ādhārassa tasmiṃ tappānācāre, pānatthācāratthadhātusambandhī
anya-e0806n0:300_14: yo nadyādi ko ādhāro so pānācāravāyevāti āha- ‘pānatthācāratthānaṃ dhātūnamādhāre’ti,
anya-e0806n0:300_15: kesañcīti aniyamena kesañci saddasatthakārānaṃ, etthāti etasmiṃ ādhāravacanicchāpakkhe,
anya-e0806n0:300_16: patiparīhi bhāgecetyavasiddhāti iminā patisaddassa dhātunā ayuttataṃ dasseti… yadi
anya-e0806n0:300_17: yujjeyya chaṭṭhiyābhāvā, tenāha-‘yadātvi’ccādi, vuttiyaṃ tenāti tasaddena, apisaddopasaṅgahitaṃ
anya-e0806n0:302_0: Yadā kāladdhānamiccādinā‘māsamāsate kosaṃ sayati’ccādo akammakehipi yoge kālabhāvaddhadesānaṃ
anya-e0806n0:302_1: parehi kammattamanuññātanti ca, yadātviccādinā tu kiriyāva sabbenasabbaṃ na sūyati,
anya-e0806n0:302_2: tathā sati kuto ca kammattanti teheva vuttantī ca dasseti, gamma mānakiriyāyogopi
anya-e0806n0:302_3: na nissito… māsamāsateccādīsu āsanādi āsanādīsu (potthake) kiriyānaṃ māsādiyogo viya
anya-e0806n0:302_4: kalyāṇittaguṇādiyogo ca lokassa patītipathamupayātīti, na sijjhatīti kiriyā na honti
anya-e0806n0:302_5: guṇadabbānīti kiriyāsambandhābhāvā kammattābhāvoti na sijjhati, guḷena missā dhānā
anya-e0806n0:302_6: bhajjitayavā guḷadhānā. Ajjhayanakiriyāya pabbatena ca māsakosānaṃ sākallena sambandhābhāvā
anya-e0806n0:302_7: accantasaṃyogābhāvoti māsassātiādīsu na dutiyā. Pubbaṇhe samayanti iminā pubbaṇhe
anya-e0806n0:302_8: samayoti sattamīāmādisamāsaṃ dasseti, accanta mevāti iminā samayassa sākallena viharaṇakiriyāya
anya-e0806n0:302_9: sambandhamāha, yaṃsamayaṃ karuṇāvihārena vihāsi, taṃ ekaṃsamayanti sambandho, upasaṅkamanakiriyāyaccantameva
anya-e0806n0:302_10: yuttoti iminā nivāsanaviharaṇa kiriyāhipi pubbaṇhasamayādīnamaccantameva yuttataṃ
anya-e0806n0:302_12: vipallāso yathāpakatamatikkamma aññathā bhavanaṃ, idha pana sattami yampattāyaṃ sattamyatthe
anya-e0806n0:303_2: tathāpīti vuttakkamena karaṇattasambhavā tatiyāya vijjamānāyapi, siyāti tatiyā siyā,
anya-e0806n0:303_3: tañcāti taṃ karaṇañca. Kārakamajjheti ettha chaṭṭhī samāso kārakasaddena ca sattikārakaṃ
anya-e0806n0:303_4: gahitanti (āha) ‘dvinnaṃ kattusattīnaṃ majjhe’ti, abhinnassāpi hi ekassa devadattādikattuno
anya-e0806n0:303_5: bhinnānaṃ taṃsamavetānaṃ kattusattīnaṃ majjhe kāladdhānāni, sattibhedameva byañjayamāha-‘tathāhi’ccādi,
anya-e0806n0:303_6: ekatthāti ekasmiṃ devadatte, dvīhetīte (bhuñjikriyā) sādhananti sambandho, dvinnaṃ
anya-e0806n0:303_7: ahānaṃ samāhāro dvīhaṃ tasmiṃ. Isumasatīti vā, isumhi āso asseti vā nipphannena issāsasaddena
anya-e0806n0:303_8: gammamānaṃ kiriyaṃ dasseti ‘isvasane’ti, nanviccādi codyaṃ, dhanupañcasataṃ koso,
anya-e0806n0:303_9: evamaññateccādi parihāro, chaṭṭhiyāsampattāyanti kosassekadeseti evaṃ chaṭṭhiyā sampattāyaṃ,
anya-e0806n0:303_10: muttasaṃsayenedaṃ samānanti mutto saṃsayo yasmiṃ avadhyādo tenetaṃ tulyanti attho.
anya-e0806n0:303_11: Vuttiyaṃ abhimatāti “sattamī pañcamiyo kārakamajjhe”ti (2-3-7) vacanena sattamīpañcamiyo
anya-e0806n0:303_12: papañcattamabhimatā, dvīhe bhuñjissatīti dvīsu divasesu gatesu bhuñjissatīti attho,
anya-e0806n0:303_14: bāhullaṃ nissāya vuttaṃ, dvīhā bhuñjissati kosā vijjhatīti dvīhā nikkhamma bhuñjissati,
anya-e0806n0:303_15: kosā nikkhamma ṭhitaṃ lakkhaṃ vijjhati upāttavisayo-yamavadhi, kose vijjhatīti kose
anya-e0806n0:305_0: Katacatthasamāsāti kato catthasamāso yesu te tathā vuttā, aññapadatthavuttayoti aññapadatthe
anya-e0806n0:305_1: vutti yesanti byadhikaraṇaññapadatthasamāso, cattasamāse gatyādīnaṃ visuṃvisuṃ padhānattā
anya-e0806n0:305_2: tehi paraṃ payujjamāno atthasaddo gatyādīhi paccekamabhisambajjhatīti maññate, atha
anya-e0806n0:305_3: sutte ‘payojje’iccetāvatyuccamāne payojjo sayaṃ kattāti kathaṃ viññāyati yena ‘payojje
anya-e0806n0:305_4: kattarī’ti vivaraṇaṃ katamiccāsaṅkiyāha-‘gatyādyattha’miccādi, ādisaddena bodhā dīnaṃ
anya-e0806n0:305_5: gahaṇaṃ, takkiriyāsamatthovāti tassā gatyādikāya kiriyāya samattho eva niyujjateti
anya-e0806n0:305_6: sambandho, kiriyākaraṇe samattho nāma kattāvāti āha-‘soca kattā’ti. Dutiyāya siddhāyāti
anya-e0806n0:305_7: vakkhamānanayena payojjassa kattuno kammattasiddhiyā “kamme dutiyā”ti sutteneva kamme
anya-e0806n0:305_8: dutiyāya siddhāya. Kiṃ lakkhaṇo-yaṃ niyamo yadatthami damārabhīyaticcāha-‘gatyādyatthāna’miccādi,
anya-e0806n0:305_9: paccudāharīyissate ‘etesameve’ccādinā, tathācābbhupagame, payojjo kattā na kammaṃ
anya-e0806n0:305_10: tyabbhupagamma payojje kattarī’ti vivaritanti attho, sāmatthiyampanaiccādinā sāmatthiyasarūpamāha,
anya-e0806n0:305_11: gati ādyatthānanti padacchedo, niyujjamāno payojakabyāpārasaṅkhātāya kiriyāya sambandhīyamānattā
anya-e0806n0:305_12: kammabhūtova bhavatīti attho, ayametthādhippāyo “gamanādikiriyāya sādhanattā yadipi
anya-e0806n0:305_13: payojjo kattā, tathāpi so payojakena gamanādīsu byāpāriyamāno payojakassa byāpāralakkhaṇāya
anya-e0806n0:305_14: kiriyāya sambandhīyamāno yadi kammaṃ na hoti aññathā kiṃ hotīti aññathānupapattilakkhaṇena
anya-e0806n0:305_15: sāmatthiyena kammabhūtova hotī”ti (attho) (potthake) ( ), patīyateti iminā patītivasenevāssa
anya-e0806n0:305_16: kammatā, sabhāvato tu payojjo kattāvātipi ñāpeti, payojakoti sabbattha devadattādiko
anya-e0806n0:305_18: atthaggahaṇassa, bodhatthassa udāharaṇanti seso, nanu vacanappayojanaṃ dassayatā
anya-e0806n0:305_19: vacanamevopadassiya pañho kātabbo, atha ‘etesamevā’tyavijjamāneneva kathaṃ tyāsaṅkiyāha
anya-e0806n0:305_20: ‘etesameve’ccādi, heṭṭhā vuttakkamena niyamatthattā vacanassa evakāro labbhati, sambandhivacanattā
anya-e0806n0:305_21: etasaddassa tena yathāpaṭhitā gatyādayova visessabhūtā saṅkhepena parāmasīyantīti
anya-e0806n0:305_22: ete samevāti katanti maññate evosañcāti maññate (potthake), (gacchati devadattoti…pe…
anya-e0806n0:305_23: nahotīti) iminā imamatthañca joteti “yadipi kiriyābhisambandhā payojjassa viya kattunopi
anya-e0806n0:305_24: kammattampasajjati, tathāpi payojjeti vuttattā kattari devadatte dutiyā nappasajjatī”ti,
anya-e0806n0:305_25: abhimatāti “gatibuddhyā”di (1-4-52) suttena payojjassa kattuno kammasaññaṃ vidhāya
anya-e0806n0:305_26: tasmiṃ payojjedutiyābhimatā, carahisaddo pucchāyaṃ, payojetīti asmiṃ uddese tadā
anya-e0806n0:305_27: kathaṃ bhavitabbanti sesoti yadācarahiccādivākyassāvasāne payojetīti asmiṃ uddese
anya-e0806n0:305_28: vacanasamīpe’tadā kathambhavitabba’nti pāṭhaseso hotīti attho veditabbo, yāvatāti
anya-e0806n0:305_29: tatiyantapaṭīrūpako nipāto, yasmā dattho vattate, yasmā dutiyā pappoti tasmā ‘yaññadattene’ti
anya-e0806n0:307_0: Niyameneccādinā vacanārambhassa payojanamāha, sāpi tatiyāpi dutiyāpiti vattabba yadātviccādinā
anya-e0806n0:307_1: harati nāhāratthe naharatyatthe (potthake) tipi viññāpeti, ubhayatthāti dutiyāya
anya-e0806n0:307_2: pattāya appattāya ca, vibhāsā vikappoti attho, kāretikara-karaṇe, lettāyādesātilatta
anya-e0806n0:309: Khādayati ādayati khāda, ada=bhakkhaṇe, avhāpayati vhe=avhāne āpubbo, “payojakabyāpāre ṇāpice”ti (5-16) ṇāpimhi pubbasaralopo, kandayati kanda=avhānarodanesu.
anya-e0806n0:310_1: dutiyā na bhavatī”ti, niyantā sārathi kiriyāsiddhiṃ niyāmakoti vatvā tameva pakāsetumāha-‘kiriyaṅga’miccādi,
anya-e0806n0:310_2: kiriyaṅga kiriyopakaraṇabhūtaṃ balī baddādiṃ kiriyākāraṇaṃ, niyametvāti ekasmiṃ karaṇīye
anya-e0806n0:310_3: kiriyā visaye patiṭṭhapetvā, vāhayati bhāraṃ devadattenetyatra hi devadatto paññavā
anya-e0806n0:310_4: puriso niyantāramantareneva bhāraṃ vahatītyaniyantuko kattā, vāhayati bhāraṃ balībadde
anya-e0806n0:310_5: iccatra tu balībaddā niyantā ramantarena na vahantīti saniyantukā.
anya-e0806n0:311_1: dutiyā na bhavatī”ti, atha kathamettha hiṃsatthatā bhakkhissa hiṃsā hi cetanāvati
anya-e0806n0:311_2: sambhavati, na cetthasassaṃ cetanāvantanti āha-‘sabbe’iccādi, sabbeti rukkhādayo,
anya-e0806n0:311_4: nanu buddhavacana nissitamidaṃ byākaraṇaṃ, tathā sati sammatameve-ttho-padassetvā
anya-e0806n0:311_5: gantabbaṃ kinnāmāññadassanopagātādhirenāti tuṇhī hoti nikkāraṇissā nikkammissā (potthake)
anya-e0806n0:311_6: bhavato-pāyoti viññāyati, paratthānubaddhakicchaṃ pana mahāpuññapaññā na kiñci viya
anya-e0806n0:311_7: maññanti, hoti (hi) etena parattho “matantarepi siddhi sissānaṃ, taṃtaṃ mataññuno
anya-e0806n0:311_8: vā kadāci karahaci yadidamavalokeyyuṃ te cetthāvatāraṃ cetthakāraṃ (potthake) labheyyuṃ
anya-e0806n0:311_9: etādiso ca paññavā paṭiladdhabuddhavacanappasādo’ti tadavatārena ca buddhe bhagavati
anya-e0806n0:311_10: kamena daḷhaṃ pasādaṃ paṭilabheyyu”nti, evamevaṃ tattha tattha taṃtaṃbyākaraṇodāharaṇappasaṅgepi
anya-e0806n0:312_1: vedāvedita (potthake) mahāpaññāpāṭavānaṃ paññavantānaṃ sāminā mahāsāminā sambuddhasāsanaratanavaropakārakena
anya-e0806n0:312_6: etthādisaddo pakāravācī, tena yācippabhutayo gayhanti, kammadvayayuttānanti niddhāraṇe
anya-e0806n0:312_7: chaṭṭhī, tena kammadvayayuttānaṃ majjhe duhādīnamappadhānepi gavādo kamme tyādippabhutayoti
anya-e0806n0:312_8: yojanā. Iccāditiādisaddena ‘avarundhati vajaṃ gāvaṃ avarundhīyate vajaṃ go’iccādīnaṃ
anya-e0806n0:312_9: pariggaho, gamanādyatthāna mityādisaddena bodhatthādīnaṃ gahaṇaṃ. Gamīyate gāmo devadattanti
anya-e0806n0:312_10: ettha kathaṃ payojjattasambhavoti āha-‘purise’ccādi, yajjapi gāmo tuṇhī hoti nibyāpārattā
anya-e0806n0:312_11: purisova tu gamanakiriyaṃ nipphādeti, tathāpi purisassa gamanakiriyāya yaṃphalappattilakkhaṇaṃ,
anya-e0806n0:312_12: tamubhinnampi gāmapurisānaṃ samānanti purisa kiriyātulyaphalattā gāmopi gamanakiriyāya
anya-e0806n0:312_13: kattubyapadese kāraṇaṃ bhavatīti adhippāyo, tathāhi gāmaṃ gacchanto koci gāme āsanne
anya-e0806n0:312_14: sati vadati ‘āgato gāmo patto gāmo’ti, atoññesanti ye kammadvayayuttā duhādayo gamanādyatthācodāhaṭā,
anya-e0806n0:312_15: etehi aññesaṃ, padhāne kammebhi ajādimhi padhāne kamme, padhānattampana ajādīnaṃ
anya-e0806n0:312_16: kiriyāya payojanattā, ajādyatthā hyānayanakiriyārabhyate. Ayampanettha saṅgaho-
anya-e0806n0:313: “Duhi yāci rudhi pucchi, bhikkhi ci bruvi sāsi ca;
anya-e0806n0:314: Ji daṇḍi patthi manthī ca, dhātū honti duhādayo.
anya-e0806n0:320: Payogo pana sambandhacintāyamiha ca vuttānusārena sabbathā viññeyyā.
anya-e0806n0:322_0: Pubbe kiriyānissayena kārakanissayena (potthake) dutiyāya vihitattā āha ‘idāni’ccādi,
anya-e0806n0:322_1: dhisaddassa atthappadhāna niddesena vā ādisaddena vā ‘hā devadatta’ntipi hoti, hā
anya-e0806n0:322_2: devadattadukkhanti tu dukkhena yogā devadattena na yutto hotīti paṭhamāvāmantaṇe.
anya-e0806n0:322_3: Nanuca antarāsaddena yoge yathārājagahanālandāhi dutiyā (tathā) antarā ca rājagahaṃ
anya-e0806n0:322_4: antarā ca nā landa(nti tathā) antarāmaggeti ettha maggatopi antarāmaggatopi kasmā
anya-e0806n0:322_5: na dutiyāti tenāyogā, yesañhi taṃmajjhaṃ te tena yujjantīti tehiyeva dutiyā, athavābbhupagatepi
anya-e0806n0:322_6: taṃyoge taṃsambandhīyeva maggoti mukhyattā tato sabbassa (potthake) na dutiyā, atrāpi
anya-e0806n0:322_7: chaṭṭhīyeva pappoti antarā tañca mañca kamaṇḍaluiti, tava mama majjhe kamaṇḍalutyattho,
anya-e0806n0:322_8: atha kamaṇḍalusaddato dutiyā kasmā na bhavati satīpyantarena yoge tassa padhānattā,
anya-e0806n0:322_9: tathāhi kamaṇḍaluno sakatthā pavatti, tumhamhānantu paratthā-kamaṇḍaluvisesanattena
anya-e0806n0:322_10: tesaṃ pavattattā, tatra kamaṇḍaluno sakatthe vattamānattā padhānattenāvatattā pāṭipadikato
anya-e0806n0:322_11: accutattā parattā paṭhameva bhavatīti jīnindabuddhinyāsa. Nindādi lakkhaṇassa sambandhassa
anya-e0806n0:322_12: sabbhāvā sabbattha sambandhachaṭṭhiyā sampattāyaṃ vacanaṃ, ākatigaṇo-yaṃ.
anya-e0806n0:324_0: Lakkhaṇādīsvatthesuti nāmassā kassā (potthake) yamatthaniddesoti āha ‘abhināyo yutto’ccādi,
anya-e0806n0:324_1: tenāti abhinā yuttassātthaniddesa kāraṇena, lakkhaṇasaddena hetu vattumicchitoti
anya-e0806n0:324_2: āha-‘tatthe’ccādi, duvidho hetu, vuttañhi subodhālaṅkāre “janako ñāpako ceti, duvidhā
anya-e0806n0:324_3: hetavo siyu”nti (252), samupalakkhayatīti samupalakkhaṇaṃ, saṅketamattaṃ ñāpakaṃ,
anya-e0806n0:324_4: na tu janakaṃ, saṅketopi lakkhaṇamuccate lakkhīyate kāriyamānenāti katvā, janakassāpyatra
anya-e0806n0:324_5: lakkhaṇattena gahaṇe payojanaṃ “anunā” (2-10) iccatra daṭṭhabbaṃ. Kañcipakāranti
anya-e0806n0:324_6: iminā itthaṃsaddassa atthaṃ vadati. Pattoti iminā bhūtasaddassa, ettha hi bhūdhātu
anya-e0806n0:324_7: pattiyaṃ vattate, rukkholakkhaṇanti rukkho ñāpakahetūti attho… rukkhena vijjuyā ñāpīyamānattā,
anya-e0806n0:324_8: ācariyajinindabuddhi pana aññathā vaṇṇayati, tassedaṃ mataṃ-
anya-e0806n0:325: Kriyāya jotako nāyaṃ, sambandhassa na vācako;
anya-e0806n0:327_0: Ayamettha attho “ayamabhi abhinandatityādīsu viya kiriyāya jotako na hoti, chaṭṭhī
anya-e0806n0:327_1: viya sambandhassa vācako na hoti, nikkosambītyatra gamanakiriyāpekkhī nisaddo viya
anya-e0806n0:327_2: nāpi kiriyantarā pekkhī, kiñcarahi sambandhassa tu bhedako visesako bhavatī”ti tamupadassetumāha-‘aññe
anya-e0806n0:327_3: tvi’ccādi, ettha itisaddo nidassane, rukkhampatvā vijjotate itievaṃ pattikiriyāya
anya-e0806n0:327_4: patvātivuttarukkhapāpanakiriyāya janitoti attho, tathāhi rukkhassa vijjuyā pāpanābhāve
anya-e0806n0:327_5: vijjuyā lakkhiyāya tallaṇassa ca rukkhassa yo lakkhiyalakkhaṇabhāvo sambandho, so
anya-e0806n0:327_6: kena sampādito bhaveyya, nanu sambandhe abhinā jotīyamāne rukkhassa lakkhaṇavuttitā
anya-e0806n0:327_7: kathaṃ jotīyatīti āha-‘lakkhaṇatthoca visayabhāvenā’ti, tathācetyādinā tasmiṃ pakkhe
anya-e0806n0:327_8: sambhāvitaṃ dosamubbhāvayati, tatrāya miccādinā yathāvuttadosaparihārāya parehevābhidhīyamānamparihāramāha,
anya-e0806n0:327_10: atoyevupari yathāvutta pakkhanissayeneva byākhyāyate, devadattassa sādhuttasaṅkhātaitthampakārappattiyā
anya-e0806n0:327_11: visayabhāvenāvaṭṭhitā mātā tattha vattati nāmāti āha-‘mātuyā’tiādi, mātā ca itthambhūte
anya-e0806n0:327_12: pavattā visaya bhāvena devadatto ca tattha visayībhāvena, tesañca visayavisayībhāvalakkhaṇo
anya-e0806n0:327_13: sambandho itthampattilakkhaṇāya kiriyāya jāto, so mātusambandho hoti kāraṇavasena,
anya-e0806n0:327_14: socātinā jotīyatīti mātu tenābhinā yogoti āha-‘yvāya’ccādi, mātusambandhoiti yojanā,
anya-e0806n0:327_15: itthampattiyāti itthampattilakkhaṇāya kiriyāya karaṇabhūtāya, evaṃ maññate “kiñcāpi
anya-e0806n0:327_16: so sambandho devadattenāpyavinābhāvīti tassa sobhinā jotīyate, tathāpi mātusambandhobhinā
anya-e0806n0:327_17: jotīyatīti ‘mātu tena yogo’ti ca (vuccati)… saddasattiyā taggatāyeva dutiyāya ubhayagatassāpi
anya-e0806n0:327_18: sambandhassa jotanato”ti rukkho rukkho tiṭṭhatīti sambandho, ṭhitimpaṭiccāti ṭhitinnissāya
anya-e0806n0:327_19: esaṃ rukkhānaṃ yo ca sambandhoti yojanā, rukkhānanti iminā rukkhā kiriyāya pare sambandhinoti
anya-e0806n0:327_20: ñāpeti, ṭhitimpaṭiccāti iminā pana tiṭṭhatisaddavacanīyā sādhyarūpā ṭhitikiriyā rukkhato
anya-e0806n0:327_23: viññeyyaṃ, so ca rukkhasambandho-bhinā jotīyatīti āha-‘so’tiādi, dvibbacaneneva jotanīyāti
anya-e0806n0:327_24: vicchātthe vuttimatte satīpi vibhattiyā vicchatthe vutkimattetyādivacanaṃ vicāreretabbaṃvitattiyā
anya-e0806n0:327_25: abisaddassaca vicchatthe vuttiyā abhāvā, lakkhaṇitthambhūti hi pakativisesanaṃ jotetumasamatthattā
anya-e0806n0:329_0: Upādiyamānoti abbhupagammamāno, yadi pana upādiyamāno bhāgo, anupādiyamāno kathanti
anya-e0806n0:329_1: āha-‘yo panā’tiādi, tagarakuṭṭhā gandhabbavisesā, mamābhajatīti maṃ ābhajati, mama
anya-e0806n0:331_0: Natulakkhaṇanti saccakiriyā vuṭṭhiyā hetu hoti, na tu saṅketoti attho, hetuttā lakkhaṇattābhāve
anya-e0806n0:331_1: saccakiriyāya kathaṃ lakkhaṇe dutiyāti hetuttepi lakkhaṇattamassa sādhento sādhammapayogenānvayamāha-‘yaṃ
anya-e0806n0:331_2: sakimpi’ccādi, ettha hi lakkhaṇaṃ sacca kiriyāti paṭiññā, pakkho (potthake) sakimpi
anya-e0806n0:331_3: nimittatāya kappanattāti hetu, yaṃ sakimpi nimittatāya kappate tampi lakkhaṇaṃ bhavati,
anya-e0806n0:331_4: yathā’api bhavaṃ kamaṇḍalupāṇiṃ sissamaddakkhī’ti sādhammapayogenānvayo daṭṭhabbo,
anya-e0806n0:331_5: kappateti samatthoti attho, kamaṇḍalu pāṇimhi asseti kamaṇḍalupāṇī, apīti pañhe,
anya-e0806n0:331_6: kadāci kenaci kamaṇḍalupāṇīsisso diṭṭho so tameva dassanaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ katvā pucchati
anya-e0806n0:331_7: ‘api’tyādinā, atha yathā vuttena hetunopi lakkhaṇattamattu tathāpi paravippaṭisedhena
anya-e0806n0:331_8: hetumhi tatiyā kasmā na siyāti codayamāha ‘na nvevampi’ccādi, pubbavippaṭisedhenāti
anya-e0806n0:331_9: apavādapubbavippaṭisedhena, tathāhi chaṭṭhiyā pavādo hoti hetumhi tatiyāvidhi… sambandhachaṭṭhiyā
anya-e0806n0:331_11: yoge tasmiṃyeva sambandhe vidhānato, tattha hetutatiyāvakāso ‘dhanena kula’nti, upapadavibhattiyāvakāso
anya-e0806n0:333: Sahatthe-nuno vattane pabbatena yogo kathanti āha‘pabbatene’ccādi.
anya-e0806n0:335_1: tenāti anunā, kathaṃ tena yuttattaṃ ukkaṭṭhassāti hīnukkaṭṭhasambandhamukhena vibhāvento’tatthā’tiādimāha,
anya-e0806n0:335_2: tatthāti hīneccādinā vutte tasmiṃ, yatoti ukkaṭṭhasāriputtādiko, hīnoti paññavattādi(to
anya-e0806n0:335_3: nikkaṭṭho, so sāriputtādiko ukkaṭṭho) hīnatthavisayo jāyate… tabbisaye tassa ukkaṭṭhatā
anya-e0806n0:335_4: pattito, hīnukkaṭṭhasambandho pana atisāyanādikāya kāyaci kiriyāya katoti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0806n0:337_0: Kintaṃ ādhikyamiccāha- ‘adhikādhikīsambandho’ti, adhiko assa atthīti adhikī=khārī,
anya-e0806n0:337_1: athādhikīvinimutte adhikādhikisambandho kathamavasīyate nahyatrādhikī koci sūyaticcāha-‘navine’ccādi,
anya-e0806n0:337_2: iti saddo hetumhi yathāvuttasambandhasādhano, tadopasaddenayogoti tadā upasaddenādhikinoyogoti
anya-e0806n0:337_3: attho. Dviṭṭhattā sambandhassa adhikassāpyupasaddena yogā tatopi kasmā na sattamītyāha-‘adhikamhātvi’ccādi,
anya-e0806n0:337_4: yathā ekāyeva vibhattiyā ubhayagatassāpi sambandhassa jotitattā vijjusaṅkhātalakkhiyā
anya-e0806n0:337_5: sattamyabhāvo, evamidhā pīti pubbe vuttasamādhimatidisanto āha-‘lakkhitā viya sattamya
anya-e0806n0:339_0: Kintaṃ sāmittamiccāha-‘sassāmisambandho’ti, kāya kiriyāya janitoti āha-‘paripālanādikiriyāya
anya-e0806n0:339_1: janito’ti, tañcāti sāmittāpekkho napuṃsakaniddeso, sambandhassānekavidhattā āha‘sabbattha
anya-e0806n0:339_2: sambandhe’ti, ākhyāyatetīmassa attho vidhīyate ñāpīyateti, diṭṭhanto-panītottho sukhena
anya-e0806n0:339_6: rājā’ti, tathā sambandhābhibyañjanakenādhinā yogepi visesanatova bhavati, nāññatoti
anya-e0806n0:339_7: āha-‘tatthā’tiādi. Byatirekamāpādīyatīti kārakachakkato byatirittattā sambandho byatireko
anya-e0806n0:339_8: taṃ āpādīyati pāpīyatīti attho, ubhayatoti saṃto sāmito ca, adhibrahmadatte pañcālāti
anya-e0806n0:339_9: brahmadattassa pañcālā santakā sāmino (potthake) ti attho, santakā sāmino (potthake)
anya-e0806n0:339_10: hi pañcālā, na sāmi nasaṃ (potthake), adhipañcālesu brahmadattoti pañcālānaṃ brahmadatto sāmītyattho.
anya-e0806n0:341_0: Kiṃ lakkhaṇo-yaṃ kattāiccāha-‘kattari’ccādi, gacchati devadattoccādo kattari patiṭṭhitaṃ,
anya-e0806n0:341_1: pacatyodanaṃ devadattoccādo kamme patiṭṭhitaṃ kiriyaṃ karotīti sambandho, karotīti
anya-e0806n0:341_2: ca iminā anvattha byapadesova siddho-yaṃ kattu vohāroti ñāpeti, kenaci payujjamānopi
anya-e0806n0:341_3: sake kamme sayameva padhānattamanubhavatīti‘payutto vā padhānabhāvenā’ti vuttaṃ hoti cettha-
anya-e0806n0:342: Padhānatāya yo kattu, kammaṭṭhaṃ kurute kriyaṃ;
anya-e0806n0:343: Sā kattā nāmappayutto, payutto vātyayaṃ dvidhāti.
anya-e0806n0:344_0: Tattha purisena katanti appayutto, purisena karoti devadattoti payutto, nanu kiriyā-yamabyavadhānena
anya-e0806n0:344_1: karaṇādhikaraṇe heva sādhyate kattārā tu dūraṭṭhena, tathāsati kathamanekasādhanasādhanīyaṃ
anya-e0806n0:345_0: Kattutoññesamubbhūtyā, vivittālocanādinā vavivekeca dassanāti vākyapadīye, pavivekeca
anya-e0806n0:345_1: kārakantharāmabhāvedissabhe kattarikriyā atthi bhavati vijjaticcādo titaṭīkā, tatiyapāthānaṃpāta 100, naṃpāta 243;
anya-e0806n0:347_0: Ayamettha attho “kattuno sakāsā aññesaṃ karaṇādīnaṃ ubbhūtyā sambhavenaca, tathāhi
anya-e0806n0:347_2: ṭhapetvā chindatī’ti, vivittassa karaṇādīhi puthabbhūtassa, kattuno kiriyāya ālocanena
anya-e0806n0:347_3: dassanena ca ‘devadatto atthi bhavati vijjatī’ti vuthabbhūtassānena ālocanena dassanenaca
anya-e0806n0:347_5: (tadadhīna) pavattiādīnaṃ gahaṇaṃ, iminā kāraṇena dūrato upakārittepi kattuyeva sappadhānatā siyā”ti, punapi-
anya-e0806n0:350_1: kasmāti ce yato kāraṇā atthe attano abhidheyyesaddassa vutti paṭipatti anādinā micchābhyāsenabhavati
anya-e0806n0:350_2: tasmā thālyādīnantiādi pakataṃ, kiṃ vuttaṃ hoti “aññathā saddattho, aññathā sabhāvattho,
anya-e0806n0:350_3: na hi saddo bāhye vatthumhi byāpāramāpajjati, tathāhi–
anya-e0806n0:351: Aññathe vāggi saṃsaggā, dāhaṃ daḍḍhoti maññati;
anya-e0806n0:353: Bāhyapadatthassa sabhāvo viya hutvā micchābhyāsena anādinā pana pavattena bāhye vatthūni avijjamānena karaṇabhūtena thālyādīnaṃ kattuttaṃ hotī”ti. Atha ca pana–
anya-e0806n0:358_0: Vuttehīti ‘kattutoññesamubbhūtyā’ccādinā, saddāvāti sadde tedhammā hontu vā mā vā
anya-e0806n0:358_2: vatthutoti attho, amukhyā vatthāhīti buddhiyā tadākāratāya pariṇāmāvatthāhi, hantyatta
anya-e0806n0:358_3: nāvattānanti ekassevāttano kammattādi jāyate, atoyevāccantamasantopi aṅkuro jananakiriyāya
anya-e0806n0:362_0: Kintaṃ karaṇaṃ nāmāti āha-‘yo panā’tiādi, yoti yo padattho, iminā idaṃ dīpeti “karaṇabyapadesāya
anya-e0806n0:362_1: suttantarābhāvepi karotyaneneti karaṇantyanvatthato pasiddho-yaṃ karaṇavohāro”ti, atredaṃ paṭibhānaṃ–
anya-e0806n0:365_0: Tattha yaṃvattumicchitaṃtyādinā idaṃ dasseti-“na vatthuto kiñci karaṇaṃ nāma atthi,
anya-e0806n0:365_1: vacanicchāvasena pana pasiddhakaraṇānampi pharasuādīnaṃ ‘pharasu chindati, pharasumhi
anya-e0806n0:365_3: thālyā pacatī’ti karaṇattassapi dassanato vacanicchātoyeva karaṇaṃ kārakaṃ viññeyya”nti,
anya-e0806n0:365_4: tañca duvidhanti āha-‘dvidhā hotī’tiādi, tattha asinā chindatīti bāhyaṃ, cakkhunā
anya-e0806n0:365_5: passatītyabbhantaraṃ. Kiriyānimittattā kārakanti iminā kārakasaddassa nimittapariyāyattamāha.
anya-e0806n0:365_6: Pakati yābhirūpoccādo kiriyāyāvijjamānattā sambandhamattaṃ viññāyatīti sambandhalakkhaṇā
anya-e0806n0:365_7: chaṭṭhī siyā, samena dhāvatītyādo tu kiriyāya vijjamānattepi kammattaṃ vattumicchitanti
anya-e0806n0:365_8: dutiyā siyā, samaṃ dhāvati visamaṃ dhāvatītyattho, tathā dvidoṇenāti dvedoṇe kiṇātītyattho,
anya-e0806n0:365_9: pañcakenāti pañca parimāṇassa pañcako pañcakaṃ vaggaṃ katvā pasavo kiṇāti pañcapañca
anya-e0806n0:365_10: katvā kiṇātītyatthoti vāttikakārena ‘tatiyā vidhānāyopasaṅkhyānaṃ’kataṃ, taṃ dassetumāha-
anya-e0806n0:365_12: taṃ kiriyaṃ kathayatīti sambandho, sabbasseva padatthassa sattābyabhicārato āha-‘bhū’iccādi,
anya-e0806n0:365_13: pakatiyābhirūpoti sabhāvenāyamabhirūpo bhavati, na tu vatthālaṅkārādinetyattho, karotissa
anya-e0806n0:365_14: gammamānatte pana pakatiyābhirūpo katotiādi, tadā kattariyeva tatiyā, yaṃ yasmā aññagotto
anya-e0806n0:365_15: gotamo na hoti atoca gotamo bhavatīti sambandho, nanuca dvidoṇa pañcakā kayampaṭicca
anya-e0806n0:365_16: kammabhūtā honti dvidoṇādinā keyattā tato kimuccate‘kayampaṭicca dvidoṇapañcakā karaṇāni
anya-e0806n0:365_17: bhavantī’tyā saṅkīyāha-‘tathāhi’ccādi, idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti-“dvidoṇādisaddena hi na gayhupagaṃ
anya-e0806n0:365_18: vatthumuccati, tehi pana dvidoṇādyatthaṃ mūlaṃ tādatthiyā bhihitanti na vuttadosāvasaro”ti.
anya-e0806n0:367_0: Yathākkamamāgamanakiriyāya thūlattaguṇena gomantadabbena ca sambandhaṃ dassetuṃ ‘taṃ
anya-e0806n0:367_1: yathe’ccādimāha, udāharaṇamattaṃ dassentopi iminā adhippāyenāpi dassetīti vuttaṃ
anya-e0806n0:367_2: ‘sabbattheva vā’tiādi, puttena sahāgatotiādīsu āgamanādikiriyampaṭicca dve kattāro
anya-e0806n0:367_3: padhānāppadhānavasena, tesu padhāne kāriyasampaccayañāyena vā bahulaṃvacanena vā
anya-e0806n0:367_4: padhāne kattari paccayo, itare’kattari tatiyā’tyeva tatiyā siddhā, tato-yaṃ vacanārambho-natthakoti
anya-e0806n0:367_5: maññamānoco deti ‘nanvi’ccādinā, ttenābhidhīyate piteti padhānakattā, tulyopi kiriyāsambandhe
anya-e0806n0:367_6: pitāputtānaṃ pitātra padhānaṃ saddacoditattā, putto-ppadhānamasaddacoditattā, saddabyāpārāpekkhāya
anya-e0806n0:367_8: sambandho saddenoccate, netarassa saddasattisabhāvato, tathā vidhā hi saddassa satti
anya-e0806n0:367_9: yato piturevātra kiriyā sambandhaṃ sakkoti paṭipādetuṃ, na puttassa, evañcāgatoccādo
anya-e0806n0:367_10: ekavacanamupajjate, aññathā hi bahuvacanaṃ siyā, ‘pitā puttā āgatā’ti. (Yadi) vuttanayena
anya-e0806n0:367_11: tatiyā siddhā ‘siddhe satyārambho niyamāya vā vikappāya vā’ na cettha niyamo, nāpi
anya-e0806n0:367_12: vikappo, tato kimanena yogenā tyāsayenāha-‘appadhāneyeva’ccādi. Nayidamevamiccādi
anya-e0806n0:367_13: parihāro. Sahabhāvamattaṃ vattumiṭṭhaṃ vāti yojanā, sāmatthiyāti bhedādhiṭṭhānattā
anya-e0806n0:367_14: sahatthayogassa puttassāpi kiriyābhisambandho viññāyati kathamaññathā sahatthayogo
anya-e0806n0:367_15: siyāti iminā attha balena. Atthaggahaṇanti sutte “sahatthene”ti atthaggahaṇaṃ. Pariyāyatthanti
anya-e0806n0:367_16: parito ayanti avagacchanti atthamaneneti pariyāyo attho payojanaṃ yassāti viggaho,
anya-e0806n0:367_17: ettha ca pariyāyatthamevāti nāvadhāraṇaṃ, atoyeva vināpi sahasaddappayogaṃ tappariyāyappayogaṃ
anya-e0806n0:367_18: vā sahatthena yoge vidhānato asatyapi sahādisaddappayoge yattha tadattho gamyate
anya-e0806n0:367_19: tatthāpi bhavatyeva tatiyā… gamyamānena sahatthena yogā, yathā“syādi syāne”ti. (3-1)
anya-e0806n0:369_0: Lakkhīyatyanenāti lakkhaṇaṃ saṅketo, kintaṃ kamaṇḍaluppabhuti, atthe kāriyassāsambhavā
anya-e0806n0:369_1: taṃvācīhi vibhattīti maññamānena yaṃvivaraṇaṃ kataṃ ‘lakkhaṇe vattamānato’ti, tamullaṅgiyātthaṃ
