anya-e0806n0:369_2: vadati ‘yo attho’iccādi, vattamānatoti viññāyati… nāmasmā paccayavidhānappa saṅgato,
anya-e0806n0:369_3: upāttoti gahito. Kañcippaṇaramāpannassa lakkhaṇe tatiyā yathā siyā ‘rukkhampati vijjotana’miccatra
anya-e0806n0:369_5: kataṃ, tammanasi nidhāya codayamāha–‘nanvi’ccādi, itthambhūtassa lakkhaṇanti chaṭṭhīsamāso,
anya-e0806n0:369_6: āpannassāti bhūtassa, sāmaññassa bhedako viseso pakāro vuccate, tathāhi ‘tidaṇḍakena
anya-e0806n0:369_8: patto, tassa tidaṇḍakaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ. Upalakkhaṇatteti iminā itthambhūtassa lakkhaṇattābhāvamāha,
anya-e0806n0:369_9: upalakkhaṇanti saṅketo. Nayidamatthiccādi parihāro, rukkhampati vijjotananti ettha
anya-e0806n0:369_10: kassaci itthambhūtassābhāvā itthambhūtaggahaṇe payojanaṃ na dissati tannivattanato,
anya-e0806n0:369_11: rukkhampati vijjotateti etthatu itthambhūtassa vijjusaṅkhātassa atthassa sabbhāvā
anya-e0806n0:369_12: tatiyāppattiyaṃ taṃnivattiyā yathāvuttaṃ ñāyamantarena nāññaṃ kiñci paṭisaraṇamatthīti
anya-e0806n0:369_14: vacane karīyamāne sati, itthambhūtavādino uttaramāsaṅkiyāha-‘nacā’tiādi, vattunti
anya-e0806n0:369_15: vacanaseso, co-vadhāraṇe, neva sakkāti vuttaṃ hoti, dutiyāvidhānasāmatthiyāti “patiparīhi
anya-e0806n0:369_16: bhāge cā”ti (2-9) kasmā na sakkāti āha-‘atthi’ccādi, asati hi payojane sāmatthiyanti
anya-e0806n0:369_17: bhāvo. Atha kamaṇḍalu pāṇimhi assāti ādo tatiyā kasmā na siyā tyāha-‘kamaṇḍalu’iccādi,
anya-e0806n0:369_18: kamaṇḍalussa setassa ca upalakkhaṇa bhāvenānupādānatoti sambandho, iminā upādātuno
anya-e0806n0:369_19: savacasi satantatamāha, visiṭṭhāvayavādheyyenāti pāṇi kamaṇḍalunā visiṭṭhovayavo,
anya-e0806n0:369_20: tassādheyyo kamaṇḍalu tenāti attho. Yenāṅgena vikatena aṅgino vikāro lakkhīyate tato
anya-e0806n0:369_22: tattha yasaddena vikatāvayavo hetuttena niddiṭṭho aṅgasaddo ca samudāyavacano upātto
anya-e0806n0:369_23: tenāha-‘yeneccādi, nanuca kāṇādīnaṃ niyataguṇīnamabhidhāyittā akkhisaddassa payogo
anya-e0806n0:369_24: na yutto byāvattiyābhāvāti, nesa doso, lokiyo-yaṃ saddassa vohāro, lokassa ca saddappayoge
anya-e0806n0:369_25: gurulaghumpatyadayo natthi, tathāhi lokena ‘sīsapāti’pi vuccate, rukkho sīsapātipi,
anya-e0806n0:369_26: yassa tu tatthādaro, so-kkhisaddaṃ payujjateva, athavā sāmaññupakkame viseso payogamarahati,
anya-e0806n0:369_27: akkhi(nāti) hi vutte sandeho siyā ‘kimassa vattumicchita’nti tato kāṇoti vuccate,
anya-e0806n0:369_28: nākkhinā nirūpayati sobhanoti, kiñcarahi kāṇoti, akkhikāṇamassetyādo kasmā na siyāti
anya-e0806n0:369_29: āsaṅkiya‘kamaṇḍalu pāṇimhi assā’tyatra yo vutto parihāro, ta metthopadisanto āha-‘heṭṭhā viya appasaṅgo’ti.
anya-e0806n0:371_0: Kismiñci phale diṭṭhasāmatthiyetthe hetu niruḷho. Ekatra hi diṭṭhasāmatthiyottho
anya-e0806n0:371_1: taṃyoggatāya kāriya (ma)karontopi hetu vuccate sati saha kārinyasati ca vidhurappaccayo
anya-e0806n0:371_2: papā(ta) to, tena kāriyassa byabhicāro, tenevāha- ‘anipphādayantopī’ti, kāraṇe tatiyāyābhāve
anya-e0806n0:373_0: Upādhi visesanaṃ, parāṅgabhūteti parassa bandhattā(dino) vidhānā yāṅgabhūte jaḷattādihetumhīti
anya-e0806n0:373_1: attho, iminā guṇasaddo yamappadhānavacanoti vadati, yañcāppadhānaṃ tamparāṅgabhūtanti
anya-e0806n0:373_3: vādarūpenopādīyamānattā, yathā ‘jaḷattā baddho, rukkho yaṃ sīsa pattā, aggi ettha
anya-e0806n0:373_5: (2-3-25) evaṃ vidhānaṃ, itthiyantiādinā pañcamīrūpassapi abhimatabhāvaṃ dasseti,
anya-e0806n0:373_7: kathaṃ pañcamyantatā tyāsaṅkiyāha-‘pañcaminiddese’ iccādi, iminā suttena pañcamiyā
anya-e0806n0:373_8: vināti yojanā, vā pañcamiyā vidhānato tatiyārūpenapi bhavitabbanti codanamanasi nidhāya
anya-e0806n0:373_9: pañcamyu dāharaṇeyeva kāraṇaṃ tatiyodāharaṇassa ca paṭhamodāharaṇānusārenānu mantabbatañcadassento
anya-e0806n0:375_1: yoggatā’ iccādi, saddasattisāmatthiyāti saddasattisaṅkhātāya sāmatthiyā, tameva phuṭayati
anya-e0806n0:375_3: udarādīhi, tajjotanāyāti hetvatthajotanāyālanti sambandho, byatirekena tu hetvatthato
anya-e0806n0:377: Nāmabhūtehīti sabbādīsu keci kesañci yadi nāmāni siyuṃ tehi, appadhānabhūtehīti piyasabbādīhi, kimpayojanantiādo payojanasaddo “payojanaṃ kāriyahetūsu”ti nighaṇḍuto hetuvacano.
anya-e0806n0:379_0: Yassa sacetanāyācetanāya vā kassaci, pūjānuggahakāmatta mantarena sammāpadānaṃ na
anya-e0806n0:379_1: sambhavatīti āha-‘pūjā’ iccādi, tenāti yathāvuttenatthena, cāgaṅganti dadātino dānakiriyāya
anya-e0806n0:379_4: tesaṃ vasena, idha sampadānantidhā vuttaṃ kathitaṃ, keteti āha-‘rukkhayācakabhikkhavo’ti,
anya-e0806n0:379_5: rukkhādikaṃ taṃ sampadānaṃ vibhāgena dassetumāha-‘tattha hi’ccādi, ajjhesanenārādhanena
anya-e0806n0:379_6: sampadānaṃ bhavatīti sambandho, anumatiyā abbhanujānena, vijjamānepyanirākaraṇe bhikkhuno-dhikamanumatantyadhippāyenāha-‘so’ iccādi.
anya-e0806n0:381_0: Payojanapariyāye atthasadde sati idanti payojanaṃ parāmaṭṭhuṃ sakkāti ‘tasseda’ntiādi
anya-e0806n0:381_1: vuttaṃ, tasaddenettha vikatiyātisambandho, atthasaddena tu pakatiyā, attha kathanametanti
anya-e0806n0:381_2: iminā vacanicchāya metissaṃ natthi samāsoti dīpeti, viggahe vāsmimimasmāyeva nipātanā
anya-e0806n0:381_3: samāso daṭṭhabbo,so vikatisaṅkhāto attho, pakatitvaññapadatthenākkhipīyate, tato
anya-e0806n0:381_4: tadatthasaddato, koyaṃ tadattha bhāvo ccāha-‘tadatthabhāvo nāmā’tiādi, nimittaṃ yūpādivikati,
anya-e0806n0:381_5: nimittīdāruādipakati tasaddenātthasaddena ca gahitā, tesaṃ sambandho tadatthasaddassa
anya-e0806n0:381_6: pavattinimittaṃ tadatthabhāvo nāmāti attho, hetu hetumantabhāvalakkhaṇo sambandho
anya-e0806n0:381_7: nāmāti vuttaṃ hoti, padhānāvacchedaguṇasmāti vidhīyamānattena padhānassa purisassa
anya-e0806n0:381_8: ācchedakā visesakā guṇā, yañhi vidhīyate ñāpīyate tampadhāna, mitaramappadhānamanuvajjamānattā,
anya-e0806n0:381_9: yadā upādīyateti vatvā upādīyamānappakāraṃ diṭṭhantena phuṭayitumāha-‘yathā’iccādi,
anya-e0806n0:381_10: yūpo nimittaṃ yassa dāruno taṃ tathā vuttaṃ nāññanimittanti yadā nimityavacchedakattenupādīyate
anya-e0806n0:381_11: tadā nimittasaddatova catutthī sambandho, tato aññanimittato, nimittanimittīnaṃ sambandhassa
anya-e0806n0:381_12: abhimukhabhāvena tattheva nimitte pavattīti sambandho, nimittasaddato hetutatiyāpi
anya-e0806n0:381_13: nāsaṅkanīyāti sambandho, kāraṇamāha-‘nimitta’ hetu iccādi. Ubhayatthāti yūpāya pākāyāti ubhayattha.
anya-e0806n0:382_0: Piṇiyamānā kiṃ saddādivacanīyā paro sāduādiko yo-ttho so añño kattā yassa so aññakattuko-bhilāso,
anya-e0806n0:382_1: abhilāso rucīti iminā dityādyanekatthantopi rucisaddo-bhilāse ruḷhova gayhatīti vadati,
anya-e0806n0:382_2: sā ruci attho-bhidheyyo yesaṃ bhe tadatthā, tesaṃ sambandhino piṇiyamānassa, iminā
anya-e0806n0:382_3: ca kiñcāpi rucirayaṃ yassuppajjateyo vā tassā janako, tesamubhinnampi atthi, tathāpi
anya-e0806n0:382_4: yassuppajjate sova tassādhikaraṇaṃ, ajanakopi so tāya saṃsattoti tasseva piṇiyamānassa
anya-e0806n0:382_5: sampadānasaññā, natujanakassa tāyāsaṃsattassāti dīpeti, idhāti iminā sakkate udāharaṇānamasamānarūpakaṃ
anya-e0806n0:382_6: dasseti, iminā ca udāharaṇānamasamāna rūpattameva catutthīvidhāne kāraṇaṃ, aññathā
anya-e0806n0:382_7: chaṭṭhīyeva tehipi vidhīyeyya kāraṇāsambhavā kāraṇasabbhāvā hi dīpeti, īdisassa paccudāharaṇa(ssa)
anya-e0806n0:382_9: idha kathanti āha-‘ihatvi’ccādi, tvanti attamatte paṭhamāyeva, sambhave kāraṇantaramāha-‘athavā’tiādi,
anya-e0806n0:382_10: natthi añño kattā yassā sā anaññakattukā ruci, bhāya ruciyā sambandhino piṇiyamānassa
anya-e0806n0:382_11: sampadānasaññaṃ ye pana icchantīti sambandho, ye pana āhu cātisambandho, uppajjanamuppatti,
anya-e0806n0:382_12: kassa uppatti, ruciyā, uppattiyā ādhāro uppatyādhāro‘devadattāya rocate’ccādo devadattādiṃ
anya-e0806n0:382_13: upalakkhetīti uppatyādhāropalakkhaṇaṃ vacanaṃ, ettha ruciyā uppatyādhāropalakkhaṇameva
anya-e0806n0:382_14: vacananti sāvadhāraṇa mattho daṭṭhabbo… sabbesaṃ vākyānamavadhāraṇaphalattā, tena
anya-e0806n0:382_15: piṇiya mānavacanamabhilāsassa aññakattukatāsandassanaparaṃ na hotīti byavacchinnambhavati,
anya-e0806n0:382_16: tesaṃ kaccāyanassa cehāpi pasajjatīti sambandho, ihāpīti tvamiti etthāpi, aññathāsiddhattāti
anya-e0806n0:382_17: atthamatte paṭhamāya eva siddhattā, vacanassāti ubhinnampi catutthīvidhānavacanassa,
anya-e0806n0:382_18: atippasaṅgocāti “kassa vā tvaṃ dhammaṃ rocesī”tiādo tavāti anabhimataṭṭhānappattica.
anya-e0806n0:383_0: Dhārippayogeti dhāridhātuno payoge, uttamīṇo adhamīṇoti dhanikagahetūnaṃ ruḷhītyāha-‘uttamīṇo
anya-e0806n0:383_2: dhāraṃdhātuto. Suttantarena (taṃ taṃ) niyamena niyamitānaṃ tesaṃtesaṃ sampadānasaññaṃ
anya-e0806n0:383_3: vidhāya catutthī vihitā parehi, tadāha ‘silāgha hanuṭṭhāsapāna’miccādi, sabbattha
anya-e0806n0:383_4: yogasambandhe chaṭṭhī, ñāpetunti silāghādike bodhetuṃ, icchitoti atimato. Tadatthavācīnañca
anya-e0806n0:383_5: dhātūnaṃ saṅgahaṇatthaṃ ‘kudhaduhissosūyatthāna’nti vuttaṃ, yampati kopoti iminā
anya-e0806n0:383_6: kopassa visayamāha, yassāti iminā yaṃkārakanti vuttameva parāmasati, yassāti rājādino,
anya-e0806n0:383_7: pucchatīti pucchiyate, teneva vakkhati-‘yassa sambandhiṃ subhāsubhaṃ pucchati nemittiko’ti,
anya-e0806n0:383_8: yocānukūlattambha jatīti iminā idaṃ dasseti “patipubbako āpubbakoca suṇoti abbhupagame
anya-e0806n0:383_9: paṭijānaneca vattate, yadāyamabbhupagamo patthanā pubbato bhavati tadā patthanāya
anya-e0806n0:383_10: kattu patthayituno catutthī rūpambhavati, yadātvapatthatampi kevalamānukūlyena vattamānaṃdisvā
anya-e0806n0:383_12: pavattanasaṅkhātāya kiriyāya kattuno catutthīrūpambhavatī”ti, iminā ca pāṇiniyavuttikārassa
anya-e0806n0:383_13: jayādiccassamate byabhicāramāha, so hi “abbhupagamo nāma parena patthitassa bhavati
anya-e0806n0:383_14: tattha patthayituyeva catutthīrūpambhavatī”ti vadati, pubbassākiriyāya yo kattāti
anya-e0806n0:383_15: vedavākyena vihitathutikakaraṇa saṅkhātāya ussāhānujānanato pubbabhūtāya kiriyāya
anya-e0806n0:383_16: yo kattā hotā potā ca, sabbatthāpi‘tassā’ti idaṃ ‘catutthīyāyadabhimataṃ rūpa’ntiiminā
anya-e0806n0:383_17: sambandhitabbaṃ, chaṭṭhiyā sabbabyāpibhāvamālamba evanti atidesoti āha ‘evantī’tiādi,
anya-e0806n0:383_18: rūpasāmyato pana tādatthiyatthasabbhāvāca yathāyogaṃ tādatthha catutthīpi na virujjhati,
anya-e0806n0:383_19: vakkhati hi‘tādatthha vacanicchāyantu ‘iccādinā, icchito rājā, kamma vacanicchāti
anya-e0806n0:383_20: iminā vacanicchāya padhānattamāha… vacanicchābhimukhattā sabbesaṃ kārakānaṃ, appacurappayogattāti
anya-e0806n0:383_21: abahuppayogattā, hanute apanayati, upatiṭṭhate upaṭṭhānaṃ upagamanaṃ karoti, pihayanti
anya-e0806n0:383_22: patthenti, kujjha amarisaṃ karoti, duhanādayo kopappabhavā nānantarena te sambhavantīti
anya-e0806n0:383_23: dūbhādayopyudāhaṭā “byañjane dīgharassā”ti (1-33) rasse aparajjhāmi, issayanti nasahanti,
anya-e0806n0:383_24: ārajjhati pucchito nemittiko upaparikkhati, bhādatthhaṃ vibhāveti ‘yasse’ccādinā,
anya-e0806n0:383_27: aññasmāpīti ayācitutoapi, thutikaraṇassa kattubhūtā hotāpotāro ussāhanānujānanānaṃ
anya-e0806n0:383_28: kammaṃ hotīti āha-‘paccanupubbassa giṇātissa kamme’ti. Hotupotusaddehiccādinā potusaddassapi
anya-e0806n0:383_29: chaṭṭhirūpaṃ dassitaṃ, vuttiyantu ‘hotu patigiṇāti’cceva pāṭho dissati, hotvevampityamhākamatropekkhā,
anya-e0806n0:383_30: ussāhayatītyatthe giṇāti antogataṇyattho. Anāvādoti nāvāannādivajjite. Ettha pana
anya-e0806n0:383_31: tathā paṭisedhābhāvepi bahulādhikārato ‘na taṃ nāvammaññe nataṃ annammaññe’ccādi
anya-e0806n0:383_32: bhavati, attheva hi bahulādhikāratovā tippasaṅgābhāvo, paṭhamantaṃ rūpanti maññamānoti
anya-e0806n0:383_33: paṭhamantaṃ rūpaṃ, etthaca yadā tiṇāditopi khikaṃsīyate tadā nindāvagamo, tattha
anya-e0806n0:383_34: ca niyogatova nañpayogo ñāthānupa pattiyāti sappaṭisedhamudāhaṭaṃ ‘na maññamāno’ti,
anya-e0806n0:383_35: avadhimhiyeva pañcamītiṇāti, nañpayogeva niyogato nindāvagamā tiṇanti kammeyeva dutiyā,
anya-e0806n0:383_36: athavā satīpi nindāvagame vacanicchāto savisayeyeva dutiyā, sammutippayogeti sammutisaddassa
anya-e0806n0:383_37: payoge, catutthiṃ icchantīti mattāyāti ettha catutthiṃ icchanti, puna ruttatte kāraṇamāha-‘atha
anya-e0806n0:383_38: sotivijjamānattā’ti, caṇḍassa kukkurassātiādisutte “atha so”ti pāṭhassa vijjamānattā
anya-e0806n0:383_39: ‘bhiyyoso mattāyā’ti ettha sokāro punaruttoti adhippāyo, caggahaṇenāti “silāghahanu…pe…
anya-e0806n0:383_40: sattamyatthesucā”ti sutte caggahaṇena, catutthībhimatāti “namo yogādisvapicā”ti suttena.
anya-e0806n0:385: Avadhīyate visilissate etasmātyavadhi, avapubbāya dhādhātuto avadhimhi“dādhātvī”ti (5-45) i.
anya-e0806n0:388_0: Etthāyamattho “yatokutocipi attho kiñci vatthuavadhīyate saṃyogassa vā kiriyānimittaṃ
anya-e0806n0:388_1: gamanadānādikiriyāpubbaṃ visilissate sayaṃ vā apeti aññena vā visuṃ karīyate, tamevaṃvidhaṃ
anya-e0806n0:388_2: calañcā calañca visilesaparicchedabhūtaṃ padatthamavadhiṃ vadanti budhā tabbiduno”ti,
anya-e0806n0:388_3: taṃ yathā dhāvatāssā puriso patati, purisaṃ pāteti vā, rukkhā paṇṇaṃ patati, paṇṇaṃ
anya-e0806n0:388_4: pāteti vāti, soca tidhāpyuccate visayabhedena, yathā–
anya-e0806n0:391_0: Tattha niddiṭṭhā vacanopanītā kiriyā visayo yattha so niddiṭṭha visayo vadhi, yathā-‘gāmasmā
anya-e0806n0:391_1: āgato’ti, upāttājjhāhaṭā kiriyā visayo yattha so upāttavisayo, yathā-‘valāhakā vijjotate’ti,
anya-e0806n0:391_2: valāhakā nikkhamma vijjobhateti attho, anumeyyā kiriyā visayo yattha so anumeyyavisayo,
anya-e0806n0:391_3: yathā‘māthurā pāṭaliputtakehi abhirūpatarā’ti, ettha abhirūpaguṇena ukkaṃsanamanumeyyaṃ,
anya-e0806n0:391_4: atoyevetthāyameva saññā paripphuṭā viññāyatīti na kācidiha saññā paribhāsīyate byāmohakāriṇī,
anya-e0806n0:391_5: athāvadhismāti vuccamāne ‘padatthāvadhismā’ti kuto-vasīyate yenevaṃ vivaraṇaṃ katantyāsaṅkiyāha-padāna’miccādi.
anya-e0806n0:391_6: Yathā gāmasmātiādinā idaṃ dīpeti “na kevalaṃ kāyasaṃsaggapubbakova visileso, kiñcarahi
anya-e0806n0:391_7: buddhisaṃsaggapubbakopi, atthi ceha buddhisaṃsagga pubbako, tathāhi corehi bhāyatityādo
anya-e0806n0:391_8: yo (bhaya)pekkhaṇa sīlo bhavati, so yadi maṃ corā passeyyuṃ, dhuvaṃ me maraṇanti
anya-e0806n0:391_9: vicārento te buddhiyā pappoti pappuyya ca tato nivattate, tathā corehi tāyatityādo
anya-e0806n0:391_10: yo ekassa mitto bhavati so yadyetaṃ corā passeyyuṃ dhuvamassa maraṇanti passanto
anya-e0806n0:391_11: te buddhiyā patvā tato nivattayatītyavadhittā avadhismāva sabbattha pañcamī”ti, parehi
anya-e0806n0:391_12: pana etādisesu sabbattha paṭipattuvisesānuggahāya sutteheva papañco kato, idha pana
anya-e0806n0:391_13: sāmaññavacaneneva siddhattā tadanuggahāya udāharaṇeheva papañcitaṃ, bhītibhāyanatthānanti
anya-e0806n0:391_14: bhīti tāyanānaṃ attho yesaṃ te bhītitāyanatthā tesanti attho, nanu bhītyatthānaṃ
anya-e0806n0:391_15: payoge bhayahetu sambhavati natu tāyanatthānanti, nesa doso, tāyanañhi rakkhanamuccate
anya-e0806n0:391_16: sāyanāhi rakkhanamuppajjabhe (potthake) tañca bhayahetuto vetyāha-‘yo bhayahetu’tiādi,
anya-e0806n0:391_18: tatoti bhayahetuto, tesanti bhayatāyanānaṃ, bhayamaniṭṭhapātasaṅkā, uttāsotyattho,
anya-e0806n0:391_19: tāyana maniṭṭhapātato parirakkhanaṃ, yathā dassanaṃ hontevātīminā vacanicchāyeva
anya-e0806n0:391_20: padhānattamāha, ko hi lokiyaṃ vacanicchamativattituṃ sakkoti, tathāhi sabbeva dabbādayo
anya-e0806n0:391_21: sabbakārakasattiyuttāva, tatthāyaṃ kārakavibhāgo vacanicchāvaseneva, taṃ yathā ‘valāhako
anya-e0806n0:391_22: vijjotate, valāhakena vijjotate, valāhake vijjotate’ti. Parāpubbassātiādinā “parājissāsayho”ti
anya-e0806n0:391_23: (1-4-26) saññāsuttaṃ paccakkhāti, asayho atthoti sahituṃ abhibhavitumasamattho attho,
anya-e0806n0:391_25: vuttaṃ, taṃ kathaṃ ajjhayanassāsayhattaṃ, yenāsayhattassāvadhittaṃ paṭipādayati tyāsaṅkiyāha-‘yaññadattānabhibhavo’ccādi,
anya-e0806n0:391_27: (1-4-27) suttitaṃ, tadāha ‘vāraṇatthāna’miccādi, vāraṇamattho yesaṃ te vāraṇatthā,
anya-e0806n0:391_28: avadhimattavacanicchāyanti visesato vidhānamantarenā vadhimatta vacanicchāyaṃ, visesavidhāneti
anya-e0806n0:391_29: icchitoti visesavidhāne, cittassāvadhivacanicchāyampana cittato pāpaṃ nivārayeti
anya-e0806n0:391_32: tadāha-‘antaradhāne’ccādi, ayamupajjhāyo yadi maṃ passatīti sambandho, dassane dosaṃ
anya-e0806n0:391_34: maññamāno sissā ahaṃ kathannāma byavahito bhavāmīti antaradhāne byavadhāna nimittaṃ,
anya-e0806n0:391_35: yena attano adassanamicchatīti sambandho, antaradhāneti nimittasattamīcāyaṃ, ato
anya-e0806n0:391_36: āha-‘byavadhānanimitta’nti, byavahitoti antarahito, māmaṃ upajjhāyotyādinā udāharaṇatthamāha,
anya-e0806n0:391_37: byavadhānatthaṃ byavahitatthaṃ, “antaradhāneti kiṃ core na didikkhatī”ti paccudāhaṭaṃ
anya-e0806n0:391_38: parehi, tampaṭipādayamāha-‘yatthādassana’miccādi, core na didikkhatī (tya), tra hi
anya-e0806n0:391_39: yo core na didikkhati tehi attano adassanamicchatīti na antaradhānanimittaṃ, kintupaghātanivatyatthaṃ,
anya-e0806n0:391_42: sambhavatī”ti. Icchatiggahaṇaṃ kimatthaṃ adassanicchāyaṃ sati satyapi dassane yathāsiyā”ti
anya-e0806n0:391_44: dassane satīpi, tatoti upajjhāyato, avadhirūpatā evāti upajjhāyassāvadhirūpatā eva.
anya-e0806n0:391_46: trādhippeto, upayogavacanasāmatthiyā vijjāgahaṇatthaṃ sissavattaṃ niyamo, tatoti
anya-e0806n0:391_48: janino attho janyattho, kintaṃ jananaṃ, tatoti janikattuhetuto, pakatisaddena kāraṇamattaṃ
anya-e0806n0:391_49: gahitaṃparehi ‘puttā pamodā jāyate’ccādo puttāditopi yathā siyā’ti, duvidhaṃ (hi)
anya-e0806n0:391_50: kāraṇaṃ upādānakāraṇaṃ sahakārikāraṇañca, tattha kāriyenābhinnadeso ghaṭassa mattikāpiṇḍo
anya-e0806n0:391_51: upādānakāraṇaṃ, tasseva pana daṇḍacakkādi (kāriyena bhinnadeso) sahakārikāraṇaṃ,
anya-e0806n0:391_52: tesūpādānakāraṇasseha gahaṇe’siṅgā saro jāyate’ccatreva siyā, na tu ‘puttā pamodā
anya-e0806n0:391_54: bhavitabbaṃ… etthantare sambandha vacanicchāyapi sambhavato, tatra tiṭṭhantīti tatraṭṭhā,
anya-e0806n0:391_55: tesaṃ, loko-naññathāvādī vohārikajano, tattha bhavā lokiyā, navattu paṭibaddhāti
anya-e0806n0:391_56: lokavacanicchamullaṅgiya ahameva vadāmīti sakajjhāsayena vadanto vattā, tappaṭibaddhā
anya-e0806n0:391_57: na hotīti attho. “Pabhavo bhavatissā”ti (1-4-31) suttitaṃ, tadāha-‘bhavatissā’tiādi,
anya-e0806n0:391_58: paṭhamato upalabbhatīti atthakathanena janyattho-tra na sambhavatīti vadati, nahi
anya-e0806n0:391_59: himavā gaṅgāya kāraṇaṃ, sā hi aññehi evakāraṇehi uppannā, himavati tu kevalaṃ paṭhamato
anya-e0806n0:391_61: jigucchāpamādatthadhātuyoge pana kammādhikaraṇavacanicchā dissatīti vuttaṃ, avadhivacanicchāpi
anya-e0806n0:391_62: pana dissake ‘jigucchati nāhiriko pāpā’ti, dhammā pamajjatītipi hoteva paṭisedhābhāvā.
anya-e0806n0:391_64: yatoti devadattādito, “aññaityatthaggahaṇaṃ, tena pariyāyappayogepi bhavatī”ti aññehi
anya-e0806n0:391_65: byākhyātattā āha-‘bhinno devadattā’ti, ārāsaddassa dūratthattā āsavakkhayato ārā
anya-e0806n0:391_66: dūro bhavatī(tyattho u) pādīyatetyāha‘ārāsaddo dūrattho’ti, niddissamānapaṭiyogīti
anya-e0806n0:391_67: ‘devadatto sūro’ti niddissamānassa kassaci yo so dutiyo, so paṭiyogī. Disādesakālavuttīnaṃ
anya-e0806n0:391_68: disāsaddattena pariggahato āha‘disā desakālavācīnaṃ yoge’ti, pubbeva sambodhātiādīni
anya-e0806n0:391_71: tadāha‘yattha’ccādi, lyappaccayassa yatrāppayogo, tassattho ce gamyate, so lyaplopo,
anya-e0806n0:391_72: tvālopo lyapalopotyaviseso, pāsāda māruyha pekkhati āsane upavisitvā pekkhatīti idaṃ
anya-e0806n0:391_73: visayo padassanaṃ pubbaṃ yassāti kiriyāvisesane samāso, vakkhamānasabbadassanesupi
anya-e0806n0:391_75: apakkamati tato taṃ dassananti tato pāsādato tassa daṭṭhuno dassanaṃ cakkhundriyaṃ
anya-e0806n0:391_76: apakkamatyapayātītyattho, avadhibhāvo pāsādassāti viññāyati, yesanti vesesikānaṃ,
anya-e0806n0:391_78: nikkhamma visālībhavantaṃ visayadesamupagamma sakalamattanā diṭṭhaṃ passati raṃsirūpena,
anya-e0806n0:391_79: yathā kāhalā mūle kisā aggemahatī, tathā ñāṇindriyānī”ti, adhiṭṭhānadesanti indriyādhiṭṭhānabhūtaṃ
anya-e0806n0:391_80: cakkhugoḷakadesaṃ, visayappavattīti gocare pavatti, santatiyāti indriyapabandhassa,
anya-e0806n0:391_81: adhiṭṭhāna manindriyaṃ nāpajjateti sambandho, tatoti pāsādato, apakkantyāti apagamanena,
anya-e0806n0:391_82: yajjapi cakkhundriyaṃ cakkhugoḷakato bahi niggacchati, tathāpipāsādaṭṭhassacakkhugoḷakā
anya-e0806n0:391_84: visaye viññāṇalakkhaṇaṃ kāriyaṃ karonti sīlenāti pattakārīni, anindriyādhiṭṭhānadoso
anya-e0806n0:391_85: neti sambandho, tatoti pāsādato, yesampanāti khaṇikavādinova dasseti, atra hi cattāro
anya-e0806n0:391_86: pakkhā pattakārīnindriyāni, appattakārīni, cakkhusotāni appattakārīni sesāni vuttaviparitāni,
anya-e0806n0:391_87: cakkhuyeva pattakārī sesamaññatheti, catusveva tesu paṭhamapakkhadvayamupanyasya
anya-e0806n0:391_89: idaṃ ayuttamiva dissati… saddasatthassimassa buddhavacanopayogittena sogatasamayānuguṇappavattito,
anya-e0806n0:391_90: khaṇikavādino pana nissāyedaṃ sundarameva, manasikārādītiādisaddena cakkhuto cakkhunā
anya-e0806n0:391_91: (potthake) abhedo rūpāpāthagamo ca dassito, yoggadeseti dassanayogge padese. “Pucchanākhyānesu
anya-e0806n0:391_92: ca pañcamī vattabbā”ti (2-3-28vā) vuttaṃ, tadāha-‘pucchanasaddato’ccādi, pucchanākhyānesu
anya-e0806n0:391_94: devadattassetyākhyānaṃ, koso yañña dattoti pañho vidhirūpovāyaṃ, yo-ṅgadītyādyanuvādarūpamākhyānaṃ,
anya-e0806n0:391_96: tadāha-‘addha’ccādi, nimīyate paricchijjate yena taṃ nimānaṃ, tadeva nimmānaṃ. “Addhassa
anya-e0806n0:391_97: paṭhamā sattamī ca vattabbā”ti (2-3-28) vuttaṃ, tatthāyamattho “taṃ yuttāti vattate,
anya-e0806n0:391_98: taṃ yuttā pañcamiyutthā parassāddhassa paṭhamā ca sattamī ca vattabbā”ti, pāṭaliputtasmāti
anya-e0806n0:391_99: pañcami yuttaṃ, etāpi na vattabbāti dassetumāha-‘sattayojanānī’tiādi, atra hi yadā
anya-e0806n0:391_100: rājagahassa yojanañcābhedo vattumicchīyate, tadā pāṭaliputtasmā rājagahaṃ sattayojanānīti,
anya-e0806n0:391_102: Tathāhi pāṭaliputtasmā sattasu yojanesu sati rājagahaṃbhavatītyayamattho patīyate,
anya-e0806n0:391_104: iminā “taṃ yuttā kāle sattamī vattabbā”ti (2-3-28vā) vacanampaṭikkhipati. “Karaṇeca
anya-e0806n0:391_107: guṇe hetumhīti guṇapadatthe hetubhūte “guṇe”ti (2-21) pañcamīti attho, yathāvuttavidhāneneti
anya-e0806n0:391_108: “guṇe”ti sutte vuttavidhānena, “guṇe”ti sutte vuttavidhānena, yadātviccādinā paresaṃ
anya-e0806n0:391_109: viya karaṇe visuṃ vidhāne payojanaṃ natthīti dasseti. Kattabbarūpassa calanassāti
anya-e0806n0:391_110: sambandho, samānādhikaraṇattena visesananti yojanā, samānādhikaraṇattenāti ca ‘rañño
anya-e0806n0:391_112: visesanabhāvo cāssa thokaguṇānvite calane vattamāno thokasaddo asattavacanova visesananti,
anya-e0806n0:391_114: chaṭṭhī vā”ti (2-3-34) vuttaṃ, tadāha‘dūranti katthehi’ccādi, avadhisambandhalakkhaṇāti
anya-e0806n0:391_115: avadhisambandhāva lakkhaṇaṃ nimittamāsaṃ pañcamīchaṭṭhīnaṃ tā tathā vuttā, vattumiṭṭhoti
anya-e0806n0:391_116: iminā vacanicchāyeva padhānattamāha, evaṃ carahi taṃtaṃ kārakavacanicchāyamaññāpi
anya-e0806n0:391_117: vibhattiyo kasmā nappayujjeyyunti āha-‘lokiyā cetthā’tiādi, ettha vibhattīnaṃ niyame
anya-e0806n0:391_118: lokiyā eva vacanicchā nibandhanaṃ kāraṇanti attho, pañcamīcātyanuvattamāne “dūranti
anya-e0806n0:391_119: katthehi dutiyā ce”ti (2-3-35) vuttaṃ, “pañcamyadhikaraṇeca” (2-3-36) iccatra ca
anya-e0806n0:391_120: kārena dūranti katthehi sattamī ca vuttā pāṭi padikatthe sārasaṅgahakārādīhi, tadakkhippa
anya-e0806n0:391_121: aññāpadesena paṭikkhipituṃ kecityādi yaṃ vuttaṃ vuttiyaṃ, taṃ dassetumāha’kecīti
anya-e0806n0:391_122: sārasaṅgahādayo’tiādi. Dūrāpādāvasecananti ayaṃ tesampaṭikkhepana yoti sambandho,
anya-e0806n0:391_123: itisaddo panettha parihīno, nahitantiādīsu tasaddenāsattarūpaṃ dūrādi vattumicchitantyavaseyaṃ,
anya-e0806n0:391_124: na hi taṃ gamyate, na hi tato gamyate, na hi tena gamyate, na hi tasmiṃ ṭhīyate’ti
anya-e0806n0:391_125: visuṃ sambandho vaseyo. Patīyantecāti co vattabbantarasamuccaye, atoceti vakkhamānahetuparāmāso,
anya-e0806n0:391_126: yanti yasmā atthe nipāto, vākyakāro vararuci, taṃsāmānādhikaraṇyatoti dūrādisā mānādhikaraṇyato,
anya-e0806n0:391_127: taṃyuttatopīti dūrādiyuttā gāmādisaddatopi, paccakkhantoti vākyakāravacanaṃ paccācikkhanto,
anya-e0806n0:391_128: tathāhyatrāyaṃ mahābhāssa pāṭho “dūrantikatthehi pañcamīvidhāne taṃyuttā pañcamīpaṭisedho
anya-e0806n0:391_129: vattabbo dūrā gāmassa, tatrāpi dassanā anatthako-yampaṭisedho, tatrāpi hi pañcamī dissati–
anya-e0806n0:393: Guruto kupitā dūrā,bhābyaṃ dūrā ca dassuhiti.
anya-e0806n0:394_0: Atra dūrantiketyādi vattabbaṃ vākyakāravacanaṃ, dūrā gāmassāti tassodāharaṇaṃ, tatrāpiccādi
anya-e0806n0:394_1: paccakkhānabhāssaṃ, dūrasmāvasathāti āvasathassa dūreti atthohi bhāssapadīpe keyyaṭo,
anya-e0806n0:394_2: paṭhamo puriso yassa so paṭhamapuriso bhavati “dūrantikā”di (2-6-5) kaccāyanasutte
anya-e0806n0:394_4: iti (2-6-2) sutte caggahaṇato pabhutiyogo ca gahito, tenāha–‘pabhuti yogecā’ti, pabhutiyogecāti
anya-e0806n0:394_5: iminā pabhutyatthayogopi saṅgahito, teneva ‘yatosarāmi attāna’nti udāhaṭaṃ.
anya-e0806n0:396_0: Nanu phuṭova tesaṃ sālādīnaṃ yogoti kimettha pañhena kassa panetehi yogo’tyāsaṅkiyāha-‘vajjanaṃ
anya-e0806n0:396_1: hiccādi, vajjanānanti kattari ano, vajjane sambandhe vattamānehīti vajjanasaṅkhāte
anya-e0806n0:396_2: sambandhe vatta mānehi apaparīhi, yuttasmāti yuttatova ekasmā, nāññato, kimettha
anya-e0806n0:396_3: vattabbanti iminā apaparīhi yuttasmāva pañcamībhavane pasiddhattamāha, pasiddhampetamāharitvā
anya-e0806n0:396_4: pakāsetumāha-‘kattuno’ccādi, yadatthoti yosālādi attho payojanaṃ yassa vajjanakiriyā
anya-e0806n0:396_5: rambhassa so yadattho. “Pañcamyapāparīhī”ti (2-3-10) āyuttepi pañcamī vidhīyate parehi,
anya-e0806n0:398_0: Diṭṭhasambandhassāti pasiddhavasena diṭṭhakāriyakāraṇassa mukhyassa, tassa kāriyatthanti
anya-e0806n0:398_1: tassa mukhyassa yaṃ kāriyaṃ, tadatthaṃ mukhyakāriya karaṇatthanti vuttaṃ hoti, tasmiṃ
anya-e0806n0:398_2: paṭinidhimhi vattamānena pabhineti sambandho, vinimayeti parivattana nimittaṃ paṭidānecāti
anya-e0806n0:398_3: ca saddassāṭṭhānappayutti daṭṭhabbā, patinā tassa yogoti sambandho.
anya-e0806n0:400_0: Yadi vajjanakiriyāya sambajjhamānassa kammattā kamme dutiyā, kimatthaṃ carahi puna
anya-e0806n0:400_2: yassā sā paṭipadavidhānā, visesavidhāna vatītyattho, yajjatra dutiyāvacanaṃ na siyā
anya-e0806n0:400_3: tadā ritesaddena yoge ujukaṃ vidhīyamānāya pañcamiyā dutiyā bādhīyethāti maññate.
anya-e0806n0:400_4: Yadyatra pañcamiyā dutiyāya bādhābhāvo eva payojanaṃ, evañcarahi ‘rite vā’ti suttayitabbaṃ
anya-e0806n0:400_5: evaṃ sati pakkhe dutiyā ca bhavissati, lahu ca suttampaṇītambhavatī tyāsaṅkiya payojanantaramāha-‘uttaratthañce’ti,
anya-e0806n0:400_6: atoyevāti uttaratthattāyeva, puna payojanantaraṃdutiyā gahaṇassa dassayamāha-‘vibhatyantare’ccādi,
anya-e0806n0:400_7: āhacca kaṇṭhādiṭṭhāne vāyunāāhanitvā āharitvā vā vacanaṃ āhaccavacanaṃ, ujukavacananti
anya-e0806n0:400_8: vuttaṃ hoti, vibhatyantaraṃ chaṭṭhīvibhatti, tassa byudāsatthaṃ, nirāsatthantuttho,
anya-e0806n0:400_9: aññāpīti dutiyāya aññā chaṭṭhīpi, pakatāya pañcamiyā sambandhanattho pakatasambandhanattho.
anya-e0806n0:402_0: Na dutiyāpi yogavibhāgatoti evaṃ maññate “tatiyā ceti vattamāne tattha yadi cakārena
anya-e0806n0:402_1: ‘dutiyā ce’ti sambandhīyeyya, tatrāpi ca kārena pañcamītyevaṃ na kassāpyapakaṃsoti‘vināññatraputhanānāhi
anya-e0806n0:402_2: tatiyā ce’tyekayogamakatvā yogavibhāgasāmatthiyā ‘tatiyā ce’ti ca kārena jātu pañcamī”ti,
anya-e0806n0:402_3: asahāyatthatte sati ‘vinātthe hī’tyevamavatvā kiṃ visuṃ suttaracanāyetyāha-‘bhedo pādānantvi’ccādi.
anya-e0806n0:404_0: Yantaṃ saddānaṃ niccattā sambandhassa yatthāti parāmaṭṭhaṃ soti, yoti parāmaṭṭhaṃ
anya-e0806n0:404_1: tassāti ca niddisati, yo yatthetyādikañca ‘kiriyādhārabhūte’ccādivuttigantha vivaraṇanti
anya-e0806n0:404_2: yoti kiriyādheyyabhūtādhippetā, etanevāha‘kiriyā cā’tiādi, tenāyamādhārīyati kattukamma
anya-e0806n0:404_3: samavetā kiriyāsmintyadhikaraṇe vā taṃ ādhārayatīti kattari vā ghaṇantena daṭṭhabbo,
anya-e0806n0:404_4: kattāraṃ kammañca kiriyānissayabhūtamādhāra yatītyādhāroti vā kattari ghaṇa, vuttaṃ hi–
anya-e0806n0:407_0: Nanu ca kiriyādhāraṇenādhārotyuccate, taṃ kimevamuccateti ce, nesadoso yadeva hi
anya-e0806n0:407_2: sambhavati tato kiriyā kāraṇenādhāraṇenādhārotya yamevattho, na kattukammapariccāgenādhārena
anya-e0806n0:407_3: ujukaṃ kiriyā gayhate, teneva vakkhati-‘kiriyāyayo ādhāro’ccādi, nanu yadyapyujukameva
anya-e0806n0:407_4: kiriyaṃ dhārayati kattā kattusamavāyiniṃ, kammasamavetañca viktedanādiṃ kiriyaṃ kammaṃ…
anya-e0806n0:407_5: tathā sati tānevādhāroti, na… loke satthe ca tesamādhāratthe nāppatītito, kattukammatāyeva
anya-e0806n0:407_6: hi tesampatītīti dassetumāha-‘kiriyā ce’tyādi, tathā ca vuttaṃ–
anya-e0806n0:410_0: Kattukammabyavahitanti kattukammehi taṃsamavetabhāvena byavahitaṃ, anuju pārampariyena,
anya-e0806n0:410_1: kriyāsiddhupakāriti kattukammasamavetāya kiriyāya pasiddhiyaṃ upakārī upakubbantaṃ,
anya-e0806n0:410_2: nanu ca na kiriyā dhāraṇenevāyamādhāro, kattukammānaṃ dhāraṇenāpyādhāroti sakkā vavatthapetunti
anya-e0806n0:410_3: codanammanasi nidhāyāha-‘na ce’tyādi, kiriyā nimittassevāti kattukammasamavāyiniyā
anya-e0806n0:410_5: cāya’miccādi, cattāro vidhāpakārā assāti catubbidho, ādheyyena sahopasileso saṃyogalakkhaṇo-ssa
anya-e0806n0:410_6: atthīti opasilesiko ādhāro-‘kaṭenisīdati thāliyaṃ pacati’tyādo kaṭādi, tathāhi devadattasamavetaṃ
anya-e0806n0:410_7: nisīdanakiriyaṃ kaṭo devadattaṃ dhārayaṃ dhārayati devadattabyavahitaṃ, evaṃ thālīpi
anya-e0806n0:410_9: kaṭādino. Yato-ññatrādheyyaṃ na vattate sabbathā bhiyyo vā, so vesayiko, visayohyādheyyassānaññatrabhāvo,
anya-e0806n0:410_10: yathā cakkhādippavattīnamaññatrābhāvā cakkhādīnaṃ rūpādayo visayāti vuccante, evamākāse
anya-e0806n0:410_11: sakunayotyādo sakunyādīnamākāsādito-ññatrābhāvāte tesaṃ visayātyuccante, visayo eva
anya-e0806n0:410_13: dadhimhi sappi,tyatra tilādikaṃ telādikamādheyyaṃ byāpetvā tiṭṭhatīti tilādi byāpakādhāro.
anya-e0806n0:410_14: Samīpe bhavo, samīpo eva vā sāmīpiko, yassa samīpadese ādheyyaṃ vattate so evamuccate,
anya-e0806n0:410_15: atrodāharaṇaṃ ‘gurūsu vasati gaṅgāyaṃ ghoso’ti. Nanu cātrāpyādhāre sattamī vidhīyate
anya-e0806n0:410_16: ādhāro ca nissayo vuccate, nissayo ca saṃyogasamavāyehi hoti, na ca sissādīnaṃ guruppabhutīti
anya-e0806n0:410_17: devadattasakunyādīnamiva kaṭākāsādīhi saṃyogo, telādīnamiva ca tilādīhi samavāyo
anya-e0806n0:410_18: vā atthi, tenāyuttaṃ te samādhārattanti, netadatthi, yadāyattā hi yassa ṭhiti so
anya-e0806n0:410_19: vināpi saṃyogasamavāyehi tassa nissayo bhavati, tathāhi purisassa na raññā saha saṃyogosamavāyo
anya-e0806n0:410_20: vātthi, atha pana tadadhīnaṭṭhitittā rājanissayo purisoti byapadissīyate, sissādīnañca
anya-e0806n0:410_21: guruppabhutina māyattā ṭhitīti tesamayaṃ tenassāyaṃ (potthake) yuttho te pati gurupabhutīnaṃ
anya-e0806n0:410_22: nissayabhāvo (jinindabuddhi) yutto guruppabhutinaṃ nissayabhāvoti, ettha pana yajjapi
anya-e0806n0:410_24: tatheva vacanicchā, nāññathā opasilesikena vā opasilesikeva visayābhibyāpakānamaggahaṇato
anya-e0806n0:410_25: upasilesasse vā upasilesasseva paribyattattā tatheva vohāroti na saṅkaro saṅkanīyoti.
anya-e0806n0:412_0: Nimittabhāvamattetīminā kammasaṃyogābhāvepi sattamiyā pavatti māha, na paresaṃ viya
anya-e0806n0:412_1: kammasaṃyoge eva, teneva vakkhati-‘evamaññate’ccādi, bāhirānaṃ hi-‘nimittā kammena”
anya-e0806n0:412_2: (caṃ, 2-1-89) iti suttaṃ, tattha kammena yoge payojanā sattamībhavatītyattho, ajinamhi
anya-e0806n0:412_3: haññate dīpītidīpinohananassa payojanaṃ cammaṃ, tassa dīpinaṃhantīti kammena yo go,
anya-e0806n0:414_0: Yassa kiriyāti yassa gavādyatthassa sambandhinī dohanādikiriyā, kiriyantarassāti
anya-e0806n0:414_1: gamanādikiriyantarassa, etenāti lakkhaṇanti etena, tato-ccassa vivaraṇaṃ kiriyāvatāti,
anya-e0806n0:416_1: ca “iti (2-3-39) āraddhaṃ parehi, tadāha-‘sāmi’ccādi, atra ca jinindabuddhinā “sāmyādīnaṃ
anya-e0806n0:416_2: bhedeno pādānaṃ pariyāyantaranivatyatthamiha mā hotu gāmassa rājā”ti vuttaṃ vākyamupanyasya
anya-e0806n0:416_3: hassāpya yuttattamupadassayamāha-‘sāmissare’ccādi, kena nivārīyate, na kenāpītyattho,
anya-e0806n0:416_5: (2-3-40) āraddhaṃ, tadāha-‘āyutte’ccādi, āsavā tapparatā, byāvaṭo niyutto, tatthedaṃ
anya-e0806n0:416_7: go sakaṭassā’ti pasajjatī”tyāsaṅkiya natthevetampi payojananti dassetumāha-‘vināpi’ccādi,
anya-e0806n0:416_10: sattamī” (2-6-40) “pañcamyatthe ca” (2-6-41) iti ca suttitaṃ, tenāha-‘kamme’ccādi,
anya-e0806n0:416_11: gahaṇassa bāhā visayoti sambandho, kaccāyanānaṃ‘bhikkhūsū’tiādīni kammatthe udāharaṇāni,
anya-e0806n0:416_12: hatthesūtiādīni karaṇatthe, kadalīsūti pañcamyatthe. “Maṇḍitussukkesu tatiyā ce”ti
anya-e0806n0:416_13: (2-6-45) kaccāyanasuttaṃ, tadāha ‘pasannatthe’ccādi, pasannattheti maṇḍitatthe, ussukkattheti ussāhatthe.
anya-e0806n0:418_0: Visuṃ karaṇaṃ niddhāraṇaṃ, jinindabuddhācariyena “kimatthampunaridaṃ vacanaṃ yāvatā
anya-e0806n0:418_1: niddhāriyamāno-vayavo samudāyabbhantaro, tattha yadā samudāyassā-dhikaraṇattaṃ vattumicchīyate,
anya-e0806n0:418_2: tadā sattamī siddhāva, yathā rukkhe sākhāti, yadā tvavayavasambandho tadā chaṭṭhī,
anya-e0806n0:418_3: yathā rukkhassa sākhāti saccametaṃ papañcatthantu vacana”nti vuttaṃ, tañceta mayuttantidassento
anya-e0806n0:418_4: āha-‘na sālayo’ccādisūkayuttānidhaññāni sūkadhaññāni, āhitā avaṭṭhitā, ādheyya bhūtāti
anya-e0806n0:418_5: vuttaṃ hoti. Yatoti āhitattakāraṇā, tatoti yato jinindabuddhivacanamevamayuttaṃ,
anya-e0806n0:418_6: tasmā kāraṇā. ‘Pañcamī vibhatte”ti (2-3-42) pāṇinīya suttaṃ, tadāha-‘samudāyato’ccādi,
anya-e0806n0:418_7: sutato sakāsā sīlaṃ atisayena seyyoti sambandho, “niddhāraṇe chaṭṭhī sattamīsu pattesu
anya-e0806n0:418_8: tadapavādo, yaṃ yogo”ti parehākhyāyate, tattha tāva niddhāraṇamevettha natthi kuto
anya-e0806n0:418_9: chaṭṭhīsattamīnaṃ tatthappavatti, yato tāsaṃ bādhanatthamidamārabbhateti dassayamāha-‘nātra
anya-e0806n0:418_10: jātyādīhi’ccādi, nahiccādinā jātyādīhi niddhāraṇābhāvaṃ dasseti, jaccādīnanti niddhāraṇe
anya-e0806n0:418_11: chaṭṭhī, kuto na bhavaticcāha-‘jaccādisambandhene’ccādi, ataṃ byapadesatoti sīlattādibyapadesābhāvato,
anya-e0806n0:418_12: puna niddhāraṇābhāve hetvantaramāha-‘tulyānañce”ccādi. Sādhunipuṇehi yoge pūjāyaṃ
anya-e0806n0:418_13: gammamānāyaṃ sattamī, tathā asādhuyoge, tathā pasitaussukkehi yoge tatiyāsattamiyo,
anya-e0806n0:418_14: tathā lopantanakkhattasaddā ca tena tena vacanantarena pāṇiniyehi vihitā, taṃ sabbaṃ
anya-e0806n0:418_15: taṃtaṃkārakavacanicchāyameva sādhetuṃ ‘mātari sādhu’ iccādayo udāhaṭā kesesu pasito
anya-e0806n0:418_16: pasatto, avabaddhoti attho, kesehi karaṇabhūtehi pasito bhavati, kattubhūtehi vā
anya-e0806n0:418_17: pasito katoti attho, phusseninduyuttena lakkhito kālo soyamityabhedena sambandhā
anya-e0806n0:420_0: Paṭhamātthamatteti ettake vuttepi vākyattho padattho vā na viññāyate nāmaggahaṇānuvattitoti
anya-e0806n0:420_3: pakatirūpenāti nāmena, tassa abhidheyyassa, mattasaddassātiādinā sāmaññantīdaṃ mattasaddassatthavacananti
anya-e0806n0:420_4: dasseti, idaṃ vuttaṃ hotīti nāmassābhidheyyamatteti iminā idaṃ vakkhamānaṃ vuttaṃ
anya-e0806n0:420_7: parimāṇaṃ paricchedo, saṅkhyā ekattabahuttāni, tabbantopi saddatthoevāti liṅgādivantopi
anya-e0806n0:420_8: sarūpā byatiritto saddattho eva, uccattanīcattasāmaññampurodhāya pavattiyā uccanīcasaddehi
anya-e0806n0:420_9: paṭhamā hoteva, taṃyuttassāpi saddatthabhāvato ‘uccaṃ gharāni’tyādīnipi uccattaṃ
anya-e0806n0:420_10: guṇaṃ nimittaṃ katvā soyamityabhedasambandha gharesu vattantīti. Palambate ajjhāgacchatityādo
anya-e0806n0:422: Abhimukhaṃ katvātiādinā yogārambhassa phalaṃ dasseti, nāmattheti saddatthe, padatoti āmantaṇādhikaatthamattappakāsakapadato, honti cettha…
anya-e0806n0:427: Taṃ yathā bhava rājeti, nippannattho bhaveti ca.
anya-e0806n0:428_0: Siddhassāti devadattattādinā siddhassa, atthoti devadattādi, kataṃ ābhimukhyaṃ samādhānaṃ
anya-e0806n0:428_1: yenāti viggaho, kriyāyaṃ viniyujjate gaccha bhuñjāti, āmantaṇaṃ natthi… idāni vidhīyamānattenāladdhasattikassābhimukhayitumasakkarūpattā,
anya-e0806n0:430_1: nāme’ccādi, kiriyāya kārakehi ca nipphāditoti iminā sambandhassa kiriyākārakasambandha
anya-e0806n0:430_2: pubbakattamāha, tatoyevāyaṃ nākasmīkoti na yesaṃkesañci dvinnaṃ bhavati, visiṭṭhānaṃyeva
anya-e0806n0:430_3: tu dvinnaṃ bhavatītyatippasaṅgābhāvo, kiriyākārakasambandhapubbako hi kārakehi añño
anya-e0806n0:433_0: Tattha assutāyaṃ kiriyāyaṃ ‘rañño puriso’ccādo kiriyā kārakasambandhapubbako-ñño
anya-e0806n0:433_1: eva sassāmibhāvādiko sambandho patīyateti, ‘sarati rajjassa’tyādo tu suyyamāne kiriyāsadde,
anya-e0806n0:433_2: ettha pana santamapi kammaṃ vattumanicchitaṃ, visesanabhāvoyeva saraṇampati rajjassa
anya-e0806n0:433_3: paṭipādīyate’rajjasambandhisaraṇa’nti, kiriyākāraka sambandho hi sabbattha vatthuṭṭhitivasenevatthi,
anya-e0806n0:433_4: tannimitto ca sassāmi bhāvādi, tattha sassāmibhāvavivacchāyaṃ vijjamānopi kiriyākāraka
anya-e0806n0:433_5: sambandho na vattumicchito, yathā ‘anudarā kaññā’ti, so cāyaṃ sambandho sassāmibhāvajaññajanakabhāvā-vayavāvayavavibhāvādilakkhaṇo
anya-e0806n0:433_6: bahuvidhoti veditabbo, tattha sassāmisambandhe rañño puriso, jaññajanakasambandhe
anya-e0806n0:433_7: nigrodhassa bījaṃ, avayavāvayavisambandhe rukkhassa sākhā, idāni sambandhassetassa
anya-e0806n0:433_9: hi’ccādi, paripālanakiriyākato nesaṃ sambandhoti iminā paripālyaparipālanalakkhaṇo-yaṃ
anya-e0806n0:433_10: sambandhoti dasseti, sā ayampari pālanalakkhaṇā kiriyā sambandhamassedambhāvahetuṃ
anya-e0806n0:433_11: janayitvā nivattati, atthappakaraṇādinā tvimāya kiriyāyāyaṃ sambandhoti viseso vasīyate,
anya-e0806n0:433_12: na chaṭṭhiyā visesāvagamane sāmatthiyaṃ… tassā sabbatthekarūpattā, suyyamāne eva
anya-e0806n0:433_13: vā kiriyāsadde kārakabhāvassa hetuno vacanicchāyābhāve assedambhābhāvasaṅkhātasseva
anya-e0806n0:433_14: phalassa vattumicchitattā tatheva sambandho jāto chaṭṭhiyābhidhīyate ‘rajjassa saratī’ti, vuttaṃ hi–
anya-e0806n0:436_0: Paripālayatīti purisamparipālayati, tato pālanādikā upakāra sabhāvā kiriyādvinnampi
anya-e0806n0:436_1: tesaṃ sambandhinī bhavati, raññā hi kāriyamānā taṃsambandhinīpurisavisayattāvapurisayoginītyubhinnampikiriyāsambhavati,
anya-e0806n0:436_2: tatoyevatassā ubhayasambandhiniyā kiriyāya sambhaveassedanti buddhiyā hetubhūtassa
anya-e0806n0:436_4: sabbathā nirapekkhatte sambandhābhāvā, sambandhi buddhisabbhavassāti sambandhīsu
anya-e0806n0:436_5: rājapurisādīsu assedanti evampavattāya buddhiyā sabbhavassa. Paresaṃ viya “guṇe chaṭṭhī”ti
anya-e0806n0:436_7: ce’ccādi, saccanti yathā vuttaṃ codanamabbhupagamma codakampati yathāvuttaṃ sambandharūpaṃ
anya-e0806n0:436_10: codakādhippāyamatropanetvā tadeva visesato chaṭṭhiyā abhāve samupanetuṃ‘yajjevamihāpi’ccādikamāha,
anya-e0806n0:436_11: tattha athāti codakādhippāyappakāsanārambhe nipāto, evaṃ vattabbanti evaṃ yadipiccādinā
anya-e0806n0:436_13: na parādhīnanti appadhānabhāvato byatiriccate tato-ttaniṭṭhameva, na rūpantarambhajati‘purisasse’ti,
anya-e0806n0:436_15: tato rūpantaraṃ bhajati ‘rañño’ti, tato byatireka lakkhaṇo sambandho hoti, ekassa
anya-e0806n0:436_16: sambandhittāsambhavā vatthuto dviṭṭho visesanagatattena patīyate tato chaṭṭhī visesanamevānudhāvati
anya-e0806n0:436_17: patītivisaye saddappavattī”ti, yo hi vikappanaṃ visayo so saddānanti, atoyeva sambandho
anya-e0806n0:436_18: niyamena visesanabhedamanuvidadhāti… vatthuto dviṭṭhassāpi taggatattena patītiyā
anya-e0806n0:436_19: yathā bhātūnaṃ dhananti, nāvassambhātūnaṃ dhananticceva bhavati, tathā satyapi visessa
anya-e0806n0:436_20: bhede visesanagatameva bhedamanu(vidadhā)ti ‘devadattassa assā’ti, tadetaṃ sabbaṃ
anya-e0806n0:436_23: vatthuto cattuno na virujjhate, vattupaṭibaddhameva ca dviṭṭhattaṃ manasikatvā taṃvādīhi
anya-e0806n0:436_25: dhānappavattitoti, nīlādivisesanantu paratthattenāppadhānampi na kārakabhāvato byatiriccati…
anya-e0806n0:436_27: nīlassuppalassa gandho’ti, yadā tu na visessapavatti tadā byatiriccateva ‘nīlassa
anya-e0806n0:436_28: guṇassa uppalannissayo’ti kārakabhāvalakkhaṇā padhānabhāvā byatiriccate eva nīlādi,
anya-e0806n0:436_29: tato visesanamevānekappakāratāyāva tiṭṭhate, tato vise- sanaṃ kiñcideva kārakarūpato
anya-e0806n0:436_30: padhānabhāvā byatiriccateti visesana mattenāpi sesaṃ sabbaṃ tathā siyāti nāsaṅkanīyanti.
anya-e0806n0:437_0: Dvepīti rājapurisā dvepi, tatiye gehasaṅkhāte sambandhinī. Sahayuttampaṭicca evanti
anya-e0806n0:437_1: iminā purisassa appadhānattameva dīpeti, abhimatāti pāṇiniyānaṃ suttantarena abhimatā,
anya-e0806n0:437_2: yato chaṭṭhīya-mattano mate sambandhanissayā, tenāha- ‘sambandhamevi’ccādi, sambandho
anya-e0806n0:437_3: cettha mātu saraṇānamavaṭṭhānādikiriyānimittoti keci, aññe tu saraṇassa kiriyārūpattā
anya-e0806n0:437_4: kiriyantaramantareneva dabbena sambandhopapattimāhuyathā dvinnaṃ jatukato saṃsileso,
anya-e0806n0:437_5: jatuno tu kaṭṭhenāttanāyeva, na jatvantarakato saṃsilesoti. Paresaṃ tatiyatthe dutiyatthe
anya-e0806n0:437_6: ca kitakappayoge ññatrāpi (pañcamyatthe) sattamyatthe ca (“chaṭṭhī cā”) ti (2-6-20)
anya-e0806n0:437_7: dutiyā pañcamīnañcā”ti (2-6-29) ca suttantarehi chaṭṭhītimatā, tassāpi vatticchātova
anya-e0806n0:437_10: bahulantīmassa atthaṃ dasseti ‘yathā dassana’nti, avisaṃvādakālokassatyādikaṃ kamme
anya-e0806n0:437_11: udāharaṇaṃ, pañcamyatthe pana vatticchātova sabbe tasanti daṇḍassātyādīni udāharaṇāni veditabbāni.
anya-e0806n0:439_1: aññehi tulyatthehi yoge tatiyāya vidhīyamānattā pāṇiniyānaṃ anabhimatā, yasmā sadisā
anya-e0806n0:439_2: bhāvā tesaṃ nopamāti ‘ajjunassa tulā natthī’tyādikamuccate, tasmā evaṃ yathāvuttanayenāti
anya-e0806n0:439_3: tadevantīmassa attho veditabbo, tadevanti vā nipātasamudāyo yathāvuttanidassanattho,
anya-e0806n0:439_4: tulyesūti sadisesu, tathāvuttāti ajjunassatulānatthītyādinā tena pakārena vuttā.
anya-e0806n0:441_0: Sutte ‘ato’ti vuttaṃ ‘akārantato’ti kathaṃ vuttīti āha ‘ato’tiādi, ādesā hontīti
anya-e0806n0:441_1: seso, yakārānaṃyeva siyuṃ… āeādesānamekavaṇṇattā, lope kateti okārassa lope kate,
anya-e0806n0:441_3: kāraṇantaraṃ vattumārabhate ‘kiñcā’tiādi, niccamparalopova siyā, na pubbalopopi āgamappayogānukūlyenātipi
anya-e0806n0:441_4: sakkā vattunti āha-‘nacā’tiādi, niccamparalopoyevāti na ca sakkā mantunti sambandho,
anya-e0806n0:441_5: evaṃ santetyādinā tattha virodhamāha, atosambhavāti ādesākārato sambhavā, jhissākāravidhānaṃ
anya-e0806n0:441_8: imassāti “ato yonaṃ ṭāṭe”tī massa suttassa, jhismātvevāti ‘jhismā’ iti etādisaṃ suttameva,
anya-e0806n0:441_9: jhismā yonaṃ ṭāṭetivāti “jhismā yonaṃ ṭāṭe”ti suttaṃ vā, atoti ‘ato’ iti suttaṃ,
anya-e0806n0:443: Yasmā ekameva rūpamudāhaṭaṃ, tasmā rūpārūpāni rūperūpānīti bhedo veditabbo, tena hi bahuvacane bahuvacanena (potthake) paṭhamādutiyāsu ‘aṭṭhīnī’ti ekameva rūpamudāhaṭanti dasseti.
anya-e0806n0:445_0: Suñiti ñakāro kimatthoti āha-‘ñakāro’tiādi, asati hi ñakāre‘ñānubandho’ti ñakārena
anya-e0806n0:445_1: visesanena sukāro na visesī yeyya satiyeva tasmiṃ tena so visesīyeyya, tasmā “ñakānubandhādyantā”ti
anya-e0806n0:445_2: sutte ‘ñakānubandhā’ti visesanaṃ visesanabhāvo attho payojanaṃ yassa so visesanattho,
anya-e0806n0:445_5: kathaṃ catutthyattho-vasīyatīti vuccate, catutthīekavacane attattha’nti ettha saddhammasavanādikamattanimittanti
anya-e0806n0:445_6: yo-ttho, so cattho-ñña padatthepi, tassā-ññapadatthabhūtassāpi attā attho payojanambhavati
anya-e0806n0:445_7: nimittabhāvenāti nātthabhedoti ta eta imavajjitānaṃ sabbādīnanti ta etaimasaddehi
anya-e0806n0:445_8: eva vajjitānamaññesaṃ sabbādīnaṃ, paṭisiddhesupi kassaci ādeso dissatīti dassetumāha‘tasaddassa cā’ti.
anya-e0806n0:449: Ghapasaññehīti idaṃ tetimāmūhi tīmassa aññapadatthasamāsena vā visesanaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ, vuttiyaṃ katanti ādikaṃ kattādippakāsanatthaṃ kataṃ, tāyāti sabbattha vikappodāharaṇaṃ.
anya-e0806n0:451_0: “Āgamā tagguṇībhūtā taggahaṇena gayhantī”ti paribhāsā vacanametaṃ tattha tagguṇībhūtāti
anya-e0806n0:451_1: tasmiṃ āgamimhi guṇībhūtā, avayavavasena pacchā bhavanto amukhyabhūtā, taggahaṇenāti
anya-e0806n0:451_2: āgamiggahaṇena taggahaṇena gahaṇatoti āgamibhūtassa naṃ iccassa gahaṇena gahaṇato,
anya-e0806n0:451_3: ‘namhi vibhattimhi’ti tu vattabbaṃ, vipallāso vā ettha daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0806n0:452_0: (49) Ikārassevavātiādinā vuttameva vivarati tissa iccādinā, tassa tissa, niddiṭṭhattāti
anya-e0806n0:452_1: tissa niddiṭṭhattā, “namhi ticatunnamitthiyaṃ tissa catassā”ti (2-20) tissādeso “namhi
anya-e0806n0:454: Vibhattisutteti “dvedvekānekesvi”(2-1) ccādisutte, ssananti bahuvacanena sahitamekavacanamāha, suttamidanti “suñsassā”ti idaṃ suttaṃ, sutte pana satīti “suña sassā”ti sutte sati.
anya-e0806n0:456: Ratti ca ādi ca ratyādayo, tehi.
anya-e0806n0:460_0: Tenāti yato ltuiti visesanattena vattumicchitassa paccayassa gahaṇaṃ, tenāti attho,
anya-e0806n0:460_1: paccayassa gahaṇā tadādigahaṇaṃ labbhate… “paccayaggahaṇe yato so vihito, tadādino
anya-e0806n0:460_3: (1-13) vacanatoti manasi nidhāyāha- ‘yato’iccādi, so kriyattho ādi yassa so tadādi,
anya-e0806n0:460_4: so paccayo-nto yassa samudāyassa so tadanto, tādisassa tadā ditadantasamudāyavisesa(ssa)
anya-e0806n0:460_5: gahaṇaṃ, na tu tadantamattassetyattho, nanu ca ‘ltvī’ti visesanattena vattumicchite
anya-e0806n0:460_6: bhavatu “vidhibbisesanantassā”ti tadantassa gahaṇaṃ, paccayaggahaṇena pana tadādino
anya-e0806n0:460_7: gahaṇaṃ kathaṃ siyā vacanābhāvātyāha-‘tadavinābhāvittā’ti, yato vihito, tena vinā
anya-e0806n0:460_8: na bhavati sīlenāti tadavinābhāvī, tassa bhāvo tasmā. “Paccayaggahaṇe yato so vihito
anya-e0806n0:460_9: tadādino gahaṇa”nti ñāyassa yattha paccayaggahaṇaṃ tattha sādhāraṇattā ‘tadādino’ti
anya-e0806n0:460_10: vuttaṃ, tadādisamudāyassa gahaṇe panettha viseso na dissati… adhikattāti adhigatantāvāti
anya-e0806n0:460_11: (potthake) ādīsu visesadassanāsambhavā, ‘tuṃsmā lopo cicchāyaṃ te” tyatra (5-4) tu
anya-e0806n0:460_12: dissati viseso, vakkhatihi tattha “tuṃtāyetave bhāve bhavissati kriyāyaṃ tadatthāya”nti
anya-e0806n0:462_0: Aityevavattabbanti ‘gea’ityeva vattabbanti vuttaṃ hoti, pakkhe dīghavidhānenevāti
anya-e0806n0:462_1: iminā akārādese kate pakkhe dīghavidhāneneva, aññatthacaritatthatāyāti ltvantādito
anya-e0806n0:462_2: aññattha bhopurisā bhopurisaiccādo jātipadatthanissayanena katatthatāya, parisa mattatthatāyāti
anya-e0806n0:462_3: vuttaṃ hoti, avassaṃ dīghabhāve kāraṇamāha ‘yadicākāro’iccādi, yadica ākāroti padacchedo.
anya-e0806n0:464_0: Ghaitisaññā ghasaññā tāsaṃ, kaññāsaññātiādīsu ghasaññānaṃ bahuttā bahuvacanena niddeso,
anya-e0806n0:464_1: gharūpassāti ghassāti ghasaddarūpassa, tathā bho brahmāti ettha tathāti iminā brahmātirūpassa
anya-e0806n0:464_2: niruttiyaṃ niddiṭṭhattāva ettha saṅgahitabhāvaṃ dasseti. Evaṃ vivarantīti tasmā sa
anya-e0806n0:464_3: sakhato gassa akāraākārā”tiādinā evaṃ vivaranti, te hi aca āca ica īca ecāti dvande
anya-e0806n0:464_4: pubbasarānaṃ lopaṃ katvā ettupasilesaniddesaṃ vaṇṇenti, sāmaññavidhānanti ‘brahmakattuisi
anya-e0806n0:464_5: sakhato’ccevamavisesetvā sāmaññena kathanaṃ, kimatthanti kiṃ attho payojanaṃ yassa
anya-e0806n0:464_6: taṃ kimatthaṃ. Sāmaññavidhānaṃ kimatthampanevaṃ payojanāsaṅkāyaṃ payojanāsaṅkāvicāraṇaṃ
anya-e0806n0:464_7: manasi nidhāya ‘āgati gaṇoya’nti vuttattā āha– ‘atthato’ccādi, atthatoti sā matthiyato,
anya-e0806n0:464_8: anenāti‘āgatigaṇoya’nti iminā vacanena, idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti ‘āgatigaṇoyanti iminā tadākārasaṅkhātajātippadhānagaṇattappakāsanena
anya-e0806n0:464_9: yadi sambodhane ekārantākārantalābhīnaṃ kattu isi sakha muni bhadantādīnaṃ gahaṇaṃ
anya-e0806n0:464_10: payojanaṃ na siyā, aññathā anupapajjanaṃ siyāti evamaññathānupapattilakkhaṇasāmatthiyato
anya-e0806n0:464_11: sāmaññavidhāne payojanamāhe”ti, soyanti iminā vuttiyaṃ ‘āgati gaṇoya’nti vuttaṃ vacanaṃ nidasseti.
anya-e0806n0:466: Ssañca ssāca ssāyoca añca tiñcāti itarītarayoge cattha samāso,ssaṃ ssā ssāyaṃ tiṃsu.
anya-e0806n0:468_0: Ghoca oca gho ghāntaokārantā, natthi gho yesante agho, tesaṃ, sāmaññavidhānatoti
anya-e0806n0:468_1: kassaci liṅgassa aparāmāsā sāmaññena vidhānato, nādekavacanesūti nādīsu ekavacanesūti
anya-e0806n0:468_2: attho, hi hetumhi, yasmā kassaci evaṃ duṭṭhādhippāyo siyā, tasmā dutiyamudāharaṇanti
anya-e0806n0:468_3: attho, dutiyopi hetumhi, yasmā sabbesaṃ saṅgahaṇatthaṃ, tasmā na ca tathādhippetanti
anya-e0806n0:468_8: “gossā gasihinaṃ sugāvagavā”tyādinā (2-67) karīyamānaṃ gāvādesādikaṃ, ettha pana
anya-e0806n0:468_9: napuṃsake ekavacanantaṃ daṇḍi kulanti vakkhamānattā nodāhaṭaṃ, yosu pana “yolopanisudīgho”ti
anya-e0806n0:468_10: (2-88) adīghassāpi dīghavidhānasāmatthiyā paṭhamameva dīghassa rassābhāvekāva kathāti
anya-e0806n0:468_11: nodāhaṭaṃ, daṇḍīdaṇḍīni icceva tu bhavati, nossavāti pāṭho dissati, ettha vijjamāne
anya-e0806n0:468_12: ge pare okārantassa vā rassāpajjanadosampasaṅgato nossā’ti pāṭhena bhavitabbaṃ.
anya-e0806n0:470: Gāvena gavenāti karaṇepi samānaṃ, gāvassa gavassāti chaṭṭhiyāpi.
anya-e0806n0:472: Senāti sutattā seiti vuttiyaṃ nimittaṃ parikappitaṃ.
anya-e0806n0:474: Saddantarattena koci dosoti sambandho, ādisitabbā ādesā kātabbā.
anya-e0806n0:476: Pena pasaññāya yuttā īpī, paca so īcāti vāpī abhedaggahaṇena, aññassāti ikāra ukāraūkārassa.
anya-e0806n0:478: Loke devadatto dattoti ekadesena samudāyavohāra dassanato sminotīmassa smiṃ vacanassātyayamattho dassitotyāha-‘smiti iminā’tiādi.
anya-e0806n0:480_0: Brahmādīsu ‘ito kvaci sassa ṭānubandho’ti pāṭhāti sambandho, brahmādīsūti “ghabrahmādite”ti
anya-e0806n0:480_1: (2-60) sutte vuttabrahmādīsu, pāṭhāti ‘ito’tyādino gaṇasuttassa pāṭhā, ṭānubandhoti
anya-e0806n0:482_0: So bhasmā anto yassa so tadanto samudāyo, tassa, “cānukaḍḍhitaṃ nottaratrānuvattatī”ti
anya-e0806n0:482_1: viññūvacanaṃ, viduno vidūti kūpaccayantassa udāharaṇaṃ, viññuno viññūti “vito ñāto”ti
anya-e0806n0:488: Paṭhamādutiyāyonamekato udāharaṇāni aṭṭhī aṭṭhīniti, tānica yolopanilātisseva dassitāni, tathāyevāññānipi ñāyantīti.
anya-e0806n0:490: Ṭamuttapakkhoti asantaṃ kubbantassāti ṭādesena muttapakkho,ntussacevanti pasiddhattāva ṭādesamuttapakkhaṃ upameti, “sañjātaṃ tārakāditvito”ti (5-45) ito andhitā.
anya-e0806n0:492_0: Ṭādeso-tippasajjatīti kasmā vuttaṃ nanu tadantassa samudāyassa patte “chaṭṭhiyantassā”ti
anya-e0806n0:492_1: (1-17) antasseva hoti, tathāsati nevātippasaṅgo, tasmā kasmātippasajjatīti vuttanti,
anya-e0806n0:492_2: saccaṃ, tathāpi ‘jhissā’ti vattuṃ sakkuṇeyyatte issāti vuttatta vuttanthi sāmatthiyato
anya-e0806n0:492_3: tadantassa ṭādeso-tippasajjatīti tathā vuttanti, nanu ‘jhissā’ti vuttepi sovātippasaṅgo
anya-e0806n0:492_4: tadavatthoyevāti saccaṃ, tathāpi yadi samudāyassa ṭādeso-bhimato siyā ‘tathā sati
anya-e0806n0:492_5: kiṃ jhaggahaṇena issatveva vadeyyāti nātippasajjatīti, jhaggahaṇe nāmante ikārasseva
anya-e0806n0:492_6: jhasaññattāti idaṃ pana visesanattena vattu manicchite yujjati.
anya-e0806n0:496_0: Hetukurusaddehi yosu iminā ṭādese “lopo”tīminā yolope vā sampatte “paccayanissitaṃ
anya-e0806n0:496_2: balavā”ti paṭhamaṃ ṭādese nimittābhāvāva lopā bhāvoti dassetumāha-‘hetukurusaddehi’ccādi.
anya-e0806n0:498_0: Nanu katarādayova sabbādisaddavacanīyā honti samāsenābhihitattā, na tu sabbasaddo
anya-e0806n0:498_1: saddasse (potthake) tyāha-‘avayavene’tyādi,yadipi ‘sabba saddo ādi yesa’nti avayavena
anya-e0806n0:498_2: viggaho, tathāpi samudāyovāssattho bhavati… yesantyanena samudāyassa parāmāsāti bhāvo,
anya-e0806n0:498_3: itīti hetumhi, ko bhavantānaṃ dvinnaṃ bahunnaṃ vā eko deva datto kaṭhādīhi vā atthe
anya-e0806n0:498_4: dvīhi bahūhi vā ekassa niddhāraṇe sati kimhā niddhāraṇe ratara ratamesu ṇādivuttiyaṃ
anya-e0806n0:498_6: kiṃsaddassa rūpasiddhīti dassetumāha katamā’tiādi, ubho aṃsā assāti atthe “ayubhadvitīhaṃse”ti
anya-e0806n0:498_7: (4-49) aye“saro lopo sare”ti (1-26) saralope rūpasiddhīti āha-‘ubho aṃsā’iccādi,
anya-e0806n0:498_8: kāyaṃ vavatthā nāme tyāha-‘sābhidheyyā’tyādi, avadhiccādinā tassevātthaṃ vibhāveti,
anya-e0806n0:498_9: adhaṃso abhaṭṭhatā avadhibhāveyevāvaṭṭhānaṃ, sābhidheyyā pekkhāti ettha so sako abhidheyyo
anya-e0806n0:498_10: attho disādi sābhidheyyoti gahitoti āha-‘pubbādīna’ntiādi, sābhidheyyanti kammato
anya-e0806n0:498_13: ettha ca parādisaddābhidheyyo-ttho disādesādi pubbādisaddābhidheyyassātthassa disāya
anya-e0806n0:498_14: desādino vāvadhibhāvena niyamavasena pavattati, yo cāvadhibhāvo niyamavasena pavattati,
anya-e0806n0:498_15: socāvadhibhāvo niyamavasena pavatto pubbādisaddavacanīyaṃ disādesādi mapekkhatīti
anya-e0806n0:498_16: sābhidheyyāpekkhovadhiniyamoyeva vavatthāti vuccatītyayamadhippāyo, na tu abhidheyyāyanti
anya-e0806n0:498_17: asambhavā, asambhavameva dassento āha-‘yo hi’ccādi, kosallena nimittenāti kusala
anya-e0806n0:498_18: saddassa pavattinimittena kosallena, uttarākuravo uttarakurudīpa vāsino, deso vā,
anya-e0806n0:498_19: ‘nāññañca nāmappadhānā”ti (2-136) aneneva saññāyaṃ sabbādikāriyassa nisiddhatte kimasaññāyaṃbhyanenetyāha
anya-e0806n0:500_1: yuttatā cāssa pāṭhe byabhicāra dassanatoti vattumāha-‘napuṃsake’ccādi, pāṭhānugatā
anya-e0806n0:500_2: hi suttaracanā, vikappānuvattiyā anapuṃsakamidameva vacanaṃ tassa kvaci byabhicāratte
anya-e0806n0:500_3: ñāpakanti vattumāha-‘tassa cā’tiādi, avassamevamettha attho gahetabbo, aññathā yathāvaṭṭhitapāṭhānukkamenātthaggahaṇe
anya-e0806n0:500_4: sati suttassa suttassā (potthake) mukhyattappatītito kathantamaññassa ñāpakaṃ bhaveyya,
anya-e0806n0:502_0: Nanu ca “lakkhaṇapaṭipadavuttesu paṭipadavuttasseva gahaṇa”ntīmāya paribhāsāya lakkhaṇikassākārassa
anya-e0806n0:502_1: gahaṇaṃ na pappotītyāsaṅkiya paṭipādayamāha-‘rassākāre’ccādi, paribhāsāya cassāyamattho
anya-e0806n0:502_2: “lakkhīyateneneti lakkhaṇaṃ, sādhvasādhujānana hesuttā sutta sattha muccate, paṭigatampadaṃ
anya-e0806n0:502_3: paṭipadaṃ, uccāritamañjasetyattho, lakkhaṇañca paṭipadañca lakkhaṇapaṭipadāni, tehi
anya-e0806n0:502_4: vuttāni rūpāni lakkhaṇapaṭipadavuttāni, tesu, vuttasaddo paccekamparisamāpīyate ‘lakkhaṇavuttesu
anya-e0806n0:502_5: paṭipadavuttesū’ti, tatrāñcasā yamaniddiṭṭhaṃ, kevalaṃ lakkhaṇadassanenāsmiṃ lakkhaṇe
anya-e0806n0:502_6: satyavassamanena rūpena bhavitabbanti lakkhaṇena paṭipāditaṃ, taṃ lakkhaṇavuttamityuccate,
anya-e0806n0:502_7: yantvañjasā saddeneva paṭipāditaṃ, taṃ paṭipadavuttanti vuccate, tasmiṃ lakkhaṇavutte
anya-e0806n0:502_8: paṭipadavutte ca rūpe sati paṭipadavuttasseva gahaṇaṃ, netarasse”ti, paṭipadavuttassevetyavadhāraṇena
anya-e0806n0:502_9: niyamarūpabhāssā paribhāsāyāvagamyate, so ca niyamo aniyamapubbake sandehe satyavatiṭṭhate,
anya-e0806n0:502_10: tasmā yatra lakkhaṇavuttameva kevalaṃ, na paṭipadavuttaṃ, tatra nāyaṃ paribhāsā vatiṭṭhate,
anya-e0806n0:502_11: yatrāpi paṭipadavuttameva kevalaṃ, na lakkhaṇavuttaṃ, sopyetissā avisayo, yatra dve
anya-e0806n0:502_12: rūpāni sambhavanti tatrevā yamparibhāsā sandehāpākaraṇamukhena pavattāti ñāyappattoyevā
anya-e0806n0:502_13: mattho imāya paribhāsāyānuvādyate, tathāhi sandehaṭhānesu yadyapyekarūpamevamabhinnamubhinnaṃ,
anya-e0806n0:502_14: tathāpi lakkhaṇavuttaṃ rūpaṃ lakkhaṇe nonnīyamānaṃ dhūmaggi viya jalabalākā viya
anya-e0806n0:502_15: cānu mānikaṃ, yantu paṭipada vuttaṃ rūpaṃ, taṃ paccakkhasiddhaṃ, paccakkhānumānesu
anya-e0806n0:502_16: ca paccakkhambalavantaraṃ pamāṇanti ato paṭipadavuttameva gayhatīti.
anya-e0806n0:506_3: ante saddo sattamyatthe, aṅge bhavamantaraṅgaṃ vibhatthyatthe-saṅkhyasamāso “eonama
anya-e0806n0:506_4: vaṇṇe”ti (1-37) attaṃ rāgamo, aṅgato bahi bahiraṅgaṃ “payyapābahitiro purepacchā
anya-e0806n0:506_5: vā pañcamyā”ti (3-5) asaṅkhyasamāso, atra cāntaraṅgaṃ bahiraṅganti nāṅgebhavamantaraṅgaṃ,
anya-e0806n0:506_6: apitvantaraṅganissitaṃ kāriyamantaraṅgaṃ, nāpyaṅgato bahibhūto samudāyo bahiraṅgaṃ,
anya-e0806n0:506_7: kintu bahiraṅganissitaṃ kāriyambahiraṅgaṃ yathā mañcanissitesu saddāyantesu ‘mañcā
anya-e0806n0:506_8: saddāyantī’tyuccate taṃ viyeti atoyevā saṅkhyasamāsepi liṅgavibhattivacanantarayogo
anya-e0806n0:506_11: kate paccakkha ñāṇassākkhanissitattañāpanatthaṃ saṅketavasena kato-yamasaṅkhya samāso,
anya-e0806n0:506_14: liṅgavibhattivacanantarayogo na virujjhate, athavā antaramaṅgamassa kāriyassātthīti
anya-e0806n0:506_16: tesvantaraṅgo balavāti. Antaraṅga kāriyassa balavattaṃ sādhetuṃ ‘sabbapaṭhamaṃ vidheyyattā’tiādi
anya-e0806n0:506_17: vuttaṃ, idampana antaraṅgakāriyassa balavabhāvasādhane kāraṇaṃ na hoti, antaraṅgattā
anya-e0806n0:506_18: balavabhāvoyeva hi sabbapaṭhamaṃ vidheyyatta kāraṇaṃ, tathā cāha-‘yo lopato akārassa
anya-e0806n0:506_19: paṭhamameva bhavane kāraṇamāha antaraṅgattā akārassā’ti, tasmā nāyaṃ pāṭho ghaṭate,
anya-e0806n0:506_20: antaraṅgabalavabhāvasādhanassa pana lokato icchitattā ayamevatthe pāṭho ghaṭate”antaraṅgameva
anya-e0806n0:506_21: kāriyambalavaṃ loke tathādiṭṭhattā, tathā hi loko pātovā”tyādi, loke tathādiṭṭhattāti
anya-e0806n0:506_22: antaraṅgabalavabhāvassa loke evaṃ vakkhamānanayena diṭṭhattā, athavā kenaci vidhurappaccayopanipātena
anya-e0806n0:506_23: kāraṇave kallena vā kadāci kattumasakkuṇeyyattepi antaraṅgassa avassaṃ vidheyyattaṃ
anya-e0806n0:506_24: dassetumāha sabbapaṭhamaṃ vidheyyattā’ti, satisambhaveti nimittassānupahatattā kāriyassa sambhave sati.
anya-e0806n0:508: Ivaṇṇassāti vuttattāti ‘ye passivaṇṇassā”ti ettha ivaṇṇassāti vuttattā.
anya-e0806n0:510_1: asatī saṅkhyā yesantyānyasaṅkhyānītyāha- ‘ekatte’ccādi, ekānekesūti vuttattā saṅkhyāvisese
anya-e0806n0:510_3: syādīnaṃ sambhavo’ti. Atha nissaṅkhyehi hotusyādīnamasambhavo uccaṃ rukkhassiccādotu
anya-e0806n0:510_5: vivarati ‘aññathe’ tyādinā, kimesamuppattiyampayojanaṃ yenāsaṅkhyehi taduppatti no-numīyate
anya-e0806n0:510_7: natthīti yo ādīsu padasmā paresaṃ tumhāmhasaddānaṃ savibhattīnaṃ vonoādikaṃ padanimittaṃ
anya-e0806n0:510_8: kāriyaṃ na siyāti ‘uccaṃ vo, uccaṃ no’tiādayo payogā na sijjhanti, sati tu syāduppattiyaṃ
anya-e0806n0:510_9: luttesupi tesu padattanipphattiyāyeva taduppattito padatte siddhe padalakkhaṇaṃ kāriyaṃ
anya-e0806n0:510_10: sijjhatevāti bhāvo. Parehi ettha ‘tassaṃ sālāya’nti vacanicchāyaṃ ‘tatra sālāya’nti
anya-e0806n0:510_12: lopo vihito, tenāha- ‘asaṅkhyehi’ccādi, tadayuttanti āppaccayassa lopavidhāna mayuttaṃtyattho.
anya-e0806n0:510_13: Atha kenātra āppaccayo vidhīyate yenāssāpi lopo-nusāsīyate “itthiyamatvā”ti (3-26)
anya-e0806n0:510_14: ce netadatthi, itthiyamāppaccayassa vidhānato-saṅkhyānañcāliṅgattā, tasmā asaṅkhyehi
anya-e0806n0:510_16: itthiyanti (3-26) hi guṇippadhāno niddeso itthattavati āppaccayādayo vidhīyante ‘tassaṃ
anya-e0806n0:510_17: sālāya (micce tasmiṃ padatthe) tatre’ti asaṅkhyamidamitthattavati vattate, tasmā
anya-e0806n0:510_18: siyāye vetasmā āppaccayotyavassamāppaccayassa lopo vidheyyoti yo maññate, tampati
anya-e0806n0:510_20: vattate’ti cobhayamikkhate, itthiyanti niddesassa guṇippadhānattaṃ sādhetuṃ ‘itthattavati
anya-e0806n0:510_21: hi āppaccayādayo’tiāha, tatretīmassāsaṅkhyassa sālāyaṃ vattanato āha- ‘itthattavati
anya-e0806n0:510_22: cā’ti, ayampasiddhirūpena na vattateti sambandho, yadi ayampasiddhirūpena vattate,
anya-e0806n0:510_25: tassāti itthattassa, padattho ca itthattaṃ siyāti yopyāheti sambandho, gammamānatthattā
anya-e0806n0:510_26: itisaddāppayogo, tassāyuttanti tassevaṃ vādino jinindabuddhino vacanamayuttaṃtyattho,
anya-e0806n0:510_27: kutoccāha- ‘evaṃ hi’ccādi, yadi itthattassa vākyatthatā itthippaccayanivattikatā,
anya-e0806n0:510_28: evaṃ sati sālāyamiccādisaddantarāpekkhā itthattappatīti tatretyādīsu siyāti attho,
anya-e0806n0:510_29: neva tathā patīyatīti bhāvo, vuttamevatthaṃ phuṭayitumāha- ‘tathāhi’ccādi, aviddasuayanti
anya-e0806n0:510_30: diṭṭhanto paññāso, aviddasu ayanti ubhayatrāpyatrekavacanasissa nivattiyā kataṃ yamekattaṃ,
anya-e0806n0:510_31: taṃ saddantarādyanapekkhameva patīyatetyattho, itthatta vuttinā sālādisaddena sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ
anya-e0806n0:510_32: tatretyetassāti etāvatā āppaccayo uppajjatīti ca na sakkā vattunti dassento āha-‘samānādhikaraṇattampi’ccādi,
anya-e0806n0:510_33: samānādhikaraṇattampīti (itthi) vuttinā sālādisaddena sāmānādhikaraṇyampi, āppaccayādīnaṃ nāṅganti sambandho.
anya-e0806n0:512_0: Evāti anuvattateeva, ekottho yassa pakatyādisamudāyassa so ekattho ‘assa cekatthasaddassa
anya-e0806n0:512_2: vattanaṃ vutti īyādīnaṃ vutti, īyādividhāne satityattho, samāsatoti samāsitā, tenevāti
anya-e0806n0:514_0: Yadā cātrādhisaddappayogo tadā teneva vibhatyatthassa vuttattā na sattamī payujjate,
anya-e0806n0:514_1: yadā sattamī, na tadādhisaddo, tenā sakapadeneva viggaho evaṃ dassanīyoti āha- ‘itthīsu
anya-e0806n0:516_0: So ca amādeso, ādesassevāti aṃādesasseva, apañcamiyāti pañcamiṃ vajjetvā. Aññatra
anya-e0806n0:516_1: vidhīyamāno-yamamādeso pañcamiyampaṭisiddhattā pañcamiyā paṭisedhena sayampi paṭisiddho
anya-e0806n0:516_4: na lopa paṭisedhenāti paribhāsamāha-‘anantarassa vidhi vā hoti paṭisedho vā’ti, ettha
anya-e0806n0:516_6: antarāḷamattapaṭisedhe payojanaṃ natthītyantarāḷagatassa vidhino paṭisedhassa cābhāvānantarotyupa
anya-e0806n0:516_7: carīyate anantarā gāmātyādi viya, diṭṭhatte pana majjhassa na vijjate-ntara mesanti
anya-e0806n0:516_9: tenevānantarassāti paribhāsāyameka vacanaṃ, itisaddo idamatthe, iti imāya paribhāsāyādesenābhisambandhatītyattho,
anya-e0806n0:516_10: tenāti yathāvuttaparibhāsāya vasena, yena kāraṇenādesenābhisambandhati tenātyattho,
anya-e0806n0:516_11: alopoti lopa paṭisedho, sāmatthiyāladdhanti dvinnamatthānaṃ vidhānāya dve vākyāni
anya-e0806n0:516_13: tatrāpañcamiyātyādesenevāti sambandhati, vuttavidhānā na lopapaṭisedhena, tathāsatyamapañcamiyātidaṃ
anya-e0806n0:516_14: vākyaṃ yadi na visesatthamālambate tamantarenānupapattito-ññathā kintyanenātthabalena
anya-e0806n0:516_15: laddhanti attho, alopoti jotetīti sambandho, vākyabhedena vivaraṇaṃ kataṃ, na ekavākyattenāti
anya-e0806n0:516_16: byatireko ekavākyatāyañhi kāriya dvayassapi pañcamiyampaṭisedho siyā ‘pañcamiṃ vajjetvā
anya-e0806n0:516_17: taṃ kāriyadvayaṃ veditabba’nti, yadipi siddhāti sambandho, yena nāppattiyātyanena
anya-e0806n0:516_19: kimatthamihāyaṃ paribhāsā paṭhyate iha satthe-pavādā ussagge bādhanteti niyamo, tatra
anya-e0806n0:516_20: cussaggā duvidhā niyatappattayo aniyatappattayo ceti, ye sabbatthāpavādavisayampavisanti,
anya-e0806n0:516_21: te niyatappattayo vuccante, ye kvacidevāpavādavisayamavagāhante, te aniyatappattayo
anya-e0806n0:516_22: vuccante, evaṃ duvidhesussaggesu ye-niyatappattayo, tesameva bādhanamicchīyate, na
anya-e0806n0:516_23: niyatikānaṃ, tena tappadassanatthamayamparibhāsā paṭhyateti, yenetyussaggassa niddeso,
anya-e0806n0:516_24: neti paṭisedhavācī nipāto, appatte asamphuṭṭhe visaye ityajjhāhāriyaṃ, yena ussaggena
anya-e0806n0:516_25: nāppatte patteeva samphuṭṭheeva visayetyattho… ‘dve paṭisedhā pākatamatthaṃ gamentī’ti
anya-e0806n0:516_26: katvā, vidhīyatīti, paṭisedho vidhānañca, ārabbhate vidhī
anya-e0806n0:517_1: yena tvappatte visaye ārabbhate tassa bādhanaṃ na bhavatītyattho, kutoti ce anavakāsattā,
anya-e0806n0:517_2: tathāhi yadi ussaggena sabbo visayo gahito siyā, ko-pavādassaañño visayo siyā, tasmā
anya-e0806n0:517_3: anavakāsattā (na) apa (vāde) pana tassa bādhanambhavatītyavaseyaṃ, yena tussaggena
anya-e0806n0:517_4: koci devāpavādavisayo-nuppattosiyā, nasabbo, tampati sāvakā sattā tambādhateti vuttaṃ
anya-e0806n0:519_0: Sutte anitthiyanti kimatthiya (manena) paṭisedhavacanena, yato imassetvevānitthiliṅgena
anya-e0806n0:519_2: paribhāsāyaṃ, tattha liṅgena sutte niddiṭṭhato aññena kenaci visiṭṭhaṃ nāmaṃ liṅgavisiṭṭhaṃ,
anya-e0806n0:519_3: tassa, yattha saddasāmaññasannissayanaṃ, tattha nāmaggahaṇe satiliṅgavisiṭṭhassāpi
anya-e0806n0:519_4: gahaṇaṃ hoti… sāmaññe sabbavisesānuppave satotyadhippāyo, idamevāti anitthiyanti
anya-e0806n0:519_5: vacanameva, ñāpakanti patti pubbako paṭisedho, so itthiyampattiyaṃ sati anitthiyanti
anya-e0806n0:519_6: kato siyāti anitthiyanti paṭisedhavacanamevemaṃ paribhāsaṃ ñāpetīti attho, iminā
anya-e0806n0:521: Anapuṃsakassāti pariyudāsoti anapuṃsakassāti ettha nañsaddassa pariyudāso-tthotyattho.
anya-e0806n0:525_0: Hotu sito-ññatrake sati sādeso, simhi tu kappaccayā paṭhamameva kato massa sādesoti
anya-e0806n0:525_1: tappaccaye sati ‘kevā’ti kiṃ sāmaññena sādesavidhānene tyāsaṅkiya suttassa sāmañña
anya-e0806n0:525_4: vibhattiyā padattasādhikāyāpagamena padattābhāvā, padasaṅkhāranibandhanoti pada siddhi
anya-e0806n0:525_6: nimittassa abhāvo nimittābhāvo, tasmiṃ nimittābhāve hetuvināsetyattho, nimittā āgato
anya-e0806n0:525_7: nemittiko, phalabhūto dhammo, nimitte bhāvo vā nemittiko, nimittassābhāve taṃ hetuto
anya-e0806n0:525_8: pavattassa nemittikassa phalassāpyabhāvo bhavatī”ti, tathāhi chattanimittachāyā chattāpāyena
anya-e0806n0:525_9: bhavati, padīpanimittadassanaṃ padīpāpāye na bhāti, tathehāpi nimittato pavattānaṃ
anya-e0806n0:525_10: nimittābhāve abhāvoyeva yutti māti maññate, aññatracāti sito aññatra ca.
anya-e0806n0:529_0: Imissāyātyādīsu “ssaṃ ssā ssāye”tyādinā (2-52) i, “tadādesā te viya hontī”ti paribhāsato
anya-e0806n0:529_1: sādyādesīnaṃ gahaṇāssāyādesādīnaṃ gahaṇasambhavepi kiṃ ssāyādiggahaṇe na suttagurukaraṇene
anya-e0806n0:529_2: tyāsaṅkiya‘ssāyādiggahaṇa’miccādi, vutti gantho vuttoti dassetumāha-‘nanu ce’tyādi,
anya-e0806n0:530: Desino ādeso tadādeso, tassa, tassa ādesino gahaṇaṃ taggahaṇaṃ, tena.
anya-e0806n0:532_0: Aññathāti guruniddesamakatvā aññena lahuppakārena niddisane sati, ekavibhattiniddiṭṭhattāti‘dutiyāyossā’ti
anya-e0806n0:532_2: paribhāsekadesassa adhippāyo pakāsitoti ñātabbaṃ, etadevānuvattatītyanena tu “ekayoga
anya-e0806n0:532_4: yojanā paribhāsāyaṃ, ñāpetīti pubbe viya sāmatthiyena ñāpeti.
anya-e0806n0:534_0: Appadhānappaṭisedhato sabbādīnaṃ tadantavidhinā bhavitabbaṃ, aññathā hi sabbādiggahaṇe
anya-e0806n0:534_1: ko pasaṅgo piyasabbādīnaṃ, yato appadhānappaṭisedho, karīyate tena paramasabbeiccādi
anya-e0806n0:536_0: Yatthāti yasmiṃ kattari karaṇe vā, kattari tatiyāsiddhimāha-‘karoti’ccādi, karotimhi
anya-e0806n0:536_1: karadhātumhi gammamāne, māsena katāti pāṭhena bhavitabbaṃ… māsena katānaṃ pubbānanti
anya-e0806n0:536_2: vattabbattā, pubbabhāveti pubbabhavane māsassa karaṇattaṃ, ettha tu māsena karaṇabhūtena
anya-e0806n0:536_3: pubbabhūtānanti attho, tenevetthāpi bhavantīti pāṭhena bhavitabbaṃ.
anya-e0806n0:538: Cassa attho cattho, soyevāti ettha samāsassa parāmāso, cattho ettha sambhavati kintu sabbādi na catthasamāsavisayoti pāṭhena bhavitabbaṃ.
anya-e0806n0:540_0: Kiṃ bahulaṃvidhānā ‘vuddhyabhāvo’ otthābhāvo (pañcikāyaṃ) ti pāṭhena payojanaṃ yene
anya-e0806n0:540_1: tadatthameva “sumedhādīnamavuddhi ce”ti gaṇapāṭho kato, hemasaddena hemamayāni gahitānyabhedenatyāha-
anya-e0806n0:540_2: ‘hemamayānī’ti, kappana saddena sīsālaṅkārajālāni gayhanti, tāniyeva vāsasāni paṭā
anya-e0806n0:540_3: taṃsarikkhatāya, sakatthepi yathāgamambhavantīti sambandho, bāṇādīsu abhidheyyesu
anya-e0806n0:540_4: manādīsu na paṭṭhīyantīti yojanā, bāṇādīsuti bāṇa saddakkhayādīsu, ahasaddassa manādikāriyāsambhavā
anya-e0806n0:540_5: ahasaddo manādīsu na daṭṭhabbo, rahasīti nipātattā ikārassa ca asabbhavā rahasaddo
anya-e0806n0:540_6: ca manādīsu na daṭṭhabboti sajjhāhāro sambandho veditabbo, ikārassa kaccāyane smino
anya-e0806n0:540_7: karīyamānassa ikārādesassa ca, rahatisaddassa nipātattaṃ sabhāvato pakāsetuṃ ‘rahasītyādi’māha,
anya-e0806n0:540_8: rahosaddeti ettha rahasaddoti pāṭho-vagantabbo, tenāti yena ahasaddassa manādikāriyāsambhavo
anya-e0806n0:542: Geti gasaññe pare, kuto-nuiccādo bho’iti bahuvacananto nipāto, tathāsati ‘tayojanā’ti yujjati, tañca nipātattaṃ samatthetīti nipātamatteti dassetumāha- ‘bahutte’ccādi.
anya-e0806n0:544_0: Sattamyantaṃ bhavatīti seso, nanucantassāti vutte ntantuppaccayovāvasīyati, na tadantavidhīti
anya-e0806n0:544_1: ntantuppaccayova nāvasīyati, tadantavidhipīti pāṭhena bhavitabbaṃ āha- ‘ntappaccaya
anya-e0806n0:544_2: sseve’ccādi, sutattāti sotaviññāṇena gahitattā paccakkhattāti vuttaṃ hoti, anumitassa
anya-e0806n0:546: Daḷho dhammo dhanu assa daḷhadhammā. Rājādīsvimappaccaye paṭhite
anya-e0806n0:547: Tadanto paccayaggahaṇa paribhāsāya gayhatī tyāha- ‘iminā iccādi.
anya-e0806n0:549_0: Paccayaiccādinā “paccayaggahaṇe yasmā so vihito tadādino tadantassa ca gahaṇa”nti
anya-e0806n0:549_1: ñāyaṃ dasseti, tattha yato vihito taṃ vinā na bhavati paccayotyanena ñāyena pattoyevāttho
anya-e0806n0:549_2: ākhyāyate ‘paccayaggahaṇe yasmā so vihito, tadādino gahaṇa’nti, “vidhibbisesanantasse”ti
anya-e0806n0:549_3: tadantaggahaṇaṃtyākhyāyate ‘tadantassa ca gahaṇa’nti, so pakativiseso ādi yassa samudāyassa
anya-e0806n0:549_4: so tadādi, so paccayo-nte yassa samudāyassa so tadanto, tādisassa tadāditadantasamudāyavisesassa
anya-e0806n0:549_5: gahaṇaṃ, na tu tadantamattassetyattho, iha tu tadantaggahaṇamevānurūpanti’ dassetumāha-“kattari
anya-e0806n0:549_6: ltuṇakā”ti iminā tyādi, tadāditadanta samudāyassa tu gahaṇe phalaṃ ‘byajigisī’tiādīsu
anya-e0806n0:549_7: daṭṭhabbaṃ, tañca “tuṃsmā lopocicchāyaṃ te”ti (5-4) sutte sayameva vakkhati.
anya-e0806n0:551_2: ‘sakamandhātu’ saddopi ltvantoti sajjhāhāro padasambandho daṭṭhabbo, tatopīti na
anya-e0806n0:551_3: kevalaṃ kattutova, mandhātusaddassa ltvantataṃ sādhetvā sakamandhātusaddampaṭipādetuṃ
anya-e0806n0:553_0: Saṅkhyāsaddo yadīpi saṅkhyāne vattate, tathāpi saṅkhyānadvārenidhasaṅkhyeyye vattatītyāha-‘cuddasahi
anya-e0806n0:553_1: saṅkhyāhī’ti pāṭhena bhavitabbaṃ, cuddasasaddavacanīyāva pañcādisaṅkhyā, yato saṅkhyāsaddo neha pariggahitoti.
anya-e0806n0:557: Dutiyāggahaṇenāti ‘dutiyāyossa ne vā’tyevaṃ sutta racanāyaṃ dutiyāggahaṇena.
anya-e0806n0:561_1: itthipumannapuṃsaka samūhoti etthāyantesaṃ sādhanakkamo ‘dvandachaṭṭhīhi samāse itthipumanapuṃsakasamūho’ti
anya-e0806n0:561_2: ṭhite “samāse ca vibhāsā”ti (2-2-35) pumantassa amādese “vaggantaṃ vā vagge”ti (1-42)
anya-e0806n0:563: Kammādittā enassāpi abhāvapakkheti “nā sse no”ti (2-80) kammādito nāssa enādesakaraṇato vuttaṃ.
anya-e0806n0:565_1: kathitānukathanaṃ, anena ca neha pacchā uccāraṇamattamanvādeso, kiñcarahi ekassābhidheyyassa
anya-e0806n0:565_2: pubbasaddena paṭipāditassa dutiyampatipādanamanvādesoti vadati, teneha na bhavati
anya-e0806n0:565_3: ‘devadattaṃ bhojaya, imañca yaññadatta’nti, kenaci visesantarayogena kathitassānukathanaṃ
anya-e0806n0:565_4: anvādesoti sambandho. Kathampana visesantarayogo gamyateccāha- ‘sāmatthiyā’ti, kenaci
anya-e0806n0:567: Navirujjhatīti iminā “itthiyamatvā”ti (3-26) sāmaññena vidhānato syādyantamajjhepi itthiyampaccayo navirujjhatīti vadati.
anya-e0806n0:569_0: Nanu yathākkamaṃ naṃvibhattikkamenāpi sambhavati, tathāsati ‘dvinnaṃ saddānaṃ dveādesā
anya-e0806n0:569_1: kamene’cceva kasmā vuttaṃ tyāsaṅkiyāha ‘na naṃvibhattikkamenāpī’ti. Kāraṇamāha- ‘tassānapekkhitattā’ti,
anya-e0806n0:569_2: iminā nissayakaraṇamekā satthiyā yuttīti dasseti, apekkhite kathaṃ bhaveyyā tyāha-
anya-e0806n0:569_3: ‘yadi hi’ccādi, apekkhiti yathākkamaṃ, evamaññate “kiñcāpi jātiniddesena dvepi naṃ
anya-e0806n0:569_4: rūpāni gayhanti, tathāpi ‘ticatunna’nti viya byattiniddesova yathākkamopakārīyamānāna,
anya-e0806n0:569_5: manudesassa tathā viññayamānattāti naṃsuicceva vadeyya, na tathā vuttaṃ, tato-vasīyate
anya-e0806n0:571_0: Nanu ntantūnanti tadantā gayhanti paccayaggahaṇaparibhāsāya, tathā sati kāriyittena
anya-e0806n0:571_1: tadantāva gayhanti kathaṃ ntantūyevā tyāsaṅkiyāha- teyeve’ccādi, paccakkhatāyāti
anya-e0806n0:571_2: sutathāya-pañcikā sutattā, balavattā teyeva kāriyittena gayhantīti sambandho, na
anya-e0806n0:571_3: tadantā, dubbalāti byatirekaṃ vatvā dubbalatte kāraṇamāha- ‘anumitattā’ti, anumitattaṃ
anya-e0806n0:571_4: sādhetumāha- ‘anumitāhi’ccādi, bhavibhattīnanti pāṭho yutta taro, tassa antādese akāreti sambandho.
anya-e0806n0:573_1: tenevāha pañcikāyaṃ- ‘kathamidamavasīyate yomhīti niddesā’ti, tassadāni atthampakāsetuṃ
anya-e0806n0:573_2: ‘paccekanti ekekasmi’ntiādi vuttaṃ. Ekekasmiṃ yomhi dvinnaṃ ādesānaṃ sambhavā ādesīnampi
anya-e0806n0:573_3: bahuttasambhavoti sutte ‘dvinna’nti bahuvacananiddeso, vuttiyampana paccekaṃ yomhi
anya-e0806n0:573_4: paccekaṃ dvisaddasambhavā ‘dvissā’ti vuttaṃ, dutiyāyampi duve dve.
anya-e0806n0:575: Pakatavasenāti tumhāmhānamādesānamadhikatavasena, kamamanatikkamma na bhavantīti sambandho.
anya-e0806n0:577_0: Kaccāyanācariyo tumhāmhehi parāya catutthī chaṭṭhī savibhattiyā “sassaṃ”ti (2-3-3)
anya-e0806n0:577_1: suttena amādesaṃ vidhāya ‘tumhaṃ amha’nti bahuvacanarūpāni sādheti… ekasmimpi attani
anya-e0806n0:577_2: guruādike ca gārava vasena bahuvacanarūpadassanatoti dassetumāha-tumhaṃ amha’ntiādi,
anya-e0806n0:577_3: tassāyuttattā ‘tamayutta’nti vatvā ayuttataṃ sādheti ‘evaṃ hi’ccādinā, imasmimpana
anya-e0806n0:577_4: satthe ekasmimpi sabbathā bahuvacana rūpasādhanakkamaṃ dassetuṃ ‘idha panā’tiādimāraddhaṃ.
anya-e0806n0:579_0: Nenāti nakārena, padasaññāvidhāya kavacanābhāvepīti pāṇini yānamiva syādityādyantānaṃ
anya-e0806n0:579_1: padasaññāvidhāyakassa suttassa abhāvepi, anvatthavasena padanti gayhamāne atippasaṅgopi
anya-e0806n0:579_2: siyāti āha-‘ruḷhiyāvātippasaṅgā bhāvo’ti, ākhyātaṃ sābyayakāraka visesanaṃ vākyanti
anya-e0806n0:579_3: keci, ekākhyātikaṃ vākyantyapare, taṃ sabbaṃ ekato saṅgahetvā ‘padasamūho vākya’nti
anya-e0806n0:579_4: vuttikārena vuttanti dassetumāha- ‘sābyaye’ccādi, ākhyātaṃ tyādyantamāhu, abyayamasaṅkhyaṃ,
anya-e0806n0:579_5: ākhyātaṃ sābyayaṃ sakārakaṃ savisesanañca vākyesaññaṃ bhavatītyattho, visesananti
anya-e0806n0:579_6: kārakavisesanassa kiriyā visesanassa ca sāmaññena gahaṇaṃ, sābyayaṃ-saddhiṃ vacati,
anya-e0806n0:579_7: sakārakaṃ odanaṃ pacati devadatto pacati, sakārakavisesanaṃ-muduṃ visadamodanampacati,
anya-e0806n0:579_8: dassanīyo devadatto pacati, sakiriyāvisesanaṃ- muduṃ pacati, mandaṃ pacati, padasamūho
anya-e0806n0:579_9: vākyanti vutte ayampi adhippāyavisesovasīyatīti vattumāha-vattu’miccādi, yatheccādinā
anya-e0806n0:579_10: anekākhyāti kampi guṇappadhānabhāve nopakārato vākyamekambhavati… pada samūho vākyanti
anya-e0806n0:579_11: vuttattāti vadati, yathā vākyanānattanti sambandho. Ihāpīti vattumicchitatthetyādopi.
anya-e0806n0:581_0: Higgahaṇe pañcamīhissāpi gahaṇambhaveyyāti sutte ‘apañcamyā’ti vuttaṃ, tumhehi puññaṃ
anya-e0806n0:581_1: pasutaṃ anappakanti gāthāpāde tumhehitiādisū tattā na voādeso, tumhe tiṭṭhatha nagareti
anya-e0806n0:581_2: pubbavākyato vākyantarattā ekavākyatā natthi, tumhe viya diya dissanti amhe viya
anya-e0806n0:583: Pacchā ādeso anvādesoti gahite kathitānukathananti kathaṃ ñāyatīti āha- ‘pacchā kathanañca kathitāpekkhanti katvā’ti.
anya-e0806n0:585: Saha vijjamāno pubbo yassa so sapubbo.
anya-e0806n0:589_0: Jaṭā assa atthīti jaṭilo, sova jaṭilako, jaṭilakāti ekatthe nidassitavisesavacanaṃ,
anya-e0806n0:589_1: māṇavakāti viya na sāmaññavacanaṃ, asatte sampatteti idaṃ “āmantaṇaṃ pubbamasantaṃ
anya-e0806n0:589_2: vā”ti (2-239) suttassa sāmaññatā vuttaṃ, sāmaññavacanassa paṭisedhoti iminā visesavacane
anya-e0806n0:589_4: devadatto devadattasaddo ādi yassa, tañca taṃ sāmaññavacanañca, tasmiṃ devadattādisāmaññavacane
anya-e0806n0:589_5: māṇavake māṇavakasadde parabhūte sati, ubhinnampi asatteti iminā idaṃ dīpeti “devadattāti
anya-e0806n0:589_6: visesavacanattā paṭisedhābhāvā pubbaparānamubhinnampi “āmantaṇaṃ pubbamasantaṃ vā”tīdaṃ pappotī”ti.
anya-e0806n0:594_1: yathāvuttaṃ syādisamudāyarūpaṃ, avayavena viggaho samudāyo samāsattho, samudāye pavattā
anya-e0806n0:594_2: saddā avayavesupi vattantīti syādisaddo siādike avayavepi vattate, vidhiggahaṇañāyenāti
anya-e0806n0:594_3: “paccayaggahaṇe yasmā sa vihito tadādino tadantassa ca gahaṇa”nti ñāyena. Syādi ante
anya-e0806n0:594_4: yassa taṃ syādyantaṃ. Nanu ca “syādisyādinekattha”nti sāmaññena vuccamāne yaṃkiñci
anya-e0806n0:594_5: syādyantaṃ yenakenaci syādyantena sahekatthībhāvamarahati, tathāhi yathā gāmagatotiādo,
anya-e0806n0:594_6: tathā passa devadatte gāmaṃ, gato yaññadatto gurukulanti ādopi samāso tyāsaṅkiyāha-‘sāmaññena
anya-e0806n0:594_7: vuttepi’ccādi, yassa syādyantassayena syādyantena sambandho, tena syādyantena sahataṃ
anya-e0806n0:597_0: Ayamettha attho “yato gāmamiccetaṃ sādhanaṃ sādhyaṃ kiriyaṃ taṃbyapadesajānanayogyamapekkhate
anya-e0806n0:597_1: gatoti, ato sādhanaṃ kāra kaṃ sādhye kiriyāya niyataṃ, yato ca kiriyā sayaṃ sādhanamapekkhate
anya-e0806n0:597_2: kiṃ gatoti, ato kiriyāpi niyataṃ sādhanametissāti niyatasādhanā hoti ayaṃ yathāvutto
anya-e0806n0:597_3: niyamo aññamaññāpekkhāvasena vattamāno etesaṃ sādhyasādhanānaṃ sannidhāna mattena
anya-e0806n0:597_4: aññamaññato pakāsatī”ti. Passa devadatta gāmaṃ, gato yaññadatto gurukulaṃtyatra tu
anya-e0806n0:597_5: gāmanti sādhanaṃ passeti sādhyamapekkhate, gatoti gamanakiriyā tu gurukulamapekkhate,
anya-e0806n0:597_6: tato ca gāmagatānaṃ vākyantarāvayavānaṃ natthevāpekkhāti na bhavati samāso, sabbatthevamūhanīyaṃ,
anya-e0806n0:597_7: sambandho hi aññamaññāpekkhālakkhaṇo sambandhyantarato-navaṭṭhitaṃ nivattetvā visese
anya-e0806n0:600_0: Bhede visese gāmantetaṃ sāmaññaṃ visesāpekkhaṃ ‘gāmamāsīsati, jahāti, gato’ti, tathā
anya-e0806n0:600_1: ‘gato gāmaṃ, vanaṃ, gurukula’nti vevamākaṅkhato-bhilasato tassa tu padhānapadassupasajjanapadassa
anya-e0806n0:600_2: ca yā pariplavamānatā anavaṭṭhitatā taṃ visese visiṭṭhe sambandhini nivesento patiṭṭhapento
anya-e0806n0:600_4: kvaci sassāmi sambandharūpo avachindati sambandhyantarato nivattetīti attho, yato-yamapekkhā
anya-e0806n0:600_5: vākyakāleyeva nirūpyate, tato yatthātthi padānamapekkhā, tattha samāsāvagamo, yatra
anya-e0806n0:600_6: tu natthi, tatra na bhavatītyanupadiṭṭho visayavibhāgo ñāyateti bhāvo, bāle abudhetu
anya-e0806n0:600_8: sambhavati, paramatthato tu saddantarattā accantaṃ aññattaṃ vākyasamāsānaṃ bhedo,
anya-e0806n0:600_9: na hi vākye diṭṭhapadāni samāse santi, tathā ca vuttaṃ–
anya-e0806n0:602: Bhedo vākyasamāsānaṃ, ccantaṃ ññattaṃ (potthake) saddantaraṃ yatoti.
anya-e0806n0:603_0: Atoyevāti yato sāmaññena vuttepiyassayena sambandhotena saha tadekatthambhavatīti
anya-e0806n0:603_1: sambandhato viññāyatīti nāniṭṭhaṃ kiñcipīha hoti, atoyeva hetutoti attho. Byapekkhā
anya-e0806n0:603_2: sāmatthiyapariggahāyeti padānamaññoññākaṅkhā byapekkhā, sāva sā matthiyaṃ, tassa
anya-e0806n0:603_3: pariggahāya. Samatthavacanaṃ na katanti pāṇiniyehi viya “samattho padavidhī”ti (pā,
anya-e0806n0:603_4: 2-1-1) samatthavacanaṃ na kataṃ. Samattho pada vidhīti paribhāsāyamayamattho “vidhīyate
anya-e0806n0:603_5: vidhīyatīti (potthake) vidhi, padānaṃ vidhi padavidhisamāsādi, yokocīha satthe padavidhi,so
anya-e0806n0:603_6: samattho viggaha vākyatthābhidhāne (satti) veditabbo”ti, tādisaparibhāsāya byāpārato
anya-e0806n0:603_7: tesaṃ ‘passa devadatta gāmaṃ, gato yaññadatto gurukulaṃ’ tyādo nāniṭṭhappatti, sāmatthiyañcettha
anya-e0806n0:603_9: vākye byapekkhāceti (potthake). Tattha paṭhamassa pariggahaṃ vacanamantarena paṭipādiya
anya-e0806n0:603_10: dutiyassa pariggahamidāni vacanena paṭipādayamāha- ‘ekatthī bhāvo’ccādi, ekatthībhāvo
anya-e0806n0:603_11: bhinnatthānaṃ sādhāraṇatthatāvasena pavattiviseso, vākye hi sādhāraṇatthatā natthi
anya-e0806n0:603_13: sādhāraṇatthatā bhavati, idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti “samāse visesanaṃ visessamanupavīsati ekībhavati
anya-e0806n0:603_14: visesanaṃ, vākye tu visesanaṃ visessato visuṃyevā vatiṭṭhate”ti. Dvandasamāsassa
anya-e0806n0:603_15: tu padānaṃ visesanavisessābhāvepi sakalapadatthappadhānattā ‘rañño go ca asso ca
anya-e0806n0:603_16: puriso cā’ti vākyato ‘rañño gavāssa purisā’ti samāsassa viseso ekatthī bhāvalakkhaṇo
anya-e0806n0:603_17: bhavatyeva, tathāhi tattha vākye bhinnatthanibandhana samuccayapaṭipādanāya casaddo
anya-e0806n0:603_18: payujjate, samāse tu nappayujjate, ekattha vacanenevāti “syādisyādinekattha” tyekatthavacaneneva,
anya-e0806n0:603_19: ekattībhāvoyeva bhavatīti seso, evakāro na vākye tathāhi dīpeti. Vākye kathanti āha- vākye’tiādi.
anya-e0806n0:604_0: Vākyeti viggahavākye, visesena gayhati ñāyatyaneneti vigga- ho, so ca taṃ vākyaṃ
anya-e0806n0:604_1: ceti viggahavākyaṃ, visesena vā gahaṇaṃ viggaho, tadatthaṃ vākyaṃ viggahavākyaṃ,
anya-e0806n0:604_2: tasmiṃ, kāyaṃ byāpekkhāti āha-‘bhedādilakkhaṇā’ti, ādisaddena saṃsagga bheda saṃsaggānañca gahaṇaṃ.
anya-e0806n0:605_0: Tattha sāntarehi sāmyantarehi ca byāvutti chedo, saṃvisesa sāmivisesānaṃ sambandho
anya-e0806n0:605_1: saṃsaggo, tadāha- ‘tathāhi’ccādinā, bhedako byāvattako, atthagahitoti kāraṇavasena
anya-e0806n0:605_2: bhedavādinā gahito, yadeccādinā saṃsaggavādino-dhippāyamāha yadā tūbhayampiccādinā
anya-e0806n0:606_0: ‘Putha bhinno attho yesaṃ padānaṃ tāni puthagatthāni, vākye hi rañño puriso tettha
anya-e0806n0:606_1: rājasaddo rājatthameva vadati, purisasaddo purisatthameva, vuttiyantu rājapurisotettha
anya-e0806n0:606_2: rājasaddopi purisatthameva vadatīti dvinnamekatthībhāvo bhavati, aññoyevāvayavatthānvito
anya-e0806n0:606_3: samudāyattho pātubhavatīti tadapekkhāya cekatthībhāvo vuccate, jahamānasakatthavuttimabhyupagamma
anya-e0806n0:606_4: vuttaṃ- ‘visesanassa sakattha pariccāgene’ccādi, atoyeva paro codessati ‘nanu ce’ccādinā.
anya-e0806n0:606_5: Ekatthībhavanaṃ samasananti iminā ekatthanti samāsoti nātthantaranti dīpeti.
anya-e0806n0:607_0: Jahamānāni padāni sakatthaṃ yassaṃ (sā) tathā vuttā, nāccantāya jayātīti evammaññate
anya-e0806n0:607_2: tassopādānato, sabbathā ca sakatthapariccāge paropakārāsampādanato-nupādānameva payojanābhāvā
anya-e0806n0:607_3: tassa siyā”ti, thapati vaḍḍhatī. Atthanti rājasaddavāccaṃ. Accantapariccāgepi na
