anya-e0806n0:607_4: doso… vākye diṭṭhassupasajjanassa vuttiyaṃ soyevāyantyanvayāvasāyato tadatthāva gatiyāti
anya-e0806n0:608_0: Soyevāyantyajjhavasāyo-nvayo, soyevāyaṃ rājasaddo yo vākyatāle diṭṭhoti vohārīnamekattāvasāyenāsatyapi
anya-e0806n0:610_0: Abyayanti yadaññesaṃ pasiddhanti liṅgavacanabhedepi byayarahitattā upasagganipātānaṃ
anya-e0806n0:610_1: parehi abyayasaññākaraṇato abyayanti paresaṃ pasiddhaṃ, tesantvayaṃ samāso abyayatthapubbaṅgamattā
anya-e0806n0:610_2: anabyayaṃ abyayambhavatīti abyayībhāvo pasiddho, asaṅkhyassa sutattā tasseva vibhatyatthādayo
anya-e0806n0:610_3: visayabhāvena visesanānīti viññāyantītyāha- ‘asaṅkhye’ccādi, iminā nemesamāsatthāti dīpeti.
anya-e0806n0:611_0: Tāvasaddassa kamavuttiyaṃ yo-ttho sampajjate tamāha- ‘vibhatya’ccādi, vibhatyatthe
anya-e0806n0:611_2: uvāharitvā, niccayamāsāna maviggaho, asakapadaviggaho vā yutto, aññathā aniccatāpattītyāha-
anya-e0806n0:612_0: Asakapadena anattaniyapadena aññapadena viggaho asakapadaviggaho, tena, ettha hi
anya-e0806n0:612_1: yathā kumbhassa samīpaṃtyaññapadavākye samīpa saddenupasaddavacanīyassa vuttattā
anya-e0806n0:612_2: upasaddo nappayujjate, yathā itthī sūti etthādhisaddavacanīyassā (dhā)ratthassa sattamiyā
anya-e0806n0:612_3: vuttattā nādhisaddoti ‘itthīsū’ti aññapadavākyaṃ vuttaṃ, kathāpavattāti tvādheyyo
anya-e0806n0:613: Adhisaddassa pana puratovaṭṭhitassādhāre vattamānassa taṃsamānādhikaraṇena sattamyantenitthisaddena saha samāsoti dassetumāha-‘adhisaddo’ccādi.
anya-e0806n0:614_0: Syādilopoti adhisaddato itthisaddato ca paresaṃ sattamī bahuvacanānaṃ lopoti attho.
anya-e0806n0:614_1: Atta (bhāva) sampattīti sarīrasampatti adhippetāti brahmasaddassa sarīraṃ atthoti
anya-e0806n0:615: Samāsavibhattiyāti samāsato uppannavibhattiyā, sakalo padesasakalo, pariggahāpekkhāti abhyupagamāpekkhāyāti attho, abhyupagamepi hi pariggahasaddo–
anya-e0806n0:617: Ravimhi rāhugahite, dāresu ca pariggaho”ti nighaṇṭu.
anya-e0806n0:618_0: Sakalassa bhāvo sākalyaṃ-sakalasaddappavattinimittaṃ, tampana nissesa matanissesa
anya-e0806n0:618_1: (potthake) ggahaṇā puthu bhavatītyāha- ‘asesaggahaṇa’nti, tiṇānaṃ sākalyanti viggaho,
anya-e0806n0:618_2: tiṇasaddena hi tiṇasahitāni gahitāni, teneva vakkhati byatirekanaye- ‘taṃ sabbaṃ
anya-e0806n0:620: Tatoti yato sakalasakale na vattati, pariggahāpekkhāya samattiyā antato sakāsā sākalyaṃ na bhijjateti sambandho, samatthiyampi ante udāharaṇanti seso.
anya-e0806n0:621_0: Aggipariyantanti aggiattho gantho tādatthiyā aggi, sopariyanto-ssa ajjheyassāti aggipariyantaṃ,
anya-e0806n0:621_1: yattakassājjheyassa pariggaho, tassa aggi pariyanto, agginā pariyantabhūtena sahito
anya-e0806n0:622_1: ca mā siyāti, atoyeva coccate ‘athetaretarābhāve’iccādi, itarasmiṃ itarassa abhāvo
anya-e0806n0:622_2: itaretarābhāvo, go asso na bhavatīti hi atthantarattaṃ nisedhīyate, na vatthubhāvo,
anya-e0806n0:622_3: brāhmaṇo na bhavatītyatrapibrāhmaṇattadhammo nisedhīyate, na vatthubhāvo, parattātiādinā
anya-e0806n0:623: Atikkamābhāvetī ettha atikkamāti pañcamiyā asamāsaniddesoti āha- ‘atikkamā’ti, na panuppannassa pacchāti iminā atikkamābhāvo nāma uppannassa pacchā abhāvoti dasseti.
anya-e0806n0:624_1: idhādhippetaṃ kālaṃ dassetumāha- ‘upabhogasse”ccādi, upabhogo kammasādhano lahupāvuraṇassa
anya-e0806n0:624_2: nāyamupabhogakāloti viggaho, (ati) lahupāvuraṇanti rūpasiddhīti dassetuṃ lahupāvuraṇassātiādi vuttiyaṃ vuttaṃ.
anya-e0806n0:625_0: Yoggaṃ rūpanti viggahe anurūpaṃ, nanu cātra niccasamāsattāsapadaviggahena bhavitabbaṃtyāsaṅkiyāha-‘vicchāya’miccādi,
anya-e0806n0:625_1: anusaddena hi yoge vicchāyaṃ “anunā”ti (2-10) dutiyā vidhīyate, vākyeyevāssa ca payogo
anya-e0806n0:625_2: nāññatreti vākyampi bhavatīti maññate. Sakikhīti etthāpi “akāle sakatthe”ti (3-81) sahassa so.
anya-e0806n0:626_0: Sadiso kikhiyāti ettha kikhiyā pasiddhabhūtāya sādhiyassa sādhanabhāvena gahitāya
anya-e0806n0:626_1: sadhammattena koci sādhiyo sadisoti vuttoti kimidha sadiso appadhānaṃ padhānamevāti
anya-e0806n0:626_2: attho tathā sati puppapadatthappadhānenāsaṅkhyasamāsena sakikhīti ettha na bhavitabbanti
anya-e0806n0:626_3: āha-‘nanuce’tyādi, kikhiyāti sambandhe chaṭṭhī, ettha pana sadisattassa kikhīyā-ppaṭibaddhattāppadhānattaṃ.
anya-e0806n0:627_0: Yathā devadattoti ettha yadi samāso bhaveyya, devadattena sadiso yathādevadattanti
anya-e0806n0:627_1: bhaveyya, paṭisiddhattā pana (na) samāsoti, kikhīti makkaṭassābhidhānaṃ. Jeṭṭhānukkamenāti
anya-e0806n0:627_2: vuttattā anujeṭṭhanti tatiyantatā gamyate. Cakkena yugapadi sacakkaṃ.
anya-e0806n0:631_0: Pañcamyāti kasmā vuttaṃ nanu avuttepi tasmiṃ vakkhamānanayena pañcamyantattā pañcamyanteheva
anya-e0806n0:631_1: samāso viññāyatītyāsaṅkiyāha‘yadipi’ccādi. Tathāpiccādinā pariharati, hotu kāmaṃ
anya-e0806n0:631_2: ‘paripabbataṃ vijjotate’ti dutiyānisedhāya, aññatra kathanti āha ‘iha ce’tyādi.
anya-e0806n0:632_0: Ācattāro vāti āsaddo vākye, saraṇe vā, gāmo bahi tiṭṭhatītyattho, purato gāmampassāti
anya-e0806n0:632_1: vadanto puretyatthappaghānoyanniddeso, nasarūpappadhānoti dasseti, abhimukhe gāmampassātyattho.
anya-e0806n0:632_2: Avuttānametānyupalakkhaṇāni, tasmā ‘tiro gāmampassā’tipi vuttaṃ hoti, tiriyato gāmampassa,
anya-e0806n0:633: Apasaddayoge niccapañcantassa vikappena samāsavidhānāvābhavanenodāharaṇaṃ dinnaṃ (ettha) pañcamyāti payojanābhāvepi aññadatthaṃ kariyamānamihāpyatthavantaṃ hoti.
anya-e0806n0:635_0: “Anu yaṃ samayā”ti (2-1-15) ca “yassa cāyāmo”ti (2-1-16) ca pāṇinino vacanadvayaṃ,
anya-e0806n0:635_1: ayametesamattho “yassa samayā samīpavācī anusaddo, tena saha samassateti ca, anu
anya-e0806n0:635_2: yassāyāmavācī, tena syādyantena saha samassate”ti ca. Vatthuto tu sāmīpyāyāmavantānamaniddesepi
anya-e0806n0:636_0: Sambandhittāti sambandhisaddā sakatthamiva niyatapaṭiyoginamākkhapanti… tena vinā
anya-e0806n0:636_1: tesaṃ sakatthābhāvā. Āyāmo dīghatā, “yassa samīpāyāmesvanu”ti yathāvuttasuttadvayamākkhepenupadisati,
anya-e0806n0:636_3: samīpaggahaṇaṃ vikappatthaṃ, tena vanassānuti vākyenāpi bhavitabbaṃ.
anya-e0806n0:637_0: Gaṅgāya āyāmo anugaṅgaṃ, bhāgavuttikāro “lakkhaṇene”ti vattate. Yassāyāmavācī anu,
anya-e0806n0:637_1: tena lakkhaṇena samassate anugaṅgaṃ bārāṇasī, gaṅgāya lakkhaṇabhūtāya pasiddhāyāmaguṇāya
anya-e0806n0:637_2: bārāṇasī lakkhīyate yāvāyatāyāmā gaṅgā tāvāyampīti sabhāvato tūpamānopameyyabhāvo
anya-e0806n0:637_3: samāse patīyate gaṅgā viya dīghā”ti lakkhiyalakkhaṇabhāvaṃ vaṇṇeti. Evaṃ sati bārāṇasīti
anya-e0806n0:637_4: paṭhamā nopapajjateti maññamāno āha-‘gaṅgāyā mena yuttā “tyādi. Anugaṅgaṃ bārāṇasiyāti
anya-e0806n0:639_0: Akatasamāsācāti anena iminā katasamāsataṃ dīpeti, tiṭṭhantīti idaṃntappaccayantassātthapadanti
anya-e0806n0:639_2: pumbhāvābhāvo nīpātanā, akāro ca nipātanā “gotva catthe cā lope”tyatra (3-46) ‘nāññāsaṅkhyatthesū’tyanuvattanato.
anya-e0806n0:640_0: Lūnayavādīnamettha nipātanā kālepi napuṃsakaliṅgattaṃ, saṃhaṭāyavā yasmiṃ kāle saṃhaṭayavaṃ,
anya-e0806n0:640_1: ummattagaṅganti saññāyamaññapadatthe vādhikārepi niccasamāso, na hi vākyaṃ saññāti,
anya-e0806n0:640_2: ādisaddena‘samassa sobhanattaṃ susama’miccādīnañca saṅgaho, pabhāvanaṃ pakāsanaṃ.
anya-e0806n0:642: Oraṃ gaṅgāya, pāraṃ yamunāyāti samāse kate nipātanā ekāro, teneva vuttiyaṃ vuttaṃ ‘ekārantattaṃ nipātanato’ti, vuttivikappanatthatoti vuttiyā vikappo attho yassāti viggaho.
anya-e0806n0:644_0: Socekatthībhāvo visiṭṭho-bhimatoti sambandho, muhuttanti accantasaṃyoge dutiyā, pādisamāsaṃ
anya-e0806n0:644_1: katvāti āsaddassa harasaddena vuttisaddena vuttipadena (pañcikā) kiriyākhyāpyateti
anya-e0806n0:644_2: asatyupasecanādikiriyāyaṃ saṅkhārakaṃ saṅkhāriyaṃ vā na bhavati, atthiceha tadubhayaṃ,
anya-e0806n0:644_3: tato tesaṃ sambhavāyeva samāsantobhūtakiriyā gamyateti maññate, tathāhi dadhibhojanaṃtyādo
anya-e0806n0:644_4: vutte adhyādino saṅkhārakattaṃ bhojanādino ca saṅkhāriyattaṃ patīyate, na copasekādimantarena
anya-e0806n0:645_1: atthe niccasamāso-bhimato sabbaliṅgatā ca, tathā vacanābhāvamiha manasikatvā ‘katha’miccādinā
anya-e0806n0:645_3: vidhānaṃ katanti evamaññateti sambandho, tattheccādinā añña padatthe bhavissatītyetthādhippāyaṃ
anya-e0806n0:646_1: siddhāyeva, kathañcipi catutthyantā bhinnatthassa samāse katepi tattha virodhamāha-
anya-e0806n0:647_1: pāṇinīyānaṃ ‘etassa ida’nti atthe samāse kate yo-ttho sampajjati, aññatthasamāsepi
anya-e0806n0:647_2: soyevatthoti dasseti ‘yo’ iccādinā, anupādāparinibbānanimittaṃ vāyāmoccādinā yojetabbaṃ…
anya-e0806n0:647_3: taṃnimittattā vāyāmādīnaṃ, tesaṃ kathādīnanti ettha tesaṃ vāyāmādīnanti vattabbaṃ…
anya-e0806n0:647_4: vāyāmotyādinā vuttattā so ca tannimittaṃ hoteva, ayametthādhippāyo “etassa idanti
anya-e0806n0:647_5: vākye atthena samāse sabbaliṅgatā ca ‘etadattho etadatthā etadattha’nti vāyāmādayo
anya-e0806n0:647_6: ca samāsatthā honti, etaṃ anupādāparinibbānamattho payojanametassa etissā etassāti
anya-e0806n0:648_0: Idañca “avippaṭisāratthāni kho ānandaṃ kusalāni, avippaṭisāro pāmojjatthāya…pe… vimuttiñāṇadassanaṃ
anya-e0806n0:648_1: anupādāparinibbānatthāya etadattho vāyāmo etadatthā kathā etadatthā mantanā etadatthaṃ
anya-e0806n0:649_1: tattheva bahulaggahaṇena ‘gāmaniggatā’dīsu samāso vutto, tenetthāntodāharaṇānaṃ dvinnamadhikattaṃ,
anya-e0806n0:649_3: (2-2-11) sutte guṇa itivacanenābhimato, saditi saññā tesaṃ ntamānānaṃ.
anya-e0806n0:650: So kathanti iha ‘bhāvatittatthehī’ti bhāvappaccayanteneva samāsapaṭisedhavidhānā ‘brāhmaṇassa sukkā’ iccādo so samā sappaṭisedho kathaṃ sijjhatīti attho.
anya-e0806n0:651_0: Guṇattaniyevāti guṇasabhāve eva, abhimatoti vāttikakārassābhimato “tadavaṭṭhehi ca
anya-e0806n0:651_1: guṇehī”ti, tasaddenāssa guṇassa parāmāso tasmiṃyeva guṇe avatiṭṭhantīti tadavaṭṭhā,
anya-e0806n0:651_2: guṇeyeva guṇātiṭṭhanti na kadācipi soyamityabhedā dabbavuttayo sukkādayo viya te
anya-e0806n0:651_3: tadavaṭṭhā guṇā gandhādayo, tadavaṭṭhitehi guṇehi chaṭṭhī samassateti vattabbanti attho.
anya-e0806n0:652_0: Ābhimatoti “pūraṇā”disutte abyayaggahaṇena, devadattassāti chaṭṭhiyā gurumhi sāpekkhattepi
anya-e0806n0:652_1: gurusaddassa sambandhisaddattā sakatthe vākye viya vuttiyaṃ byapekkhā-yāhānito vuttisabbhāvaṃ
anya-e0806n0:653_0: Sātthevāti sakatthe viya, assāti sambandhisaddassa, sāmatthiyaṃ gamakattañcatthīti
anya-e0806n0:653_2: vā atthīti attho, guruno kulaṃ dāsassa bhariyāti viggaho, athātra brāhmaṇassa ucce’iccādo
anya-e0806n0:653_3: sāmatthiyaṃ gamakattaṃ vā natthīti kuto-vasitaṃ, yena tadābhāvātra samāsābhāvo vaṇṇīyateccāha-‘sāmatthyādinotvi’ccādi.
anya-e0806n0:655: Yogīnanti itarītarayogīnaṃ, anenetaretarayogacatthasamāsaṃ vadati. Vuttihotītyassa vivaraṇaṃ chaṭṭhīsamāso bhavatīti, ekatthībhāveiccassa vivaraṇaṃ gavādīnañca catthasamāse satīti.
anya-e0806n0:656_0: Ruḷhittāti samāsasseva kīḷāvācakattena jīvikāya ca paccāya kattena pasiddhattā, na
anya-e0806n0:656_2: kiṃ vacaneneti maññate, sarasi ruḷhanti viggaho.
anya-e0806n0:657_0: Ayampana amādisamāso kammadhārayadigusamāsāti sabbepi paresaṃ tappurisasadisattā
anya-e0806n0:657_1: tappurisā, yathā hi tassa puriso tappurisoti uttarapadatthappadhāno, tathā te siyuṃ,
anya-e0806n0:657_2: saṅkhyāpubbatta napuṃsakattasaṅkhātehi dvīhi lakkhaṇehi gacchati pavattatītidigu.
anya-e0806n0:659_0: Kintaṃ visesana micchāha-‘yami’ccādi, yaṃ avatthāpayati taṃ vuccatīti sambandho,
anya-e0806n0:659_1: kintaṃ visessamiccāha-‘yadaneke’ccādi, yaṃ avatthā pīyate tamabhidhīyateti sambandho,
anya-e0806n0:659_2: nanvekatthenetyuccamāne visesseneti kathamavagamyate, yato evaṃ vivaritavā tyāsaṅkiyāha- ‘yadipi’ccādi.
anya-e0806n0:660_1: tena vinā tesaṃ sakatthassāsambhavāti, vivaritavāti vivarittha, ekatthenetīmassa
anya-e0806n0:660_2: samānādhikaraṇena saha samāso hotīti evaṃ sājjhāhāro attho veditabbo, atthasaddassānekatthattā
anya-e0806n0:661_0: Visessassa samānādhikaraṇattañca visesanāpekkhanti sambandho. Visessasaddassa visesanena
anya-e0806n0:661_1: saha samānādhikaraṇattaṃ visesana saddāpekkhanti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo, tattha
anya-e0806n0:661_2: kāraṇamāha- ‘sambandhā’ti, adhikaraṇassa samānattaṃ nāma bhinnānaṃ sambandhīnaṃ bhavati,
anya-e0806n0:661_3: sambandhino ca sambandhamantarena na hontī hoti (potthake) ti visesanavisessānaṃ
anya-e0806n0:661_4: sambandho viññāyate, evaṃ viññātā tasmā sambandhāti attho.
anya-e0806n0:662_0: Saddabyatirekena hettha atthānaṃ visesanavisessabhāvo na sambhavati, tathā hi ‘nīlamuppala’nti
anya-e0806n0:662_1: pañca vatthūni sannihitāni nīlanti nīlattaṃ guṇasāmaññaṃ, nīlo guṇo, tadādhāro dabbanti
anya-e0806n0:662_2: tīṇi, uppalanti uppalattaṃ uppalajāti, dabbañca tannissayoti dve.
anya-e0806n0:663_0: Tattha uppalajāti guṇajātīnaṃ nīlajātiuppalajābhadhanaṃ (kātantaṭīkā) tāva na sambhavati
anya-e0806n0:663_1: visesanavisessabhāvo jātiyā nigguṇattā, nīlattassa ca nīlaguṇe samavāyino, uppalattassa
anya-e0806n0:663_2: ca uppaladabbe samavāyino samānādhikaraṇattampi natthi, uppalajātiyā nīlassa ca guṇassa
anya-e0806n0:663_3: atthi samānādhikaraṇattaṃ… nīla muppalanti pavattinimittānaṃ uppalajātinīlaguṇānamekamadhi
anya-e0806n0:663_4: karaṇaṃnissayoti, visesana visessabhāvo tu natthi jātiyā anīlattā, guṇadabbānantu
anya-e0806n0:663_6: tatiyaṃ natthi, yena samānādhikaraṇattaṃ siyā, evaṃ nīladabba uppaladabbānampi aññamaññaparihārena
anya-e0806n0:663_7: vattumicchitānaṃ na visesana visessabhāvo, nāpi samānādhikaraṇattaṃ, kasmā aññamaññāsambandhato
anya-e0806n0:663_8: apekkhābhāvato, vuttapaṭipakkhato pana vakkhamānanayena saddānameva sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ
anya-e0806n0:664_0: Atoyevāti yato visessassa samānādhikaraṇattaṃ visesanāpekkhaṃ, atoyeva hetutoti attho,
anya-e0806n0:664_1: bhinnanimittappa yuttānamevāti sāmaññena nīlaguṇādhāre dabbe guṇeyeva vā nīlasaddassa,
anya-e0806n0:664_2: uppalasaddassa ca sāmaññena guṇavati dabbe vattamānattā aññamaññesu bhinnesu saddappavattiyā
anya-e0806n0:665_0: Samānādhikaraṇattanti nīluppalasaddānaṃ visuṃvisuṃ yoge visiṭṭhadabba vācittassāsambhavā,
anya-e0806n0:665_1: nīlañca taṃ uppalaṃ ceti sāmānādhikaraṇye sannipatite sati sambhavā evaṃ tattha visiṭṭhe
anya-e0806n0:665_2: vatthumhi pavattānaṃ tesaṃ samānatthatā, evakārena byavacchinnamatthaṃ dassetumāha-‘natvabhinne’ccādi.
anya-e0806n0:666: Nanucetyādi codyaṃ, sīsampātīti sīsapā rukkhaviseso, nayida mevamiccādi parihāro.
anya-e0806n0:667_0: Atha tuccateiccādinā parassa vacanāvakāsamāsaṅkate, visesavuttīti phalassa rukkhassa
anya-e0806n0:667_1: ca sāmaññasaddattā bhāvena visese vutti, imesanti sīsapādīnaṃ na samodhāritāti na
anya-e0806n0:667_2: nicchitā, sāmaññavuttiyeva samodhāritāti adhippāyo, avasitā nicchitā vutti yesaṃ
anya-e0806n0:667_3: sīsapādīnaṃ te avasitavuttayo, payatanaṃ vinā tadā pappoti cāti sambandho, payatananti
anya-e0806n0:667_5: vuttatthānampi sarūpamattakathanāya ‘pūpe bahū ānaye’ti yathā, evaṃ jātīyakanti sarūpakathanappakārayuttaṃ.
anya-e0806n0:667_6: Upasaṃharamāha-‘tadeva’miccādi, nipātasamudāyovāyaṃ vuttena pakārenetyassa atthe vattate.
anya-e0806n0:668_1: visesanassa visessassa vā sambhavepi, yatrapyubhinnamatthi visesanavisessabhāvasambhavo
anya-e0806n0:668_2: tatthapitāva bahulaṃvacanatova nivatti hoti, kimpanā-ññatarasambhaveti dassetumāha-‘yathā
anya-e0806n0:668_3: puṇṇo’iccādi, ettha pana aññepi puṇṇanāmakā santīti byabhicārasambhavā ubhinnampi
anya-e0806n0:668_4: visesanavisessabhāvasambhave bahulaṃvacanameva samāsaṃ nivatteti, evaṃ vidhepīti
anya-e0806n0:668_5: aññatarasambhavepi, na kevalaṃ visesanavisessabhāvasambhave, atha kho evaṃ vidhepyañña
anya-e0806n0:669_0: Yajjevamiccādi paccekaṃ visesanavisessabhāve sati aniṭṭhā pādanacodanā, paccekaṃ
anya-e0806n0:669_1: visesanaṃ siyā ubhinnampi visesanattā, tattha dosamāha-‘visessassaca pubbanipāto’ti,
anya-e0806n0:669_2: co-vadhāraṇe, vattabbantarasamuccaye vā, kutoccāha- ‘nāggahite’ccādi, iti kāraṇe,
anya-e0806n0:669_3: ato kimaniṭṭhamāyāta miccāha- ‘uppalanīlantipi siyā’ti, itthañcarahi kintyāha- ‘nīluppalanti
anya-e0806n0:670_1: attho, atha dvinnampi appadhānattaṃ kasmā na siyā tyāha- ‘appadhānattepi’ccādi, sakasakappadhānāpekkhāvantānanti
anya-e0806n0:670_2: sakesake padhāne attani apekkhāvantānaṃ. Atha kuto dabbasseva padhānattamasitaṃ,
anya-e0806n0:670_3: na tu guṇassetyāsaṅkiya ñāyamupanissayati ‘atha ce’tyādinā. Chāgotyajo vuccate, taṃ
anya-e0806n0:670_4: setavaṇṇamālabhetha māreyya, phusanaṃ vā kareyyāti attho, āpubbo labhi hi māraṇe
anya-e0806n0:670_5: phusane ca vattate, desanāyanti codanāyanti codanāvākya (potthake) vedavākyeti attho,
anya-e0806n0:671: Chāgābhāveti setaguṇayuttassa chāgassābhāve, piṭṭhapiṇḍimālabbhāti setaguṇayogena viṭṭhapiṇḍiṃ ālambha, na ca nālambhate tasmā guṇo appadhānanti ajjhāharitabbaṃ.
anya-e0806n0:672_0: Puna codento āha- ‘nanu ce’ccādi, athetyadhippāyamāsaṅkate, aniṭṭhamāpādayati nīlasaddepi
anya-e0806n0:672_1: pasaṅgo’ti, kutoccāha- ‘sopihi’ccādi, idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti- “uppalasaddo jātivācī, na
anya-e0806n0:672_2: tu dabbavācī, jāti visiṭṭhadabbavācittā yadi dabbavācīti vuccate, tadā nīlasaddopi
anya-e0806n0:672_3: guṇavisiṭṭha dabbavācittā dabbavacanamāpajjatīti imesaṃ na koci viseso”ti, pariharanto
anya-e0806n0:672_4: āha ‘nedamatthi’ccādi, apāyino apagantāro dabbāti gamyate, kutoccāha- ‘satīpi’ccādi, iti kāraṇe.
anya-e0806n0:673_0: Visesanamekattheneti siddhepi papañcatthaṃ paripphuṭatthañca udāharaṇabahuttaṃ dassetuṃ
anya-e0806n0:673_1: pāṇiniyehi bahuṃ suttitaṃ, sabbassetassa paccakkhātabhāvaṃ dassetuṃ vuttiyamudāharaṇamattaṃ
anya-e0806n0:673_2: dassitaṃ, tadidāni byākhyātukāmo āha- ‘pubbakāle’ccādi, chinnoca visesanantī sambandho
anya-e0806n0:673_4: suttaṃ, tatthekādīnaṃ vuttiyamudāharaṇāni na dassitānyupalakkhaṇatova viññāyantīti
anya-e0806n0:673_5: dassetumāha- ‘eke’ccādi, eko ca so purisocātyādinā viggaho upalakkhaṇattāyeva ca
anya-e0806n0:673_6: ‘satta ca te isayo ca sattisayo’ccādikañca daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0806n0:674_1: sādhāraṇo yo dhammo sāmatātena visiṭṭhaṃ yadupameyyaṃ, taṃ vacanenetyattho upamānopameyyaccādi
anya-e0806n0:674_2: kassa, samāso bhavatīti seso, kāraṇamāha- ‘visese’ccādi, visesāpariggahāti visesanantyeva
anya-e0806n0:674_3: sāmaññena pariggahā, evambhū tassāpīti upamānarūpassāpi. Nanu satthīsaddassasatthiyaṃ
anya-e0806n0:674_4: vutti sāmāsaddassa tu devadattāya, ato byadhikaraṇattā kathamettha samāsoccāsaṅkīyāha-
anya-e0806n0:674_5: ‘yade’ccādi, samāno dhammo sāmattādi yassa so sadhammo, tassa bhāvo sādhammiyaṃ sāmattaṃ,
anya-e0806n0:674_6: tasmā devadattātthe vattate upacāravasena, sāmāsaddopi guṇavacanopi sāmattaṃ vatvā
anya-e0806n0:674_7: saddhādittavasenābhedopacārena vā devadattāyaṃ vattate, nanu ca sāmāsaddassa devadattābhidhāne
anya-e0806n0:675_0: Ihāti niddhāraṇe, etesaṃ guṇānaṃ majjheti attho, iha vā satthiyaṃ, sāmaguṇavantatāya
anya-e0806n0:675_1: sāmāyāti gamyate, pasiddhivasenāti satthisāmātyatropamānaṃ satthī, upameyyā devadattā,
anya-e0806n0:675_2: pasiddhantupamānaṃ bhavati nāppasiddhaṃ… pasiddhasādhammiyā sādhyu sādhanamupamānanti
anya-e0806n0:675_3: katvā satthiyeva sāmaṅguṇena pasiddhā na devadattā, tasmā sāmaguṇappasiddhiyāti attho.
anya-e0806n0:675_4: Sādhyute upamīyateneneti sādhanamupamānaṃ, sādhyate upadhīyateti sādhyamupameyyaṃ,
anya-e0806n0:675_5: pasiddhassa sādhammiyaṃ tena, sādhyassāppasiddhassa kassaci sādhanaṃ sādhyasādhanaṃ.
anya-e0806n0:675_6: Yatratviccādinā bahulaṃvacanasāmatthiyā sāmaññavacaneneva samāsasabbhāvaṃ vatvā aññenāsabbhāvamudāharaṇena
anya-e0806n0:676: Taṇḍulasaddoti upameyyabhūtataṇḍulasaddo, taṇḍulattampi vatvā dabbe pavatto sāmaññavacano natu bhavatīti sambandho, dabbeti taṇḍuladabbe phāladabbe ca.
anya-e0806n0:677_1: yo visāradattādidhammo tabbacanassa ‘muni ayaṃ sīho viya visārado’tyādo visāradādisaddassāppayogeti
anya-e0806n0:677_2: attho, kesañciti kesañci saddānaṃ majjhe, visessattameva phuṭayati. ‘Tathā ce’tyādinā,
anya-e0806n0:677_3: visesanavisessānaṃ yathiṭṭhattā niccaṃ sīhādīnaṃ visessatāyeva vacanicchāti pubbanipātattāppasaṅgoti
anya-e0806n0:677_4: bhāvo, upapatyantaramāha-‘visesanasseve’ccādi, yadipi sīho visesanameva na visessaṃ,
anya-e0806n0:678_0: Athātrāpi visesananteva samāsappaṭipādane’muni ayaṃ sīhova visārado’ccādo sāmatthiyatova
anya-e0806n0:678_3: sāmaññavacanappayoge sāpekkhattā samāsāppasaṅgoti sāmatthiyaṃ tasmāti attho. Sāmaññappayogatthanti
anya-e0806n0:678_4: samāsavākye sāmaññavacanassa sūrattādi(no), appayogatthaṃ, tathā hiccādinā sāmaññasaddappayoge
anya-e0806n0:679_0: Visesānantabbhāvāti sāmaññassa samāse antobhāvepi tikhīṇattādito visiṭṭhassa sūrassādivacanīyassa
anya-e0806n0:679_1: visesassa samāse anantogadhattā appasaṅgo sāpekkhamasamatthanti. Atheti ‘saccameta’ntiādiṃ
anya-e0806n0:679_2: paravacanamāsaṅkiya vadati, evamādisijjhanatthaṃ samāsoti (ñāpanatthaṃ) ārabbhanīyambhavatīti sambandho.
anya-e0806n0:680_1: visesanaṃ tenevā (potthake) ppadhānaṃ, samāsāvayavabhūtaṃ rājānaṃ pati visessabhāvenāviphalitasakatthatāya
anya-e0806n0:680_2: padhānabhūtassa purisassa. Ādisaddena ‘rājapurisassa dassanīyassa geha’nti saṅgaṇhāti.
anya-e0806n0:681_0: Ettha hi gehampati visesanabhāvenāppadhānattepi rājānampati padhānabhūtassa purisassa
anya-e0806n0:681_1: sāpekkhassāpi samāso hoteva. Idañcañāpanatthaṃ vacanārambhappayojanañca, kāraṇamāha- ‘gamakattā’iccādi.
anya-e0806n0:682_0: Gamakattāti viggahavākyatthassa vuttiyampatīyamānattā gamakattaṃ tasmā, naceha gamakattamatthīti
anya-e0806n0:682_1: ‘muni sīhova sūro’tyatra tu vākyato yottho patīyate, nāyaṃ ‘muni sīho sūro’tyato
anya-e0806n0:682_2: gamyateti gamakattaṃ natthī-ti attho, tathāhi munisīhasaddenevo pamānopameyyabhāvanimittassa
anya-e0806n0:683_1: bahulādhikārato viññāyati, nanu cātra visessabhāvāsambhavāppasaṅgoyeva vuttiyāti
anya-e0806n0:684_1: hi visessambhavati yathā nīlatāyuppalaṃ, pariharati ‘nedamatti’ccādinā, mantāṇiputtānaṃ
anya-e0806n0:684_2: anekattāti kevalaṃ mantāṇiyā putto puṇṇoyevāti abhāvā tesaṃ bahubhāvato, attano attano
anya-e0806n0:685: Vuttiyeveti evakārena byavacchinnamatthamāha-‘vākyaṃ nivattetī’ti. Visiṭṭhajātivacanāti vuttaṃ kaṇhasappajātiyā lohitasālijātiyā ca visiṭṭhattā.
anya-e0806n0:686_1: bālayuvattādisaṅkhātatacchakabhāvato abyāvutto, atthināmadheyyoti tacchako nāma koci
anya-e0806n0:686_2: tannāmo atthi, kiriyāsaddoti tacchatīti tacchakoti evaṃ kiriyāya pavattinimittattenopādinno
anya-e0806n0:686_4: samāsena bhavitabbaṃ, tathā sati kimidaṃ paccudāharaṇaṃ kata”nti. Atra kenaci na
anya-e0806n0:686_5: nāmadheyyassetyādi nopajāyatevātyetadavasānaṃ vuccamānamanudyataṃ nirākattukāmo āha-‘yopā he’ccādi.
anya-e0806n0:687: Imassāyamadhippāyo “vuttanayena tacchakasaddassa kiriyā saddassātthavisayāpekkhāyābhāvato visessattābhāvā paccudāharaṇamidaṃ kata”nti.
anya-e0806n0:688_0: Kasmā ayuttamiccāha-‘yato’ccādi, nāmadheyyassa kiriyāvācino ca atthābhidhānasāmatthiyaṃ
anya-e0806n0:688_1: tulyaṃ vā na vā, avayavappasiddhiyā samudāyappasiddhi balavati vā navetyetaṃ vicāretuṃ
anya-e0806n0:689_1: na yujjate ‘sati sambhave byabhicāre ca visesanaṃ sātthakaṃ hotī’ti visesanaṃ maggīyate,
anya-e0806n0:689_2: nāsambhave nābyabhicāre yathā sītaṃ (himaṃ) uṇhoggīti, tasmā sambhavabyabhicāracintā
anya-e0806n0:689_4: vicāretumadhikatanti katthacipi visesanavisessa sabbhāve samāso hotevā”ti, yadipi
anya-e0806n0:689_6: tathāpi vakkhamānanayena samāsasabbhāvā na kāci hānīti dassetumāha- ‘ettha cā’tiādi.
anya-e0806n0:690_0: Etthacāti keci pakkhe ca, kañci pīḷamāvahatīti sambandho, kutoccāha ‘tathāhi’ccādi.
anya-e0806n0:690_1: Evaṃ maññate- “yadīpi samudāyappasiddhiyā sati kiriyāsaddatthavisayāpekkhā nopajāyate,
anya-e0806n0:690_3: manusse ca tannāmake nāmadheyyassa tacchakasaddassa pavattisabbhāvā(ti) visesanavisessasabbhāvato
anya-e0806n0:690_4: samāsappasaṅgo tadavattho yevā”ti, na kevalaṃ sappavisesasseva tacchakasaddo nāmadheyyamapitu
anya-e0806n0:690_7: Kamenatthappasiddhīti yaṃ, etampana sakkā viññātunti yojanā.
anya-e0806n0:691_0: Yanti yaṃ pasijjhanaṃ, kamenāti bādhābhāvato anukkamena. Evañceti iminā nacetyādinā
anya-e0806n0:691_1: vuttaṃ paccāmasati… kimpaṭivihitaṃ siyā parihaṭaṃ siyāti attho, iti iminā kāraṇena
anya-e0806n0:691_2: ‘tacchako sappo’ti paccudāharaṇaṃ na yuttaṃ… tacchakasappoti samāsasabbhāvatoti adhippāyo,
anya-e0806n0:691_3: nedamevamiccādinā pariharati, yadā carati yathā vuttena visesanavisessabhāvasambhavo,
anya-e0806n0:691_4: tadā kathaṃtyāha- ‘yadā visesane’ccādi. Tadāpi kathaṃ vākyena bhavitabbamiccāha-
anya-e0806n0:692_0: Aññassāti kammani sambandhavacanicchāyaṃ chaṭṭhī. Avacchedakattāti ettha kattunā
anya-e0806n0:692_1: bhavitabbanti kāḷassāti kattari bhāvayoge chaṭṭhiyā ajjhāharitabbaṃ. Pattāpannehi
anya-e0806n0:692_2: dutiyantassa jīvikampatto jīvikā pannoti samāso ‘kārakaṃ bahula”nteva (caṃ-2-2-19)
anya-e0806n0:692_3: vihito dutiyantena tu tesaṃ samāsatthaṃ suttantaraṃ kataṃ parehi, atthañca tesamitthiliṅgānampi
anya-e0806n0:692_4: samāseneva, kāranivattiyā, tathā māso jātassāti viggahe parimāṇivācinā chaṭṭhiyantena
anya-e0806n0:692_5: parimāṇavacanānaṃ kālasaddānaṃ, tadāha- ‘pattāpannāna’miccādi, parimāṇaṃ māsādi paricchedo
anya-e0806n0:693_0: Ettha hi māso parimāṇaṃ paricchedakattā, jāto parimāṇī paricchejjattā, pattā jīvikānenāti
anya-e0806n0:693_1: patto jīvikanti pāṭhena bhavitabbaṃ vacanicchāyaṃ yo-ttho so- ñāpadatthasamāsepyatinno
anya-e0806n0:693_3: taṃ byākhyātukāmo āha- ‘vānekaññatthe iccevā’tiādi. Aññattha samāse kate sabbattha
anya-e0806n0:693_4: “itthiyaṃ bhāsite”ccādinā (3-67) pumbhāvo. Māso jātassāti vacanicchāyaṃ yo-ttho,
anya-e0806n0:694_0: Jātasaddassatthamāha sampannoti, sampuṇṇotyattho, iminā ca māso jāto-ssāti viggahassa
anya-e0806n0:694_1: attho dassito, aññathāti yadi māso tassa aññapadatthassa jātādino sampuṇṇo na bhātīti
anya-e0806n0:694_3: suttena pubbanipāto vutto, tadāha- ‘nace’ccādi, pubbanipātappasaṅgo naca siyātisambandho,
anya-e0806n0:694_4: kutoccāha- ‘jāti’ccādi. Kesañciti vākyakāramāha, naca yuttanti sambandho, kāraṇamāha-
anya-e0806n0:694_6: sādheti… chaṭṭhīsamāse ‘sati sambhave byabhicāre ca visesanassa sātthakambhavatīti
anya-e0806n0:695_0: Avacanepīti niyamavacane (a)satīpi, chaṭṭhīsamāsappasaṅgo carahi vuttanayena byavacchejja
anya-e0806n0:695_1: byavacchedakattābhāvena visesanānatthakyā na bhaveyya ce vākyenāpi na bhavitabbanti
anya-e0806n0:695_2: āha- ‘vākyaṃ tvi’ccādi. Ayampana visesanasamāso parehi kammadhārayoti ñāyati… yathā
anya-e0806n0:695_3: kammaṃ kiriyaṃ payojanañca dhāreti evamayaṃ samāso kammamiva dvayaṃ dhārayatīti.
anya-e0806n0:697_0: Etthevāti “ṭa nañssa”iti (3-74) sutteeva. Pāmanaputtotipāmā kuṭṭhaviseso assa atthīti
anya-e0806n0:697_1: pāmasaddā “dissantaññepi paccayā”ti (4-120) nappaccayo, pāmanassa putto, yadi hettha
anya-e0806n0:697_2: ñakāro visesanattho na karīyetha, tadā “ṭa nassā”ti suttaṃ karīyetha, tathā ca satyuttarapade
anya-e0806n0:698_0: Siyāti bhāvo, nanu ciha samāsavidhimhi ña kāroccāraṇā ña lopa rahitassa samāso na
anya-e0806n0:698_1: bhavatīti vattumucitaṃ, na tu “ṭa nañssā”ti visesanatthoti ññakāro etthova visesanattho,
anya-e0806n0:698_2: ti bhavitabba saccaṃ, kintviha samāsavidhimhi ña kārassa byavacchajjaṃ na dissate.
anya-e0806n0:699_0: Pariyudāsavuttīti pari tulitamuggayha nisedhanīyassa asanaṃ khepanaṃ vajjanaṃ pariyudāso,
anya-e0806n0:699_1: tena pariyudāsena visiṭṭhe-tthe vutti asseti pariyudāsavutti, pasajjappaṭisedhavuttīti
anya-e0806n0:699_2: paṭisedhanīyameva pasajja patvā taṃsadisamanapekkhiya nisedho, tena vutti asseti
anya-e0806n0:700_0: Yattha brāhmaṇā aññova bhavatītyevaṃ vākyenātthantaravidhānā vidhino padhānattaṃ,
anya-e0806n0:700_1: atthantaravidhānasāmatthiyeneva brāhmaṇassa paṭisedho patīyate, brāhmaṇassa brāhmaṇassā
anya-e0806n0:700_2: (potthake) nivattane tadapekkhāyāññassa vidhānayogato sakapadena nañkhyena vidhibhāgī
anya-e0806n0:700_3: na vuccate, kiñcarahi aññasaddena… pariyudāsanissayinoññasaddasseva vākye payogato’
anya-e0806n0:700_4: añño brāhmaṇā abrāhmaṇo’ti, nañssaca syādyantena sāmatthiyaṃ, na tyādyantenetyekavākyatā…
anya-e0806n0:700_5: añño brāhmaṇā abrāhmaṇoti tattha tattha pariyudāsavuttittā.
anya-e0806n0:701_0: Pasajjappaṭisedhetu paṭisedhassa padhānattā brāhmaṇo na bhavatīti vākyena brāhmaṇassa
anya-e0806n0:701_1: paṭisedho vidhi atthagammo vākyabhedo, sakapadena ca nañkhyena paṭisedhabhāgivācī
anya-e0806n0:701_2: sambajjhate. Ko so brāhmaṇā aññoti āha- ‘brāhmaṇattānajjhāsito’ccādi.
anya-e0806n0:702_0: Itarasminti pasajjappaṭisepekkhe, kenaci saṃsayanimittenāti upavītadassanādinā kenaci
anya-e0806n0:702_1: saṃsayakāraṇena, sabbampi padaṃ sakatthe payogampati ñāṇamapekkhate, tañca ñāṇaṃ
anya-e0806n0:702_2: dvidhā sammāñāṇaṃ micchā ñāṇañca. Ubhayampetabrāhmaṇasaddaṃ pavattayati. Tattha sammāñāṇa
anya-e0806n0:702_3: pubbake abrāhmaṇasaddappayoge natthi nañssa byāpāro, na hi tattha tena kiñci karīyati.
anya-e0806n0:702_4: Micchāñāṇapubbake tu vijjate tassa byāpā ro tattha hi tena micchāñāṇappabhavatā parassākhyāyate,
anya-e0806n0:702_5: micchāñāṇaṃ cendriyahetukaṃ, vinā sadisattaṃ na bhavatīti paṭisedhe sati uttarapadatthasadiso
anya-e0806n0:702_6: samāsattho jāyateccāha- ‘tattha sadisattaṃ vine’ccādi. Rajjuyaṃ hi sappabuddhi sadisattā.
anya-e0806n0:703_1: brāhmaṇamattassānayanaṃ siyā pubbapadassuccāraṇamanatthakaṃ siyā, atha na kassaci
anya-e0806n0:703_2: ānayanaṃ evampi sabbassevā brāhmaṇasaddassānatthakattaṃ, tasmā payogasāmatthiyāpi
anya-e0806n0:704_1: ‘atoyeva vuccate’ccādi. Ayañcettha attho “nañvacanena ivasaddena ca yaṃ yuttaṃ tadaññasmiṃ
anya-e0806n0:704_2: tappadatthasadise-tthe paṭipattiṃ janeti, tathāhyatthasampaccayo loke dissati ‘abrāhmaṇamānayā’ti
anya-e0806n0:704_3: brāhmaṇasadiso khattiyādi ānīyatīti, adhikarīyati niyujjate saddo-smintyadhikaraṇaṃ.
anya-e0806n0:704_4: Yathāvuttena ca byākhyānena kimiṭṭhaṃ siddhantyāha- ‘tadeva’miccādi. Keci pana uttarapadatthappadhānattamiha vaṇṇenti.
anya-e0806n0:705_0: Samatthavādīnanti “samattho padavidhi” (pā 2-1-1) tvevaṃ vādīnaṃ. Samattha vādīnaṃ
anya-e0806n0:705_1: samāso vidheyyoti sambandho, vidheyyoti vacanantarena vidheyyo, tathāhi apunageyyāti
anya-e0806n0:705_2: gāyanena nañssa sambandho, na tu punasaddatthena. Anokāsaṃ kāretvāti karaṇena sambandho
anya-e0806n0:705_3: na okāsena. Amūlāmūlaṃ gantvāti gamanena, na mūlenāti asāmatthiyaṃ. Gamakattavādinoti
anya-e0806n0:705_4: asāmatthiyepi yatra gamakattaṃ tattha samāso hoteva, tato gamakattañca samāsassa
anya-e0806n0:705_5: nibandhananti yo vadati tassetyattho. Etthāpīti apunageyyātyādopi, nanvayamapyācariyo
anya-e0806n0:705_6: gamakattavādī, tathāsati gamakattāiccanabhidhāya bahulādhikārāti kasmāvuttanti āha-‘so ce’ccādi.
anya-e0806n0:706_0: Kehicīti vuttigganthena byavacchinnamatthaṃ dassento āha- ‘kehiciyeva na sabbehī’ti,
anya-e0806n0:706_1: apunageyyāti “ṭa nañssā”ti (3-74) nassaṭo, atippasaṅgābhāvatoti suttantarena samāse
anya-e0806n0:708_1: gatassa syādividhino, asyādividhimhīti pariyudāso-natthakoti codento āha ‘nanvi’ccādi,
anya-e0806n0:708_2: anatthakaṃ bhaveyya… lakkhaṇādyatthānaṃ samāse guṇībhūtattā samāsato kiriyāsambandhānurūpavibhattiyatthassa
anya-e0806n0:708_4: yoge dutiyā vidhānasāmatthiyā vākyampi hoti, aññathā niccasamāse dutiyā vidhānamanatthakanti
anya-e0806n0:708_5: bhāvo, nigamayati tasmāiccādinā, “ku pāpatthe”ti paresaṃ gaṇapāṭho, evamuparipi “dunindāyaṃ”tyādi veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0806n0:710: Cīsaddoti ettha cīti iminā cīppaccayantaṃ parāmasati, cīppaccayanta saddoti attho.
anya-e0806n0:712: Pītisambhamoti pītiyā sambhamo pītipubbikā paccuṭṭhānāsana dānādivisayā turitatā, alaṃbhutvā pariyattaṃ sampuṇṇaṃ bhutvā.
anya-e0806n0:714_0: Purobhūya aggatobhūya. Tirobhūya antaradhānībhūya. Anaccādhāneti imassa attho ‘upariyādhānato
anya-e0806n0:714_1: aññatrā’ti, ādhānaṃ patiṭṭhāpanaṃ, icchantīti pāṇiniyādayo icchanti, urasi katvā
anya-e0806n0:716_1: vivacchitaṃ ekasaṅkhyāya sāmaññaṃ, evaṃ maññate “yadi‘syādi syādine’ti vattumicchitekasaṅkhyāsāmaññassa
anya-e0806n0:716_2: pariggaho na siyā tadā ihānatthaka (maneka)ggahaṇaṃ siyā tenehāne kaggahaṇasāmatthiyāyeva
anya-e0806n0:716_4: idaṃ dasseti “tena yathāvuttena pubbe vutto sabbopi samāso pubbaparānaṃ dvinnaṃyeva
anya-e0806n0:717_1: vā sijjhati, ayaṃ aññapadatthasamāso. Catthe bahunnamiṭṭhattā tadatthañcānekaggahaṇaṃ,
anya-e0806n0:717_2: tena ‘hotu potu pitā puttā’ti hoti uttarapade (yoni) sambandhe parato pubbapadassa
anya-e0806n0:717_3: “putte”ti (3-65) suttenāttena, aññathā dvinnaṃdvinnaṃ samāse sabbattha uttarapadasambhavena
anya-e0806n0:717_5: potā pitā puttā’ti āpajjeyya. Anekanti paṭhamantattā syādītīdamevānuvattate, tenevānekaṃ
anya-e0806n0:717_6: syādyantamicceva vuttaṃ. Athāññattheti vutte-ññassa vākyassattheti avatvā padassecceva
anya-e0806n0:717_7: kasmā vuttantyāsaṅkiyā ha- ‘syādyantasse’ccādi, tassevāti sāmatthiyaladdhassa syādyanta
anya-e0806n0:718_0: Tassa guṇā tagguṇā tasseccanenāññapadattho niddisīyate, tassa aññapadatthassa ye
anya-e0806n0:718_1: guṇā yāni visesanāni, tesaṃ saṃviññāṇaṃ gahaṇaṃ tagguṇasaṃviññāṇaṃ, athavā so guṇo
anya-e0806n0:718_2: yassa so tagguṇo, tagguṇassa tagguṇayuttassāññapadatthassasaṃviññāṇaṃ, na guṇavirahitassā(ti)
anya-e0806n0:718_3: tagguṇasaṃviññāṇaṃ, ettha pana ‘aññapadatthe tagguṇasaṃviññāṇaṃ pyatthī’ti paribhāsīyati,
anya-e0806n0:718_4: tatthāyamattho “aññapadatthe samāse-ññapadattho visesanena saha viññāyati navisesanarahito”ti,
anya-e0806n0:718_5: kvaci atagguṇasaṃviññāṇassāpi dassane nāpisaddo, yatrāvayavena viggaho samudāyo samāsattho
anya-e0806n0:718_6: tattheva tagguṇasaṃviññāṇaṃ bhavati, tagguṇasaṃviññāṇato aññaṃ atagguṇasaṃviññāṇaṃ,
anya-e0806n0:719: Ettha pana bahudhanasaddo purisassa upalakkhaṇabhāvena katattā. Abhimatoti pāṇinīyānaṃ abhimato dasannaṃ samīpe āsannā dasannamiccādivākye.
anya-e0806n0:720: Parimāṇamevasaṅkhyeyanti parimāṇalakkhaṇameva saṅkhyeyaṃ, tañca parimāṇalakkhaṇaṃ saṅkhyeyañca.
anya-e0806n0:723: Saṅkhyānavuttīti tena anativattiyamānatapparicchedaka saṅkhyānarūpa saṅkhāte saṅkhyāne vutti yassā sā saṅkhyānavutti-pañcasaṅkhyā.
anya-e0806n0:724_0: Diṭṭhanteniminā imaṃ dīpeti “yathā pañca parimāṇamesanti pañcakāti ettha parimāṇarūpo-vayavabhedasamudāyasabhāvo
anya-e0806n0:724_1: pakatiyattho samudāyino sakunā paccayattho, tathā tidasāti etthāpi”ti, kappaccayo
anya-e0806n0:726: Pakatippaccayatthabhedasambhavāti iminā paresaṃ pakatippaccayatthānaṃ bhedābhāvassa icchitattā saññāyaṃ sakatthe kappaccayassa vidhānaṃ dasseti.
anya-e0806n0:728_0: Tadatthepīti tassa vāiti aññapadassa atthepi, tadattho cettha vikappattho vā siyā
anya-e0806n0:728_1: tadā pana dvinnaṃ gahaṇe na tiṇṇaṃ, tesantu gahaṇe na dvinnaṃ, saṃsayo vā, tadā tu
anya-e0806n0:728_2: saṃsayassobhayā lambanarūpattā dvevāti vutte tayo, tayovāti vutte dve apekkhīyantīti
anya-e0806n0:729: Nāmattenāti ruḷhināmattena, abhimato pāṇiniyānaṃ, vikappitaṃ suttantarena vibhāsā sabbanāmasaññāvidhānena.
anya-e0806n0:731_0: Nanu ca samānādhikaraṇānaṃ bahubbīhi vutto pāṇiniyehi ‘pañcahi bhuttamasseti byadhikaraṇānaṃ
anya-e0806n0:731_1: na siyā’ti, tathā paṭhamatthaṃ vajjetvā sabbavibhatyatthesu iṭṭho ‘vuṭṭhe devegatoccatra
anya-e0806n0:731_2: vuṭṭhadevoti na siyā’ti tasmā kathamatra byadhikaraṇānaṃ paṭhamatthe samāso vaṇṇīyateccāsaṅkiyāha-‘byadhikaraṇānampi’ccādi,
anya-e0806n0:731_4: anabhidhānato vā na bhavissati, tatoyeva ca pañca bhutta vanto-sseti samānādhikaraṇānampi
anya-e0806n0:731_5: kvaci na bhavissati, tathā paṭhamatthepi kvaci na bhavissati vuṭṭhe deve gato’ti.
anya-e0806n0:732_0: Aññatracāti tulyayogato-ññatra salomakotyādīsu ca, vijjamānāni lomānyassa, vijjamānā
anya-e0806n0:732_2: (2-2-24-vā) sabhāvato eva nivatto na suttantarato, gatatthassāpi hi payoge anavaṭṭhānaṃ
anya-e0806n0:732_3: siyā piṭṭhapesane viya, kathañcarahi brāhmaṇe bahū ānaya, ahaṃ pacāmīti nāvassamevaṃ
anya-e0806n0:732_4: payogo, katthaci pana vacanasiliṭṭhatādippayojane sati hoteva.
anya-e0806n0:733_0: Kaṇṭhe sambhavoti kāḷassa kaṇṭhe sambhavo. Ṭṭhasaddatthoti kaṇṭhaṭṭhasadde ṭṭhasaddattho.
anya-e0806n0:733_2: tasmā oṭṭhova mukhamassāti viggayha oṭṭhamukhoti samāso, na ca pāṇi pāṇyantarassa
anya-e0806n0:733_3: mukhaṃ, mukheneva ca pāṇimukhassa sadisattaṃ pasiddhanti sāmatthiyā oṭṭhamukhamiva
anya-e0806n0:733_5: kāḷo yassā’tyādīkameva vākyanti dasseti. Samudāye vikārecāti samudāyasambandhe vikārasambandhe
anya-e0806n0:733_6: ca. Taṃsamāsassāti tassā chaṭṭhiyā samāsassa, tadabhidhāyinanti saṅghāta vikārābhidhāyīnaṃ,
anya-e0806n0:733_7: kesānaṃ saṅghāto iccādi paresaṃ vākyaṃ. Dhātuto jātaṃ dhātujaṃ, uttarapadaṃ patitasaddādi,
anya-e0806n0:734_1: tu avijjamānasaddo nañsamāso, padantare nāssa bahubbīhi vottarapadalopo, avijjamānā
anya-e0806n0:734_2: puttāssa aputtovijjamānaputtoti sādhenti, icchate pāṇinīyehi… dakkhiṇapubbā saddānaṃ
anya-e0806n0:734_3: nānatthattā byadhikaraṇattā, vacanepīti sutte vijjamānepi, aya maññapadatthasamāso
anya-e0806n0:734_4: parehi bahubbīhīti vuccati tathāhi bahavo vihayo yassa so bahubbīhi, yathā bahubbīhīti
anya-e0806n0:736_0: Samuccīti piṇḍīkaraṇaṃ, ko soti āha- ‘sādhanameka’miccādi. Ekaṃ sādhanaṃ ekaṃ kiriyaṃ
anya-e0806n0:736_1: vā paṭicca cīyamānatāti sambandho, kesanti āha- ‘kiriyāsādhanāna’nti, kenāti āha-
anya-e0806n0:736_2: ‘attarūpabhedenā”ti. Tattha devadatto bhuñjati tiṭṭhati pacaticāti sādhanampaṭicca
anya-e0806n0:736_3: kiriyānaṃ attarūpabhedena cīyamānatā veditabbā, dhave ca khadire ca palāse ca chindāti
anya-e0806n0:737: Soti samuccayo bhavatīti seso, kesanti āha- ‘tulya balāna’miccādi.
anya-e0806n0:738: Tulyabalānanti iminā visuṃ padhānabhāvena kiriyābhisambandhā aññamaññānapekkhattamāha.
anya-e0806n0:739_0: Aniyatakkamayogapajjānanti kamo ca yogapajjañca, aniyataṃ kamayogapajjaṃ yesaṃ saddānaṃ
anya-e0806n0:739_1: tesaṃ, yathetyādinā tatthodāharaṇaṃ dasseti, etthāyamadhippāyo “ettha gavādīnaṃ visuṃ
anya-e0806n0:739_3: aniyatakkamatā gavādīnaṃ yugapadi nayanābhāvā aniyata yogapajjatā ca hoti, tathā
anya-e0806n0:739_4: aññaṃ tādisampī”ti. Anu pacchā padhānānurodhena (cayanaṃ) anvācayo, taṃ byañjayati
anya-e0806n0:739_6: padhānamantaraṅgattā, netaraṃ bahiraṅgattā, taṃ karaṇe yadi gāvopi passati tāpyānayati,
anya-e0806n0:739_7: ettha tu gossānayanaṃ bhikkhāṭanamapekkhate, netaramitarassa… vināpi tena tadanuṭṭhānato.
anya-e0806n0:739_8: Itarassa itarena yo go itaretarayogo, so ca etādisoti āha- ‘aññamaññe’ccādi.
anya-e0806n0:740_0: Avayavappadhāno cāti sābhāvikābhidhānasāmatthiyenāputhubhūto ca, vuttivayena sāriputtasaddo
anya-e0806n0:740_1: moggallānattho hoti moggallānasaddo sāriputtatthopīti aññamaññatthe padhānato yugapadyadhikaraṇavacane
anya-e0806n0:740_2: sati cattha samāsoti so-yamadhikaraṇa samudāyo ubhayapadānugataubhayatthavasena catubbidhopi
anya-e0806n0:740_3: yugapadi buddhiyā gayhamāno kadāci ubbhūtāvayavabhedo teneva sābhāvikābhidhānasāmatthiyeneccevamavayavappadhāno
anya-e0806n0:740_4: ca, nanu ca jananamaraṇānīti viruddhānaṃ kathamekenābhidhānanti vuccate- sabbopi
anya-e0806n0:740_5: saddo payujjamāno (itarī) tarenāvadhāraṇaṃ vattate, tena ekeko saddo ekekassatthassa
anya-e0806n0:740_6: vācako, tathāpi yathā sāriputtamoggallānāti ettha bahuvacanassaññathānupapattiyā
anya-e0806n0:740_8: sāmatthiyena ekenāpyabhidhānaṃ hoti. Iti hetumhi, yato evamavayavappadhāno tatoti attho.
anya-e0806n0:741_0: Bahuttāti kiñcāpi vākye nesaṃ vākyenevesaṃ (potthake) visuṃ bahvatthatā, na hi sāriputtamānayāti
anya-e0806n0:741_1: vutte moggallānassāpi sampaccayo bhavati, tathāpi yato vuttivisaye sahabhūtānamevesaṃ
anya-e0806n0:741_2: visuṃ bahvatthatā, tato tattha vacanīyassa atthassa saṅkhyātedena bahuttaṃ. Samāharaṇaṃ
anya-e0806n0:741_3: piṇḍīkaraṇavasena saṃharaṇaṃ samāhāro, so cevaṃ veditabboti dassetumāha ‘aññamaññe’ccādi.
anya-e0806n0:742_0: Ettha ca kiñcāpi itarītarayogassa samāhārassa ca bhāvarūpattā adabbarūpatā, tathāpītarītarayoge
anya-e0806n0:742_1: tu yathā guṇavaca nānaṃ sukkaṃ vatthaṃ sukko kambalo sukkā gāvīti nissayabhedato
anya-e0806n0:742_2: liṅgavacanasiddhi, tathā taddhammānamabhidhānato nissayato liṅgavacana siddhi veditabbā,
anya-e0806n0:742_3: saṃhatippadhānattācekavacananti yadā bahunnaṃ samudāyo tirohitāvayavabhedo saṃghāto
anya-e0806n0:742_4: pakkamīyate, tadā samāhārocceva saṃhatippadhānattā ekavacanaṃ hotīti attho. Tadanuṭṭhānatoti
anya-e0806n0:742_5: tassa karaṇato. Byatikaro missatā, byatikaraṃ dasseti pāṇiccādinā, paccekaṃ parisamattiyaṃ
anya-e0806n0:743_0: Cakkhuñca sotañca, mukhañca nāsikā ca, hanu ca gīvā ca, chavi ca maṃsañca lohitañca,
anya-e0806n0:743_1: nāmañca rūpañca, jarā ca maraṇañcāti viggayha samāso, “samāhāre napuṃsaka”nti (3-20)
anya-e0806n0:743_2: sabbattha napuṃsakaliṅgaṃ, syādimhi mukha nāsikantiādīsu “syādīsu rasso”ti (3-23)
anya-e0806n0:743_3: rasso. Alabhatā gomukhaṃ ḍiṇḍimo bherivisesā, āḷambaraṃ paṇavo, murajo mudaṅgo, maddavo
anya-e0806n0:743_4: mudaṅgo. Maddavavādanaṃ paṇavavādanañca sippamassa maddaviko pāṇaviko, sammaṃ kaṃsatāḷaṃ,
anya-e0806n0:743_5: tāḷaṃ hatthatāḷaṃ, alasatā ca āḷambaro ca, murajo ca, gomukho ca, saṅkho ca ḍiṇḍimo
anya-e0806n0:743_6: ca, maddaviko ca, pāṇaviko ca, gītañca vāditañca, sammañca tāḷañcāti viggaho. Yugassa
anya-e0806n0:743_7: hitā yoggā goṇā, tesamidaṃ yoggaṃ kasikammaṃ, tassa aṅgaṃ. Tenāha- ‘kasibhaṇḍāna’nti,
anya-e0806n0:743_8: phālokasako, pācanaṃ patodo, yugo ca naṅgalañcāti viggaho. Piṇḍamāyudhaviseso, asi
anya-e0806n0:743_9: ca satti ca tomarañca piṇḍañcāti viggaho. Cammaṃ saravāraṇaphalakaṃ, kalāpo tūṇīraṃ,
anya-e0806n0:743_10: paharaṇañca āvaraṇañcāti viggaho. Ahi ca nakulo ca, bīḷāro ca mūsiko ca, kāko ca
anya-e0806n0:743_11: ulūko ca, nāgo ca supaṇṇocāti viggaho. Saṅkhyā ca parimāṇañca saṅkhyāparimāṇaṃ, tattha
anya-e0806n0:743_12: parimāṇasaññānaṃ yathādīgho ca majjhimo ca dīghamajjhimaṃ. Ekakañca dukañcāti viggaho,
anya-e0806n0:744: Khuddajantu siyā- naṭṭhi, athavā khuddakova yo;
anya-e0806n0:745: Sataṃ vā pasate yesaṃ, keci ānakulā api.
anya-e0806n0:746_0: Kīṭo ca pataṅgo ca, kuntho ca kipilliko ca, ḍaṃso ca makaso ca, makkhikā ca kipillikācāti
anya-e0806n0:746_1: viggaho. Pacanacaṇḍālāti o rabbhikādīnaṃ ruḷhīsaññā. Urabbhe hantvā jīvatīti orabbhiko,
anya-e0806n0:746_2: evaṃ sesesu. Sānaṃ sunakhaṃ pacatīti sapāko, venā tacchakā, rathakārā cammakārā.
anya-e0806n0:746_3: Sādhāraṇā samānā, caraṇasaddo- yaṃ idha gayhatīti sambandho, yathā sakamajjhayanāya
anya-e0806n0:746_4: carīyanti vatānyetesūti caraṇāni, kaṭhādivājhānyajjhayanāni sākhāsaññakāni. Yasmā
anya-e0806n0:746_5: etehi carati ariyasāvako gacchati amataṃ disaṃ, tasmā caraṇāni sīlādayo paṇṇarasa
anya-e0806n0:746_6: dhammā. Tenāha- ‘kaṭhādīhī’tiādi, kaṭhādīhīti pasiddhivasena kamātikkamenāpi vuttaṃ,
anya-e0806n0:746_7: tato ādisaddena atisādayo gayhanti. Atisena bhāradvājena kaṭhena vuttaṃ vidantyadhīyanti
anya-e0806n0:746_8: vāti “aññasmi”ti (4-121) ṇo, “lopo”ti (4-123) lopo atisā bhāradvājā kaṭhā. Kalāpinā
anya-e0806n0:746_9: vuttaṃ vidantyadhīyanti vāti, teneva ṇo, kalāpā, kaṭhā ādi yesaṃ te kaṭhādayo, tehi
anya-e0806n0:746_10: ajjhenavisese ca purise ca upacārāti sambandho.
anya-e0806n0:747_0: Sīlādayotiādisaddena indriyasaṃvarādayo gayhanti. Sīlañca paññāṇañca, samatho ca
anya-e0806n0:747_1: vipassanā ca vijjā ca caraṇañcāti viggaho. Ekato ajjhayanametesūti ekajjhayanāni,
anya-e0806n0:747_2: pakaṭhāni vacanāni pāvacanāni saddhammo, ekajjhayanāni ca tāni pāvacanāni ca tesaṃ,
anya-e0806n0:747_3: dīgho ca dīghāgamo ca majjhimo ca majjhimāgamo ca, ekuttaro ca aṅguttarāgamo ca saṃyuttāgamo
anya-e0806n0:748_0: Tesanti iminā liṅgavisesānanti chaṭṭhiyantataṃ dīpeti, itthī ca pumā ca, dāsī ca
anya-e0806n0:748_1: dāso ca, cīvarañca piṇḍapāto ca senāsanañca gilānapaccayo bhesajjaparikkhāro ca,
anya-e0806n0:748_2: tiṇañca kaṭṭho ca sākhā ca palāso cāti viggaho. Cheko dakkho, pubbā ca parācātiādinā viggaho.
anya-e0806n0:749_0: Pubbadakkhiṇantiādīsu “byañjane dīgharassā”ti (1-33) rasso. Kāso ca kuso ca usiro
anya-e0806n0:749_1: ca bīraṇañca, muñjañca babbajañcāti viggaho. Khadiro ca palāsocātiādinā ca, gajo
anya-e0806n0:749_2: ca gavajo cātiādinā ca, hatthī ca goca asso ca vaḷavācāti ca, haṃso ca balāvā cātiādinā
anya-e0806n0:749_3: ca, bako ca balākācāti ca. Hiraññañca suvaṇṇo ca, maṇi ca saṅkho ca muttā ca veḷuriyo
anya-e0806n0:749_4: ca jātarūpañca rajatañcāti ca, sāli ca yavakocātiādinā ca, sākañca suvañcātiādināca,
anya-e0806n0:749_5: kāsiyo ca kosalācātiādinā ca viggaho, janapadavācinā ca bahuvacanantā.
anya-e0806n0:750_0: Ekavīsaticcādino ekañca taṃ vīsaticāti visesanasamāso vā siyā, ekañca vīsati ca ekavīsatīti
anya-e0806n0:750_1: catthasamāso vā, samāhāre napuṃsakattantu na pappoti, “nānusāsanīyaṃ liṅgaṃ sokanissayattā
anya-e0806n0:750_2: liṅgasse”ti loke napuṃsakaliṅgassehānabhidhānato napuṃsakaliṅgaṃ na bhavissatītyadhippāyo,
anya-e0806n0:750_3: sabhāparisāyāti ñāpakato vā samāhāre napuṃsakaliṅgamatra byabhicaratīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0806n0:751_0: Pubbappayogo-bhimatoti upasajjanasaññakassa syādīti paṭhamāya niddiṭṭhassa samāse
anya-e0806n0:751_1: pubbanipāto “upasajjanaṃ pubba”miccanena (2-2-31) iṭṭho kamassa padhānabhāvena vattumiṭṭhattāti
anya-e0806n0:751_3: syādineti tatiyāniddiṭṭhassa pacchāvaṭṭhānato “syādisyādinā”ti sutte paṭipāṭiyā padhānabhāvena vattumiṭṭhattā.
anya-e0806n0:752_0: Parappayogo-bhimatoti heṭṭhā vuttasuttena pubbanipāte patte “rājadantādīsu para”ntīminā
anya-e0806n0:753_0: Kamampaccanādarāti iminā padhānabhāvenā-kkamassa vattumiṭṭhattamāha. Saro ādi yassa
anya-e0806n0:753_1: taṃ sarādi, saṅkho ca dundubhi ca vīṇā ca, udukkhalañca musalo ca, dhanapati ca rāmo
anya-e0806n0:753_2: ca kesavocāti viggaho. Jaṃdaṃsaddā jāyāsaddasamānatthā asaṅkhyā-jañca pati ca, dañca
anya-e0806n0:753_3: paticāti viggaho, avantayo ca assakāca, aggi ca indocāti viggaho, taṃnivāsimhi gahite
anya-e0806n0:753_4: avanti ca assakocāti ekattenapi viggaho vattati. Dvandasamāso- yaṃ dvandasadisattā
anya-e0806n0:753_5: dvando, dve ca dve ca padāni dvandānīti hi ubhayatthappadhāno- yaṃ dvandasaddo.
anya-e0806n0:755_0: Atha “samāhāre napuṃsaka”nti (3-20) vijjamāne kiṃ “saṅkhyādī” ti iminā satthagāravakarenāti
anya-e0806n0:756_0: Neti iminā catthetiādinā kataparikappanā na sijjhatīti dasseti, tattha hetumāha-
anya-e0806n0:761_1: kātabboti “saṅkhyāpubbo digū”ti (2-1-52) saṅkhyāpubbassa samāsassa digusaññaṃ vidhāya
anya-e0806n0:762_0: Samāharaṇaṃ samāhāroti iminā bhāvasādhano-yaṃ samāhārasaddo. Yadi samāharīyatīti
anya-e0806n0:762_1: samāhāroti kammasādhano siyā, tadā pañca kumāriyo samāhaṭāti vākyassātthe vutti siyā
anya-e0806n0:762_3: (3-24) appadhānarassattañca na siyā… samāhaṭānameva kumārīnaṃ padhānattā, tasmā pañca
anya-e0806n0:762_4: gāvo sa māhaṭātyetasmiṃ vākye samāsova natthi kammasādhanassānupagamato. Pañcannaṃ
anya-e0806n0:762_5: gunnaṃ samāhāro, catunnaṃ pathānaṃ samāhāroti vākye pana atthi, samāhārassekattā
anya-e0806n0:762_6: tu sataṃ yūthaṃ vananti ettha viya sābhāvikamekavacanaṃ siddhameveti viññāpeti.
anya-e0806n0:764_0: Kvacisaddassa payoganiyamanattho “paro kvicī”ti (1-27) ettha vuttanayena veditabbo.
anya-e0806n0:764_1: Avisesena udāharaṇepīti paresaṃ viya “chāyā”ti (2-2-73) suttayitvā vikappena ‘(kuḍḍacchāya)
anya-e0806n0:764_3: ca nodāharitvā sāmaññena ‘salabhacchāyaṃ sakuntacchāya’nti udāharaṇe dassitepi. Aññatthāti
anya-e0806n0:764_4: bahulabhāvato aññattha. Viggahasamattassāti viggahasāmaññassa, yathāsambhavanti pāsādassa
anya-e0806n0:766_0: Nanuceccādinā vuttaṃ codanaṃ nisedheti ‘tanne’ti. Tattha kāraṇamāha- ‘ghasaññattā’tyādi.
anya-e0806n0:766_1: Aghonanti ghaokāravajjitānaṃ, nanu itthi yamākāro gho, tathāsati napuṃsake so (na
anya-e0806n0:766_2: siyāti) parikappeti ‘napuṃsakattā ghattameva natthīti cedi’ti. Tampi neti yathā vuttampaṭikkhipitvā
anya-e0806n0:766_4: Napuṃsake ghattassa napuṃsakattassa (potthake) sabbhāvameva samattheti napuṃsakattaṃ
anya-e0806n0:766_5: hi’ccādinā, pāribhāsikanti ettha suttamevādhippetaṃ, paribhāsāya nibbattaṃ pāribhāsikaṃ
anya-e0806n0:766_8: Etaṃ ghanissitaṃ kāriyaṃ naca yuttanti sambandho. Ayuttattepi doso-yamāpatatevākyāsaṅkiyāha-‘nāyampidoso’ccādi,
anya-e0806n0:766_9: na rassassa ettheva laddhāvasarattā paṭhamaṃ tena paviṭṭhe… (ghani)ssitaṃ kāriyanti
anya-e0806n0:766_10: nāyampi doso paribhāsāva senāti mantabbaṃ. Salabhacchāye iti padacchedo.
anya-e0806n0:770: Sakatthapariccāgena kule pavattattāti iminā chaṭṭhīsamāsassa uttarapadatthappadhānattamāha.
anya-e0806n0:772_1: nāmavisesanaṃ vā siyā paccayatthavisesanaṃ vā, tattha nāmavisesanamevidaṃ na paccayatthavisesananti
anya-e0806n0:772_3: nāmasmā. Itthattanti ettha itthīti itthiliṅgaṃ vuccati. Itthiyeva hi esāti liṅgīyati
anya-e0806n0:772_4: saṅketīyatīti liṅgaṃ. Itthiyā esāti pasiddhimato atthassa bhāvo sāmaññaṃ bālayuvattādi
anya-e0806n0:777_0: Atthesu yesu esā eso etanti pasiddhi lokassa hoti etāni yathākkamaṃ itthipurisanapuṃsakaliṅgānīti
anya-e0806n0:777_1: lokena vuccantīti attho. Evañcakatvā vuccate “liṅgaṃ nānusāsanīyaṃ lokanissa yattā
anya-e0806n0:777_2: liṅgassā”ti. Tattha goiccādīsvesā esoti pasiddhiyā itthiliṅgattaṃ, acciādīsvesā etanti
anya-e0806n0:777_3: pasiddhiyā itthinapuṃsakattaṃ, taṭobhaṭī taṭamiccādīsveso esāetanti pasiddhiyā pumitthinapuṃsakattaṃ,
anya-e0806n0:777_4: mālāiccādīsvesāti pasiddhiyā itthattaṃ, rukkhoccādīsvesoti pasiddhiyā pulliṅgattaṃ,
anya-e0806n0:777_5: kulamiccādo etanti pasiddhiyā napuṃsakattaṃ. Samāsassāpyevaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ, jotakāti
anya-e0806n0:777_6: dassetīti sambandho. Jotakā itthattasseti pakaraṇato viññāyati. Tato veccādinā paccayatthabhāvino
anya-e0806n0:777_7: ye dosā tesametthanāvakāsoti dasseti. Samānādhikaraṇattaṃ bahuvacanampi hotītisambandho.
anya-e0806n0:777_8: Iminā idaṃ dīpeti “itthattassa paccayatthatte sati padhānattāssa byatirekalakkhaṇāya
anya-e0806n0:777_9: chaṭṭhiyā ‘kumārittaṃ (devadattāyā’tibhavitabbaṃ, tato ca na siyā kumārī) devadattā’ti
anya-e0806n0:777_10: samānādhikaraṇattaṃ, tathā kumāriyoti bahuvacanampi itthattassekattā. Pakatiyattha
anya-e0806n0:777_11: visesanapakkhe tu pakatiyā itthattavisiṭṭhaṃ dabbamevoccate, āādayo tu jotakatāti
anya-e0806n0:777_12: tattha byatirekābhāvā chaṭṭhiyā appasaṅgo ca bahuvacanampi anekattāva dabbassa yuttanti
anya-e0806n0:777_13: yathāvuttadosāvasarābhāvā iṭṭhatthasiddhī”ti. Aññeti jayādicca jinindabuddhyācariyādayo dasseti.
anya-e0806n0:778_2: no papajjate nopapajjeyya (pañcikā) devadattāsaddavacanīyassāpi itthattato abyatirittattā
anya-e0806n0:778_3: ‘itthattaṃ devadattāyā’ti bhinnādhikaraṇatā na yujjate, anupapattimeva samattheti
anya-e0806n0:779_0: Atoevāti itthatte āvidhānatoyeva. Tabbatotthassāti idaṃ jayādiccādimatānugāminā nugāmī
anya-e0806n0:779_1: pana (potthake) vuttaṃ, tathā hi te evaṃ liṅgalakkhaṇa māhu (pā, 4-1-3 kāsikāyaṃ)
anya-e0806n0:779_2: “sāmaññavisesā itthattādayo gottādayo viya bahuppakārabyattiyoti sāmaññāni ca tulyajātiyapadatthasādhāraṇattā
anya-e0806n0:779_3: tāni visesā ca añña maññehi vijātiyeti ca visissante byāvattanteti sāmaññavisesā.
anya-e0806n0:779_4: byañjīyantiā etehīti byattiyo sāmaññavisesānaṃ nissayā, bahuppakārā byatti yo yesaṃ
anya-e0806n0:779_5: sāmaññavisesānaṃ te tathāvuttāti– (kāsikāvivaraṇa pañjikā.) te hyevaṃ maññante “yathā
anya-e0806n0:779_6: gottādayo samānajātiyesu sabbesvanuvattante, vijātiyehi pana nivattante, tathā itthattādayopi.
anya-e0806n0:779_7: Vicittattā pana sāmaññavisesanissayānaṃ byañjakānaṃ kociyeva sāmaññaviseso kenacideva
anya-e0806n0:779_8: nissayena byañjate, na sabbo sabbena (pati) niyatavisayattā bhāvasattīnaṃ, tattha
anya-e0806n0:779_9: yenatthena itthattameva byañjate na pumattaṃ nāpi napuṃsakattaṃ, sā itthiyeva bhavati
anya-e0806n0:779_10: na pumā nāpi napuṃsakaṃ. Yena pumattameva byañjate, so pumāyeva. Yena tu napuṃsakattaṃ
anya-e0806n0:779_11: taṃ napuṃsakameva. Yo tu dvinnaṃ tiṇṇaṃ (vā) byañjako, so dviliṅgo tiliṅgo ve”ti
anya-e0806n0:779_12: (pā, 4-1-3 kāsikāvivaraṇapañjikā) tasmā pabbato yathā vuttaitthattavato atthassa
anya-e0806n0:780_0: Atheccādinā yathāvuttadosaparihārāya jinindabuddhinā yadupavaṇṇi taṃ taṃ parikappeti.
anya-e0806n0:780_1: So eva carahiccādinā upahāsapubbakamuttara mācikkhate. Masimakkhitakukkuṭoviyāti
anya-e0806n0:780_2: yadā koci aññakukkuṭo aññasmā bhīto siyā, tadā vijayino kukkuṭassa mukhaṃ masiyā
anya-e0806n0:780_3: makkhetvā upanenti so paṭhamaṃ tato bhītopi puna aññoti mantvā yujjhitumussahate.
anya-e0806n0:780_4: Yathātra sova kukkuṭo byāje nopadassito, tathā trāmītyattho.
anya-e0806n0:782: Puṃyogena bhariyāyaṃ vattamānatova niyamena “mātulāditvānī bhariyāyaṃ” (3-33) tyānī, iminā tvaniyamena bhariyāyamabhariyāyañca inītyaniyamena vattumāha- ‘ārāmikassa bhariyā’iccādi.
anya-e0806n0:784_0: Ttimhāti ettake vuttepi ttippaccayantatoti vacane kāraṇamāha-kevalassa aññapadatthe
anya-e0806n0:784_1: payogābhāvā’ti. Iminā paccayaggahaṇaparibhāsamantarenāpi sāmatthiyenevāyamatthaviseso labbhatīti dīpeti.
anya-e0806n0:786: Taṃsanniyogāti tena nīppaccayena sanniyogā ekībhāvā, ayametthādhippāyo ‘yattha nīppaccayo tattheva yalopo’ti.
anya-e0806n0:788_1: samaññābhūtā, puṃyogenāti purisena saha sambandhena hetunā. Itthiyaṃ vattantīti soyamityabhedavacanicchāyaṃ
anya-e0806n0:788_2: yadā bhariyāsaṅkhātāyamitthiyaṃ vattante, nadādipāṭhāti vutte viññāyati ‘ākatigaṇattā
anya-e0806n0:788_3: nadādipāṭho honto evaṃ hotī’ti dasseti, punnāmasmāyogāapālakantāti nadādipāṭhatoti
anya-e0806n0:788_4: atthoti seso. Idañca nadādīsu gaṇasuttanti veditabbaṃ, tassa atthaṃ vadati-‘pumuno’iccādi,
anya-e0806n0:790_0: Puthusaddato saññāyaṃ vīppaccayaṃ samattheti‘puthubhūtā pathavīti hi mahī vuccatī”ti,
anya-e0806n0:790_1: puthubhūtāti hi iminā pathavīsaddassa puthusaddabhūtattaṃ viññāpeti, mahī vuccatīti
anya-e0806n0:790_2: iminā nadādipāṭhā saññāyaṃ vīppaccayattaṃ, puthubhūtā patthaṭāti attho.
anya-e0806n0:792_0: Parādhikārato paccayassa paravidhināva sāmīpyassa siddhattā sādhīpyavacanassantasaddassa
anya-e0806n0:792_1: gahaṇamanatthakaṃ siyāti mantvāvayavavacano yamantasaddo gayhatīti dassento āha-
anya-e0806n0:792_2: ‘tassa anto’iccādi. Avasānavati+avayavoti padacchedo, samāsaggahaṇena gahaṇe kāraṇamāha-‘avayavattā’ti.
anya-e0806n0:792_4: rukkhassa pallavānamavayavattaṃ viya samāsato uttarakālaṃ vidhīya mānassa akārassa
anya-e0806n0:794_0: Atikkantamaṅguliyoti viggaho. Dve aṅguliyo samāhaṭāti paraviggahenātthamāha, dve
anya-e0806n0:794_1: aṅguliyo pamāṇamassāti viggahenevaṃ samāso tato mattappaccaye tagghappaccaye vā tassa
anya-e0806n0:794_2: “lopo”ti (4-123) iminā lope kate visesanasamāsā akāroti dassetuṃ ‘katha’miccādinā
anya-e0806n0:794_3: yaṃ vuttaṃ taṃ dassetuṃ ‘aññapadatthe’ccādi vuttaṃ. Samāsavidhānaṃ atopīti mattādippaccayalopaṃ
anya-e0806n0:794_5: māne paccayalopavasena vināva appaccayena niṭṭhappattīti mantvā ‘aṅgulasaddo vā’ccādinā
anya-e0806n0:794_6: yaṃ vuttiyaṃ vuttaṃ tattha āsaṅkaṃ viracayati ‘athe’ccādi. Dvaṅgulasaddassa pamāṇinivattanato
anya-e0806n0:794_7: kathañcipi aññapadatthatā siyāti ‘yathā tathā aññapadatthe vattatū’tivuttaṃ. Nanu
anya-e0806n0:794_8: niraṅgulantyādi sabbamaṅgulasaddena sādhetuṃ sakkā, tathā sati kimaṅguli saddā appaccayavidhānenetyāsaṅkiya
anya-e0806n0:794_9: payojanantaraṃ apadisitumāha- ‘sabbatthe’ccādi. Aṅgulisaddato appaccaye avihite niraṅguliccādipi
anya-e0806n0:796_0: Dīgharattantyādo nānusiṭṭhattā liṅgavisesassa kathaṃ napuṃsakattameviccāsaṅkiya codeti
anya-e0806n0:797_0: Ahorattanti samāhāre (cattha) samāsā napuṃsakattaṃ. Atirattoti pulliṅge pādisamāso,
anya-e0806n0:797_1: samudāyasaddassāpyavayave vutti sabbhāvato ekadesavacano pubbarattādo rattisaddoccāha-‘pubbā
anya-e0806n0:797_2: ca sā ratti cā’tiādi. Evamekarattanti pāṭhena na bhavitabbaṃ… tassa samāhārena samāsattābhāvā.
anya-e0806n0:798: Asamāsantapakkheti samāsantaappaccayassābhāvapakkhe. Pubbā atikkantā ratti pubbarattī(ti ratti saddo) nekadesavacanoti samāsantābhāvo.
anya-e0806n0:800: Nanuceccādinā yathāpāditadosaṃ nāyaṃ dosoti pariharati. Syādilopassiccādinā sulabhasyādi lopato pyasulabhataddhita lopova alopetīminā parāmaṭṭhuṃ yuttoti dasseti.
anya-e0806n0:802_0: Rattindivaṃ bhuñjatīti payoge ādheyye bhojanasaṅkhāte apekkhite ratyādayo ādeyyasāpekkhā,
anya-e0806n0:802_1: tesampi iminā nipāta nenevātimatā samāsassa siddhīti dassento āha- ‘rattandiva’ntiādi,
anya-e0806n0:802_2: ratti ca divācāti viggaho, catthasamāse tu ra(ttindi) vā.
anya-e0806n0:804_0: Samāsattho (ettha) dāru, nāssa mukhyāhi aṅgulīhi sambandho yujjati, nanu dve aṅgulī
anya-e0806n0:804_1: pamāṇamassa dārunoccādiṃ mukhyo aṅgulisaddogahitoti sambandho sambhavati kimevaṃ
anya-e0806n0:804_3: aṅguli saddassa dāruno pamāṇavācakattā vuttaṃ- ‘dāruno sambandho atthī’ti. Visesanasamāsato
anya-e0806n0:804_7: tabbidhāne tassa appaccayassa vidhāne payojanaṃsissokārotisambandho. Iminā kaccāyanānaṃ
anya-e0806n0:804_8: pakaraṇe payojanaṃ dassitaṃ. Athaca panettha “kvaci samāsantagatānamakāranto”ti (ka,
anya-e0806n0:804_9: 2-7-22) iminā akārantassa samāsante kate sāmatthiyā ‘syāca’iti (ka, 2-3-29) sissākārādesābhāvā
anya-e0806n0:804_10: niccamokārantarūpaṃ sampajjatīti parikappiyatassāyuttabhāvaṃ dassetuṃ yaṃ vuttaṃvuttikārena,
anya-e0806n0:804_11: taṃ dassetumāha‘akārantassapi’ccādi, yaṃ-vuttaṃ sissākārā desanivattane akārakaraṇe
anya-e0806n0:804_12: sāmatthiyaṃ, tadabhāvā sissākārādeso na nivārīyatīti dassetumāha-‘nace’ccādi. Caritatthatāya
anya-e0806n0:804_13: niṭṭhitappayojanatāya, teneva kaccāyanavuttikāreneva appaccayanta mudāhaṭaṃ sakkataganthānusārena,
anya-e0806n0:804_14: abyañjanantattāti iminā tiṇṇamesaṃ saddānaṃ sakkate byañjanantattameva bodheti, niratthakanti
anya-e0806n0:806: Aññamaññakiriyeti kiriyāparivattanamāha, iminā sutte kiriya saddābhāvepi vītiharaṇasaddeneva kiriyābyatihāreti labbhatīti dasseti.
anya-e0806n0:812: Āparicchedāvasānā na pare parena (potthake) tato paraṃ ṇādikāriyavidhānā.
anya-e0806n0:814_2: bhāvoti vākye“tassa bhāvakammesuttatā ttana ṇya ṇeyya ṇiya ṇiyā”ti (4-56) tto, vibhattilopo,
anya-e0806n0:820: Apavādavisayepīti “vijjāyonisambandhānamā tatra catthe”ti (3-64) imassa apavādasuttassa visayepi.
anya-e0806n0:822_1: vivaraṇamiccāha-‘vijjāyoni’ccādi, vijjā ca yoni ca vijjā yonī tāsaṃ sambandho, so
anya-e0806n0:822_2: yesaṃ atthi te hotādayo mātādayo ca abhedopacāreneha vijjāyonisambandhisaddena gayhantīti
anya-e0806n0:822_3: adhippāyo, tasaddenāti tatretyatra. Te ca ltupitādayoti tasaddena parāmaṭṭhā ltupitādayo
anya-e0806n0:822_4: ca, atthe kāriyā sambhavā taṃvācako saddo gayhati.
anya-e0806n0:828_0: Itthisaddena itthiliṅgaṃ gahitaṃ na itthī, taggahaṇe sati ‘itthiyaṃ vattamāne’ti
anya-e0806n0:828_1: vuttiganthassa itthisaṅkhāte atthe vattamāneti attho gayheyya, evaṃ sati ‘kalyāṇippadhānā’ti
anya-e0806n0:828_2: etthāpi pumbhāvo pasajjeyya… padhānasaddassa kalyāṇiyaṃ vattamānattāti āha- ‘itthiyanti
anya-e0806n0:828_3: itthiliṅge’ti. Atha itthiyanti ettake vutte kathaṃ taggahaṇaṃ siyāti āha-‘visesane’ccādi,
anya-e0806n0:828_4: ekattheti vuttepi itthiyaṃ vattamāneti ayamattho viññāyatīti itthiyanti vacanamanatthaṃ
anya-e0806n0:828_6: āha- ‘visesane’ccādi, itthiyanti itthiliṅgasseva gahaṇanti sambandho. Byavacchejjābhāvā
anya-e0806n0:828_7: visesanamanatthakaṃ siyāti ekattheiccaneneva itthiyaṃ vuttiyā (gamma) bhāvatoti bhāvo.
anya-e0806n0:828_8: Pume pulliṅge vattamāno saddo pumāsaddo, sakaloti padesasakalo hi gayhati… kassaci
anya-e0806n0:830_0: Vattanaṃ ekasmiṃ atthe adhitthiccādo itthivisiṭṭhe sattamiyatthādo, vāsiṭṭhoccādo
anya-e0806n0:830_1: vasiṭṭhādivisiṭṭhe apaccādo, puttīyaticcādo puttādivisiṭṭhe icchādyatthe pavatti,
anya-e0806n0:830_2: tenāha-‘ekatthībhāvo’ti. Sāmañña gahaṇatthanti iminā mattasaddassa kasiṇatthe pavattimāha.
anya-e0806n0:832_0: Evanti iminā itarītarayoge catthasamāsaṃ vibhāveti. Jānijāyā, saddantarenāti jānisaddena
anya-e0806n0:832_1: tathāsaddopadiṭṭhena daṃ jaṃ saddantarena ca, kesañciti kharīgatantiādīsu ‘kharī’tiādīnaṃ
anya-e0806n0:832_2: kesañci, kharīti kharatthe vattamāno-yaṃ saddo niyatavisayo… gatasaddaṃ vinā aññattha
anya-e0806n0:832_3: adiṭṭhattā, nāyampayogoti tudampatippayogaṃ nivattetvā hetumāha- ‘āgame’ccādi, aññehi
anya-e0806n0:834_0: Nanu sutte‘sare’ti ettakaṃ vuttaṃ‘sarādo’ti kathaṃ laddhanti āha-‘sare’tiādi, vaṇṇe
anya-e0806n0:834_1: yantantadādoti siṭṭhavacanaṃ, vaṇṇe parabhūte yaṃ kāriyaṃ vidhīyate taṃ so vaṇṇo
anya-e0806n0:834_2: ādi yassa taṃ tadādi, tasmiṃ tadādo uttarapade sampajjatīti attho, khādhātuto ktappaccaye
anya-e0806n0:834_3: vihite rassenākārenevāyampayogo, na visuṃ akārenāti dassetuṃ na ākkhātaṃ anakkhāta
anya-e0806n0:836_1: sabbesameva saddānaṃ nipphannavācitañcāttano dīpeti, yathākathañci nipphatti, ruḷhiyā
anya-e0806n0:836_2: atthanicchayo, tena saññeccādo-dhippāyaṃ vivarati ‘yaṃkiñci’tyādinā, itthī ca pumā
anya-e0806n0:836_3: ca itthipumaṃ, na itthi pumanti samāse nipātaneniminā napuṃsakādeso napuṃsakaniddeso
anya-e0806n0:836_4: (potthake) ti dasseti ‘na itthi’ccādinā. Khī-khaye, khara-vināse cāti hi etehi ‘na
anya-e0806n0:836_5: khīyati na kharatī’ti atthe “bhāvakārakesva ghaṇa ghakā”ti (5-44) appaccaye’ na khaya
anya-e0806n0:836_6: na khara’iti ṭhite khattādesoti āha- na khīyati’ccādi.
anya-e0806n0:838: Evanti iminā gacchatīti vākye kvippaccayādiṃ dasseti, viseso panettha nañssa(ṭo) vasalo caṇḍālo, sītena karaṇabhūtena.
anya-e0806n0:840: Tattha tasmiṃ parabhūte, yassa ca jhattanti sambandho.
anya-e0806n0:842_2: Kapotādibhāveti katthaci gharādo kapotavātamaṇḍalikādīnaṃ dassanavasena sabbhāve
anya-e0806n0:842_3: sati. Agyādidassanatoti aggipisācādidassanato, aññatrāpīti gharādito aññatra, kapotavātamaṇḍalikādino
anya-e0806n0:842_4: liṅgassa, agyādiyoganti aggiādīhi anumeyyehi sambandhaṃ. Mantvāti anumānañāṇena jānitvāpayogoti
anya-e0806n0:844_0: Sakatthe vattamānassa sahasaddassāti vattabbe vattamāno tappadhānoyevāti āha- ‘sakatthappadhānassa
anya-e0806n0:844_1: sahasaddassā’ti, vutti bhavatīti sambandho, yugapadi dhurā sadhuraṃ. Aparaṇhena sahitaṃ sahā paraṇhaṃ.
anya-e0806n0:846_0: “Aṭṭhādasa nimesā tu, kaṭṭhā tiṃsantu tākalā”ti vacanato āha- ‘kalā kālaviseso’ti.
anya-e0806n0:846_3: akālattho”ti. Ganthavuttipi kalādi kālasaddatthaṃ nātikkamatīti adhippāyenāha- ‘ganthavuttipi’ccādi.
anya-e0806n0:846_4: Adhiko māsako assāti samāsako, vikappena siddheti “sahassa so-ññatthe”ti (3-78).
anya-e0806n0:848_0: Samāno pati yassā sapattinī sapattī iti nipphannānamekadeso ‘pattinī pattī’ti dassitoti
anya-e0806n0:848_2: gaṇapāṭhato akkhaye vattamānasso manādittā okārantattanti dassetumāha- ‘vayo’tiādi.
anya-e0806n0:852: Tumhe viya dissantīti tumhādī amhādīccādiṃ “sabbādīnamā”ti (3-86) ā.
anya-e0806n0:854: Gabbhenāti iminā kucchigatena gabbhena saha dvihadayattamassāti dasseti, pubbapadeti dusadde.
anya-e0806n0:856: Guṇā paṭalā dve padāni assa iti bhavitabbaṃ dve pādā esaṃ dve satāni assa, dve sahassāni assa, dvinnaṃ satānaṃ dvinnaṃ sahassānaṃ vā samāhāroti viggaho.
anya-e0806n0:858: Dvattipattāti paṭhamantā‘pūra-pūraṇe’iccasmā karaṇatthe “bhāva kārakesva ghaṇa ghakā”ti (5-44) appaccaye syādisamāsoti dassetu māha- ‘dvattipatta’iccādi.
anya-e0806n0:860: Dve ca tiṃsā ca, dvīhi vā adhikā tiṃsāti viggaho.
anya-e0806n0:862_0: Sampattavibhāsāyanti ayaṃyogo (sampattavibhāsāti) dasseti, sampatte vibhāsā vikappoti
anya-e0806n0:862_1: attho, tayo ca cattālīsā ca, tīhi vā adhikā cattālīsāccādinā viggaho, tisso cattālīsā
anya-e0806n0:869_0: Nanu ca ‘ṇo vāpacce’ti vacanato kathaṃ pakativisayāvagamo siyā. Yathākathañci pakativisayāvagamepi
anya-e0806n0:869_1: sāmaññavacanato pana dhammenāpaccantyādo yato kutoci dhammeniccāditopi siyā ṇā dipaccayotyāsaṅkiyāha
anya-e0806n0:869_3: pariggahaṇāya sāmaññavacanato yo apaccavā tato, atthato pana asambhavā dabbācakasaddāva
anya-e0806n0:869_4: sāmatthiyena chaṭṭhiyantā sabbaliṅgavacanā jāyateti viññātabbaṃ. Dhammasmāpaccaṃtyādīsu
anya-e0806n0:870_0: Dhammenāti dhammena karaṇabhūtena. Dhammāyāti dhammatthaṃ, dhammasmāti dhammahetunā,
anya-e0806n0:870_2: dhammenāpaccaṃ kassāti pucchitvā devadattassāti apekkhiyamānaṃ vadati. Devadattassāti
anya-e0806n0:870_3: apaccavā devadattādi apekkhīyateti sambandho, hisaddo hetumhi. Na hettha ṇādivutti
anya-e0806n0:870_4: aññattha nahetakāmantattha (potthake) sāpekkhattā kambalo vasiṭṭhassāpaccaṃ devadattassāti
anya-e0806n0:870_5: ettha pana vasiṭṭho-paccavāti tato chaṭṭhiyantā hoticcāsaṅkiyāha- ‘na ce’ccādi. Na
anya-e0806n0:871_0: Kāraṇamāha- ‘asambandhā’ti. Na hettha sambandho vasiṭṭhassa kambalāpekkhattena apaccassa
anya-e0806n0:871_2: apaccaṃ vāsiṭṭhoti ṇādivuttiyā bhāve sāmatthiyaṃ natthi, samatthañhi vasiṭṭhaṃ rājapurisādi
anya-e0806n0:872: Yadi panettha ṇādippaccayo sabbathā sambandhamapekkhate, tadā visesato yassāpaccena sambandho tatova janakato so siyāti dassetumāha- ‘yajjeva’miccādi.
anya-e0806n0:873_0: Yo janakoti yoyo yassa yassa apaccassa janako. Tatoyevāti tasmātasmā janakatoyeva.
anya-e0806n0:873_1: Siyāti tasmiṃ tasmiṃ apaccatthe ṇādippaccayo siyā. Tattha hetumāha- ‘tassevāpaccena
anya-e0806n0:873_2: yogā’ti. Yogāti apaccasambandhato, na mūlappakatitoti paramappakatito na hotīti vuttaṃ
anya-e0806n0:873_3: hoti. Hetumāha- ‘ayogā,ti, vacanābhāvampettha dassetuṃ ce’tyādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0806n0:874: Vacananti suttaṃ, sambandhābhāvā (tādisavacanābhāvā) ca mūlappakatito ṇādippaccayassābhāvaṃ dassetvā idāni mūlappakatitovāssābhimatabhāvaṃ dassetuṃ ‘mūlappakatito’ccādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0806n0:875_2: vatvā taṃ sādhayitumārabhate ‘katha’miccādi, evaṃ hiccādi kathaṃpanidamiccādinā yathāvuttassa
anya-e0806n0:875_3: samattha navākyaṃ, hiyasmā taṃ disvā tathā pucchito devadattassavātiādinā uppādetārameva
anya-e0806n0:875_4: niddisati, nāttānaṃ pitāmaho, tasmā uppādetāyevāpaccena sambajjhati na pitāmahoti
anya-e0806n0:875_5: yojetvā adhippāyo veditabbo. Idaṃ yathāvuttamuppādetuniddisanaṃ, tena apaccena saddhiṃ
anya-e0806n0:875_6: uppādetuyeva janakasseva yogo sambandho paṭipādetuṃ na sakkāti sambandho.
anya-e0806n0:876_0: Tantitaṃ tattha-iti (pañcikāyaṃ) pucchānimittaṃ, tenāti apaccena. Apatananti narake
anya-e0806n0:876_1: apatanaṃ bhavati, soti yoso yassātyaniyamaniddiṭṭho so ñātuṃ na icchitoti sambandho.
anya-e0806n0:876_2: Iminā idaṃ dīpeti- “napatatyanena naraketyapaccanti vuccati apaccenānena yassakassaci
anya-e0806n0:876_3: avisesenāpatanambhavati narake soso tāya pucchāya ñātuṃ na icchito”ti. So vāti kassāyaṃ
anya-e0806n0:876_4: puttoti pucchāyānurodhane so uppādetāyeva ñātumicchitoti sambandho. Tusaddo cetthāpaccena
anya-e0806n0:876_5: narakāpātasabba janajānanicchāvisesajotako, yadi siyāti sambandho, attānampi niddiseyya
anya-e0806n0:876_6: na kevalamuppādetāraṃ, atthiccādi pitāmahassa attanopi niddese kāraṇavacanaṃ, taṃ
anya-e0806n0:876_7: apaccaṃ nimittaṃ kāraṇaṃ, yassa taṃ taṃnimittaṃ tasmā katvā (potthake) evaṃ diṭṭhiko
anya-e0806n0:877_0: Byavahitajanitenāpīti byavahitena kattunā janitenāpi, karaṇe cāyaṃ tatiyā, hetumhi
anya-e0806n0:877_1: vā. Kasmā evaṃ diṭṭhikoti āha ‘yaṃ nimittaṃ hi’ccādi. Hisaddo yasmādatthe. Yassāti
anya-e0806n0:877_2: pubbajassa, tena apaccena apatanaṃ tadapatanaṃ tato, idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti “tena byavahitajanitenāpi
anya-e0806n0:877_3: pumunā pubbajopi narakaṃ na patati so pubbajassāpya paccaṃ bhavati yathāvuttena nibbacanenā”ti.
anya-e0806n0:877_5: Pubba pubbabhāve satīti pubbassa pubbassa vijjamānatte sati. Byavahitena janite apaccepi
anya-e0806n0:877_6: nimittaṃ apāyāpatakāraṇabhāvo atthiye vāti sambandho. Kesanti āha-‘pubbesanti pubbajānanti
anya-e0806n0:877_7: attho, ke nāti āha- ‘pārampariyenā’ti. Abhedopacārenāti pubbapubbabhāve saticcādinā
anya-e0806n0:877_8: vuttanayena janakassa viya pārampariyenapubbesampinimittatā vato janakasadisattā
anya-e0806n0:877_9: janakāva nāma te siyunti evamabhedena upacaraṇato cintanatoti attho. Ubhayathāti
anya-e0806n0:877_10: ñāyena upacārenacāti ubhayena pakārena, evamubhayathāpi mūlappakatiyā paccenābhisambandhā
anya-e0806n0:878: Tato cāti mūlappakatito ca, apaccasāmaññavacanicchāyanti itthi punnapuṃsakattavisesopaggāhi apaccasāmaññassa vacanicchāyaṃ.
anya-e0806n0:879_0: Evammūlakatito- paccasāmaññena ṇādippaccayaṃ vavatthapetvā idāni apaccāditopi hoteva
anya-e0806n0:879_1: ṇādi sāmaññavidhānā. So ca bahulādhikārato gurujanāyattattā tanniyogācaraṇena pasatthe
anya-e0806n0:879_2: yevāpacce byavahitajanitepi itthivajjite siyāti dassetumāha ‘nattādīhi’ccādi. Satiyeva
anya-e0806n0:879_3: gurujane sappadhānabhāvena kucchite-paccetu nattādīvuttīhi vasiṭṭhādīhi ṇādippaccayo
anya-e0806n0:879_4: hoti vāsiṭṭhotiādi, itthiyañca na hoti vāsiṭṭhītiādi.
anya-e0806n0:880_0: Atthatoti sāmatthiyato. Apacce vidhīyamāno paccayo apaccavatā jāyamāno tassāpaccanti
anya-e0806n0:880_1: atthe jāyati. Socāya matthaviseso cha(ṭṭhiyanta) tābhāve kathaṃ siyāti idamettha
anya-e0806n0:880_2: sāmatthiyaṃ. Anantare vāpacce putte-bhidheyya nattādo vāpacce-bhidheyyāti sasambandho.
anya-e0806n0:880_3: Kutoci apaccavatā nattādo eva. Idañca sabbambahulavacaneva sampajjatīti āha- ‘bahulādhikārā’ti.
anya-e0806n0:880_4: Apacceti ekavacanena niddese pumunā napuṃsakena kariyati, tene kasmiṃ yevāpacce siyā,
anya-e0806n0:880_5: na bahūsu vasiṭṭhassāpaccāni vāsiṭṭhāni, na citthi vāsiṭṭhāni, na citthiyaṃ vāsiṭṭhītyāsaṅkiyāha-‘idañce’ccādi.
anya-e0806n0:880_6: Idañca apaccavacanañca. Iminā cettha tathā nissayakaraṇaṃ dasseti. Tassa vacanicchābhāvatoti
anya-e0806n0:881_0: Kiṃ pana kāraṇaṃ sutte liṅgavacanāvacanicchāyaṃ tassāppadhānattā yenakenaci liṅgādinā
anya-e0806n0:881_4: pume napuṃsakepacce-bhidheyye vidhi hoticcevaṃ kāriyappaṭipattiyā vattuṃ na iṭṭhaṃ.
anya-e0806n0:882_0: Vacanantarepi aññasmiṃ vacane. Āṇīti ṇippaccayasuttaṃ vadati. Agottāditoti yogottassādibhūto
anya-e0806n0:882_1: na hoti, tato, teneva “āṇī”ti sutte (4-5) vakkhati-‘akārantamattatovāyaṃṇina gottādibhūtato’ti.
anya-e0806n0:882_2: Vākyasamāsāpīti yathāsaṅkhyenāha. Tasmiṃ attheti tasmiṃ vākyopadassite atthe, tanti
anya-e0806n0:883_0: Satipanāti vākāre sati tu aniccattā ṇappaccayassa. Sopīti samāsopi, samāsotiādinā
anya-e0806n0:883_1: pakkhantaramāha. Tena vākyasijjhanena. Pakkhe vākyasamāsāpi siyunti pakkhe samāsavuttiyā
anya-e0806n0:883_2: eva bādhitattā pakkhantare ṇādivutti na bādhīyatīti vākyavuttiyopi siyunti attho.
anya-e0806n0:885_0: Vacchakaccādinā kaccādigaṇaṃ dassetvā tassa vibhāgena nipphattiṃ dassetuṃ ‘vacchādīhī’tiādimāha.
anya-e0806n0:885_1: “Kaṇho brāhmaṇe”ti gaṇasuttaṃ. Tattha kaṇhasaddo brāhmaṇe vattamāno ṇānaṇāya nappaccaye
anya-e0806n0:885_2: uppādayatīti attho. Evamādīhiccādinā ākatigaṇattamassa dasseti. “Katāṇiyove”ti gaṇasuttaṃ,
anya-e0806n0:885_3: diccādīsūti yatoṇyo dissati “ṇya diccādīhī”ti (4-4), te diccādayo, tesu pāṭhāti taṃsuttappadese
anya-e0806n0:885_4: “katā ṇiyove”ti pāṭhābhāvepi diccā dīnamākatigaṇattā paṭhitameva nāma tanti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0806n0:886_0: Ṇyeti ṇyappaccaye kate. Gottādisaddāti gotte vaṃse ādibhūtā saddā. Vaṃsoti anvayo.
anya-e0806n0:886_1: Soyeva gāvaṃ sajāti sādhāraṇaṃ vijātivinivattanaṃ sakaṭādivacanaṃ tāyatīti gottanti
anya-e0806n0:886_2: vuttaṃ, tenāha-‘gottaṃ vaṃso’ti. Tassāti gottassa, tassādayo gottādayoti seso. Kete
anya-e0806n0:886_3: gottādayoccāha- ‘saññākārino’ccādi. Vacchādayo nattādino apaccassa apaccaṃ tadapaccādi
anya-e0806n0:888_0: Ghapasaññantāvettha bhīyyo kattikādayoti gayhanti. Yadi panettha aññepi gayhanti,
anya-e0806n0:888_1: atthi paṇhiādayo keciyeva kattikādīsu antogadhā hontīti vattumāha- ‘etthā’tiādi.
anya-e0806n0:888_2: Vinatā supaṇṇamātā, tehīti vidhavādīhi. Vidhavādigaṇaṃ dasseti ‘bandhaka’ccādi. Vigato
anya-e0806n0:888_3: dhavo pati assāti vidhavā, bandhakī abhisāriṇī.
anya-e0806n0:890_0: Yassa ca cavaggoti sambandho, kevalaṃ gaggyoti ettakamevā dassetvā parasatthāgatagaggādigaṇekadesabhūtakuṇḍanīsaddatopi
anya-e0806n0:890_1: koṇḍaññoti mudāharanto so gaggādigaṇopyatrābhyupagatoti viññāpeti. Tasmā tasmiṃ gaggādikepi
anya-e0806n0:890_2: parasatthapaṭhite yoyo payogo āgame dissati vaccho aggivessoccādi. Sopīha veditabboti
anya-e0806n0:890_3: dassetumāha-‘gaggādi’ccādi. Gaggādīti gaggādi ayaṃ. Gottassa gaggavaṃsassa ādibhūtena
anya-e0806n0:890_4: gaggena upalakkhito gaṇo gottādigaṇo, tena gaggo nāma koci, tassatvapaccaṃ gaggīti
anya-e0806n0:890_5: bhavati. Paputtādovāti avadhāraṇaṃ gaggassāpaccaṃ gaggicceva yathāsiyāti.
anya-e0806n0:892_0: Pakatassāti “māgadhaṃ saddalakkhaṇa”nti vā “nāmasmā”ti vā pakatassa. Āti nāmavisesanesati
anya-e0806n0:892_1: “vidhibbisesanantassā”ti tadanta vidhinā akāranto gayhatīti āha-‘visesanena cā’tiādi.
anya-e0806n0:894: Paccayantenāti rājaññoti paccayantena. Rājaññotīmassattho khattiyajātīti, rājaññajātīti attho. Rañño apaccaṃ rājāpaccaṃ.
anya-e0806n0:896_0: Samudāyenāti paccayantasamudāyena, jātiyanti manussajātiyaṃ. Jātisaddāeteti idaṃ
anya-e0806n0:896_1: manusso mānusoti ettha apaccatthābhāve hetuvacanaṃ. Apaccattho ettha natthevāti ca
anya-e0806n0:896_2: idaṃ visuṃ manussamānusa saṅkhātassa paccatthassābhāvadassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ. Ṇovāti
anya-e0806n0:896_3: manuno apaccanti atthe“ṇo vāpacce”ti (4-1) ṇappaccayova. Na jātīti byatirekamāha.
anya-e0806n0:898: Rājasambandheti raññeti vuttarājasambandhe. Pañcālānaṃ khattiyānaṃ apaccaṃ, pañcālānaṃ janapadānaṃ rājāti vā evamettha vi(bhāgo) veditabbo okkākānaṃ apaccaṃ rājā vā okkāko.
anya-e0806n0:900_1: kusumbhādināti (vuttaṃ) siyā, rañji aya matthi abhisaṅge‘bhojane ratto’ti. Atthi
anya-e0806n0:900_2: vaṇṇavisese ‘rattogo’ti, lohitotyattho, atthi sukkasaja vaṇṇantarāpādane‘ratto paṭo’ti.
anya-e0806n0:900_3: Iha tu tatiye-tthe vattamāno gayhatīti vuttaṃ- ‘vaṇṇantaramāpādita’nti. Rāgāti.
anya-e0806n0:901_0: Atthaggahaṇanti atthappadhānattā niddesassa vuttaṃ. Tañcācariyāna mupadesato avicchinnā
anya-e0806n0:901_1: (cariya) pārampariyāvagamyate, rāgāti kasāva saṅkhātaatthaniddeso. Tenāti paṭassa
anya-e0806n0:901_2: rattabhāve rāgassa karaṇaniddeso, rattanti paccayatthaniddeso, paccayo cāyaṃ kasā
anya-e0806n0:901_3: vatthato bhavatyasambhavā, tena sutte rāgāti vuttepi tabbācakā kasāvasaddāti viññāyati,
anya-e0806n0:901_4: rāgāti pana tenāti rāgasseva niddiṭṭhepi tabbhāvenā tabbāvakabhāvenā-ti bhavitabbaṃ
anya-e0806n0:901_5: ttho niddiṭṭho, tabbācakā ca honto‘tena ratta’nti atthe hotīti kasāvena rattanti
anya-e0806n0:901_6: viññāyatīti rāgavācino tatiyantattaṃ sampajjati, tena ‘ṇa rāgā tena ratta’nti vuttepi
anya-e0806n0:901_7: labbhamānatthavasena vuttaṃ- ‘rāgavācitatiyantato’ti. Sutte pana rāgena rattantetasmiṃ
anya-e0806n0:901_8: atthe rāgā rāgavācīsaddā tatiyantā ṇappaccayo hotīti attho. Abhidhānatoti upacāravasena
anya-e0806n0:903_0: Tatiyantato vijjhatthaṃ tenāti anuvattateti sambandho. Sutte ayamattho “induyuttena
anya-e0806n0:903_1: nakkhattena lakkhito ce kālo, tadā tena lakkhite kāletyasmiṃ atthe tatiyantato nakkhattā
anya-e0806n0:903_2: ṇo hotī”ti. Suttavivaraṇe tu tañcetyādikamadhippāyavasena vuttaṃ. Tenātyanuvuttiyā
anya-e0806n0:903_3: tatiyantatoti labbhati nakkhattenāti sutattāti, kāleti pana atthaniddesato ṇappaccayādheyyassa
anya-e0806n0:903_4: kālo ādhāroti viññāyatīti ‘lakkhite kāle’ti vuttaṃ, visessagatavibhattiyā vicāritāya
anya-e0806n0:903_5: visesana gatā ca (vicāritā) nāmāti āha- ‘nakkhattene’ticcādi, iha keci khandhapañcakasaṅkhātaṃ
anya-e0806n0:903_6: kiriyāsabhāvamicchanti aniccaṃ, apare tu dabbasabhāvaṃ niccaṃ. Tasso bhayassapi kālassa
anya-e0806n0:903_7: candayuttena phussādinā lakkhiyabhāvā lakkhaṇe tatiyā yuttanti vattumāha- ‘kiriyā rūpo kālo’ccādi.
anya-e0806n0:904_0: Visesāvasāyoti kālassa visesāvadhāraṇatthameva hi ‘phussī ratti’ccādi. Loke payujjate.
anya-e0806n0:904_1: Gurunāti ettha guru jīvo, na nakkhattaṃ, candayuttatā panettha atthi… candayuttena
anya-e0806n0:904_2: gurunā rattiyā lakkhitattā. Kattikāya lakkhito muhuttoti ettha candaṃ vinā kattikāya
anya-e0806n0:904_3: tu kevalāya muhutto kālo lakkhito ‘kattikā muhutto’ti. Phussena lakkhitā atthasiddhīti
anya-e0806n0:904_4: ettha phusseninduyuttena atthasiddhi lakkhitā na kālo phussoti. Nakkhattayuttassa
anya-e0806n0:904_5: kālassa ratyādivisesāparāmāsena nakkhattavācito uppannassa paccayassa suttantarena
anya-e0806n0:904_6: lopaṃ vidhāya puna aññena suttena yuttāti desavidhānena sakaliṅgasaṅkhyāyuttehi-ṭṭhamabhidhānaṃ
anya-e0806n0:905_0: Ratyādivisesāparāmāsenāti phussī ratti phusso ahoti evaṃ ratyādivisesassa aparāmāsena
anya-e0806n0:905_1: asammassena aggahaṇena. Sakaliṅgasaṅkhyāyuttenāti phussakattikādīnaṃ yaṃyaṃ liṅgaṃ
anya-e0806n0:905_2: yāyā saṅkhyā, attaniyehi tehi tehi liṅgehi tāhitāhi ca saṅkhyāhi yuttena nakkhattasaddena.
anya-e0806n0:905_3: Na tadupalakkhito kāloti kattikā saddobahuvacananto bahutārakattā kattikāya, tāyakattikāya
anya-e0806n0:905_5: ko doso ye nevamuccateccāha- ‘ajjeti’ccādi. Iminā ca paramate doso ubbhāvito, tadatthatte
anya-e0806n0:906_0: Sattamī siyāti nakkhattasaddā taddhitalopantā phussena pāyasaṃ bhuñjeyya, phusse
anya-e0806n0:906_1: pāyasaṃ bhuñjeyyā’tyādo ādheyyantarāpekkhā siyā sattamī, yā suttantarena vidhīyati
anya-e0806n0:906_3: ‘ajjakattikāsū’ti, na paṭhamā. Paṭhamāyeva panāyaṃ payogo ‘ajjakattikā,ti. Ajjetyadhikaraṇappadhāno
anya-e0806n0:906_4: ahorattakālavācī saddo, kattikāsaddopi taddhitalopena takkālābhidhāyako, tato yevaubhinnampisāmānādhikaraṇyā
anya-e0806n0:906_5: kattikāyopyadhikaraṇaṃ sampajjante, tañca na vinādheyyena hotītyādheyyantarāpekkhāyaṃ
anya-e0806n0:906_6: tesu sattamīyeva siyā, na paṭhamā (upa) pajjeyyātyadhippāyo. Attanodāni dassane sattamiyā
anya-e0806n0:906_8: sattamiyā appasaṅgamāha. Evañcarahi vacanamantarena paresaṃ viya sattamīvidhāyakaṃ
anya-e0806n0:906_9: kathaṃ kattikāya jātoccāsaṅkiya tampaṭipādetumāha- ‘kattikāya jāto’ccādi. Bahuvacanantattepi
anya-e0806n0:906_10: kattikāya jātiyameka vacanantaṃ. Pakārantaramāha- ‘lopoti’ccādi. Lopenāti kattikāhi
anya-e0806n0:906_11: induyuttāhi lakkhito kāloti viggayha kataṇappaccayassa lopena.
anya-e0806n0:908_0: Seti paṭhamantāti sāti niddiṭṭhapaṭhamantā, yaṃ paṭhamantanti sāceti dassitaṃ paṭhamantamāha.
anya-e0806n0:908_1: Paṭhamantassa devatāpuṇṇamāsittabhāvato tadatthamabhedenāha- ‘sā’ti. Kā sā devatāccāha-
anya-e0806n0:908_2: ‘lokappasiddhāyeva devatā’ti. Yāgasampadānampi loke devatāti pasiddhanti yāgassa
anya-e0806n0:908_3: yajitabbassa puroḍāsādino sampadānampi paṭiggāhako pindādi loke deyyassa puroḍāsādino
anya-e0806n0:908_4: devatā sāmīti pasiddhantyattho, indo devatā assa indaṃ, ādicco devatā assa ādiccaṃ,
anya-e0806n0:909_0: Mantathomanīyampi devatāti pasiddhanti yena manthena yo thūyate so tassa mantassa
anya-e0806n0:909_1: devatā sāmīti loke pasiddhantyattho mahindo yamo varuṇo devatā assāti viggaho. Vuttanaya
anya-e0806n0:909_2: mevāti “nakkhatteninduyuttena kāle”ti sutte vuttanayameva. Jātyekavacanaṃ maghāyāti,
anya-e0806n0:909_3: tārakarūpānampana bahuttā maghāsaddo bahuvacananto. Pāṇinīyā “sāsmiṃ puṇṇamāsīti
anya-e0806n0:909_4: saññāya”nti (4-2-21) suttayitvā phussī puṇṇamāsī asmiṃ phusso māso phusso addhamāso
anya-e0806n0:909_5: phusso saṃvaccharoti saññāyaṃ paṭipādenti, tena tesaṃ phussī puṇṇamāsī asmiṃ pañcadasaratteti
anya-e0806n0:909_6: ettha ca bhatakamāse ca taddhito na bhavati. Idha pana ‘saññāya’nti vacanābhāve bhatakamāsepi
anya-e0806n0:909_7: chaṭṭhyatthe bhavatītyāsaṅka viracayati ‘bhatakamāsepi’ccādi. Puṇṇo mā iccatra māsaddo
anya-e0806n0:909_8: candapariyāyoti āha- ‘māsaddene’ccādi. Puṇṇo mā assanti nibbacanāti ettha puṇṇamāsīsaddassa
anya-e0806n0:909_9: puṇṇo mā assanti nīharitvā vacanāti attho. Vuttiyā atthassa phuṭīkaraṇāya vuttaṃ-
anya-e0806n0:909_10: ‘so puṇṇo tiādi. Tassanti puṇṇamāsiyaṃ. Sāpuṇṇamāsī, bhatakassa bhatiyā kammakārakassa
anya-e0806n0:909_11: yo tiṃsati ratto māso paribbayaniyamito, tassa sambandhinī neti sambandho.
anya-e0806n0:910_0: Yassañcatithīyanti aniyamena paṭipadādimāha. Atoeva ca nipātanāti imasmāva nipātanā,
anya-e0806n0:910_1: tenevāha- ‘sutte vacanameva nipātana’nti. Māsasutiyāccādo sādhippāyamatthaṃ vivarati
anya-e0806n0:910_2: ‘yadipi’ccādinā. Assāti sāmaññavacanepi ‘sāssa devatā puṇṇamāsī’ti sutte assāti avisesavacanepi
anya-e0806n0:910_3: soyeva puṇṇamāsīsadde sūyamāno māsoyeva chaṭṭhyattho viññāyatīti sambandho.
anya-e0806n0:911_0: Pañcadasarattādoti paresaṃ saññāgahaṇena nivattitapañcadasarattādo. Atha addhamāsasaṃvaccharānampi
anya-e0806n0:911_1: udāharaṇatte nopaññāso kasmā na katoccāha- ‘addhamāsasaṃvaccharāna’miccādi. Evammaññate
anya-e0806n0:911_3: saṃvacchare phussena māsena sambandhā phussotyupacārīyate, yathā ca phussādimāsassa
anya-e0806n0:911_4: sambandhī addhamāso phusso addhamāsotyupacārīyate, na panojukanti tesamudāharaṇatte nānupādāna”nti.
anya-e0806n0:913_0: Nākaḍḍhanatthoti ṇassākaḍḍhanattho na hoti. Yadyākaḍḍhanattho assa, tadā cānukaḍḍhitaṃ
anya-e0806n0:913_1: nottaratrānukaḍḍheyyāti maññate, kociyeva hotīti hontīti ito bhinditvā ānetabbaṃ.
anya-e0806n0:913_2: Tadā desassāti iminā “tadādesā taggahaṇena gayhantī”ti paribhāsamupalakkheti. Katayādesassāpīti
anya-e0806n0:913_3: kato yādeso yassa tassa katayādesassāpīti. Ikārassāti yādesato pubbe ikārassa, iminā
anya-e0806n0:913_4: cādesādesīnamabhedo dassito. Tasadde nekenāpi paccekābhisambandhe siddheti evamaññate-
anya-e0806n0:913_5: “yathā’tena kataṃkīta’ (4-29) ntyādisutte ekova tasaddo bahūhi paccayattehi sambajjhate,
anya-e0806n0:913_7: tasmā kimetadatthena dvitaggahaṇene”ti. Dvitaggahaṇe payojanattayaṃ vuttaṃ, tattha
anya-e0806n0:914_0: Tattha-‘yo yamadhīte jānāti cā’ti iminā dvitaggahaṇābhāve paccayatthāvayavassa samuccayappasaṅgamāha.
anya-e0806n0:914_1: Samuccaye sati(yo) yamadhīte jānāti ca, tattheva siyā, yo panādhīte kevalaṃ, na (jānāti)
anya-e0806n0:914_2: tattha na siyāti bodhayituṃ byabhicāramāha‘na paccekāti sambandhene’ti. Yathā “tena
anya-e0806n0:914_3: kathaṃ kīta”miccādo “tena jitaṃ jayati”ccādi paccekasambandhena bhavati evammāviññāyīti
