anya-e0806n0:914_4: yatheccādi kassāttho. ‘Tena kataṃ kīta”miccādīhi avatvā “tena jitaṃ jayati”ccādisuttekadesavacanamatthabyatti
anya-e0806n0:914_5: tathā vutte hotīti vuttaṃ, tena jitamiccādo jayanādikā kiriyāne kadabbasamavāyittena
anya-e0806n0:914_6: pasiddhāti yutto tattha paccekābhisambandho, nevamajjhena vedanā pyekadabbasamavāyittābhiyyotyadhippāyo.
anya-e0806n0:915_0: Idāni dutiyaṃ dasseti ‘jānana’miccādi, nimitta miṭṭhāniṭṭhabodhakāraṇaṃ muhutto kattikādi,
anya-e0806n0:915_2: Jānanasāmaññeti nimittādīnaṃ jānana sāmaññe. ‘Yathāvuttajānanassa ajjhena visayatte
anya-e0806n0:915_3: hetumāha- ‘taṃ jānātīti tasaddena adhīyamānaparāmasato’ti. Tatiyaṃ dasseti ‘yato
anya-e0806n0:915_4: ce’ccādinā. Yato ca uppannena vidhinā ajjhena ñātu abhidhānampasiddhanti sambandho,
anya-e0806n0:915_5: potthakesu pana ajjhetuñātūsuti pāṭho dissati, etthāyamadhippāyo “katthaci pasiddhivisayo
anya-e0806n0:915_6: hoti tasaddo, tathā ca vuttaṃ subodhālaṅkāraṭīkāyaṃ pakkantavisayo tathā pasiddhavisayo
anya-e0806n0:915_7: anubhūtavisayo ca taṃsaddo yaṃ saddaṃ nā pekkhate’ti, tasmā pasiddhivisayena tasaddena
anya-e0806n0:915_8: puthageva pasiddhiyā upasaṅgahatthaṃ dvitaggahaṇaṃ kattabba”nti. Atthattaye vattamānassa
anya-e0806n0:915_9: tu tasaddassa savisayo viseso tatovātthikehi veditabbo.
anya-e0806n0:917_0: Visayasaddo gāmasamudāyepi vattate, gāmasamudāyo ca nāma desoyeva, tenāha visayopi
anya-e0806n0:917_1: gāmasamudāyattā desoyevā’ti, iminā visayadesasaddānaṃ samānādhikaraṇattamāha. Vasāti
anya-e0806n0:919_0: Tannāmeccādinā na kevalaṃ nivāseyeva, athakho vakkhamānesu pīti dasseti. Paccayantaṃ
anya-e0806n0:919_1: sebbādi. Desanāmambhavati catūsu atthesūti viññāyati, tenāha-‘nivāsādo vidhī’ti.
anya-e0806n0:919_2: Nivāsādoti nivāsa adūrabhavanibbattaatthiatthesu. Saṃhitanāmaṃ nāma lokiyasaddavo
anya-e0806n0:925_0: Paccayantanāmeti paccayantanāmaṃ yassa sattamyatthabhūtassa desassa hasminti attho,
anya-e0806n0:925_1: nāññasseti bhūmādivisiṭṭhatthayuttato aññassa paccayantanāmaṃ na hotīti attho. Badarā
anya-e0806n0:931: Majjhe bhavo majjhimo, ante bhavo antimo iccādi.
anya-e0806n0:933_0: Magadhesu araññe gaṅgāyaṃ pabbate vane kule bārāṇasiyaṃ campāyaṃ mithilāyaṃ sambhavoti
anya-e0806n0:933_1: viggaho. “Dissantaññepi paccayā”ti (4-120) eyyakoti seso. Paccayantaradassane sati
anya-e0806n0:933_2: imināva suttena ito aññatrāpi paccayantarāni hontīti seso, gāme bhavo udare bhavo
anya-e0806n0:937_1: vādanādikassa abhyāso, so pubbo yassāti samāso, vīṇādisaddehi kimuccateccāha- ‘vīṇādi’ccādi,
anya-e0806n0:937_2: dabbaṃ taṃtaṃsamudāyarūpaṃ. Sippañcāti vatvā tadatthaṃ vibhāveti ‘kiriyā viseso’ti.
anya-e0806n0:937_3: Vādanādikiriyāya visiṭṭho jānanakiriyāvisesoti attho, iminā vīṇādisaddā dabbatthavuttino
anya-e0806n0:937_4: vādanādikiriyaṃ kiriyā visesañca sippamupacārena vadantīti dīpeti. Itisaddo hetumhi.
anya-e0806n0:937_5: Sāyeveti abhyāsitabbā jānanakiriyāvisesassa pubbabhūtā vādanakiriyā, visesetuṃ yuttā
anya-e0806n0:938_0: Yuttatā cettha… vīṇādivādanavasena sippassa gahetabbabhāvato, kathaṃ vīṇādisaddehi
anya-e0806n0:938_1: dabbavuttīti vādanā vuccatīti āha- ‘vīṇādi visayattā’ti, vādanavuttivīṇādisaddānaṃ
anya-e0806n0:938_3: yatheti sambandho. Vuttameva phuṭayanto vuttiganthassa mukhaṃ vivarīyati ‘kiriye’ccādinā.
anya-e0806n0:938_4: Kiriyātyāsapubbakaṃ ñāṇakkhamaṃ kosallaṃ vādanakiriyā visayattā vīṇāvādanamiccanena
anya-e0806n0:938_5: kiriyāsaddena vuccatītyattho. Mudaṅgaṃ mudaṅgavādanaṃ sippamassa, vaṃso sippamassāti
anya-e0806n0:939_0: Appicchatāyāti paccayappicchatāya. Santuṭṭhitāyāti catūsu paccayesu dvādasavidhasantuṭṭhiyā.
anya-e0806n0:939_1: Anuvidhīyamānaṃ karīyamānaṃ. Phalanirapekkhanti iminā idha loke cīvarādihetu paṇidhāya
anya-e0806n0:939_2: paṃsukūla dhāraṇādiṃ paṭikkhipati, sīlaṃ tapparabhāvena sevanā. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti
anya-e0806n0:939_5: viggaho tesaṃ guḷo paṇyamassāti viggaho tomaraṃ, muggaro paharaṇamassāti viggaho,
anya-e0806n0:939_6: upadhīyatyupariādhīyatīti rathaṅgaṃ vuccati. Kāmakkhandhakilesābhisaṅkhārā vā upadhi
anya-e0806n0:941: Bahumhi bhūtānagatesupi paccayabhāve kāraṇamāha-‘saṅkhyākālānamavivacchitattā’ti, sutte vuttāya ekasaṅkhyāya vuttamānakā lasseva ca vattumanicchitattāti attho.
anya-e0806n0:942_0: Tadupādānantūti tesamekavacanādīnamupādānantu. Taṃ nānantarīya kattāti upalakkhaṇavasena
anya-e0806n0:942_2: kathaṃ ṇādīnaṃ tadatthe jāyamānānaṃ sādhanappadhānatta miccatra hetumāha ‘sabhāvato’ti.
anya-e0806n0:942_3: Mīne hantīti meniko. Ajivhā animisā ca macchā, diṭṭhova sandiṭṭhanti iminā saṃsaddassa
anya-e0806n0:942_4: visuṃ atthabhāvaṃ dasseti. Lokuttaradhammoti navavidho lokuttaradhammo, phaladhammopi
anya-e0806n0:942_6: pariyāyato dissamānova vaṭṭabhayaṃ nivatteti, bhāvanābhisamayavasena maggadhammo
anya-e0806n0:943_0: Vaṭṭabhayanti kammakilesavipākasaṅkhātaṃ tividhavaṭṭabhayaṃ. Vidhāna vacananti appatte-tthe
anya-e0806n0:943_1: niyogasaṅkhātavidhino pakāsataṃ ehipassa vacanaṃ. Parisuddhattāti kilesamalavirahena
anya-e0806n0:943_2: sabbathā visuddhattā. Amanuññampi kadāci sappayojanaṃ yathāsabhāvappakāsanena dassetabbaṃ
anya-e0806n0:943_3: bhaveyyāti tadabhāvaṃ dasseti. Tenāha ‘vijjamānampi ce’ccādi. Nanu ca ehipassāti
anya-e0806n0:943_4: tyādyantā, tasmā neteti paccayo pappoti, tathāhi pāṭipadikato paccayavidhānampaṭipāditaṃ,
anya-e0806n0:943_5: na tyādyantato nāpi vākyato, tasmā kathamehipassikoti hotīti āha-‘ehipassasaddocāya’miccādi.
anya-e0806n0:943_6: Padasamudāyassānukaraṇoti padasamūhassa anukaraṇabhūto eko ehipassasaddo. Athavā
anya-e0806n0:943_7: ehi āgaccha imaṃ dhammaṃ passāti yo appatte-tthe niyogasaṅkhāto vidhi, tabbācako
anya-e0806n0:943_8: yannipāto ehipassāti, ehipassavidhiṃ arahatīti ehipassiko, athavā ehicceva nipāto,
anya-e0806n0:943_9: dassanaṃ ñāpanaṃ passo, ehīti passo ñāpanaṃ ehipasso, ehipassaṃ arahatīti ehipassiko.
anya-e0806n0:945_0: Ekībhāvoti muggehi saṃsaṭṭhānaṃ māsānamiva missībhāvo. Esoti saṃsaggo, ukkaṃsenāti
anya-e0806n0:945_1: ukkaṃsādhānena utkaṃsasādhanena (potthake) ca bhavitabbanti sambandho. Saṃsaggaukkaṃsānaṃ
anya-e0806n0:945_3: yattha saṃsaggarahitaṃ kevalamabhisaṅkhattamatthi, tattha paccayamudāharaṇena dassetvā
anya-e0806n0:945_4: vijjāya saha saṃsaggassāvijjamānatte kāraṇaṃ vadati ‘rūpī dhammattā’tiādi. Rūpaṃ
anya-e0806n0:945_5: bhūtopādāyabhedamassa atthīti rūpī, ghatādi saṃsaṭṭhaṃ bhattādi. Tassa dhammo sabhāvo
anya-e0806n0:945_6: saṃsaggo, tassa bhāvo tattaṃ, tasmā, tassāti saṃsaggassa, vijjātvarūpī… yathāvutta
anya-e0806n0:945_7: rūpasabhāvābhāvā, tenāha- ‘vijjāya ca arūpittā’ti caraiccandhātuyeva carati.
anya-e0806n0:946_0: Vācasikaṃ mānasikanti “manādīnaṃ saka, yaṃkiñcīti satādikaṃ yaṃkiñci. Bāhulakenevetthāvadhāraṇaṃ
anya-e0806n0:946_1: labbhatīti vuttaṃ- ‘tato vā’ti, devadattena kītoti so attho tadattho, tassa appatīti
anya-e0806n0:946_2: abhidhānasattivekallena vuttiyamanavagamo, devadattikoti hi vutte devadattena kītotyayamattho
anya-e0806n0:946_3: nappatīyate… tādisa saddasattivekallena tadatthassānamidhīyamānattā, avagamo ca nāma
anya-e0806n0:946_4: sati sāmatthiye siyāti imamatthaṃ saṅkhepato dassetumāha- ‘tadatthāppatītiyā’tiādi.
anya-e0806n0:947_0: Abhidhānalakkhaṇattanti abhidhānaṃ sati sāmatthiye vākye vacanīyassātthassa vuttiyā
anya-e0806n0:947_1: kathanaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ sabhāvo yesante abhidhānalakkhaṇā, tesaṃ bhāvo tattaṃ, tabbādisamāpyevameva
anya-e0806n0:947_2: daṭṭhabbā. Maricena abhisaṅkhataṃ saṃsaṭṭhaṃ vāti, salākāya jitanti viggaho.
anya-e0806n0:951: Pavuttepīti kaccāyanena pavuttanti atthe “aññasmiṃ”tismiṃṇo hotevāti adhippāyo.
anya-e0806n0:955: Mātāpitunnaṃ mātāpitaroti mātuyā mātāpitaro pitussa mātāpitaro, na ekamekato dvīsūti ekato ekato vuttanayena dvīsudvīsu atthesu na bhavatīti attho.
anya-e0806n0:959_0: Sena rūpena ñātepi visesarūpena aññāto aññātaviseso. Kaṭṭhādimayā yā paṭimā tampaṭicchandakaṃ.
anya-e0806n0:959_1: Sambandho sassāmīlakkhaṇo assa atthīti sambandhi kassāti kiṃ saddaniddiṭṭho, sova
anya-e0806n0:959_2: viseso, sambandhiviseso visayo assa aññāṇassāti samāso. Payogāsambhavāti ayamassoti
anya-e0806n0:959_3: vutta assappakatiyāpi payogā sambhavā. Tathāhi yadi yassāccantamajānanaṃ siyā tathā
anya-e0806n0:959_4: sati sabbathā vatthujānanābhāve pakatiyeva na siyā, na hi sabbathā aviññātattho saddo
anya-e0806n0:959_5: payogamaharati, tasmā sarūpena ñātassa yassa viseso aviññāto, soyevidha aññāto-timatoti
anya-e0806n0:959_6: viññāyate, aññāto-ssokassa aññāto sesaññassa (potthake) vā kutotivā kiṃ sabhāvo veti
anya-e0806n0:959_7: hi assakoti. Kappaccayanto hatthikaiccayannāmadheyyaṃ nāmaṃ yassa hatthiviyāti dassitapaṭibhāgassa
anya-e0806n0:959_8: so kappaccayantanāmadheyyo. Abhinivesena vā sijjhanti yathā ajjunādivesadhārini ajjunādisaddenāti adhippāyo.
anya-e0806n0:960_0: Paṭimāyāti ettha pūjanatthā eva paṭimā gahitā, morasamāna nāmattā moroviyāti yojanā,
anya-e0806n0:960_1: cañcā tiṇapuriso, idha pana taṃ sadiso puriso manusso cañcā. Akasmā eva ākasmikaṃ
anya-e0806n0:960_2: “sakatthe”ti (4-122) ṇiko. Yaṃkiñci abuddhipubbakaṃ, tamākasmikaṃ, tasmiṃ ākasmikebhidheyyo
anya-e0806n0:960_3: sati ivasaddatthe vattamānato īyo hotīti attho. Kāko ca tālañca phalaṃ kākatālāni,
anya-e0806n0:960_4: tesamiva milanaṃ. Ajākhaggānamiva milanaṃ yadākasmikaṃ, kiñci tama jākhaggīyaṃ, ṇo
anya-e0806n0:960_5: ivatthe. Sakkaranti “saṃyoge kvacī”ti (4-125) vuddhyabhāvo. Munīva, bālova, kulisamiva,
anya-e0806n0:962_0: Doṇādītyādisaddena khārasatādayopi parimāṇavisesā gayhanti. Saṅkhyā asītipañcādayo,
anya-e0806n0:962_1: aññaṃ vā yaṃkiñcīti upaḍḍhakāyādi, soḷasa doṇā ekā khārī. Nanu pañcakaṃ ganthajātanti
anya-e0806n0:962_2: vatvā aññaṃ vā saṅghādikanti vuttaṃ taṃ kathaṃ pāṇiniyehi viya “saṅkhyāya saññāsaṅghasuttājjhayanesū”ti
anya-e0806n0:962_4: vattantī”ti pañcasaddassa saṅkhyeye vuttattā āha- ‘pañcāvayavā’ti. Parimāṇasaddasannidhāne
anya-e0806n0:962_5: saṅkhyānepi pañcasaddoti maññamāno āha- ‘pañcasaṅkhyānañce’ti. Pañcā vuttayoti pañcavārā,
anya-e0806n0:962_6: rūpānīti ca pariyāyantarena āvuttisaddasse vātthaṃ byattaṃ karoti.
anya-e0806n0:964_0: Nanu sutte saṅkhyāyanti na vuttaṃ katyādayo ca payogā saṅkhyā parimāṇeyeva dissanti
anya-e0806n0:964_1: kathaṃ nāmetthāyaṃ vidhīti āha- ‘bahule’ccādi. Saṅkhyāparimāṇeyevāyaṃ vidhīti kiṃ
anya-e0806n0:964_2: sadde saṅkhyāparimāṇa visayeyeva vattamāne ayaṃ ratyādiko vidhīti attho, nanu cettha
anya-e0806n0:964_3: kiṃ saddo pañhe vattamāno kathaṃ saṅkhyāparimāṇe vattateti vuccate, yajjapi saṅkhyāparimāṇe
anya-e0806n0:964_4: na vattate, tathāpi saṅkhyāparimāṇassa pucchiyamānattā saṅkhyāparimāṇavisaye vattate
anya-e0806n0:964_6: parimāṇakattena. Ayametthādhippāyo “yadākimidaṃ saṅkhyā parimāṇamesaṃ dasannaṃ na
anya-e0806n0:964_7: kiñci appakamevetanti saṅkhyāparimāṇameva kiṃ saddena nindīyate, tadāpi saṅkhyā parimāṇassa
anya-e0806n0:964_8: nindīyamānattā saṅkhyāparimāṇavisayattameveti khepe vattamānāpi kiṃ saddā raticcādi
anya-e0806n0:964_9: siyā, bahulādhikārāditova panettha na siyā”ti. Rakārānubandhā isaddalopatthāti yojanā.
anya-e0806n0:966_1: cā”ti (5-59) kattari kte ñimhi ca bubhukkhito pipāsitoti siddhepi vattamāne payogatthaṃ
anya-e0806n0:968: Sabbamparicchedarūpanti ummānaparimāṇādikaṃ sabbaṃ paricchedarūpaṃ. Tatra ca uccattena mānamummānaṃ, sabbato mānaṃ parimāṇaṃ.
anya-e0806n0:970_1: tattha pamāṇa māyāmo. Saṅkhyāyāti pañcamī. Etehi saṃsaye matto vattabboti attho.
anya-e0806n0:971_0: Na vattabbanti yathāvuttavattabbavacanaṃ paṭikkhipati. Paṭikkhitte tasmiṃ vidatthimattaṃ
anya-e0806n0:971_1: ratanamattaṃ vātiādi(nā) yaṃkiñci daṇḍapubbaṇṇādikaṃ paṇṇādikaṃ (potthake) saṃsayitaṃ,
anya-e0806n0:971_2: tena mānasaṅkhātassa paricchedassābhāvā kathamete payogā siyunti āsaṅkiya tattha
anya-e0806n0:971_4: ratanammāna massātyādinā tenappakārena abhyūhanato abhyupagamatoti attho. Saṃsayo
anya-e0806n0:971_5: ca nāma ubhayapakkhaparāmasane sati siyāti yathāvuttamabbhūhanaṃ sādhetumāha-nāntarene’ccādi.
anya-e0806n0:971_6: Pakkhadvayehīti vidatthi mānamassa ratanammānamassāti evamādikehi pakkhadvayehi.
anya-e0806n0:971_7: Abhyūhanaṃ saṃsayassāti gamyate. Jaṇṇu mānamassa jaṇṇutagghaṃ.
anya-e0806n0:977_0: Saccutīsāsadasantāya saṅkhyāya paṭhamantāya asmiṃ satasahasse adhikā saṅkhyāti atthe
anya-e0806n0:977_1: ḍo bhavatīti suttattho. Saccutīsā sadasantāti paṭhamāvacanaṃ paṭhamantato vidhiñāpanatthaṃ.
anya-e0806n0:977_2: Nanu ca sutte ‘satasahassa satasahasse ḍo’ti na vuttaṃ, tathā sati vuttiyaṃ kathaṃ
anya-e0806n0:977_4: sataṃ sahassanti ca satasahassanti ca ubhayappakārenāvagamā, ubhayathāvagamo payoga
anya-e0806n0:977_5: dassanañcettha evaṃ vivaraṇe kāraṇanti adhippāyo. Paccayatthena samānajātiye pakatyatthe
anya-e0806n0:977_6: satīti yenakenaci suvaṇṇakahāpaṇādinā paccayatthena samānajātiye. Suvaṇṇamāsakadīna
anya-e0806n0:977_7: suvaṇṇakahāpaṇādīnaṃ (potthake) masamāna jātiyānaṃ. Akevalaṃ codāharaṇaṃ dassetuṃ
anya-e0806n0:979_0: Nanu ca saṅkhyāsaddo saṅkhyāne saṅkhyeyye ca vattate, kathamettha saṅkhyānevasitā
anya-e0806n0:979_1: vutti yenevaṃ vivaraṇaṃ katamiccāha- ‘yadipi’ccādi, paccāsannaṃ saṅkhyāsaddassāti
anya-e0806n0:979_2: adhippāyo. Iminā ca karaṇasādhano-yaṃ pūraṇasaddoti viññāpeti. Yatoti vuttayaṃ saddasambandhinā
anya-e0806n0:979_3: taṃsaddena seti ulliṅgitassa saṅkhyātiatthamupadassiya sāyeva pūrīyatetīmassa kammabhāvena
anya-e0806n0:979_4: tiṭṭhatīti dassetuṃ tena pūraṇena pūrīyate’ti āha.
anya-e0806n0:980_1: dabbānaṃ dabbantare nātirittīkaraṇaṃ saṅkhyāya pūraṇaṃ kiñcarahi tassa samappattiyevā”ti.
anya-e0806n0:980_2: Atha kāyaṃ vacoyutti ‘sāsaṅkhyā pūrīyate yene’ti, yāvatā sāti yasmā paccayo vihito
anya-e0806n0:980_3: tassa saṅkhyāsaddassa parāmāso tassa ca pūraṇena abhedoccāsaṅkiyāha- ‘abhedenoccate
anya-e0806n0:980_4: saṅkhyā pūrīyate yenetī’ti abhidhānābhidheyyānamabhedopacārena vuccatītyattho, saṅkhyeyyapūraṇe
anya-e0806n0:980_5: ḍo na hotīti vatvā tadatthaṃ vibhāvetumāha- ‘dvādasanna’miccādi. So ghaṭo tāsaṃ ghaṭikānaṃ
anya-e0806n0:980_6: pūraṇo dabbānaṃ dabbantare nāti rittīkaraṇavasena. Vīsatiyā pūraṇotiādinā viggaho.
anya-e0806n0:982_0: Kaccāyanena “dvitīhi tiyo”ti (2-8-42) suttena dvitisaddehi tiyappaccayaṃ vidhāya
anya-e0806n0:982_1: “tiye dutāpi cā”ti (2-8-43) dvitīnaṃ dutādesena dutiyaṃ tatiyanti ca “catuchehi thaṭhā”ti
anya-e0806n0:982_2: (2-8-41) suttena catuto thappaccayaṃ vidhāya dvittena catutthanti ca nipphāditaṃ.
anya-e0806n0:982_3: Idha tathā bhāvena kathaṃ te sijjhantīti āsaṅkiya vuttiyaṃ ‘katha’miccādi vuttanti
anya-e0806n0:984_0: Saṅkhyāvacanassa gahaṇe ko dosoccāha-‘saṅkhyāvāci’ccādi. Bahuttavisaye payogo na
anya-e0806n0:984_1: siyāti saṅkhyāvacanassa ekatthe niyatattā vuttaṃ. Ekākīhiccassa atthamācikkhati padhānabhūteheva’ccādinā.
anya-e0806n0:986_0: Taro hotīti vuttepi tehi taro hotīti viññāyati, vacchādīhīti sutattā pana vacchādīnanti
anya-e0806n0:986_1: ca viññāyatīti vacchādīnantiādinā vuttiganthopadassanaṃ. Nanu tanutte vavacchādīhi
anya-e0806n0:986_2: paccayo vidhīyate, ye ca sarīrena kisāvacchādayo, tatrāpyavisesena payogo pasajjati
anya-e0806n0:986_3: payopasajjane (potthake) visesānupādānato, tasmā kathamatra sabhāvasseva tanuttaṃ
anya-e0806n0:986_4: viññāyate yenevaṃ vivaṭamiccāha- ‘vacchādisaddāna’ micca-di, vacchādīhi pakatīti
anya-e0806n0:986_5: paccaye vidhīyamāne tāsaṃ pavattinimittaṃ vayovisesādi, yasmiṃ sati vacchādayo saddā
anya-e0806n0:986_6: dabbe-bhinivisante, taṃ paccayā-sannaṃ, na ca kisattassa bhāvā dabbe vacchādisaddā
anya-e0806n0:986_7: pavattante. Ato tasseva saddappavattinimittassa tanutte yuttaṃ paccayena bhavituṃ,
anya-e0806n0:986_8: (na) tanuttamatteti maññate. Pavattinimittaṃ sambandhi āsannanti samānādhikaraṇāni.
anya-e0806n0:987_0: Vaccho paṭhamavayo, tassa tanuttaṃ dutiyavayappatti. Dutiyañhi vayaṃ pappontassa
anya-e0806n0:987_1: vacchassa paṭhamo vayo vacchasaddassa pavattinimittaṃ kiñcimattāvasesaṃ bhavati amumevāha-‘susuttasse’ccādinā.
anya-e0806n0:987_2: Ukkhotaruṇodutiyavayappatto vuccate, tassa tanuttaṃ tatiyavayappatti. Tatiyañhi vayappattakāle
anya-e0806n0:987_3: dutiyassa vayassa ukkhasaddappavatti nimittassa kiñcimattā vasesato vasissate (potthake)
anya-e0806n0:987_4: jātisaṅkarattā gaddabhajātiyā vaḷavājātiyā ca missattā. Bhāravāhakattampati yo samattho,
anya-e0806n0:987_5: so usabhotyuccate, yadātu tassa bhāravāhakatte sāmatthiyaṃ mandaṃ bhavati parikkhīṇaṃ,
anya-e0806n0:989_0: Samudāyo nāma dvyavayavo vā siyā bahukāvayavo vā, tattha dvyavayavasamudāyā niddhāraṇe
anya-e0806n0:989_1: sāmatthiyā ekasseva niddhāraṇaṃ viññāyati tamevānusarati. Bahukāvayavasamudāyāpye
anya-e0806n0:989_2: ‘kassa niddhāraṇe’ti sutte ekassāti vacanābhāvepi ekasseva niddhāraṇaṃ viññātabbaṃ
anya-e0806n0:989_3: teneva kataro bhavataṃ devadatto’tyādikamudāharaṇamadāsi. Kataro bhavataṃ devadatto
anya-e0806n0:989_5: bahuttena vuttaṃ. Apaccaparaṃparāya pavattaṃ gottaṃ vaṃso, tadabhi dhāyino apaccappaccayantāpi
anya-e0806n0:989_6: abhedopacārena gottaṃ, tevāpaccā paccavantasambandhadvārenāpacce pavattāti sambandhisaddā
anya-e0806n0:989_7: bhavanti, caraṇasaddā ca kaṭhā yo kiriyāsaddā bhavanti kaṭhādīhi vuttajjhayanatthaṃ
anya-e0806n0:989_9: kesañci atthassa kiriyāsaddānaṃ cātthassa asatyapi jātitte jātinibandhanaṃ loke kāriyamiṭṭhaṃ
anya-e0806n0:989_10: taduttaṃ “gottañca cara- ṇehi sahā”ti. Tatthāpi jātittamparibhāsitaṃ, tenāha- ‘kaṭhassa
anya-e0806n0:991_0: Lokiyāti parasaddasatthakāre sandhāyāha. Iha tu avisesena vuttanti sambandho. Niruttiyaṃ
anya-e0806n0:991_1: sāmaññena vuttattāti yojanā. Sāmaññena vuttākāraṃ dassetuṃ ‘katha’ntiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0806n0:991_2: Devehi datto brahmunā dattotiādīni kattari karaṇe vā viggahavākyāni. Devadatto devadattiko
anya-e0806n0:992_1: devalo deviyotiādīnampana vacanantareneva nipphattiṃ dassetuṃ ‘devehi datto’tiādi
anya-e0806n0:992_2: vuttaṃ. Parasaddasatthakārānampi devalo deviyoti vacanantareneva sādhanaṃ sādhanākārañca
anya-e0806n0:992_3: tesaṃ dassetuṃ ‘kecīhī’tiādi vuttaṃ. Ekadesatoyeva paccayamicchanti tena tesaṃ devalo
anya-e0806n0:992_4: deviyo datti loccādi bhavati. Kappanāgāravoti dattasaddalopanāmekadesavasena kappanāgāravo.
anya-e0806n0:994_0: Na ca sabbetiādinā bahulādhikāre phalaṃ vuttaṃ. Bhāvasaddo katthaci kiriyāyaṃ vattate
anya-e0806n0:994_1: ‘bhāve ayaṃ vidhī’ti. Katthaci adhippāye ‘ayametesaṃ bhāvo bhāvodhippāyo’ti. Katthaci
anya-e0806n0:994_2: padatthe ‘ime bhāvā’ti. Katthaci sattāmatte‘tiṇānaṃ bhāvo’ti. Tenāha-‘bhāvasaddasse’ccādi.
anya-e0806n0:994_3: Rūpasādhana dvārenāti bhāvasaddassa rūpasādhanadvārena, sappanti pakāsenti attha
anya-e0806n0:994_4: manenāti saddo. Sova abhidhānaṃ abhidhīyate-nenatthoti katvā. Bujjhati atthasarūpanti
anya-e0806n0:994_5: buddhi, sāva patīyate-nenāttho pacceti attha miti vā paccayoti vuccati.
anya-e0806n0:995_0: Nanu ca ‘bhavanti etasmā buddhisaddā’ti vuttaṃ tasmā pavattinimittamubhinnampi bhavati,
anya-e0806n0:995_1: tathāsati ‘saddappavattinimitta’nti saddasseva pavattinimittatā kasmā vuttāti vuccate.
anya-e0806n0:995_2: Pākaṭabhāvena abhidhānābhidheyyasambandhassa saddasseva pavattinimittataṃ vatvā visuṃ
anya-e0806n0:995_3: buddhiyā nimittassa rūpānugatattaṃ visesetvā pavattinimittatamassā dīpetuṃ ‘nimittavasāhi’ccādimāha.
anya-e0806n0:995_4: Dabbeguṇoti dabbe vuttiyaṃ guṇo nimittanti sambandho. Guṇasaddasseva jātisaddattenodāharaṇadvayaṃ
anya-e0806n0:995_5: dattaṃ… guṇassa jātiyā visuṃ jātinimittassābhāvato nidhittassa bhāvato. Kiriyādītiādisaddena
anya-e0806n0:995_6: dabbādīnaṃ gahaṇaṃ, keci pana kiriyāsaddānaṃ kiriyā pavattinimittantyāhu. Tesaṃ devadattādīnaṃ
anya-e0806n0:995_7: avatthāvisesena avatthābhedena sāmaññaṃ tadavatthā visesasāmaññaṃ. Tenāha- ‘devadattassā’tiādi.
anya-e0806n0:995_8: Vijjamāno padattho visayo yesaṃ devadattādīnaṃ saññāsaddānaṃ tesaṃ pavattinimittaṃ
anya-e0806n0:996_0: Anena ca devadattādayo saññāsaddāpi samānā jātisaddāti vuttaṃ hoti. Yadi carahi saññāsaddāpi
anya-e0806n0:996_1: jātivacanā siyuṃ, pañcavidhattamesaṃ parihāyatīti. Nedamevaṃ viññeyyaṃ… pasiddhatarajātyābhidhāna
anya-e0806n0:997_1: sambandhīnaṃ bhedena abhāvassa bhedato abhedepi bhedā upacaritā santīti yojanā. Yassa
anya-e0806n0:997_3: ākāso viya niravayavā abhāvo viya asantā ca, te visayo yesaṃ saddānaṃ tesanti attho.
anya-e0806n0:997_4: Sāmaññaṃ bhāvoti puthujjanādisāmaññaṃ bhāvoti attho. Alasassa bhāvo kiriyāsambandhittaṃ,
anya-e0806n0:997_5: brahmaññaṃ jāti cāpalyaṃ nepuññaṃ guṇo vā. Vuttiyaṃ sakatthekantāti “sakatthe”ti
anya-e0806n0:997_6: (4-122) iminā sakatthe katakappaccayantāti attho. Na daṭṭhabbanti sambandho. Pattakālova
anya-e0806n0:999: “Ekayoganiddiṭṭhānaṃ sahavāpavatti sahavā nivattī”ti ‘bhāva kammesū’ti anuvattate. Tathāpi bhāvetīmināvettha sappayojanattaṃ dassetumāha- ‘bhāvakammesu’ccādi.
anya-e0806n0:1001_0: Yajjapi sīdhātussa kevalassa supane pavatti, tathāpyatipubbassa ukkaṃse pavattīti
anya-e0806n0:1001_1: āha- ‘atisayo ukkaṃso’ti. So ca atisayo kassa sambhavaticcāha- ‘so ca kiriyāguṇāna’nti.
anya-e0806n0:1001_3: Anapekkhito kiriyāguṇānaṃ nissayo dabbasaṅkhāto yesanti viggaho, dabbassa nissayabhūtassā-tisayattaṃ
anya-e0806n0:1001_4: hontampi nissitānaṃ kiriyā guṇānaṃ vaseneva siyā nāññathāti vattumāha-‘paccadhikaraṇa’ntiādi.
anya-e0806n0:1002_0: Nanu ca yadi kiriyāguṇānamevātisayo, tadā na sijjhati ‘gotaro’ti nesa doso, no cettha
anya-e0806n0:1002_1: jātiyātisayo, kassa carahi guṇassa go ayaṃ yo sakaṭaṃ vahati, gotaro-yaṃ yo sakaṭaṃ
anya-e0806n0:1002_2: vahati sirañcāti, jātiyā hi niccāyekarūpāya nokkaṃsāpakaṃsayogo sambhavatīti dabbassāpi
anya-e0806n0:1002_3: nātisayasambhavo. Tathāhi tulyappamāṇassa guṇakatova mūlato ukkaṃso dissati samānepi
anya-e0806n0:1002_4: hi āyāme vitthāre ca paṭassa kāsikassāññovāggho bhavati māthurassāñño vāti. Dabbassāpi
anya-e0806n0:1002_7: vattati nāma, tadagge tabbācikāpi pakati attano vacanīyatthavasena tattha vattatiyeva
anya-e0806n0:1002_8: nāmāti ‘atiyaye vattamānato’ti pakativisesanavasena vuttaṃ, tenevāha- ‘iminā pakati
anya-e0806n0:1002_9: visesanattañcāhā’ti. Sakatthikānaṃ pakatiattho jotanīyo hotīti sambandho.
anya-e0806n0:1003_0: Sakatthikānanti kattari chaṭṭhī sambandhavacanicchāya, sakatthikehīti attho. Hetumāha-
anya-e0806n0:1003_2: tato pakatyatthabhūte-tisaye jātattā sakatthikehi yathāvuttanayena pakatyatthabhūtetisayo
anya-e0806n0:1003_3: jotanīyo hotīti attho. Tattha nābhidheyyoti byatirekamāha, tathā ca vakkhati- ‘atisayajotakātarādayo’ti.
anya-e0806n0:1004_0: Atha pakativisesanatte kasmā nābhidheyyo jotanīyoccāha ‘pakatiyāyeva’ccādi. Ukkaṃso
anya-e0806n0:1004_1: samānaguṇavisayeyeva loke diṭṭho paviṭṭho (potthake) tena sāmaññavacanepi tādithavisayeyeva
anya-e0806n0:1004_2: soyeva kāraṇa vasena hotīti dassetumāha- ‘atisayene’ccādi. Dvinnamekassā-tisayeccādinā
anya-e0806n0:1004_4: Taraiyāti sakavohārena vuttaṃ, tesantu īyappaccayo. Evamihāvidhānaṃ sukhasānettanti sambandho.
anya-e0806n0:1005_1: pāṭaliputtakehi sukumāratarā’ccādo tarappaccayo na hotīti eko māthuro dutiyo pāṭaliputtako
anya-e0806n0:1005_2: imesaṃ sukumārānaṃ dvinnameko māthuro-tisayena sukumāro sukumārataro, ekamaññesaṃ
anya-e0806n0:1005_3: dvinnamukkaṃsetathāññesaṃ dvinnamekassāti evaṃ dvinnaṃdvinnamekekassa ukkaṃse tarappaccayo
anya-e0806n0:1005_5: samudāyānamavayavā māthurā bahavo pāṭaliputtakāpi nikkaṃsiyamānā tathevāvayavā bahavo
anya-e0806n0:1005_6: honti, evaṃ māthurā pāṭali puttakehi sukumāratarā’ti tarappaccayena sijjhati. Imasmiṃ
anya-e0806n0:1005_7: gāme aḍḍhatarā vāṇijjāccādopi kathitena ñāyena dvinnaṃdvinnamekekassa ukkaṃse tarappaccayo
anya-e0806n0:1005_8: bhavati, bahuvacanantu katthaci avayavāpekkhanti sabbaṃ sakkate kicchena sādhenti.
anya-e0806n0:1005_9: Iha tu tathāvidhassa suttassā vidhānā “taratamissikiyiṭṭhātisaye”ti tarādīnamatisaye
anya-e0806n0:1005_10: sāmaññena vidhānā sabbattha tarappaccayena sukhasādhanaṃ hotī”ti.
anya-e0806n0:1006_0: Avatthābhedenāti paṭutarāvatthāvato paṭuavatthāya bhinnattā vuttaṃ, tathāhi tamevāvatthantarayuttaṃ
anya-e0806n0:1006_1: vattāro bhavanti aññe ‘bhavaṃsūavattho’ti. Pakārantarenapi sādhane hetumāha- ‘atisayamatte
anya-e0806n0:1006_3: yathāvuttānaṃ tarādīnaṃ pañcannaṃ majjhe, rūpāni guṇavacanassa vuttiyamudāharitāni.
anya-e0806n0:1006_4: Kiriyāvacanassa tu ‘atisayena pācakataro pācakatamo’ti. Issika iyaiṭṭhā sarādī tato
anya-e0806n0:1008_0: Tassāti sāmaññena vuttepi vikārasambandhīyeva chaṭṭhiyanto gayhati, chaṭṭhiyantasambandhīyeva
anya-e0806n0:1008_1: ca vikāro gayhati sambandhavasāti dassetumāha ‘yassā’ccādi. Kosakārakapāṇavisesehi
anya-e0806n0:1008_2: kato koso. Pāṇayo sattā, osadhyophalapākantā, rukkhā pupphaphalūpagāti rukkhosadhīnaṃ
anya-e0806n0:1008_3: lakkhaṇaṃ vadanti tallakkhaṇenettha rukkho sadhayo na gayhanti, kiñcarahi osadhisaddena
anya-e0806n0:1008_4: latādipi gayhati, rukkhasaddena (vanappa)tayopi, vanappatayo hi phalavantā na pupphavantā.
anya-e0806n0:1008_5: Kathaṃ gāvassa vikāre purise mayoccāha- ‘aññasmi’ntiādi. Gāvassa idaṃ gomayaṃ.
anya-e0806n0:1012_0: Tīsuttaresu ca vattateti sambandho. Rājaññamanussānampi jātiyamapacce ññassappaccayānaṃ
anya-e0806n0:1012_1: vidhānā vuttaṃ ‘gottappaccayantā’ti āha- ‘rājaññānaṃ samūho’ccādi. Ukkho usabho.
anya-e0806n0:1012_2: Oṭṭho kharato, urabbho meso, evamiccādinā ‘ukkhānaṃ samūho’ccādi. Vākyamapadisati.
anya-e0806n0:1012_3: Kākānaṃ samūhoti viggaho, ṇikaacittāti iminā ṇiko acittavāca keheva dissatīti ñāpeti.
anya-e0806n0:1014_1: atthe chaṭṭhiyantato īyappaccayo hotī’ti. Tena madanassa ṭhānaṃ madanīyaṃ bandhanassa
anya-e0806n0:1014_2: ṭhānaṃ bandhanīyaṃtyādikaṃ sādhenti. Idha pana tathāvidhassābhāvā kathaṃ taṃ sijjhatītyāsaṅkiya
anya-e0806n0:1015_1: āyitattappaccayo hotī”ti tena dhūmo viya dissatīti dhūmāyitattaṃ timiramiva dissatīti
anya-e0806n0:1015_2: timirāyitattaṃtyādikaṃ sādhentīti vuttanayameva. Tampihaccādikaṃ dvīsu sādhanakkamadassanaṃ,
anya-e0806n0:1015_3: dhūmo viya dissatīti dassito yo kammattho sopi dhūmāyīti kattuvasena sakkā parikappetunti
anya-e0806n0:1015_4: kattusādhanato dhūmāyitasaddā sakatthettappaccayepi dhūmo viya dissatīti atthe āyitatthappaccayepi
anya-e0806n0:1015_5: nātthabhedo-ññatravacanicchābhedāti daṭṭhabbaṃ, bhāvattho pana tesaṃ bhāvappadhānavasena
anya-e0806n0:1015_6: labbhati, dhūmasseva dassananti viggahe āyitattena vā.
anya-e0806n0:1019: Pavāse dūragamane sādhu pavāsiko, upavāse ratyabhojane sādhu upavāsiko.
anya-e0806n0:1021: Pathe sādhu upākārakaṃ pātheyyaṃ, maggopakaraṇaṃ, sapatimhi dhana patimhi sādhu upakaraṇaṃ sāpateyyaṃ dhanaṃ.
anya-e0806n0:1023: Tumantakiriyāyāti ghātetuṃ (tyādītu) mantakiriyāya. Vā saddo samuccayo, ghātetuṃ vātiādinā yojetabbo.
anya-e0806n0:1025_1: byāpārīyaticcāha-‘ettha assa atthī’ti. Nanu ca yaṃ yassa hoti taṃ tasmimpi hoti (yaṃ
anya-e0806n0:1025_2: yasmiṃ hoti) tassāpi taṃ hoti teneva vuccate- ‘chaṭṭhīsattamīnamaviseso’ti, tatrañña
anya-e0806n0:1025_3: taraniddeseneva siddhe kimatthamiha chaṭṭhīsattamīnaṃ bhedenopādānaṃ karīyatīti vuccate-yatrāvayavāvayavibhāvo,
anya-e0806n0:1026_0: Nanu ca sambhave byabhicāre ca sati visesanaṃ sātthakaṃ bhavati yathā ‘nīlamuppala’nti,
anya-e0806n0:1026_1: nevātthittassātthi byabhicāro, tathā ca vuttaṃ- ‘na sattaṃ padattho byabhicaratī’ti,
anya-e0806n0:1026_3: abyabhicāre pīti sambandho. Kālantarā byabhicāratthamatthītivisesananti dassetumāha- ‘kāle’ccādi.
anya-e0806n0:1027_0: Nanu ca suttesu kālo padhānaṃ na hoti, “tena kataṃ kītaṃ”tyādinā hi paccayattho dassito,
anya-e0806n0:1027_1: tathā hi kāyikaṃvācasikaṃ tyādo na kālasampaccayo, evamihāpi sattāmatte bhavitabbaṃ,
anya-e0806n0:1027_2: atthīti tu vattamānasattāya eva pariggaho kathamavasīyate yena kālavisesanaṃ siyāti.
anya-e0806n0:1027_4: visiṭṭho sattā atthīti visesanattenopāttā, na sattāmattanti patīyate, sā pana visiṭṭhā
anya-e0806n0:1027_5: sattā sampatisattā, atthi ca tassā byabhicāro sāmaññasattāyāti yujjateva visesanavisessabhāvoti
anya-e0806n0:1028_0: Na bhuñjaticcādiviyāti yathā na bhuñjatīti nañssa paṭisedhattā viruddhatthapadassa
anya-e0806n0:1028_2: bhavati, tamivākyattho. Adhippāyattha māha- ‘atthivacanicchāya yo visayo tassa niyamo’ti.
anya-e0806n0:1028_3: Kati payasambhave na pana gomā rukkhavāti yojanā, tehīti pasaṃsāpahūtehi. Kakude
anya-e0806n0:1028_4: āvatto kakudāvatto, nindito kakudāvatto assa atthīti kakudāvattī. Kathaṃ ninditattamassiccāha-‘kakudā
anya-e0806n0:1028_5: vatto’ccādi. Saṃsatto daṇḍo assa atthiccanena gehaṭṭhitena vijjamānenapi daṇḍena
anya-e0806n0:1028_7: dabbe-bhidheyye, bhavaṃ bhaveyyāti yadākadāci bhavanto yadi bhaveyya.
anya-e0806n0:1032_0: Dve hontīti iko īceti dve honti, ekamekaṃvāti ubhinnaṃ. Vāsaddo dve hontīti etthāpi
anya-e0806n0:1032_1: daṭṭhabbo. Uttamīṇeva dhanā ikoti gaṇasuttaṃ vivarati ‘uttamīṇevā’tiādi. Kenettha
anya-e0806n0:1032_2: samāsoti āha- ‘syādisyādinekatthanti samāso’ti. Uttamīṇo dhanasāmī. Asannihite atthāti
anya-e0806n0:1032_3: gaṇasuttaṃ, asannihitetīmassa atthaṃ vivarati ‘appatte’ti. Asampatteti attho. Asannihiteti
anya-e0806n0:1032_4: ca attho iccassa visesanaṃ. Atthanaṃ asannihite atthe āsisanaṃ attho, so assa atthīti
anya-e0806n0:1032_5: atthiko atthī. Tadantācāti gaṇasuttaṃ, asannihitetyanuvattate, asannihitopādhikā
anya-e0806n0:1032_6: atthantā ca ika īppaccayo bhavatītyattho. Vaṇṇantāīyevāti gaṇasuttaṃ, brahmānaṃ devānaṃ
anya-e0806n0:1032_7: vaṇṇoti vā samāso. Hatthadantehi jātiyanti gaṇasuttaṃ.
anya-e0806n0:1033_0: Jātiyanti paccayavisesanaṃ. Vaṇṇato brahmacārimhīti gaṇasuttaṃ. Brahmasaddena niyamaviseso
anya-e0806n0:1033_2: nasuddassāti dassento āha- ‘tañce’ccādi. Tevaṇṇiko vaṇṇīti vuccatīti sambandho. Tīsu
anya-e0806n0:1033_3: vaṇṇesu bhavo tadantogadhattā tevaṇṇikoti bhavatthe ṇiko. Vaṇṇasaddo brāhmaṇādivaṇṇavacano.
anya-e0806n0:1034_0: Athavā brahmanti nibbānaṃ tadattho ganthopi, taṃ brahmaṃ nibbānaṃ dhammaṃ vā tepiṭakaṃ
anya-e0806n0:1034_1: caratīti brahmacārī, yati. Yatayopi hi vaṇṇīti brahmacārinoti vuccanti. Vaṇṇīliṅgīti
anya-e0806n0:1034_2: hi vutte tiliṅgavāti attho. Vaṇṇa saddo panettha yathāvutta brahmapariyāyo. Pokkharādito
anya-e0806n0:1034_3: deseti gaṇasuttaṃ. Deso cettha yattha(tthi pokkharādīni so). Padumagaccha pokkharaṇīnaṃ
anya-e0806n0:1034_4: vācakassāti iminā padumāni assaṃ santīti paduminīti pokkharaṇīpi vuccatīti dasseti.
anya-e0806n0:1034_5: Nāvā atthīti nāviko, yāgame nāvāyiko. Sukhadukkhā ī, balā bāhūrupubbā ceti ca gaṇasuttāni.
anya-e0806n0:1036_0: Ihāpi pasajjeyya madhu asmiṃ ghaṭe atthīti etthāpi payoge madhuranti rappaccayo pāpuṇeyya
anya-e0806n0:1036_1: madhumhi abhidheyyati adhippāyo. Na gacchantīti nagā. Yajjapi ūsavāccādo pahūtādivisayāyātthitāya
anya-e0806n0:1036_2: sambhavo, tathāpi ñusādivato paccaya(ttha)ttena vacanicchābhāvā ñusavā ghaṭoccādi
anya-e0806n0:1036_3: na sijjhati tasmā pahūtādivisayātthitāsambhavepi taṃvato-tthassa paccaya(ttha)ttena
anya-e0806n0:1036_4: ñusaro desoti vattu micchāyaṃ paccayo yathā siyā aññatramābhaviccevamattho veditabboti
anya-e0806n0:1038: Parehi vācāsaddā ālo vihito nindāyaṃ, neha tatheti codanamubbhāvayati ‘nindāya’miccādinā.
anya-e0806n0:1040_0: Sīlamassa atthi, kesā assa santīti viggaho. Aṇṇā niccanti niccavidhyutthaṃ gaṇasuttaṃ.
anya-e0806n0:1040_1: Gāṇḍīrājīhi saññāyanti saññāvisayaniyamanatthaṃ gaṇasuttaṃ. Gaṇḍassa gaṇḍamigasiṅgassa
anya-e0806n0:1040_2: ayaṃ gāṇḍī, sā assa atthīti gāṇḍīvo.
anya-e0806n0:1044_0: Akārādeso ca ṇasanniyogenāti iminā yattha ṇakāro tatthevāyamakārādesoti dasseti.
anya-e0806n0:1044_1: Upādānatoti iminā nissayakaraṇameko satthiyo ñāyoti dasseti. Antassa avidhānasāmatthiyācāti
anya-e0806n0:1044_2: iminā satipi pubbalopena payoga nipphattiyaṃ akāraṃ vidhāya tassa lopo niratthakoti
anya-e0806n0:1044_3: dasseti. Lakkhī sirī assa atthīti lakkhaṇo.
anya-e0806n0:1046: Kappo yogyatā assa atthīti kappiyo, jaṭā hānabhāgo, senā assa atthīti viggaho.
anya-e0806n0:1048_0: ‘Ohāka cāge’ iti sakakārassa hādhātuno payoge toppaccayaṃ nisedhetvā‘satthā hīyate
anya-e0806n0:1048_1: satthā hīno’ti udāharaṇaṃ dassitaṃ. Tenāha- ‘sakkateccādi. Dassetuṃ tatiyampanudāharaṇanti
anya-e0806n0:1048_3: vutto cīppaccayo avasāne ye santi viggaho. Jātiyavajjitānanti “tabbati jātiyo”ti
anya-e0806n0:1048_4: (4-113) suttena jātiyappaccayena vajjitānaṃ. Kaccāyane tu toādīnaṃ vibhatti saññattā
anya-e0806n0:1050: Vuttiyaṃ ‘etassa ṭa eta’ iti atoiccatra etassa ṭādeso etto iccatra etaādesoti attho.
anya-e0806n0:1052_0: Nanu ca kiṃ iminā suttena, pañcamyantā “to pañcamyā”ti (4-95) bhavissati, apañcamyantātu
anya-e0806n0:1052_2: kutoci pañcamyantā hotu, apañcamyantā pana “ādyādīhī”ti sutte sasaṅkhyassādisaddassa
anya-e0806n0:1052_3: gahaṇena taṃsadisā sasaṅkhyāevopalakkhīyantītipi viññāyeyya tato apañcamyantehi abhyādīhi
anya-e0806n0:1052_4: to na siyāti abhitoccādi na sijjhatīti “abhyādīhī”ti suttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0806n0:1054_0: Nanu ca toicceva sāmaññena suttite yatokutoci pañcamyantā vā apañcamyantā vā bahulaṃ
anya-e0806n0:1054_1: vā tomhi iṭṭhappasiddhīti kiṃ ādyādīhīti suttenāti saccaṃ, tathāpi vibhāgena dassite
anya-e0806n0:1054_2: vibhāgaso visesāvasāyo siyāti na dosoti. Yanti paṭhamantā tomhi yato.
anya-e0806n0:1056: Pubbenevāti “sabbādito” (4-99) ccādināva. Etassāti etasaddassa, imassāti imasaddassa.
anya-e0806n0:1060: Yatrāti vutte yatthāti uppalakkhitameva siyāti na vuttaṃ. Evamuparipi.
anya-e0806n0:1062: Hiñcanaṃ vidhīyate “hiṃ haṃ hiñcana”nti (2-5-9) suttena. Hiñciādīnanti hiñcidācirahaciādīnaṃ.
anya-e0806n0:1068_0: Nimittanimittīnanti kāraṇakāriyānaṃ, samāneti sādhāraṇe. Samānameva bodheti ‘taṃyathe’ccādinā.
anya-e0806n0:1068_1: Ettha pana mammatāḷanaṃ nimittaṃ pāṇa haraṇaṃ nimittī, tassāti anajjatanassa. Upari
anya-e0806n0:1068_2: tyādikaṇḍe karahasaddo tu cisaddasaṃyuttova dissati karahacīti.
anya-e0806n0:1070_0: Saṅkhyāvācino saddā saṅkhyāsaddena gahitāti āha- ‘atthe’ccādi. Pakāro dabbaguṇadhisayopi
anya-e0806n0:1070_1: atthi, tattha yadi sopi gayheyya dabba guṇānaṃ liṅgasaṅkhyāhi yogā dhāppaccayanta(mpi
anya-e0806n0:1070_3: dhāppaccayantamaliṅgamasaṅkhyañca-iti kāsikāvuttipañjakāyaṃ na siyā, evañca satyabyayattamabhimatantassa
anya-e0806n0:1070_4: na siyā, tañciṭṭhaṃ, kiriyāvisaye tu tasmiṃ gayhamāne ekadhābhuñjati dvidhābhuñjati
anya-e0806n0:1070_5: dvidhāgacchaticcādo bhojana gamanādikiriyāya sabbathā liṅgasaṅkhyāhi yogābhāvā yathāvutta
anya-e0806n0:1070_6: doso na siyāti pāṇinīyavuttikārena jayādiccena kiriyā visayoyevettha pakāro gahito.
anya-e0806n0:1071_0: Tattha puthabyāpotejovāyvākāsakāladisāttamanānīti nava dabbāni. Rūpa rasa gandha
anya-e0806n0:1071_2: ca guṇā, casaddena gurutta davattasinehasaṅkhāradhammādhammasaddā ceti catubbīsati
anya-e0806n0:1071_3: bahudhā guṇo. Atrāpi yathāvuttakāsikāvuttiyā pañcikākārena jinindabuddhinā navadhā
anya-e0806n0:1071_4: dabbaṃ bahudhā guṇotyatrāpi “kiriyājjhāharitabbā navadhā dabbaṃ bahudhā guṇo upadisīyati
anya-e0806n0:1071_5: viññāyati byākhyāyate vijjatevā”ti kiriyāvisayoyeva pakāro paṭipādito, payogadassanato
anya-e0806n0:1072_0: Navadhā dabbaṃ bahudhā guṇoti payogadassanato dabbaguṇavisayānampakārānaṃ gayhupagattā
anya-e0806n0:1072_2: jinindabuddhinā vuttanayena kiriyā atthevāti kiriyāvisayova pakāro gayhatīti vuttikāra
anya-e0806n0:1073_0: Tatoyevāti yato visesanopādānamayuttaṃ tatoyeva dvīhiccādikamāheti attho. Ayametthādhippāyo
anya-e0806n0:1073_1: “dvidhā karotīti kiriyāpayogepi pakāro dabbaguṇavisayo… dabbavisayassa guṇavisayassa
anya-e0806n0:1073_2: vā dvidhābhāvassa karīyamānattā, natu kiriyāvisayo… dvidhābhāvassa karaṇakiriyāvisayassettha
anya-e0806n0:1073_3: vattumanicchitattā. Tatoyeva kiriyāpakāropādāne pakārotisayane (potthake) atra dhāppaccayantappayogo
anya-e0806n0:1074_0: Dabbaguṇavisaye pakāre gayhamāne yoyaṃ doso sambhāvito parehi, taṃ dāni nirākattumāha
anya-e0806n0:1074_2: dhāppaccayo vihito pāṇiniyehi, tadāha- ‘dabbasse’ccādi saṅkhyāntarāpādanepīti pubbaṃ
anya-e0806n0:1074_3: yā vavatthitā saṅkhyā, tato- ññaṃ saṅkhyāntaraṃ tassāpādanaṃ karaṇaṃ saṅkhyantarāpādanaṃ, tasmimpīti attho.
anya-e0806n0:1076: So pakāro assāti tabbā, tasaddena pakārassa parāmaṭṭhattā tabbatītettha pakāravatīti attho vuttoti āha- ‘tasaddene’ccādi. Pakāravatīti pakāravati atthe. Muduppakāravā mudujātiyo.
anya-e0806n0:1078_0: Kiṃ saṅkhyānamparimāṇamesanti atthe “kimhā rati rīvarīvataka rittakā”ti (4-44) suttena
anya-e0806n0:1078_1: ratippaccayaṃ vidhāya katīti siddhattā vuttaṃ- ‘saṅkhyāparimāṇavisaye sādhitattā’ti,
anya-e0806n0:1078_2: kati ca so saṅkhyā parimāṇavisayattā saṅkhyā ceti katisaṅkhyā, tāya.
anya-e0806n0:1080: Paccāsattīti sambandhimhi ekamhi dassite dviṭṭhattā sambandhassa paro sambandhī viññāyamāno parova viññāyati yuttitoti ‘sambandhatovā’ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0806n0:1084: Khaṇḍaṃ khaṇḍaṃ khaṇḍaso, puthu pakāro puthuso.
anya-e0806n0:1086_0: Nanu ca abhavanannāma sabbathā anuppattiyā vā avatthantarena vā, tathā satyabhūtasaddo-nuppannamattavacanopīti
anya-e0806n0:1086_2: tasaddena parāmasīyatīti ce abhūtasaddo yadyanuppannavācī siyā, tadā tasaddappa yogoyeva
anya-e0806n0:1086_3: na siyā… tasaddenābhūtasseva gahaṇato, abhūtabhāveccādinā suttitaṃ siyā, tena tasaddappayogasāmatthiyā
anya-e0806n0:1086_4: avatthāva tasaddena parāmasīyati, tapparāmaṭṭhañcāvatthantaramabhūta saddo apekkhate,
anya-e0806n0:1086_5: tenāha- ‘tabbhāvetivacanā’iccādi. Bhavanaṃ bhāvo tāya avatthantare bhāvo tabbhāvo
anya-e0806n0:1086_6: tasmiṃ. Tenāha ‘abhūtasse’ccādi. Bhāveti visayasattamī, saṃsattamī vāti āha- ‘visaye
anya-e0806n0:1088_0: Dissantīti vutte payoge dissantīti ayamattho viññāyatīti āha ‘disi’ccādi, idaṃ suttaṃ
anya-e0806n0:1088_1: vijjhaṅga paribhāsā bhavatīti seso. “Ṇovā-pacce”tiādinā (4-1) suttena vuttesvanekavidhesu
anya-e0806n0:1088_2: atthesu pari samantato bhāsatīti paribhāsā, vidhino paccayassa aṅgabhūtā paribhāsā
anya-e0806n0:1090_0: Antarasaddo-nekatthopīhāntarāḷavācī majjhavācī gayhati, na vijjatentaramesanti antarāḷamattapaṭisedhepayojanaṃ
anya-e0806n0:1090_1: natthīti katvāntarā ḷaṭṭhassābhāvāntarāḷaṃ natthītyupacarīyati, evañhi loke payujjate
anya-e0806n0:1090_2: ‘anantarā ime gāmā anantarā ime pāsādā’ti antarāḷagatassa ññassa gāmassaññassa pāsādassa
anya-e0806n0:1090_4: anantarā ityuccante, athavāntarasaddo byavadhānavācī byavadhānābhāvato-nantarā iti
anya-e0806n0:1090_5: vuccante. Antaraṃ karotīti vā khādiippaccayaṃ ṇippaccayaṃ (potthake) vidhāya antarāyati
anya-e0806n0:1090_6: byavadhānaṃ karotīti kattari appaccayaṃ vidhāya antaro byavadhāyako natthetesanti
anya-e0806n0:1090_7: anantarā. Yathā ‘rukkhā vanante’ttha rukkhā samuditāvekavanabyapadesaṃ labhante,
anya-e0806n0:1091_0: Saṃyogoti hi samudāyappadhāno niddeso byañjanātyavayavappadhāno, tasmā byañjanāti
anya-e0806n0:1091_1: bahuvacanena saṃyogoti ekavacananiddeso ghaṭate, nanu ca vaṇṇānamuccāritappadhaṃsittā
anya-e0806n0:1091_2: yogapajjamaṭṭhitamānānaṃ na sambhavati samudāyattanti samudāyattamayuttanti nāyuttaṃ,
anya-e0806n0:1091_3: tathāhi uttaruttaraggāhini buddhi pubbaparībhūte byañjanāvayave samudāyarūpena saṅkappentī
anya-e0806n0:1092_0: Ṇānubandheti ditisaddassa saṃyogāvisayattā deccoti ‘sarānamādissā’ti visayo, uḷumpasaddassa
anya-e0806n0:1092_1: saṃyogavisayattā oḷumpikoti etassa visayoti tattha rāghavo venateyyo meniko decco
anya-e0806n0:1092_2: dosaggānti rūpāni. Idha tu oḷumpiko koṇḍaññoti yujjanti. Teneva ca tattha pañcikā
anya-e0806n0:1092_3: ettha, ettha ca pañcikā tattha upanetabbāti.
anya-e0806n0:1094: Kosajjanti ettha tassa jattañca nipātanā, ajjavanti etthha “uvaṇṇassā vava sare”ti (4-129).
anya-e0806n0:1100_0: Satissāti vutte satisaddo viññāyati satyantepi visesanattena vattumicchitesatyanto
anya-e0806n0:1102: Dhātuto añño saddo adhātu tassa. Pañcikāyampana pakatipi saddoyevāti dhātutoiccādinā adhātusaddassa atthamattaṃ vuttaṃ.
anya-e0806n0:1103_0: Tassāti adhātuppakatiyā, adhātusaddassāti vuttaṃ hoti. Tenacāti kakārena ca, tasmāti
anya-e0806n0:1103_1: tena kāraṇena. Pubbaggahaṇamantarenātipāṇininā ikārādesavidhāyake imasmiṃyeva suttekakārato
anya-e0806n0:1103_2: pubbassa ikārādesavidhānatthaṃ pubbaggahaṇaṃ kataṃ, taṃ pubbassātivacanaṃ vināti
anya-e0806n0:1103_3: attho. Sacetiādinā kathayatīti sambandho. “Byañjane dīgharassā”ti (1-33) rasso vutto,
anya-e0806n0:1103_4: assāti jātiniddese tu ākārassacikāro bhavatyeva, siyā etanti bahuparibbājakāti etaṃ
anya-e0806n0:1103_5: rūpaṃ hoti. Syādyatra byavahito… kakārato pubbe syādi, na syādi kakārā paroti.
anya-e0806n0:1104_0: Nanu ca asyāditoti ettha pasajjappaṭisedho naña kasmā gahito, na pariyudosoti āsaṅkiya
anya-e0806n0:1104_1: pariyudāsesmiṃ gahite sati dosaṃ vattumārabhate ‘pariyudāse’iccādinā. Syāditoti syādyantato
anya-e0806n0:1104_2: paribbājakasaddato. Paribbājakasaddohi syādyanto vākye syādyantattā, teneva vakkhati-
anya-e0806n0:1104_3: ‘paribbājakasaddato ettha syādyuppattī’ti. Asyādismā paroti katvā bahuparibbājakasaddato
anya-e0806n0:1105: Tatocāti bahuparibbājakasaddato ca. Pasajjappaṭisedhena nañasaddena aññapadatthasamāsepi siyāva dosoti dassento āha- ‘avijjamānosyādi’ccādi.
anya-e0806n0:1110_1: purisādhīnattāti attho, pakati visesananti tijamāha saddānaṃ visesanaṃ, kimpana pakativisesane
anya-e0806n0:1110_3: kasmiṃ atthe carati khasā vidhīyanticcāha- ‘atthantarassā niddesā’iccādi. Atthantarassāti
anya-e0806n0:1110_6: sakatthe vidhāneneti vuttaṃ hoti. Titikkhakiriyattāti iminā paresaṃ viya khādyantānaṃ
anya-e0806n0:1111_0: Titikkhā khamā, titikkhati khamati, vīmaṃsā upaparikkhā, vīmaṃsati upaparikkhatīti
anya-e0806n0:1111_1: attho. Sutte tijaiti niddesā bhūvādikassa gahaṇaṃ. Niccaṇyantassa curādikassa hi
anya-e0806n0:1111_2: tādise payojane sati bahulaṃ vidhīyamānepi niccattamattano nātivattati. Athavā curādimānenābyabhicārinā
anya-e0806n0:1111_3: sāhacariyā tijopi curādikova, taṃ yathā ‘gāvassa dutiyenāttho’ti. Vuttegoyevopādīyate,
anya-e0806n0:1111_4: nāsso, na gadrabho. Kadāci pana assādinopi dutiyassa gahaṇaṃ siyā atthappakaraṇā dippabhāvato.
anya-e0806n0:1112_0: Nanu ca vīmaṃsāyaṃ sappaccayavidhāna manupapannamitaretaranissayadosa duṭṭhattā,
anya-e0806n0:1112_1: tathāhi siddhe vīmaṃsāsadde sappaccayo uppajjate, sati ca tasmiṃ vīmaṃsāti rūpaṃ
anya-e0806n0:1112_2: sampajjatīti itaretaranissayo, itaretara nissayāni ca kāriyānī nopakappantīti tenāha-
anya-e0806n0:1114_2: Vissatthoti visaddassa attho. Atha kimitthaṃ chappaccayantasseva dvidhodāharaṇantyāsaṅkiyāha-
anya-e0806n0:1116: Ninda=garahāyaṃ tato “itthiyamaṇattikayakyā ce”ti (5-49) appaccaye tato “itthiyamatvā”ti (3-26) āppaccaye rūpaṃ. Bandhatīti badhako.
anya-e0806n0:1118_0: Tuṃsmātīha paccayaggahaṇamācikkhati ‘tuṃtāye’ccādinā. Tato ceti yato tuṃsmāti paccayasseva
anya-e0806n0:1118_1: gahaṇaṃ yato ca visesana niddeso, tatoti attho. Paccayaggahaṇe tadādiggahaṇaṃ viññāyate…
anya-e0806n0:1118_2: “paccayaggahaṇe yasmā so vihito tadādino gahaṇa”nti ñāyato. Visesanattena vattumicchitattā
anya-e0806n0:1118_4: kiriyatthā’iccādi. So kiriyattho ādi yassa samudāyassa so tadādi so paccayonte tassa
anya-e0806n0:1118_6: Nanu ca tuṃsmāiti visesanattena vattumicchite bhavatu “vidhibbisesanantasse”ti tadantaggahaṇaṃ
anya-e0806n0:1118_7: paccayaggahaṇe tu kathaṃ tadādino gahaṇaṃ vacanābhāvatoccāha- ‘tadavinābhāvittā’ti.
anya-e0806n0:1118_8: Yato vihito tena vinā na bhavati sīleneti tadavinābhāvī tassa bhāvo tasmā. Imāya
anya-e0806n0:1118_9: yuttiyā viññāyate-ttho, yamākhyāyate ‘paccayaggahaṇe yasmā so vihito tadādino gahaṇa’nti.
anya-e0806n0:1118_10: Bhavatvevaṃ tadādino tadantassa ca gahaṇaṃ, tato kipphalaṃtyāha- ‘tene’ccādi.
anya-e0806n0:1119_0: Sapāditoti pādisahitato. Kha cha suppattābhāvāti kha cha sānaṃ uppattiyā abhāvā.
anya-e0806n0:1119_1: Vuttappakārasseva tuṃppaccayantassa pakatibhāvena gahaṇā sapādito kha cha sānamanuppattīti
anya-e0806n0:1119_3: tuṃssaca lopo, nemittike ekāre nivatte ‘jisa jisa iti dvitte anādibyañjanalopo “jiharānaṃ
anya-e0806n0:1119_4: gī”ti (5-102) gī. Jigīsappakatito “bhūte īūṃ”iccādinā (6-4) ī. Tasmiṃ aña. “Ā ī ū
anya-e0806n0:1119_5: mhā ssā ssamhānaṃ vā”ti (6-33) īssa rasse byajigīsi. Yadi tu sapādito sassa uppatti
anya-e0806n0:1119_6: siyā, tadā byajigīsīti ettha dvibbacanaṃ karīyamānaṃ sappaccayantassa paṭhamassekassarassa
anya-e0806n0:1119_7: dvibbacanaṃ bhavatīti “kha cha sāna”miccādinā (5-69) vijiya iti samudāye ādibhūtassa
anya-e0806n0:1119_8: visaddassa siyā īmhi ca vihite sapādino pakatibhāvoti visadda pubbe añāgamo siyā,
anya-e0806n0:1120_0: Tuṃsmā icchāyanti ca pakatippaccayatthānamupadiṭṭhattā tena sabhāva liṅgena kha cha
anya-e0806n0:1120_1: sappaccayā tadanto ca anumito na pana tuṃ, tumiha sutoti āha- ‘na tadanto, nāpi cha
anya-e0806n0:1120_2: chasā’ti. Jighacchāiccatra dvitte pubbassa ghassa “catuttha dutiyānaṃ tatiyapaṭhamā”ti
anya-e0806n0:1120_3: (5-78) go. Tassa “kavaggahānaṃ cavaggajā”ti (5-79) jo. Pāṇinināpīha sappaccaya vidhāyake
anya-e0806n0:1120_4: sutte vākyampi yathā siyāti vāvacanaṃ kataṃ, tadayuttanti nirākattumāha- ‘vākyampi’ccādi.
anya-e0806n0:1120_5: Pakatyādityatra ādi saddena atthaviseso gahetabbo, pakati viseso tumanto, icchattho-tthaviseso.
anya-e0806n0:1120_6: Idaṃ lakkhaṇanti “tuṃsmā lopo cicchāyaṃ te”iti idaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ. Niyogatoti niyamena.
anya-e0806n0:1121_1: tenāsiddhena vākyenāsiddhānaṃ kha cha sānaṃ sādhanaṃ asiddhenāsiddhasādhanaṃ. Icchāvacanicchāti
anya-e0806n0:1121_2: icchāya vattumicchā. Icchāyapavattito upaladdhīti icchāya upaladdhi upālambo parijānanaṃ
anya-e0806n0:1121_3: pavattitoti attho. Cetanāvaticāti vuttaṃ tasmā cetanāvati pavattito upaladdhiṃ dassetvā
anya-e0806n0:1121_4: tadapadese nācetanepi dassetuṃ ‘yopesā’tiādimāha. Devadatte rajju khīlādipāṇinā uyyogo,
anya-e0806n0:1121_5: kūle mattikāvikīraṇādi. Rajju guṇo. Khīlo kīla (pañcikā) saṃkvādi.
anya-e0806n0:1122_0: Pulo tiṇādīnaṃ saṅghāto. Sā sunakho mimarisatīti mara=pāṇacāge’icchāyaṃ tumantā so.
anya-e0806n0:1122_1: “Ñi byañjanasse”ti (5-170) ñi. Dvitte pubbato-ññassa lopo “kha cha sesvī”ti (5-76)
anya-e0806n0:1122_2: dvitte pubbassāssa imimarisati. Tathā pipatisatīti ‘patapatha=gamena’ iccassa. Sā
anya-e0806n0:1122_3: mimarisatīti satipi sacetanatte visattajīvitassa sunakhassa maraṇicchā sambhavatīti
anya-e0806n0:1124_0: Karīyati sambandhīyatīti kammaṃ. Tañca nāma jāti guṇakiriyādabba sambandhato pañcadhā
anya-e0806n0:1124_1: bhavati. Tattha nāmakammaṃ’ ḍittho ḍavitthoti nāmena piṇḍassa sambandhā. Jātikammaṃ
anya-e0806n0:1124_2: goassoti gottādijātiyā piṇḍassa sambandhā. Guṇakammaṃ sukkonīloti sukkādinā guṇena
anya-e0806n0:1124_3: dabbassa sambandhā. Kiriyākammaṃ pācako pāyakoti pācakādikiriyāya dabbassa sambandhā.
anya-e0806n0:1124_4: Dabbakammaṃ daṇḍīvisāṇīti daṇḍādinā dabbena piṇḍassa sambandhā. Evaṃ kammassa pañcappakārasambhavepicchāyamatthe
anya-e0806n0:1124_5: īyassa vidhānato icchāsambandhiyeva kammaṃ gayhatīti kiriyākammamevātra gayhate amukamevatthamupadassento
anya-e0806n0:1124_6: āha- ‘yadipi’ccādi. Ayañca nipāta samudāyo visesābhidhānanimittāsyupagame vattate.
anya-e0806n0:1125_2: ettha tva(tta)ggahaṇamantarenātta sambandhinyeva puttādo kathaṃ viññāyate visesavacanābhāve
anya-e0806n0:1126_0: Appattiyāti karaṇe hetumhi vā tatiyā. Etthāti attano puttamicchatītetthāpi. Na iṭṭhoti
anya-e0806n0:1126_1: īyappaccayo nābhimato. Nevettha bhavitabbanti vadato-dhippāyāmāha ‘sāpekkhatta yeveti
anya-e0806n0:1126_2: bhāvo’ti. Yadi attano puttamicchatīti vattumicchāyaṃ sāpekkhettepi siyā, tadāyamaniṭṭhappasaṅgoti
anya-e0806n0:1127_0: Aniṭṭhappasaṅgassa sarūpamāha- ‘attano puttīyatīti siyā’ti. Uppajjamānena īyeneva
anya-e0806n0:1127_1: attatthassābhihitattā attasaddassāppayogoti cetampi na saṅgatanti paṭipādayamāha
anya-e0806n0:1127_2: ‘na ca sakkā’tiādi. Kasmādevaṃ vattuṃ na sakkāti āha- ‘pakati’ccādi. Apūpādikāya
anya-e0806n0:1127_3: pakatiyā samānatthasseva visesanassa vuttipade antobhāva dassanāti attho. Kvapanevaṃ
anya-e0806n0:1127_4: diṭṭhantyāha- ‘taṃyathe’ccādi. “Tamassa sippaṃ sīlaṃ paṇyaṃ paharaṇaṃ payojanaṃ”ti
anya-e0806n0:1127_5: (4-27) ṇike āpūpiko. Natu bhinnatthassāti byatirekaṃ dassetvā taṃ diṭṭhantena sādhetumāha-
anya-e0806n0:1127_7: sāmyantarabyavacchedāya devadattasaddasso pādānato gurukulanti vuttipadena devadattatthassānto
anya-e0806n0:1127_8: bhāvoti attho. Tametthopi samānantūpadassento āha- ‘tathehāpi’ccādi. Athāttano puttamicchatītyetasmiṃ
anya-e0806n0:1127_9: vākye padassānvākhyānato attasaddassāpphayogo kinna siyāti dassetumāha- ‘nacāpi’ccādi.
anya-e0806n0:1128_0: Padassāti puttīyādino padassa. Nacāpi appayogoti sambandho. Kāraṇamāha- ‘īyantassā’tiādi.
anya-e0806n0:1128_1: Īyanto puttīyādi, niyogato na pappotīti sambandho. Tabbācīsaddappayoganti aññavācīsaddayogaṃ.
anya-e0806n0:1128_3: atthato pakaraṇāditopi puttassatta niyatā gamyate, sutasaddassa tu gahaṇamupalakkhaṇatthanti vadati.
anya-e0806n0:1129_0: Nanu ca sutte kammāti vuttattā kammasamudāyatopīyo siyā tyāsaṅkiyeva (mabhā)vaṃ sādhayamāha-
anya-e0806n0:1129_1: ‘kammā’tiādi. Vattuṃ iṭṭhā ekasakhyā yassa kammasāmaññassa taṃ tathāvuttaṃ. Vattumiṭṭheka
anya-e0806n0:1129_2: saṅkhyassa gahaṇamāha- ‘kammasamudāyato’ti. Kimpanāvayavato na siyā’ mahantamputtamicchatī’ccatra
anya-e0806n0:1129_3: puttamiccatoccāsaṅkiyāha ‘avayavatopi sāpekkhattāyevā’ti. Na bhatīti sambandho. Evañcarahi
anya-e0806n0:1129_4: idampi na sijjhatīti codento āha ‘carahi’ccādi. Mahā cāyaṃ puttoceti mahāputtamicchatīti
anya-e0806n0:1131_1: Pasiddho gavādi, tassa sādhamyā samāna rūpatāya yampasiddhassa gavayādino sādhiyassa
anya-e0806n0:1131_2: sādhanaṃ tamupamānantyattho. Samāno dhammo-sseti sadhammo, gavādiyeva. Tassa bhāvo
anya-e0806n0:1131_3: sādhamyaṃ. Sādhyate upamīyate-neneti sādhanamupamānaṃ gavādi. Sādhute upamīyateti
anya-e0806n0:1132_1: putte viya māṇavake madhurannapānadānādikamācaraṇaṃ karoticcevamatthasambhavena dvinnampi
anya-e0806n0:1132_3: putte ācaraṇampi pasiddhanti āha- ‘tampasiddha’nti. Tadācaraṇena tena ācaraṇena puttamāṇavakavisayamācaraṇaṃ
anya-e0806n0:1132_4: vā puttamāṇavaka saddenupacārato gahetvā visayīvasena visayabhāvavohārotipi yujjati.
anya-e0806n0:1132_5: Vākyattho panetasmiṃ pakkhe ‘puttamiva puttavisaya māṇavakamiva ācarati māṇavakavisayamācaraṇaṃ
anya-e0806n0:1132_6: karotī’ti, vuttiyantu yathāvuttamatthadvayaṃ yathāyogaṃ yojetvā veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0806n0:1133_0: Nanu ca yajjatropamānopameyyabhāvo vuttiyaṃ īyeneva jotitoti ivasaddo nivattate,
anya-e0806n0:1133_1: tadopamānopameyyabhāvo putta saddeva vattate, taṃ kathamupameyyavacanassa māṇavakasaddassa
anya-e0806n0:1134_1: etthāyamadhippāyo ‘upamāna visiṭṭhācaraṇe upamānavacanato īyassa vidhāne nopameyyavacanamantarenopamānavacanassa
anya-e0806n0:1134_3: īyeneva jotitattā tadantassupameyye vutti siyātyattho. Pabbatāyatīti “kattutāyo”ti
anya-e0806n0:1136_0: Yathānantarasutte upamāne upameyyassa māṇavakassa payogo upapanno, tathātrāpi ‘pāsāde
anya-e0806n0:1136_1: kuṭiya’nti copameyyassapayogoti atidisanto āha- ‘heṭṭhāviye’ccādi. Upamāne upameyyassānantobhāvāti
anya-e0806n0:1136_2: attho. Nanu kimatthamidamuccate yavatāyo pāsāde ivācarati so pāsādamivācaratītipi
anya-e0806n0:1136_3: vattuṃ sakkāti nātthabhedo-ññatra vacanicchābhedāti pubbenevetthāpi īyo siddho, tato
anya-e0806n0:1138_0: Ettha kattutoiti vacanā kammāti nivattate, āyaggahaṇā īyo. Kadā pana kattuviseso-vasīyaticcāha-‘yatthyādisaddasamānādhikaraṇatte’tiādi.
anya-e0806n0:1138_1: Pabbatāyati hatthiccevamādinā hatthyādi saddena samānādhikaraṇatte satīti attho.
anya-e0806n0:1140_0: Koyaṃ cyatthoccāsaṅkiya “abhūtatabbhāve karāsabhūyoge vikārācī”ti (4-119) cīssa abhūtatabbhāve
anya-e0806n0:1140_1: karādiyogesati vidhānā ‘abhūtatabbhāvo karādivisiṭṭho’ti āha. Abhūta tabbhāvassa
anya-e0806n0:1140_2: karādivisiṭṭhattā karotyatthanivattiyāvassaṃ pāṇiniyā viya bhuviggahaṇaṃ kattabbamaññathā
anya-e0806n0:1140_4: abhūtatabbhāvocyattho teneva hetunāti attho. Bhavatyatthe-nena kāraṇena laddhe karotyatthopyaniṭṭho
anya-e0806n0:1140_6: karoti dhavalīkaroticceva cīppaccaye kattabbe kammeneva karotissābhisambandhassa
anya-e0806n0:1140_7: diṭṭhattāti attho. Kāraṇantaramāha- ‘iha ce’ccādi. Itisaddo hetumhi yasmā iha kattutoti
anya-e0806n0:1141_0: Asatyatthassa pana bhavatyattheyevāntobhāvā na tannivatti paṭipāditā. Tappakaraṇeti
anya-e0806n0:1141_3: Cyantā paccayābhāvatthaṃ- ‘acīto’ti paccayavidhānasutte paṭisedho na kato, tenāha-‘acītoti
anya-e0806n0:1142: Paṭhamantācī. Ṇādivuttittā “ekatthatāya”nti (2-119) vibhattilopo. Iheceti ‘cyatthe” itīmasmiṃyeva. Na ca vuccateti sambandho.
anya-e0806n0:1144_0: Nanu ca asati sutte dutiyāggahaṇe dutiyantehiccāyaṃ viseso kuto labbhate yena ‘saddādīhi
anya-e0806n0:1144_1: dutiyantehī’ti vivaraṇaṃ katanti saccaṃ, tathāpi paccayavidhimhi yuttepi pañcamiyā
anya-e0806n0:1145_0: Sabbatthāti “tamadhīte taṃ jānāti kaṇikācā”do (4-14) sabbattha. Kiriyāvātyavadhāraṇena
anya-e0806n0:1145_1: yaṃ byavacchinnaṃ, tamupadassento āha- ‘na kāle’ccādi. Yadīpi adhīteccādīsu vattamānakālena
anya-e0806n0:1145_2: kattunā ekavacanena ca niddeso, tathāpi tesamappadhānattā aññasmimpi bhūtādike kāle
anya-e0806n0:1145_3: kammādo sādhane bahuvacanena ca paccayo siyā eveti bhāvo.
anya-e0806n0:1146_0: Nanu ca “dhātvatthenāmasmī”ti (5-12) ippaccaye patte-yamārabbhate assapi dhātvattheyeva
anya-e0806n0:1146_1: vidhānaṃ, tato ca saddādīhi dhātvatthe ippaccayena na bhavitabbaṃ, dissate ca ippaccayapayogoccāsaṅkiya
anya-e0806n0:1146_3: nānāvākyaṃ, tassa bhāvena, tena bhinnavākyabhāvenāyassa ippaccayassa ca samuccayatoti
anya-e0806n0:1146_4: attho. “Dhātvatthenāmasmī”tyekaṃ vākyaṃ, “saddādīni karotya”paraṃ. Etāni dve bhinnavākyāni-
anya-e0806n0:1146_5: ‘dhātvatthe nāmasmā ippaccayo bhavati, saddādīni karoticcasmiṃ atthe āyo bhavatī’ti
anya-e0806n0:1146_6: paccekamākhyātāpekkhāya vākyaparisamattiyā bhinnatā, abhinne hi kiriyāpadekavākyatā,
anya-e0806n0:1146_7: bhinnetu nānāvākyatā, nānāvākye ca sati samuccayo. Na hi sāmaññavisesabhāvena vidhānameva
anya-e0806n0:1146_8: bādhāhetu, kiñcarahi ekavākyatāpi, taṃ yathā-‘brāhmaṇānaṃ dadhi diyyataṃ, takkaṃ
anya-e0806n0:1146_9: koṇḍaññāye’ti. Nānāvākye tu samuccayo, taṃ yathā- ‘brāhmaṇā bhojīyantu, māḍharāya
anya-e0806n0:1146_10: vatthayugalaṃ dīyatū’ti māḍharo brāhmaṇabhāvena bhojīyate vatthayugalañca labhate,
anya-e0806n0:1146_11: tenojukaṃ vuttena vatthayugaladānena sāmaññavuttaṃ bhojanaṃ na bādhīyate, tathehāpi
anya-e0806n0:1146_12: ujukaṃ vihitenāyena sāmaññavihito ippaccayo na bādhīyate lakkhiyānurodhena satthakārassa
anya-e0806n0:1146_13: vākya bhedābhedoti nānavaṭṭhitidosoti maññate. Timhi le ca siddhanti sambandho.
anya-e0806n0:1147_0: Yappaccayo na vihito pāṇinīādīhi viyāti adhippāyo. ‘Jala dala- dittiyaṃ’. “Māno”ti
anya-e0806n0:1147_3: Jalamānāti aṭṭhakathāvacanatoti iminā kiriyāsamabhihāre yappaccayābhāvaṃ dasseti.
anya-e0806n0:1147_4: Iminā ca sakkate viya bhusābhikkhaññepi kiriyāsamabhihāro kiriyāparivattanaṃ, tañca
anya-e0806n0:1147_5: yadā kiriyamaññena kattabbamañño karoti, tena kattabbañcetaro, tadā bhavatīti viññeyyaṃ.
anya-e0806n0:1147_7: “māno”ti sāmaññena vihito mānappaccayo bhusatthe ābhikkhaññe ca bhavissati. Daddalla
anya-e0806n0:1147_8: mānāti ettha bhusaṃ jalamānā, punappuna jalamānāti ca attho veditabbo.
anya-e0806n0:1149: Namo karoti namosaddamuccāreti, saddaṃ karoti saddamuccāretīticcevamattho (na) gahetabbe anissayanato anabhidhānato vā.
anya-e0806n0:1151_0: Aparinipphannoti anipphanno asiddhāvatthoti attho. Kārakasādhiyoti yathālābhaṃ kārakehi
anya-e0806n0:1151_1: sādhiyo. Asatvabhūtoti adabbabhūto. Ayantu kiriyārūpo padattho pacatyādīnaṃ vikledanādipadhānakiriyārūpo
anya-e0806n0:1151_2: ca tadavayavarūpā pubbaparībhūtauddhanāro panādikādayo tādatthiyā ca pacatyādivacanīyā.
anya-e0806n0:1151_3: Tasmā yathā vuttalakkhaṇe dhātvatthe dhātuto vidhīyamāno tyādippaccayo tathābhūtameva
anya-e0806n0:1151_5: devadattena, ṭhīyate devadattehī’ti bhavati. Na yatokutocītiādinā yato yattha na
anya-e0806n0:1151_6: dissati, tato tattha na hotīti dīpeti. Yato yattha vidhi, sa tassa sambandhī bhavatīti
anya-e0806n0:1151_7: nāmehi vacanīyatthato-tthantarabhūto yoyaṃ dhātvattho kamādīnamatthabhūto, so sakatthoti
anya-e0806n0:1152_0: Tassacāti ekārassa ca. Atha atihatthayaticcādo pādivisiṭṭhe eva dhātvatthe ippaccayassa
anya-e0806n0:1152_1: vidhānā tadatthavihiteneva ippaccayena pādivisiṭṭho dhātvattho vutto, tena kimattho
anya-e0806n0:1154: Atthamācikkhati, vedamācikkhatīti viggaho. Sukhāpeticcādo sukhaṃ vedayaticcādinā viggaho. Vāpāṭhāti vikappena pāṭhato.
anya-e0806n0:1156_0: Asati sutte sakattheti kathaṃ labbhatīti āha- ‘atthānati desā’ti. Atthā-natidesāti
anya-e0806n0:1156_1: atthavisesassa kassaci sutte aniddesāti attho. Atthavisesassā-natidesamattena sakatthoyeva
anya-e0806n0:1156_2: ṇinā vāccoti kathaṃ viññāyateccāha- ‘sakatthassa ca sutattā’ti. Cura=theyye iccādīsu
anya-e0806n0:1156_3: theyyādikassa sakatthassa sutattāti attho. Yogavibhāgatoti ‘ṇī’tiyogavibhāgato, rajjaṃ
anya-e0806n0:1156_4: kāretīti ettha sāmyamaccādikaṃ sattaṅgaṃ rajjaṃ pavattetīti vā attho, payojakabyāpāre ṇi.
anya-e0806n0:1158_0: Payojako codako byāpārakoti attho nanu ca vuttiyaṃ ‘kattāraṃ payojayatī’ti vuttaṃ
anya-e0806n0:1158_1: kathaṃ payujjamānassa kattuttaṃti āha- ‘payujjamāno’ccādi. Nāvassaṃ kiriyāpavattakatteneva
anya-e0806n0:1158_2: yoggatāmattenapi kattuttaṃ siyāti dassento āha- ‘kiriyāya yoggo’tiādi. Pāsāṇambalenuṭṭhāpeti’ccādīsu
anya-e0806n0:1158_3: hi yogyatāyapi kattuttāvasāyosiyā, kopanāyaṃ payojakabyapāroti āha- ‘pesane’ccādi.
anya-e0806n0:1158_4: Dāsādino hīnassa katthaci atthe niyojanaṃ pesanaṃ. Guruādino sakkārapubbaṃ byāpāraṇamajjhesanaṃ.
anya-e0806n0:1158_5: Taṃ pesanajjhesanādikaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ sabhāvo yassa so tathā vutto.
anya-e0806n0:1159_0: Ādisaddena ānukūlyabhāgino byāpārassa gahaṇaṃ, tathā ca ‘bhikkhā vāsayati kārīso-jjhāpesī’ti
anya-e0806n0:1159_1: sijjhati. Bhikkhā hi pacurabyañjanavatī labbhamānā vāsānukūlaṃ tittivisesamupajanayati.
anya-e0806n0:1160_0: Payojakabyāpāretīdaṃ paccayavisesanaṃ vā siyā pakativisesanaṃ vā. Tattha yadi pakativisesanaṃ
anya-e0806n0:1160_1: siyā, tadā payojakabyāpāre vattamānā ṇīṇāpī vidhīyantīti (gamanaṃ) pati yo niyogo
anya-e0806n0:1160_2: tadattho gami, na gatyattho, tassa cāyaṃ payojjoti ‘gamayati māṇavakaṃ gāma’nti gatyatthassa
anya-e0806n0:1160_3: payojje “gatibodhāhāre”ccādinā (2-4) vihitā dutiyā na pappoti, tato pakatyatthavisesanapakkho
anya-e0806n0:1160_4: duṭṭhoti paccayavisesanapakkhaṃ dassetumāha- ‘paccayavisesanaṃ vedaṃ na pakativisesana’nti.
anya-e0806n0:1161_0: Payojakamattaggahaṇeti mattasaddo sāmaññavācī, yathā ‘kaññā mattaṃ vārayatī’ti. Kattāraṃ
anya-e0806n0:1161_1: yo payujjati yo ca karaṇādīnaṃ payojako tesaṃ sāmaññena gahaṇe satīti attho. Byāpāretvevāti
anya-e0806n0:1161_2: payojakaggahaṇamantarena byāpāreicceva vacanaṃ kattabbaṃ siyāti bhāvo, tanti payojakaggahaṇaṃ,
anya-e0806n0:1161_3: visiṭṭho visayo yassa payojakaggahaṇassataṃtathāvuttaṃ. Kopanāyaṃvisiṭṭho visayoccāha-
anya-e0806n0:1161_4: ‘yo loke’iccādi. Itovāti vakkhamānassa hetuno parāmāso. Tanti curādīhi ṇividhānaṃ.
anya-e0806n0:1161_5: Evaṃsaddo vakkhamānāpekkho. Taṃ visuṃ curādīhi ṇividhānameva vakkhamānappakārena
anya-e0806n0:1161_6: saphalaṃ siyā nāññathāti attho. Tameva pakāraṃ dasseti‘yadiminā’ccādi.
anya-e0806n0:1163: Kattari vihitesupi mānantatyādīsu parabhūtesu kyo bhavatīti viññāyeyyāti ‘bhāvakammesū’ti na kyassa visesananti āha- ‘mānantatyādīna’miccādi.
anya-e0806n0:1164_0: Yadi hi kattari vihitesu siyā, tathā sati tesamubhinnaṃ padhānattenābhidhīyamānānamaññamaññānapekkhattā
anya-e0806n0:1164_1: asambandho siyā, na ce vambhūtānamabhidhānamatthi, na hi ‘ṭhīyate’ccasmā bhāvo kattā
anya-e0806n0:1164_2: ca patīyate, nāpi ‘gamyate’ccasmā kammaṃ kattāca. Api tu bhāvakammāneva gamyante,
anya-e0806n0:1165_0: Tesamevāti mānantatyādīnameva. Parasamaññābhi paresaṃ kaccāyanā naṃ parokkhāicceva
anya-e0806n0:1165_1: nāmaṃ. Tabbajjitesūti parokkhāsaññipaccayavajjitesu. Aparokkhesūti ettha parasamaññāvasena
anya-e0806n0:1165_2: parokkhāiccanena saha samāsaṃ dassetvā idāni aññathāpi paṭipādetuṃ ‘athavā’tiādimāha.
anya-e0806n0:1165_3: Parokkheti indriyāvisaye kāle. Parokkhevihitā paccayāti iminā upacārena taddhitappaccayavasena
anya-e0806n0:1165_4: vā parokkhāti saddanipphattimāha. Te pana‘a u’ iccādayo. Tatoti parokkhappaccayato.
anya-e0806n0:1166_0: Nanu pubbapakkhe ‘aparokkhesū’ti ettha ‘parokkhāvajjitesū’ti attha vacanaṃ yujjati,
anya-e0806n0:1166_2: atthavacanaṃ yujjatīti āha- ‘tepanā’tiādi. Idhāti aparokkhesūti imasmiṃ. Nanu ca
anya-e0806n0:1166_4: vihitatā kathanti manasi nidhāyāha ‘parokkhe’iccādi. Bhavanaṃ bhāvo kiriyādhātvattho.
anya-e0806n0:1167_0: Sādhīyamānāvatthoti iminā siddhāvatthā nirassate. Pubbaparībhūto padhānakiriyāvayavabhūto
anya-e0806n0:1167_1: kiriyārūpo attho lakkhaṇaṃ sabhāvo yassa dhātvatthassa so tathā vutto. Satvabhūtoti
anya-e0806n0:1167_2: ettha patīyatīti seso. Bahuvacanampi hoti pākāpāketi adhippāyo, karīyatīti kammaṃ,
anya-e0806n0:1167_3: tañca yadipi nāmādikammamatthi, tathāpi kriyatthāiccādhikārato mānādīnamaññatthālabbhanato
anya-e0806n0:1167_4: ca kiriyā sambandhova gayhate, su-savane sūyamānaṃ.
anya-e0806n0:1168_0: Pāṇiniyehettha “bhindati kusūlaṃ’tyādo yā bhedanādikiriyā kammani dissate, sā yadā
anya-e0806n0:1168_2: sayameve’ccādinā, tadāssa kattuno suttantarena kammasarikkhabhāvo vidhīyate ‘kammanissayaṃ
anya-e0806n0:1168_3: kāriyaṃ yathā siyā’ti. Tannissāyāha- ‘yadā kammameve’ccādi. Yadā kammameva kattubhāvena
anya-e0806n0:1168_4: vivacchīyateti sambandho. Kathaṃ katvā tathā vivacchīyateccāha- ‘attasamavetāya’iccādi.
anya-e0806n0:1168_5: Attasaddena kammamatra vivacchitaṃ, attani samavetā ekadesībhūtā attasamavetā, tassā
anya-e0806n0:1169_0: Subhedattādineti hetumhi karaṇe vā tatiyā. Atthatoti ‘kammeyeva kyo’ti (na sakkhi)
anya-e0806n0:1169_1: tasmā vuttanti adhippāyo. Tathāhi ‘bhijjateti savanā kammatāvagamyate’ti iminā atthato
anya-e0806n0:1169_3: Aññathāti yadi kammeyeva tepaccayo na siyā. Atoti bhijjate iccasmā. Upasaṃharamāha-
anya-e0806n0:1169_4: ‘tasmā’iccādi. Kiṃ vacanenāti pāṇinīyānamiva kiṃ suttattarenāti attho.
anya-e0806n0:1170_0: Vacanābhāvepi kammakattari padasaṅkhārakkamopadassanamukhena vutti ganthaṃ vivaritumāha-
anya-e0806n0:1170_2: vākyato visuṃ katvā bhijjate’ti pade saṅkhariyamāne nipphādīyamāneti attho. Tadevāti
anya-e0806n0:1170_3: padatthasāmaññameva. Tannipphādaneti tassa saṅkharimānassa padassa saṅkharaṇe. Sayantīmassātra
anya-e0806n0:1170_4: attanāti attho. Na kevala manenetadeva vuttaṃ- ‘kammeyeva paccayo’ti, kiñcarahi aññampatthīti
anya-e0806n0:1170_5: dassetumāha- ‘anena ce’ccādi. Co vattabbantarasamuccaye. Anenabhijjateti savanāiccādinā
anya-e0806n0:1170_6: idañcāhāti attho. Kintadiccāha ‘kamma kattuno’ccādi, na padamudāharaṇanti kammakattuno
anya-e0806n0:1170_7: vākyamevodāharaṇaṃ… vākyeneva tassa patītiyā maññate. Padamevodāharaṇaṃ kasmā na
anya-e0806n0:1171_0: Asmiṃ pakkheti asmiṃ kattuttena vivacchite pakkhe. Tabbisayattanti kammavācīsayaṃ
anya-e0806n0:1171_1: saddavisayattaṃ. Bhāvakammesūtīmassa kattariccassa ca paccayavisesanatthe sati sāmatthiyaladdhampayojanaṃ
anya-e0806n0:1171_2: dassetumāha- ‘bhāvakammesū’tiādi. Iminā anena ca visesisattāti sambandho. Kintaṃ
anya-e0806n0:1171_3: visesitanti āha- ‘mānanta tyādīsū’ti. Kintampayojananti payojanaṃ dassetumāha- ‘tyādīna’miccādi.
anya-e0806n0:1171_4: Yadi bhāvakammesu kattari ca tena tena dhānena suttena mānādayo na siyuṃ, kathantaṃ
anya-e0806n0:1171_5: visesitesu mānādīsu paresu kyādayo siyuntīminā sāmatthiyena ( ) (sati) bhāvakammesu
anya-e0806n0:1172_0: Natadatthaṃ vacanamāraddhanti bhāvakammesu kattari mānantatyādividhānatthaṃ pāṇiniyehi
anya-e0806n0:1172_1: viya suttantaraṃ nāraddhanti attho. Atha bhāvakammesu kattari ca mānādividhānatthaṃ
anya-e0806n0:1172_2: vacanaṃ nāraddhaṃ dhātuniyamanaṃ dhātuniyamatthaṃ tvassa vattabbanti tañca sāmatthiyāva
anya-e0806n0:1172_4: ca sakammakā kamme kattari ceti kiriyatthaniyamo yathāvuttena sāmatthiyā labbhateti
anya-e0806n0:1172_5: sambandho. Akammakānaṃ kammavirahā, sakammakānañca satopi bhāvassāppadhānattā akammakā
anya-e0806n0:1172_6: kattari bhāve ca bhavanti na kamme, sakammakā kammasabbhāvā kattari kamme ca bhavanti
anya-e0806n0:1173_0: Kammamapekkhateti pacādito kattari paṭhamapurisekavacane kate pacaticcādīsu pacādino
anya-e0806n0:1173_1: pacanādikiriyā odanādikaṃ kammamapekkhate. Kattuttamapekkhateti bhavaticcādīsu bhūādīnaṃ
anya-e0806n0:1177_0: Jinantoti “byañjane dīgharassā”ti (1-33) rasso. Sabbattheva yattha kattari paccayo
anya-e0806n0:1177_1: tattha vikaraṇāpi kattariyeva, yattha bhāvakammesu tattha vikaraṇāpi bhāvakammesuyeva,…
anya-e0806n0:1177_2: ekāya pakatiyā kārakabhede(na) paccayassāsambhavato. Tasmā sahābhidhānānaṃ mānādivikaraṇānaṃ
anya-e0806n0:1179_1: kattabbo karaṇīyo. “Apavāda visaye ussaggo nābhinivisatī”ti eso ussaggadhammo. Tabbādīnantu
anya-e0806n0:1179_2: kesañcussaggānampi apavādavisaye pavatti hoti bahulādhikārā. Yathā “bhāvakammesu
anya-e0806n0:1179_3: tabbānīyā”ti ussaggo, “vadādīhiyo”ti (5-30) apavādo taṃvisayepi tabbānīyā honti ‘gantabbo
anya-e0806n0:1183: Annatotīminā ‘bhoggamañña’ntettha aññaṃ nāma annavatā aññanti atthamāha.
anya-e0806n0:1185: Kammakaro bharitabbatāyeccādinā kiriyāsaddattaṃ bhaccasaddassa dassento saññābhāvamapākaroti. “Saññāyaṃ bharā”ti ca gaṇasuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ, tenāha- ‘saññāyaṃ bharā’tiādi.
anya-e0806n0:1186_0: Abharitabbāpiccādinā idaṃ dīpeti duvidhā saññāsaddā keci daccanta vigatāvayavatthā
anya-e0806n0:1186_1: yathā ḍitthādayo, kecidavayavatthānugatāyathā sattapaṇṇādayo, tattha bhariyāsaddassa
anya-e0806n0:1186_2: kammampavattinimittaṃ ‘bharitabbā bhariyā’ti, yathā satta paṇṇāni assāti sambandho
anya-e0806n0:1186_4: kvacideva tvatthavisese satyasati vā tasmiṃ nimitte saddo vattatī”ti. Okārassāti
anya-e0806n0:1188_0: Saddikānanti pāṇiniyakaccāyanādiveyyākaraṇānaṃ. Pesanaṃ sakkārapubbakaṃ vā niyojanaṃ.
anya-e0806n0:1188_1: Kāmacārānuññāti kattumicchato yathiccha manujānanaṃ atisaggonāmāti attho. Nimittabhūtassāti
anya-e0806n0:1189_0: Nanu ca sāmaññena vihitā e(te), tathā ca sati vijjhatthavihi tehi eyyādīhi te bādhīyanticcāha-
anya-e0806n0:1189_1: ‘nace’ccādi. Vidhivisesatte pīti vidhānaṃ vidhi niyojanaṃ kiriyāsu byāpāraṇā, tassa
anya-e0806n0:1189_2: vidhino pesādīnaṃ visesattepi, nāvassantiādi jayādiccabyākhyānaṃ nissāya vuttaṃ,
anya-e0806n0:1189_3: vuttañhi tena “kimatthaṃ pesādīsu kiccasaññino tabbaanīyaṇyatyappaccayā vidhīyante,
anya-e0806n0:1189_4: na sāmaññena bhāvakammesu vihitā, evamete vihitāeva, vo-kāsikāvutti pesvādīññasvatra
anya-e0806n0:1189_5: ca bhavissantīti visesavihitena vidhyādīsu paccayena bādhīyante, vāsarūpavidhinā
anya-e0806n0:1189_6: bhavissanti evañcarahi etaṃ ñāpeti ‘itthīadhikārato parena vāsarūpavidhi nāvassambhavatī’ti
anya-e0806n0:1189_7: kimatthamiccādi codya, vicasasavihiteccādi parihāro, kiccā hi sāmaññena vihitā, pañcamī
anya-e0806n0:1189_8: tu pesādinātthavisesena, ato tena visesavihitena kiccā pesādivisaye bādhīyeranti
anya-e0806n0:1189_9: punabbiyate, vāsarūpeccādinā parihāraṃ vighaṭayati. evaṃ carahiccādinā pesādīsu kiccavidhānassa
anya-e0806n0:1189_11: vā vikappena bādhako hoti ussaggassāti etaṃ avassaṃ na hotīti ñāpanatthampi na vidhīyateti
anya-e0806n0:1189_13: apavādappaccayo ussaggassa bādhako bhavati itthi adhikāre vihitappaccayaṃ vajjayitvāti
anya-e0806n0:1190_0: Bhotā khalu kaṭo kātabboccādi pesane. Tvayā kaṭo kātabboti anuññāyaṃ. Pattakāle paramudāharaṇaṃ.
anya-e0806n0:1190_1: Ettha pana kaṭakaraṇe kālārocanamattameva viññāyati, na pesādi. “Sattyarahesveyyādī”ti
anya-e0806n0:1190_3: vuttamatthaṃ vivarati ‘sattī’tiādinā. Kathaṃ sattivisiṭṭhatā kattunoti āha- ‘taṃyogā’ti.
anya-e0806n0:1190_4: Tāya sattiyā yogo taṃyogo. Avassakādhamīṇatāvisiṭṭhe tu kattari kiccānaṃ tadaññesañca
anya-e0806n0:1190_5: bhāvāya visuṃ- suttitaṃ, tena, vuttaṃ ‘āvassakādhamīṇatā visiṭṭheva kattarī’ti. Sabbatthevettha
anya-e0806n0:1190_6: ‘uddhaṃ muhuttato’tiādinā ekekamudāharaṇaṃ kamena dassitaṃ. Bhotā rajjaṃ kātabbanti
anya-e0806n0:1190_7: arahe, bhavatā rajjaṃ kātabbanti attho. Bhavaṃ arahoti pana arahakattuttappakāsanatthaṃ
anya-e0806n0:1192_0: Galecopakoti alopasamāso. Abhimato parehi. Arahādīsu vihitappaccayehīti “sattyarahesveyyādī”
anya-e0806n0:1192_1: (6-11) ca “sīlābhikkhaññāvassakesu ṇī”ti (5-53) ca arahādīsu vihitappaccayehi. Upādānasīlo
anya-e0806n0:1192_2: sikkhāpanasīlo. Muṇḍanaṃ dhammo sabhāvo yesaṃ te muṇḍanadhammā. Vadhuṃ katapariggahaṃ
anya-e0806n0:1194_1: yo kattā so visayo yassā sā tathā vuttā. Kiriyāvisesakattuvisayattameva phuṭī kattumāha-
anya-e0806n0:1194_2: ‘assā’iccādi. Assā jīvanakiriyāya nandana kiriyāya bhavanakiriyāya vā kattā taṃkiriyaṃ
anya-e0806n0:1194_3: sampādento bhaveyya bhavatūti attho. Jīvatu nandatu bhavatūti āsiṃsāyaṃ payogena
anya-e0806n0:1195_0: Akenevāsiṃ sanatthassa gamitattāti āsiṃsanā eva attho, tassa akappaccayeneva gamitattā
anya-e0806n0:1195_1: avabodhitattā. Nāsiṃ sanatthassa payogoti āsiṃsanā attho yassa jīvatu nandatu bhavatviccādino
anya-e0806n0:1199_0: Jahanti udakanti vīhīsu hāyanasaddassa pavattinimittaṃ dasseti. Jahāti bhāve padattheti
anya-e0806n0:1199_1: imināpi saṃvacchare. Bhāveiccassatthamāha ‘padatthe’ti. Nipphattimattaṃ kiriyopādānanti keci.
anya-e0806n0:1201_0: Nanu ca vitoti pañcamīniddiṭṭhattā ‘vito parasmā ñāiccasmā’ti vattabbaṃ kathaṃ vipubbāti
anya-e0806n0:1201_1: vuttanti āha- ‘vito paro’iccādi. Vipubbo yassaso vipubbo. Visaddato dhātumhi parabhūte
anya-e0806n0:1201_2: sati visaddo pubbo nāma hotīti attho.
anya-e0806n0:1205_1: kriyatthasambandhā kiriyākammasseha gahaṇaṃ. Tañca nibbattivikatipattibhedena tividhaṃ,
anya-e0806n0:1206_0: Lokavidūtiādidassanato kvaciggahaṇe payojanaṃ vattumāha- ‘kammato’ccādi. Nanu ca
anya-e0806n0:1206_2: vuttanti āha ‘tene’ccādi. Tenāti yena kvaciggahaṇaṃ kutociyevāti dassanatthaṃ kataṃ
anya-e0806n0:1206_3: tenāti attho. Tenāti vā kvaciggahaṇena. Atha ādiccaṃ passaticcādo viya kammakarādīsupi
anya-e0806n0:1206_4: nivattimadassetvā ‘kvacīti kiṃ kammakaro’ti kasmā vuttanti āha- ‘yajjeva’miccādi.
anya-e0806n0:1207_0: Tassāti bahulavacanassa, mahādhikārattāti mahāvisayattā. Kutociyevāti kutoci dhātutoyeva.
anya-e0806n0:1207_1: Atheha kasmā na hoti devadatto sayati dāttena lunāti sunakhānaṃ dadāti nagarā apeti
anya-e0806n0:1207_2: thāliyaṃ pacati mātu saratī”ti, sabbamevedaṃ kiriyā (yā) bhisambandhīyatīti yadipevaṃ,
anya-e0806n0:1207_3: tathāpi kammatteneva yaṃ vattu micchitaṃ na kārakantarattena nāpi sambandhabhāvena,
anya-e0806n0:1207_4: tasseva kammasaddena gahaṇaṃ kammavacanasāmatthiyā, aññathā syāditocceva vadeyya
anya-e0806n0:1209: Vedanti ettha atthamāha vittinti, tuṭṭhinti attho.
anya-e0806n0:1211_0: Tañceti upamānassa parāmāso. Bhedena vivaraṇanti samānādīhīti avatvā bhedena vivaraṇaṃ.
anya-e0806n0:1213_0: Kārakaṃ sādhakaṃ nibbattakanti anatthantaraṃ. Karoti kiriyaṃ nibbatteti nimittabhāvenāti
anya-e0806n0:1213_1: kārakaṃ. Kattādīnaṃ kiriyānimittattantu sayameva ‘tattha kattā’tiādinā bhedena pakāsayissati.
anya-e0806n0:1213_2: Kiriyānimittaṃ… nibbattakesu kattādīsu chasupi ruḷhattā tenettha kattāvāttappadhāno,
anya-e0806n0:1213_3: karaṇādayopyappadhānā kārakabyapadeso labbhante… aññathā kārakasaddena tesaṃ gahaṇaṃ
anya-e0806n0:1213_4: na siyāti. Kimidaṃ kārakantyāha- ‘sattikāraka’nti. Evaṃ carahi dabbādīnaṃ kathaṃ
anya-e0806n0:1213_5: kārakattamiccāha- ‘tadadhikaraṇā’tiādi. Tassā sattiyā ādhārā nissayāti attho, puṃ
anya-e0806n0:1213_6: napuṃsake adhikaraṇasaddo. Tesu dabbā dīsu tiṭṭhatīti tatraṭṭhā, satti. Tassā bhāvo
anya-e0806n0:1213_7: tatraṭṭhatā, tāya. Atha dabbādīnaṃ mukhyato kārakatte sati kimāyātantyāha ‘yadi’ccādi.
anya-e0806n0:1214_0: Tesanti kattādikārakānaṃ. Aññamaññabyāvuttarūpattāti aññamaññato byāvuttaṃ nivattaṃ
anya-e0806n0:1214_1: rūpaṃ karaṇādisabhāvo yesaṃ kattādi kārakānaṃ te tathā vuttā, tesaṃ bhāvo tattaṃ
anya-e0806n0:1214_2: tasmā. Karaṇa rūpanti karaṇaṃ rūpaṃ sabhāvo yassa adhikaraṇassa taṃ tathā vuttaṃ.
anya-e0806n0:1214_3: Evañcasatiko dosoccāha ‘tathā ce’ccādi. Kenaci sukarattena sappadhānattavacanicchāyaṃ
anya-e0806n0:1215_0: Evañcakatvāti nipātasamudāyo-yaṃ hetvattho. Tasmāti attho. Kattā nimittanti sambandho.
anya-e0806n0:1215_1: Kattuṭṭhakiriyānimittassa kattuno udāharaṇaṃ ‘hasati naccatī’ti. Tadattheti tāya
anya-e0806n0:1215_2: kammasamavāyiniyā pacanādikiriyāya atthe adhissayanādayo pavattento kiriyāya nimittanti
anya-e0806n0:1216_0: Odanaṃ pacati devadattoti kammaṭṭhakiriyāya nimittabhūtassa kattuno udāharaṇaṃ. Bhājanasaṅkharaṇamadhissayanaṃ.
anya-e0806n0:1216_1: Ādisaddena taṇḍulavapanaindhanāpaharaṇādayo gayhanti. Dvidhāpattiyanti rukkhādīnaṃ dvidhā pavattiyaṃ.
anya-e0806n0:1217_0: Byāpaneti sambandhe. Giradhātuto appaccaye- “eonama vaṇṇe”ti (137) sutte ‘avaṇṇeti
anya-e0806n0:1217_1: yogavibhāgato gakāre ikārassa attaṃ hotīti dassetumāha- ‘avaṇṇeti yogavibhāgā attaṃ
anya-e0806n0:1217_3: kataessa. Sakalenāti ‘eonama vaṇṇe”ti sakalena suttena. Purīti nipāto.
anya-e0806n0:1218_0: Īsakkaroti bindulopo, dvittaṃ, sāmaññena vidhānatoti paresaṃ visesavidhānasabbhāvamāha.
anya-e0806n0:1218_1: Gaṇikālayaṃ gaṇikānaṃ gehaṃ. Nepathyamākappo. Dattoladdhoti paccayassa kammasādhanattaṃ
anya-e0806n0:1218_2: dīpetuṃvuttaṃ. Vināliṅgavacanehi pāṭipadikatthaṃ niddisituṃ na sakkāti bhāveti sabbaliṅgasaṅkhyāsambandhayoggapāṭipadikatthasāmaññe
anya-e0806n0:1218_3: paccayanimittattena gahitepi sāmaññe caritatthattā liṅgavacanaṃ nappadhānanti iṭṭhiāvudhantī
anya-e0806n0:1218_4: itthi napuṃsakebhāve, pākāti bahuvacanepi bhāve bhavati eva.
anya-e0806n0:1220: Sapādīhi apādīhicāti pādisahitehi pādirahitehi ca dādhāhi.
anya-e0806n0:1222: Sāpānadoṇiyanti sārameyānaṃ bhuñjanakaambaṇe. Ṭhitasupāna vamathuviyāti pavattasunakhacchaddanaṃ viya.
anya-e0806n0:1224_0: Yathādassananti ācikkhatīti yojanā. Tena kutoci dhātutoti. Gaṇhantīti gaha=upādāneccassa.
anya-e0806n0:1224_1: Salākāsaddassa salākanti. Sabhāsaiccassa antabyañjanalope sabhāpakatito “itthi yamatvā”ti
anya-e0806n0:1226: Calanādīnaṃ sīlādīsu nipphādanatthaṃ visuṃ suttitaṃ parehi, idha pana bahulaṃ vacanenevāti dassetumāha- ‘calanādīsū’tiādi.
anya-e0806n0:1228_0: Klikayakiccatra kakārabahuttā kakārāti bahuvacanaṃ. Titikkhā iccādo titikkhanamiccādinā
anya-e0806n0:1228_1: viggaho “itthiyamatvā” (3-26). Apari paṭhitoti dhātupāṭhe aparipaṭhito. Pāṇivisesoti
anya-e0806n0:1228_2: sattaviseso. Iminā ca “yathākathañci nipphatti, ruḷhiyā atthanicchayo”ti dasseti.
anya-e0806n0:1229_0: Āsiṃ sāyaṃ gammamānāyaṃ saññāvisaye dhātūhi tippaccayo kiccappaccayo ca yathā siyāti
anya-e0806n0:1229_1: “tikiccāsiṭṭhe”ti (7-2-3) suttitaṃ kaccāyanena. Tamiha sāmaññena vidhānāva siddhanti
anya-e0806n0:1229_2: nirūpayitumāha- ‘kaccāyanena pane’ccādi. Tabba anīyaṇya teyya riccappaccayānaṃ “te
anya-e0806n0:1229_3: kiccā”ti (7-1-22) kiccasaññaṃ vidhāya sesānaṃ “aññekitī”ti (7-1-23) kitsaññā katā
anya-e0806n0:1230_0: Tabbādippaccayo ca vihitoti sakiyavohārenāha. Sakiya satthe avuttadosaṃ suttadosaṃ
anya-e0806n0:1230_1: pariharitvā vakkhamānanayena yutyabhāvā tathā vidhāne ayuttataṃ dassento ‘nacāsiṃ
anya-e0806n0:1230_2: sāya’miccādimāha. Guhanaṃ, rujanaṃ, modananti viggaho. Sayanaṃ vā seyyā. Vajadhātuno
anya-e0806n0:1230_3: vassa bakārena bhavitabbaṃ, so kathaṃ yakāre parabhūte asatīti āha- ‘cavaggabayañātiyogavibhāgā vassa bo’ti.
anya-e0806n0:1234_0: Atha sarūpeccetāvati vutte- ‘kiriyatthassa sarūpe’ti kathaṃ viññāyaticcāha- ‘kiriyatthā’ticcādi.
anya-e0806n0:1234_1: Nanu ca lo-yaṃ kattari vidhīya mānokathamettha siyātyāha- ‘akattaripi’ccādi. Abhimato
anya-e0806n0:1234_2: kaccāyanassa. Paṭipādayitumāha- ‘tatthā’tiādi. Karaṇaṃ uccāraṇaṃ, assa karoti samāsavākyaṃ.
anya-e0806n0:1234_3: Na hi eva dīhi kāro vihitoti akkhare heva kārassa vihitattā akkharasamudāyato na
anya-e0806n0:1234_4: pappotīti bhāvo. Atha ceti matappadāne. Evādisaddavācakā evakārādayo sādhavoti atha matanti attho.
anya-e0806n0:1235: Tatthāti tathā abhimate tasmiṃ. Niyamahetuno abhāvāti akkhareheva kārappaccayo vidheyyo na pana evādīhiccassa niyamassa yo hetu tassa hetuno abhāvā.
anya-e0806n0:1237_1: Kiriyāvisayarucivisesānumitanti uṇhabhojanasaṅkhātā kiriyā visayo yassa so (kiriyā)
anya-e0806n0:1237_2: visayo ruciviseso, tena anumitanti attho. Kimidamābhikkhaññanti āha- ‘ābhikkhañña’miccādi.
anya-e0806n0:1237_3: Punappunabhāvo ponopuññaṃ. Āse vā tapparatāti tamevābhikkhaññaṃ pariyāyehi phuṭīkaroti.
anya-e0806n0:1238_0: Yajjevanti yadi ābhikkhaññaṃ tappato vuccate. Tassīlyamidaṃ hotīti iminā- ‘sīlābhikkhaññādi”sutte
anya-e0806n0:1238_1: sīlasaddenevābhikkhaññassa gahitattaṃ dīpeti. Aññathāpi sīlato aññamevābhikkhaññanti
anya-e0806n0:1239_0: Gammamāneti patīyamāne. Patīti ca atthappakaraṇasaddantarādīhi. Abhimatoti pāṇiniyehi
anya-e0806n0:1239_1: abhimato. Āvassakaggahaṇāyeva siddhoti vuttaṃ kathametthāvassambhāvo patīyati ccāha- ‘tañcā’tiādi.
anya-e0806n0:1240_0: Yogavibhāgāti ‘ṇī’ti yoga vibhāgā. Sādhuṃ karoti, brahmaṃ vadati, asaddhaṃ bhuñjati,
anya-e0806n0:1240_1: paṇḍitamattānaṃ maññatīti viggaho. Sādhunti kiriyāvisesanaṃ. Assaddhabhojīti vate.
anya-e0806n0:1240_2: Vatañca bhojane atthitāyaṃ saddhaassaddhabhojanavisayāyaṃ pavattiyaṃ yadi bhuñjati
anya-e0806n0:1240_3: assaddhameva bhuñjati na saddhanti satthe vuttaniyamo, assaddhaṃ bhuñjati evāti nottarapadāvadhāraṇaṃ…
anya-e0806n0:1240_4: evañhi viññāyamāne yadevāssaddhaṃ na bhuñjati tadeva vatalopo siyāti atthitāya (bhojanākaṅkhitattā)
anya-e0806n0:1240_5: yathecchaṃ sāmaññena bhojane pavattiyaṃ mattāyaṃ asaddhabhojanaṃ satthavihitamupalabhamānassa
anya-e0806n0:1240_6: saddhato nivattitvā visese hi saddhe pavattiniyamo vatamuccate, niyamocātraduvidho
anya-e0806n0:1240_7: sambhavati-asaddhaṃ bhūñjati eva, athaddhamo bhuñjatīti vā, tatrādime niyame yadevā
anya-e0806n0:1240_8: saddhaṃ na bhuñjati tadevavata loposiyā (ra-3-228) kātantapañjikā. Aññathāpi paṭipādayitumāha-
anya-e0806n0:1242_0: Sayameva attanāeva. Kammakattarīti ubhayatthāpi kammakattari paccayo bahulādhikārāti
anya-e0806n0:1242_1: adhippāyo. Ettha pana ekopi padattho kammañca hoti kattāca kārakasattibhedato. Yathā
anya-e0806n0:1242_2: ‘pīyamānaṃ madhu madayatī’ti ekassāpi sattibhedā kammattaṃ kattuttaṃ, tathā trāpīti
anya-e0806n0:1242_3: viññeyyaṃ. Yo paraṃ bhañjati tatthapi siyā sāmaññavidhānatoti āha- ‘nipātanassi’ccādi.
anya-e0806n0:1245_0: Nanucātretaretaranissayadoso pasajjate, satī hi bhūtādhikāretto vidhīyate, sati ca
anya-e0806n0:1245_1: tte bhūtasaddassa nipphattīti phuṭo yevitaretaranissayadosoti. Nesadoso, saṅketāti
anya-e0806n0:1245_2: byatto saddatthasambandho cirakālappavatto, nāssa kiñci asādhuttaṃ, atikkante cāssa
anya-e0806n0:1245_3: vutti saddasattisabhāvato veditabbā. Ktavantā dayopi carahi saddasattisabhāvato bhūteeva
anya-e0806n0:1245_4: bhavissantīti na vattabbaṃ. Bhūtasaddo-yamatikkantatthe pasiddho ktavantādayotvappasiddhā,
anya-e0806n0:1245_5: ato tena pasiddhatthenāppasiddhānamanvākhyānaṃ karīyatīti. Bhūteti cāyaṃ pakativisesanaṃ
anya-e0806n0:1245_6: vā siyā ‘bhūtatthe vattamānā’ti, paccayattha visesanaṃ vā’bhūte kattarī’ti, tatra
anya-e0806n0:1245_7: kassidaṃ visesananti āhabhūteti pakativisesana’nti. Kutoccāha- ‘sambandhassa ce’tyādi.
anya-e0806n0:1245_8: Atha paccayatthavisesane ko dosoccāha- ‘paccayatthavisesane hi’ccādi. Paccayatthassa
anya-e0806n0:1245_9: kattuno anabhikkantattā ayanti payogo nopapajjateti bhāvo. Abhidheyyeti iminā payojanādiṃ byavacchindati.
anya-e0806n0:1247: Kamme guṇībhūtattāti kamme sati bhāvassāppadhānattā. “Guṇamukhyesu mukhyeyeva kāriyasampaccayo”ti mukhye kammeyeva paccayo, na tu bhāve tassetthāppadhānattā.
anya-e0806n0:1249_0: Nanucārambheti vuttaṃ- ‘kiriyārambhe’ti kathanti āha- ‘soce’ccādi. So ca ārambho.
anya-e0806n0:1249_1: Kiriyāyeva ārambhokiriyārambho tasmiṃ. Kiriyārambheti sāmaññena vuttattā kiriyatthavisesanaṃ
anya-e0806n0:1249_2: vā etaṃsiyā paccayatthavisesanaṃ vā ubhayathāpi na dosoti dassetumāha- ‘kiriyatthavisesanaṃ
anya-e0806n0:1249_3: ceta’ntiādi. Paccayatthavisesanapakkhepi sāmatthiyā ārambhe kiriyatthassāpi pavattī
anya-e0806n0:1249_5: Anantarasuttena yo vihito kto, sopi sāmaññena vacanato bhāvakammesu ārambhepi hotīti
anya-e0806n0:1249_6: yojanā. Sāmaññena vacanatoti “kto bhāvakammesū”ti (5-56) sāmaññena vacanato. Bhāvakammesuceti
anya-e0806n0:1249_7: evaṃ na vuttanti ‘yathāpattañce’ti vadatā vuttikārenevaṃ na vuttanti attho.
anya-e0806n0:1250_0: Kasmā evaṃ na vuttanti āha- ‘pubbasmiṃ viyā’ti ādi. Aniyamuppatti saññāya sati ñāpananti
anya-e0806n0:1250_2: Evaṃ maññate “bhāvakamma gahaṇaṃ cākārenānukaḍḍhiya ‘bhāvakammesu cā’tyanena ktevidhīya
anya-e0806n0:1250_3: māne idamāsaṅkīyate ‘pubbeneva sāmaññena siddhe punabbacanā punabbacanaṃ kiriyatthāniyamena
anya-e0806n0:1250_4: ttassuppattī’ti, yathāpattañceti hyuccamāne cakārena yathāpattampi kāriyamanuññāyateti
anya-e0806n0:1250_5: pubbeneva vacanena bhāvakammesvārambhepi yathāpatto kto bhavatīti viññāyate”ti. Evañcarahi
anya-e0806n0:1250_6: bhāvakammesvārambhepi pubbeneva siddhattā “kattariārambhe”icceva vucceyya kiṃ cakārene
anya-e0806n0:1251_0: Nanucādibhūto kiriyākkhaṇo ārambho nāma, bahūhi kiriyākkhaṇehi kaṭe parisamatteyeva
anya-e0806n0:1251_1: bhūto kālo ca bhavatīti kiriyāphalassāparinipphannattā vattamānova kāloti tatrakto
anya-e0806n0:1251_2: na pappoticcāsaṅkiyāha- ‘kiriyāphalassi’ccādi. Kaṭekadesassāpi kaṭattā tassa ca nibbattattā
anya-e0806n0:1251_3: bhūtavacanicchāti bhāvo. Nanucādisūte kiriyākkhaṇakāle kaṭo nābhinibbatto, kaṭakāraṇabhūtā
anya-e0806n0:1251_4: bīraṇāva hi tadā santi, na ca tadavatthā te eva kaṭoti kathaṃ ‘pakato kaṭo’ti bhūtakālena
anya-e0806n0:1251_6: visese. Pakattuṃ ārabhi, pakattuṃ ārabhīyittha, pasottuṃ ārabhi, pasottuṃ ārabhananti atthe tto.
