anya-e0806n0:1253_0: Anārambhatthaṃvacananti ārambhe pubbeneva siddhattā. Apādinopisilisassa sakammakattā-
anya-e0806n0:1253_1: ‘yebhuyyenā’ti vuttaṃ. Sakammakatthanti vatvā sakammattamesaṃ pādiyoge sati hotīti
anya-e0806n0:1255_0: Avivacchitakammo cehākammakoti kathayamāha- ‘avijjamāne’ccādi. Yātavanto yātā, yānaṃ
anya-e0806n0:1255_1: yātaṃ. Ayoyitthāti yā to. Kto na vidhātabbo pāṇiniyehi viya. Kāraṇasāmaggiyaṃ bhūtāyanti
anya-e0806n0:1255_2: sassādihetubhūtasamiddhiyaṃ bhūtāyaṃ. Sā ca bhūtā yevātīminā kāraṇasāmaggiyā atītakālikattamāha.
anya-e0806n0:1257_0: Ādhāreceti anuvuttiyā ettha cakārato ‘yathāpattañce’ti sambandhā vuttanti seso. Evaṃ
anya-e0806n0:1257_1: na kutoci apakassanaṃ siyāti evamādhārādike anuvattamāne sati kutoci ādhārādito apakassanaṃ
anya-e0806n0:1257_2: visuṃ karaṇaṃ na siyāti attho. Tathā sati heṭṭhā suttenekayogameva kareyyāti adhippāyo.
anya-e0806n0:1258_0: Bahulassa bhāvo kammaṃvāti bahvatthādānamevātra bahulasaddassa pavattinimittaṃ bhāvo
anya-e0806n0:1258_1: kammaṃceti tattha paccayo. Kecīti pāṇiniye yeva sandhāyāha. Tassāpi bhūteyeva pavattimupadisati ‘sopi’ccādi
anya-e0806n0:1259_0: Nā. Bhijjamānanti paccamānaṃ. Pararūpena passinnoti yojanā. Keciti teyeva. “Matibuddhipūjatthehi
anya-e0806n0:1259_1: ce”ti (3-2-188) tesaṃ sutte casaddākaḍḍhite dasseti ‘yathā’tiādinā. Akkocchi tanti
anya-e0806n0:1259_2: kamme viggahamāha, tanti kammapadaṃ, evamuparipi curādiṇilope “nimittābhāve nemittikassāpyabhāvo”tyākāranivatti.
anya-e0806n0:1259_3: Kasirayaṃ gatyādyane kattho, kaṭṭhaṃtyatra kimatthoti āha- ‘ettha hiṃsattho’ti.
anya-e0806n0:1260: Hetunoti dukkhaphalassa hetuno agyādino. Kaṭṭhasaddassa phalahetubhūte agyādike vattamāne evaṃ hotu phalevattamāne kathanti āha- ‘yadāpanā’tiādi. Kodhātiko idha.
anya-e0806n0:1262_0: Nanu ca bhāveiti bhavatināyaṃ ghaṇantena niddeso karīyatīti bhavativisayova paccayatthaniddeso
anya-e0806n0:1262_1: kato bhavati, tato ca bhavatino yo bhāvo tasmiṃyeva vācce paccayo siyā, so ca bhavatito
anya-e0806n0:1262_2: yevuppajjamānena paccayena sakkābhidhātuṃ tato tasmāva paccayena bhavitabbaṃ, tasmā
anya-e0806n0:1262_3: kathaṃ pacituṃ pāko cāgo rāgotipacādīhibhavati ccāha- ‘bhavanaṃbhāvo kiriyādhātvattho’ti.
anya-e0806n0:1263: Kiriyāsāmaññañhi sabbadhātvatthānugataṃ bhavatissattho, tena kiriyāsāmaññavācinātthaniddeso karīyamāno sabbadhātuvisaye kato bhavati tasmā pacādīhipi bhavatītyadhippāyo.
anya-e0806n0:1264_0: Nanu cātra tumādayo bhāve bhavantīti vutte na viññāyate kiṃvisesite bhāve tumādayo
anya-e0806n0:1264_1: bhavanticcāha- ‘yato’ccādi. Tassāti dhātuno. Yo vattabbo bhāvoti yo vācco bhāvo.
anya-e0806n0:1264_2: Kutoccāha- ‘sambandhā’ti. Tumādīnaṃ yā pakati tāya vācceneva bhāvena saha sambandhāti
anya-e0806n0:1264_3: attho. Ṭhātabbanti bhāve tabbo. Atha kriyāyaṃtyanena tabbādyabhihitassa dabbarūpāpannassa
anya-e0806n0:1264_4: bhāvassa kathaṃ gahaṇaṃtyāha- ‘yadipi’ccādi. Sakanissayakiriyābyapadesoti dabba rūpassa
anya-e0806n0:1264_5: attano nissayabhūtāya kiriyāya byapadeso daṭṭhuṃ cakkhuccādo bhavanakiriyāya patīyamānattā
anya-e0806n0:1265_0: Nanu ca tumādīnaṃ bhāve vihitattā kiriyāyeva padhānattanti kamma kārakaṃ nappatīyateti
anya-e0806n0:1265_1: kathaṃ ‘kaṭaṃ kātuṃ gacchatī’ti siyāccā saṅkiya paṭipādetumāha- ‘yadipi’ccādi. Dhātvatthakato
anya-e0806n0:1265_2: kiriyāsaṅkhātena dhātvatthena kato. Atthīti iminā yattha ‘supyate deva dattene’ccādo
anya-e0806n0:1266_1: tumādayo yathāsiyunti visuṃ suttitaṃ, tenāha- ‘icchatthesmi’ccādi. Yathā ‘bhottuṃ
anya-e0806n0:1266_2: pacatī’tyādo bhojanakiriyā payojanā pacanakiriyā hoti, nevamettha tappa yojanā icchā…
anya-e0806n0:1267_0: Icchatthassa dhātuno payogāti iminā ‘icchanto karotī’ti ettha icchantoti icchatthassa
anya-e0806n0:1267_1: dhātuno payogatthameva, na icchāya payojanaṃ karaṇanti dīpeti. Devadattaṃ bhuñjamānamicchatītettha
anya-e0806n0:1267_2: bhottunti na hoti samānakattukesūti vacanato, bhojanassa devadatto kattā, icchatissa
anya-e0806n0:1267_3: aññoyevātipi suttassa visuṃ payojanaṃ na vattabbanti dassento āha- ‘devadatta’miccādi.
anya-e0806n0:1268_0: Icchatissāti’devadattaṃ bhuñjamānamicchatī’ti ettha icchatīti vuttaisissa. Sādhanaṃ
anya-e0806n0:1268_1: ‘devadattaṃ bhuñjamāna’nti vuttakammasaṅkhātaṃ attho payojanaṃ yassa so sādhanattho-icchati.
anya-e0806n0:1268_2: Tassa bhāvo tattaṃ, tasmā. Kammamevicchāya payojanabhāve ṭhitanti bhāvo. Niratthakanti
anya-e0806n0:1268_3: etadatthameva samānakattukaggahaṇaṃ kataṃ tañca yathāvuttena pasaṅgābhāvā niratthakanti adhippāyo.
anya-e0806n0:1269_0: Sakādyatthesu dhātū sūpapadesu dhātu mattā tumādayo suttantarena vihitā pāṇiniyehi,
anya-e0806n0:1269_1: tenāha- ‘sakādidhātuppayoge’tiādi. Siddhāti tumādayo siddhā. Bhujikiriyatthāti bhujikiriyā
anya-e0806n0:1269_2: attho yassā sattiyā sā bhujikiriyatthā patīyate. Patīya mānatte kāraṇamāha- ‘asatopi
anya-e0806n0:1269_3: hi’ccādi. Parehettha akiriyatthopapadattho punārabbhoti vaṇṇitaṃ. Tadetaṃ vighaṭayitumāha-
anya-e0806n0:1269_5: bhottuṃti tadasatti. Ghaṭate bhottuṃtyādo yogyatā. Ārabhate bhottuṃtyādobhujisse
anya-e0806n0:1269_6: vādyavatthākiriyantaraṃ. Labhate bhottuṃti appaccakkhānaṃ. Atthi bhottuntiādīsu sambhavamattaṃ.
anya-e0806n0:1269_7: Vaṭṭati bhottuṃtyādo dosā bhāvo gamyate. Sakkoticcādino upapadassa bhojanādikiriyatthatā
anya-e0806n0:1269_8: na gamyate tasmā akiriyatthesupi sakādīsūpapadesu tumādayo bhavantī”ti.
anya-e0806n0:1270_2: sakkotiādīnaṃ atthi yevāti attho siddhāyeva “tuṃtāye”ccādinā. Alamatthavisiṭṭhesu
anya-e0806n0:1270_3: pariyattivacanesūpapadesu dhātuto tumādayo vihitā parehi, tatthāha ‘alamatthavisiṭṭhe’iccādi.
anya-e0806n0:1270_4: Pahusaddampi antogadhaṃ katvā ‘samatthādī’ti vuttaṃ, bhavatissa sambhavo “pubbekakattukāna”nti
anya-e0806n0:1270_6: casaddena abhimatā imassāti ‘kālo bhottuṃ’tiādino. Yathā bhottumanotiādinā paresampi
anya-e0806n0:1270_7: ayameva nipphattikkamoti dīpeti. Abyabhicāratoti avinābhāvato, bhavati bhojanaṃ bhāvoti
anya-e0806n0:1270_8: bhojanaṃ bhuñjanaṃ bhāvo bhavatīti attho. Natugamissakiriyātadatthāti gamanakiriyā
anya-e0806n0:1270_9: bhojanatthā na hotīti attho. Atthasaddohyayaṃ payojanavacano yañca yamuddissa pavattati,
anya-e0806n0:1270_10: taṃ tassa payojanaṃ bhavati. Nacāyaṃ bhojanamuddissa gamissati, kiñcarahi kāriyantaraṃ,
anya-e0806n0:1270_11: kevalaṃ tena nimittena sambhāvīyate. Yadā tu bhojanatthamevārabbhate gamanakiriyā,
anya-e0806n0:1271_0: Tuṃvisaye ṇakopi vihito pāṇiniyehi, tatrāha- ‘kārako vajati’ccādi. Parihāramāha-
anya-e0806n0:1271_1: ‘pubbe’ccādinā. ‘Kattariltu’ccādinā yoyaṃ ṇako tīsupi kālesu sāmaññena vihito, kriyatthā
anya-e0806n0:1271_2: yaṃ kriyāyaṃ upapade kattuno-bhidhānaṃ siddhaṃ, na cāssa visesavihitena tuṃpaccayena
anya-e0806n0:1271_3: bādhā bhinnattā, tuṃpaccayassa hi bhāve vidhānaṃ ṇakassa tu kattarīti. Pubbaṇakeneva
anya-e0806n0:1271_4: siddhepi ltvādinivattiyā so vidheyyova, no ce ltvādayopi siyunti codakappasaṅgamāsaṅkiyāha-
anya-e0806n0:1271_6: eso vajati so kattā, yo eso vajati so vikkhipotyayamattho-tra gamyate, na pana tehi
anya-e0806n0:1271_7: tādatthiyaṃ gamyateti attho. Codako ltvādīhi sāmyamāpādayituṃ sāmarisaṃ vuttavidhinevāppattiṃ
anya-e0806n0:1271_8: ṇakassāpyāha- ‘ṇakopi’ccādi. Agatthaṃ apakatatthaṃ (potthake) yadipi ṇakena tādatthiyaṃ
anya-e0806n0:1271_9: na gamyate pakaraṇato gamyateti ṇako bhavissatītyāsaṅkiya codako āha- ‘athe’ccādi.
anya-e0806n0:1271_10: Pubbeccādinā vutto-yaṃ ‘ṇako na vidheyyo’ccassa na parihāro… sottarattā yathāvuttena,
anya-e0806n0:1271_12: tādatthiyānavagame vinicchite tādatthiyavisesena tesaṃ sambhavoti anatthakaṃ “ṇakassa
anya-e0806n0:1271_15: tathāpiṇako paro vidheyyotyadhippāyenāha- ‘athāpi’ccādi. Gatattaṃ. Bhavissati kāle
anya-e0806n0:1271_16: kriyatthāyaṃ kriyāyamupapade bhāve ca ṇappaccayādayo vihitā, tatrāha- ‘pākāya vajati’ccādi.
anya-e0806n0:1273: Sotunādīsu ‘savanaṃ kātuna’iccādinā viggaho. Suteneti savananti viggaho.
anya-e0806n0:1275_0: Veti nātisambajjhate vidhino niccattā. Ekasaddassānekatthattā viseseti ‘sakhyāvacanoyamekasaddo’ti.
anya-e0806n0:1275_1: Kutoccāha-‘saddāna’miccādi. Ekasaddassa saṅkhyāvacanatte yottho sampajjate, tamāha
anya-e0806n0:1275_3: samudāye ekadesabhūto byāpāro niddhāriyamānoti vuttaṃ, tathāpi pubbasaddena byāpāravācako
anya-e0806n0:1275_4: kriyattho vuccate upacārā, teneva ‘tesu yo pubbo tadatthato kriyatthā’ti vuttiyaṃvuttaṃ.
anya-e0806n0:1275_5: Nanu ca satti kārakaṃ, aññā ca pubbakālakiriyāya satti, aññā uttara kālakiriyāya,
anya-e0806n0:1275_6: tasmā kuto ekakattukattamiccāsaṅkiya paṭipādento āha- ‘yadipi’ccādi. Sattimato dabbassāti
anya-e0806n0:1275_7: devadattādino sattimato dabbassa. Tadajjhāropāti ekattassa ajjhāropā. Eka kattukānaṃ
anya-e0806n0:1275_8: byāpārānaṃ kamābhidhānāya tunādayo vidhīyamānā bhāveyevuppannā sakkonti kamamabhidhātunti
anya-e0806n0:1276_0: Ekakattukānanti bahuvacanattā ‘bhutvā pitvā vajatī’tipi bhavati. Bhuttasmintettha
anya-e0806n0:1276_1: anekakattukattā bhuñjitvāpi bhavati. Pāṇini yānamiva visuṃ vacanamantarena tunādividhippaṭipādayamāha-
anya-e0806n0:1276_2: ‘mukhaṃ byādāya supati’ccādi. Byādāyāti dādhātussa viāpubbassa tvāppaccaye “pyo vā
anya-e0806n0:1276_3: tvāssa samāse”ti (5-064) tvāssa pyādese rūpaṃ, mukhavivaraṇaṃ katvātyattho, byavadhāyakakālassāti
anya-e0806n0:1276_4: byādāna supanānamantareyo kālo tassa, bhedānupalakkhaṇanti bhedassādassanaṃ. Bhedassīnaṃ
anya-e0806n0:1277_0: Abhimatā pāṇiniyānaṃ, parāya nadiyā pabbato-varo visesī yateti appatvā nadimpabbato’ti
anya-e0806n0:1277_1: vutte nadiyā orabhāge pabbatoti attho. Bhavati, tato ca pārebhūtanadīvisiṭṭho pabbato
anya-e0806n0:1277_2: patīyate. Avarena pabbatena parā nadī visesīyateti atikkamma pabbataṃ nadīti vutte
anya-e0806n0:1277_3: pāre nadiyā ore pabbatoti attho patīyate, tato ca orabhāge pabbatavisiṭṭhā nadī viññāyate.
anya-e0806n0:1277_4: Bhavatino sabbattha sambhave sati ekakattukatā pubbakālatā yathā gamya te tathā dasseti
anya-e0806n0:1278_0: Bhutvā bhutvā gacchatīti pare-ññathā nipphattimākaṅkhanti pāṇiniyādayo, tatrāha-
anya-e0806n0:1278_2: phuṭayati ‘yehi’ccādinā. Yehīti veyyākaraṇehi. Jivaggāhaṃ agāhayiccādo pareññathā
anya-e0806n0:1278_4: abhimatoti sambandho. Kiṃ ṇampaccayenāti idaṃ vuttaṃ hotīti sambandho. Aññathā siddhippakāramāha-
anya-e0806n0:1278_5: ‘jīvassi’ccādi. Kiṃ visiṭṭhanti pucchitvā jīvaggāhena visiṭṭhanti dassetuṃ jīvaggāha’nti
anya-e0806n0:1279_0: Ākhyātanti agāhayīti ākhyātaṃ kattabbarūpanti imānā gahaṇa kiriyāya kammattaṃ bodheti.
anya-e0806n0:1279_1: Tabbisesanampīti kattabbarūpāya gahaṇa kiriyāya visesanampi. Tathābhūtamevāti kattabbarūpameva.
anya-e0806n0:1279_2: Tathā ceti kiriyāvisesane dutiyāya ṇamante jāte sati. Ṇamanta rūpanti ṇamantassa
anya-e0806n0:1279_3: rūpaṃ yassāti viggaho. Ṇaṃpaccayeniha kiñcineti sambandho. Iheti imasmiṃ byākaraṇe.
anya-e0806n0:1279_4: Kiñci payojanaṃ. Pacāditotiādisaddena tehi avihitaṇampaccayā gahitā.
anya-e0806n0:1281_0: Yo sādhayitumāraddho naca niṭṭhamupagatoti yo kaṭādisādhayituṃ nibbattayituṃ āraddho
anya-e0806n0:1281_1: niṭṭhaṃ parisamattiṃ na copagato nappatto. Pavatto-nuparatovāti yo pabbatādi niccappavato-avirato
anya-e0806n0:1281_2: teneva niṭṭhaṃ nopagatosovattamānoti vuccateti yojanā. Tabbi sayakiriyādvārenāti
anya-e0806n0:1281_3: yathāvuttakaṭādivisaya kiriyāmukhena, idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti “yathāvuttakaṭādīnaṃ vattamānattā
anya-e0806n0:1281_4: tabbisayā kiriyāpi vattamānā evāti taṃdvārena kriyatthavisesana”nti.
anya-e0806n0:1282_0: Bhuñjati devadattoti ettha yajjapi bhuñjamāno hasati khajjati vadati pāniyaṃ pivati,
anya-e0806n0:1282_1: tathāpi yuttā vattamānatā kattumicchitassārambho na parisamattoti vuttaṃ- ‘sādhayitumāraddho
anya-e0806n0:1282_2: na ca niṭṭhamupagato’ti. Tiṭṭhanti pabbatātiādīsu niccesu pabbatādīsu bhūtānāgatānamasambhavā
anya-e0806n0:1282_3: tannisedhino vattamānassāpyasambhavā yadīpi kālavibhāgo na viññāyate, tathāpi āraddhassa
anya-e0806n0:1282_4: ṭhānassāparisamattiyā vattamānā evāti vuttaṃ- ‘pavatto-nuparato vā’ti. Kattuvisesane
anya-e0806n0:1282_5: sati ko dosoccāha- ‘kattu visesane’ccādi. Ihāpi siyā kattuno vattamānattā, vattamānatta
anya-e0806n0:1283_0: Idha pana sāmaññena vihitattā āha- ‘sāmaññenā’tiādi. Santo ‘asa-bhuvi’ntappaccayo.
anya-e0806n0:1283_3: ‘dhara=dhāraṇe’. Payojakabyāpāre ṇi, dharituṃ payuñjamāno dhārayanto. Dissanto disa
anya-e0806n0:1285_0: Kālakato avatthāviseso vayo. Mānovāti imināntappaccayābhāvamāha. Yujjhamānā’yudha=sampahāre’
anya-e0806n0:1289_1: ādī yeyaṃ kālādīnaṃ te dhā tvādayo tesaṃ pariggahenāti attho. Kālo vattamānādi, kārakaṃ
anya-e0806n0:1289_2: kattādi pakaṃsena niyamena paccayo karīyate etasmāti pakati. Kākriyaṃ āyukādi.
anya-e0806n0:1290_0: Kāriyavisesanti ādesādikāriyavisesaṃ. Kāru sippijāti viseso. Tacchakādayo (tacchakakamma)
anya-e0806n0:1290_1: kāratantavāyarajakanahāpitā pañca kāravo cārudāruti vattamāne kālaniyamenāññatrāpi
anya-e0806n0:1292_1: nanu sutte ekassaroti pulliṅgena niddeso, ādīti ca tabbisesanaṃ, evaṃ sati napuṃsakena
anya-e0806n0:1292_2: vivaraṇaṃ kathaṃ yujjatīti āha- ‘sadde’ccādi, atha jāgareccādo puthagavayavekassarassa
anya-e0806n0:1292_3: jāgarasaddassa ca paccekaṃ kasmā na dvibhāvoccāha- ‘teneve’ccādi.
anya-e0806n0:1293_1: ‘avayavo ca so ekassaro ce’ti. Athādīhi ekassaravisesanattepyavayavekassarassa kasmā
anya-e0806n0:1294_1: vattumāha- ‘ekassaroti’ccādi. Tathā sati ko dosoti āha- ‘eko ce’ccādi. Sarodīti ca
anya-e0806n0:1295_0: Nanu ca pacatimhi yenevākārena pacasaddo ekassaro teneva tadavayavāpi acsaddo pasaddo
anya-e0806n0:1295_1: ca ekassaro, tatovāvayavānampi paccekaṃ dvibbacanaṃ pappoti… dvibbacanakāriyino ādissa
anya-e0806n0:1295_2: ekassarassa sāmaññena niddesā, evañca samudāyassa tadavayavānañcekassarānaṃ visuṃ
anya-e0806n0:1295_4: samudāyassa gahaṇa’nti. Sakiṃ satthappavattiyā ekavāraṃ dvibbacanasuttassa pavattiyā
anya-e0806n0:1296_0: Sāvayavassāti yathāvuttāvayavehi saha vattamānassa na vinā tehi. Evaṃ maññate “yassa
anya-e0806n0:1296_1: dvibbacane karīyamāne sabbesamavayavānaṃ gahaṇaṃ bhavati, tasseva samudāyassa dvibbacanaṃ
anya-e0806n0:1296_2: yuttaṃ nāvayavānaṃ, tesañhi dvibbacane ekāya dvibbacanassuppattiyā na sabbesaṃ gahaṇaṃ
anya-e0806n0:1296_3: kataṃ hoti nāvayavantassa samudāyassa ca katanti puna tesaṃ dvibbacanāya satthappavattiyā
anya-e0806n0:1296_4: bhavitabba”nti. Upapattantaramāha- ‘athave’ccādi. Iha ṭhāne dvibbacanaṃ dvippayogo
anya-e0806n0:1296_5: dvibbacananti dve pakkhā. Tatra ṭhāne dvibbacanapakkhe dosadassanato dvippayogo dvibbacanantyayameva
anya-e0806n0:1296_6: pakkhobbhupagatoti dassento paṭhamantāva ṭhāne dvibbacanapakkhe bhāvinaṃ dosamāha-
anya-e0806n0:1297_0: Saṅkhyeyyañcettha saddarūpamuccāraṇaṃ vā, tattha uccāraṇe saṅkhyeyye ṭhāne dvibbacanaṃ
anya-e0806n0:1297_1: na sambhavati… uccāraṇassa saddā(nugata) dhammattā. Saddarūpe saṅkhyeyye ṭhāne dvibbacanaṃ,
anya-e0806n0:1297_2: tattha tañca (potthake) doso. Tathā cāha- ‘rūpadvaye vidhīyamāne’ti. Tathā sati nivuttidhamme
anya-e0806n0:1297_3: ṭhānī bhavatīti ṭhānino nivuttiyā bhavitabbaṃ, nivuttiyā ca dhātuttā nivutti, tenāha-
anya-e0806n0:1297_4: ‘pakatippaccayavibhāgābhāvato’ti. Tena ppaccaye pare pakatiyā vidhīyamānaṃ kāriyaṃ
anya-e0806n0:1297_5: na siyā, tena vuttaṃ- ‘assa ittaṃ na siyā’ti. Pipāsati ‘pā=pāne’. Icchāyaṃ pātuntitumantā
anya-e0806n0:1297_6: “tuṃsmā”ccādinā (5-61) so. ‘Pāsa pāsa’ iti dvitte pubbato-ññassa lopo, “rasso pubbassa”
anya-e0806n0:1297_7: (5-74) ‘kha cha sesvassi. Dvippayoge tu dvibbacane nāyaṃ doso samāvisatīti āha- ‘āvuttiyaṃ
anya-e0806n0:1297_8: ti’ccādi. Dvidhā bhūtassā tidhinā dhātusseva dvidhābhūtattaṃ dīpeti.
anya-e0806n0:1299_0: Yogavibhāgā ‘a ña’ādīsu gamyate. Yadi hyatrāpi chaṭṭhī abhimatā siyā tadā “kha cha
anya-e0806n0:1299_1: sa parokkhānamekassarodidve”ti ekameva yogaṃ kareyya. Parokkhe vihitā añaādayo dhātutova,
anya-e0806n0:1299_2: nāññatoti parokkhāvacanasannidhānā casaddena dhātuvihitappaccayāva gayhantīti āha-
anya-e0806n0:1299_3: ‘aññasmimpi dhātuvihitappaccaye’ti. Yadi pana bhusattho ābhikkhaññattho vā vattumiṭṭho
anya-e0806n0:1299_4: siyā, tadā bhūsatthādīsu ca daddallaticcādikaṃ hotīti veditabbaṃ. Caṅkamati momūhacittānīti
anya-e0806n0:1299_5: bhusatthassa yujjamānattā tyādayo bhusatthe bhavanti bahulādhikārāti vattuṃ sakkāti.
anya-e0806n0:1301_0: Paṭhamo dutiyoti ca dve ekassarā. Tattha “khachasānamekassarodi dve” (5-69) “parokkhāyaṃ
anya-e0806n0:1301_1: ce”ti (5-70) paṭhamassekassa rassa dvibbacanaṃ ‘ādismā sarā”ti tu dutiyassa, tasmā
anya-e0806n0:1301_4: kriyatthānanti chaṭṭhiyā dutiyenekassa renaca sambandhā paṭhamadvibbacanassavidhāya
anya-e0806n0:1301_5: kamaññavākyamaññaṃ dutiyassāti na vākyabhedoti āha- ‘eke’ccādi. Assāti ‘ādismā sarā”ti
anya-e0806n0:1301_6: assa yogassa, pubbayogeti pubbehi dvihi suttehi. “Ādismā sarā”ti saramadvittenupādāya
anya-e0806n0:1301_7: sāmaññena saddarūpassa dvibbacanavidhānato pubbe viya byañjanayuttasseva vidhānaṃ
anya-e0806n0:1303: Paṭinimittanti nimittaṃ nimittaṃ pati paṭinimittaṃ, nimitte satīti attho.
anya-e0806n0:1305_1: tenāha- ‘yathā visaya’nti. Paṭhama dutiya tatiya dvibbacananti ettha puiti paṭhamaṃ
anya-e0806n0:1309_0: Catthaparattāti catthasamāsā parabhūtattā. Tena paccekāti sambandhena. Samānādhikaraṇattena
anya-e0806n0:1309_1: visesananti sambandho. Ācariyena yovibhattilopeneva niddiṭṭhattā āha- ‘luttayovibhattiko vā niddeso’ti.
anya-e0806n0:1311_0: Dhūpāyatīti dhūpitā, paccayassāti tippaccayassa. Kānubandhakaraṇamanatthakaṃ siyāti
anya-e0806n0:1311_1: ghakvikaraṇassa paccayattābhāve (taṃ) nibandhanassa kāriyassābhāvā ‘na te kānubandhanāgamesū”ti
anya-e0806n0:1313_0: Pucchīyitthāti viggayha tto, tassa “pucchādito”ti (5-143) ṭho. Sesaṃ vuttanayameva.
anya-e0806n0:1313_1: E onampaṭisedhamukhenāti eonampaṭisedhassa pakatattā vuttaṃ. Cinitabbantiādīsu cīyittha
anya-e0806n0:1313_2: cīyati vātiādinā viggaho. Cinituntiādīsu cinanā yāti(ādinā). Nanu ca (ñiāga)mo, na
anya-e0806n0:1313_3: paccayoti kathampaccaye “lahussupantassā”ti (5-83) eo papponti kathañce sampaṭisedhoccāsaṅkiyāha-
anya-e0806n0:1313_4: ‘ñisse’ccādi. Nanucādimhi na yuvaṇṇābhi kathametthappasaṅgoti āha- ‘sakāpānaṃ kukkūṇeti’ccādi.
anya-e0806n0:1314_0: Pattokārassāti dhusadde ukārassa pattokārassa. Yuvaṇṇeccādināpattassāti (tabba) tuṃ
anya-e0806n0:1314_1: paccayesu ca ṇino pattassa. Vā vidhānā na ñi. Dhunāpetabbantiādipāṭhe ñimhi akate
anya-e0806n0:1314_2: “aññatrāpī”ti (5-87) paṭisedhābhāvo. Dhunāpetīti pāṭhetimhi le ca “kvaci vikaraṇāna”nti
anya-e0806n0:1314_3: (5-161) vikaraṇalope ca ekāro. Asati nāgame “yuvaṇṇe”ccādinā ettaṃ siyā tampināgame
anya-e0806n0:1316: Sama dama-upasame. Sametīti samako, dametīti damako, jana-janane, janetīti janako badha=bandhane, badhatīti badhako.
anya-e0806n0:1318: Nipajjati nipajjanaṃ. Pamajjate pamajjitabbaṃ. Pamajjanāya pamajjituṃ. Pamajjati pamajjanaṃ.
anya-e0806n0:1322_1: (1-17) antasseva lopo siyāti codanaṃ manasi nidhāya taggahaṇe payojanaṃ dassento
anya-e0806n0:1322_6: Idāni chaṭṭhīniddiṭṭhānaṃ visesena vattumicchittaṃ antasseva lopapattidosaṃ dassetumāha- ‘tadante’ccādi.
anya-e0806n0:1324_0: Atha dvitteti kathamavasīyate sadde abhāvetiāha- ‘para’iccādi. Anantarasutte “paripaccasamo
anya-e0806n0:1324_1: hī”ti vuttattā tato parassāti kinnāvasīyatīti codana mubbhāviya tadayuttataṃ dassetumāha- ‘nanuce’ccādi.
anya-e0806n0:1330: “Vaṇṇe yantaṃ tadādo”ti paribhāsāya ayamattho “vaṇṇe pare yaṃ kāriyaṃ taṃ tadādo tasmiṃ vaṇṇe ādibhūte hotī”ti teti takāre pare.
anya-e0806n0:1332: Tetvevāti vatvā paccudāharaṇaṃ dasseti ‘vuyhatī’ti. Vuttivacanaṃ mulliṅgiya atthaṃ vadati ‘ussā’tiādi.
anya-e0806n0:1340_0: Vatta=vattanetīmasmā ttippaccaye vā ukāro na vihitoti āsayena ‘katha’miccādi vuttanti
anya-e0806n0:1340_3: nipātanā pakkhe ukāro na hoti, tenāha- ‘vattī’tiādi. Vattanaṃ vutti vatti.
anya-e0806n0:1344: Byattiniddesenāti iminā jātiniddesassānissitattaṃ dasseti. Īsseccādinā vuttiganthassādhippāyaṃ vivarati.
anya-e0806n0:1352: Nāññatracayādīsūti nicchayato-ññesu aññasmiṃ cayādīsvatthesu cho na bhavatīti attho.
anya-e0806n0:1354: Īmhi jasadde akārassa lopo, le tu jīrāpayati. Tassātikyassa.
anya-e0806n0:1356: Diṭṭhi dassanaṃ, dassanāya daṭṭhuṃ. “Saramhā dve”ti (1-34) dvitte duddaso. “Ā ī”ccādinā (6-33) īssa rasso (addakkhi). Dakkhissati “bhavissati ssati”ccādinā, (6-2) ssati.
anya-e0806n0:1360_0: Dassātyananuvattamānepi dasseva pappoti vacanabalenāti dassetuṃ pakkhantaramāha-
anya-e0806n0:1360_1: ‘ādissā’tiādi. Anaghaṇsu paresu āparīhi dassāniyamena ḷoccāsaṅkiya nevaṃ, yathākkamameva
anya-e0806n0:1360_2: nissitoti dassetumāha- ‘anaghaṇsu’ccādi. Āparassāti ākārato parassa dassa.
anya-e0806n0:1362_0: Vuttiyaṃ etasmiṃ visayeti ettha etasminti tyādintavajjitapaccaya visayeti attho.
anya-e0806n0:1362_1: Viññāyamānattā ñāpito hotīti gamyate. Na ñāpakatoti iminā idaṃ dasseti “kiñci vacanānusārato
anya-e0806n0:1362_2: viññāyamānatāmattena ñāpīyate kiñci ñāpakena, asmimpakkhe vuttānusārato katthaci
anya-e0806n0:1362_3: kassaci dhātuno appayogo viññāpīyatī”ti. Pakkhantaramāha- ‘ñāpakattāyeva vā’tiādi.
anya-e0806n0:1362_4: Samattheti tathāhiccādinā. Asassāppayogoti asadhātussa kismiñci tabbādike paccaye
anya-e0806n0:1363_0: Vināpi suttanti “atyādī”tiādikaṃ suttaṃ vināpi. Evaṃ maññate “asassa bhūādesena sādhīyamānaṃ
anya-e0806n0:1363_1: sabbamiṭṭhaṃ bahulādhikārato bhūdhātunāva sijjhati vināpi bhūādesasuttantaranti katthaci
anya-e0806n0:1363_2: kassaci appayogassa ñāpakattampissa yujjati aññattha karīyamānamihāpi atthavantaṃ siyā”ti.
anya-e0806n0:1364_0: Yeti dhātuppayogā yasminti visaye, pātissāti ‘pā-rakkhaṇe’tīmassa, nappayogo pāyayati
anya-e0806n0:1364_1: pāyayitabbantiādippayogo na hotīti. Evamuparipi yathāyogaṃ ñeyyaṃ. Brūssāti ‘brū=vacane’iccassa.
anya-e0806n0:1364_2: Adissāti ‘ada-bhakkhaṇe’iccassa. Īādīti bhūte īādi. Etissa ca īādīsūti sambandho.
anya-e0806n0:1365_0: Avabodhe etissa ṇisesu ca īādīsu ca, ajjhene etissa parokkhāsu ca ṇisesu ca īādīsucāti
anya-e0806n0:1365_1: yojetabbaṃ. Sabbattha nappayogoti yojetvā attho veditabbo. Bahulaṃvidhānato ñātabbāti
anya-e0806n0:1365_2: yojanā. Yakvikaraṇena niddesā ‘asa-kkhepanetī massā’ti vuttaṃ, tadāha- ‘asassā’tiādi.
anya-e0806n0:1369: Pubbasaralope rūpassa samānattā antinā antu ca gahitoti ‘santi santū’ti udāharaṇadvayaṃ dassitaṃ.
anya-e0806n0:1371_0: Te ca pādayo jotentīti sambandho. Anvayabyatirekehi kiriyā yadipi dhātunāva vuccatīti
anya-e0806n0:1371_1: sambandho. Kiṃ visiṭṭhā kiriye ccāha- ‘sāmaññabhūtā visiṭṭhā vā’ti. So visesoti yena
anya-e0806n0:1371_2: visesena visiṭṭhā kiriyā dhātunāva vuccati so viseso. Vācaka bhedatoti sāmaññāya
anya-e0806n0:1371_3: ca kiriyāya visiṭṭhāya ca vācakānaṃ dhātūnaṃ bhedato tenāpīti kaccānenāpi. Saṇṭhānaṃ saṇṭhiti.
anya-e0806n0:1373: Kiṭṭhamadatīti kiṭṭhādo, kiṭṭhasaddenupacārato kasitaṭṭhāne uṭṭhita sassaṃ vuccati.
anya-e0806n0:1377: Anusāsīyitthāti anusiṭṭho kamme kto “sā sassa sisvā” (5-117) sāsanāya sāsituṃ.
anya-e0806n0:1379: Atha bahassāti ḍhādesasambandhe chaṭṭhī kasmā na viññāyateti āha- ‘bahassā’tiādi. Ḍhayogapajjenāti ḍhakārena saha yogapajjena ekībhāvenāti attho.
anya-e0806n0:1381: Ḷocāti vuttattāti evaṃ maññate “yadāyaṃ paccayādeso siyā tadā ete samāsene-kato niddiseyyā”ti, tenāha- ‘haḷāti vadeyyā’ti.
anya-e0806n0:1385_0: Imassāti ‘pī-tappane’tīmassa, ihāti imasmiṃ ṭhāne. Pinayīti thūlo ahosīti attho sūyīti
anya-e0806n0:1385_1: itisaddo ādyattho, tena adīyi aḍīyi alīyi alūyītime saṅgayhanti. Yāva ktiggahaṇāti
anya-e0806n0:1389: Akirī, akirīyitthāti vā kiṇṇo, akirīti kiṇṇavā. Apurī purīyitthāti puṇṇo, apurīti puṇṇavā. Akhiyīti khīṇo khīṇavā.
anya-e0806n0:1391: Atarī, ajīrīti kamena viggaho. Cīyitthāti ciṇṇo, cinīti ciṇṇavā.
anya-e0806n0:1393: Asakkhīti satto sattavā. ‘Saja=saṅge’tī massāpi satto sattavāti hoti.
anya-e0806n0:1403_1: adhippāyatthamāha. Tathāhi visesanaṃ kevalayakārato visuṃ karaṇaṃ attho yassāti añña
anya-e0806n0:1403_2: padatthe sati kevalayakārassa nivattanaṃ viññāyate. Yakāramatte gahite ko dosoti
anya-e0806n0:1403_3: āha- ‘yo vā tvāssa samāsetihī’tiādi. Patvāti ‘pata patha=gamane, pada=gamane’iccassa vā.
anya-e0806n0:1407: Nāppakketi na appatte patteyevāti attho. Ñāpakālopoti “titālīsā”ti (1-1) ñāpakatoyeva ktvāppaccayassa yo vakāro tassa lopoti attho.
anya-e0806n0:1409_0: Nanu nassāti vutte paccayanakārassāti kathaṃ viññāyatīti āha- ‘nassā’tiādi,ntamānatyādīnaṃ
anya-e0806n0:1411: Icchīyateti icchitabbaṃ. Esanaṃ icchā. Icchīyitthāti icchitaṃ, āsanamāsitabbaṃ. Āsanāya acchituṃ. “Byañjane dīgharassā”ti (1-33) rasso.
anya-e0806n0:1413: Amānaparacchakkatte kuruādesena nodāhaṭaṃ. Karānoti “mānassamassā”ti (5-16) malopo. Kasmā ntapubbachakkesu kuru ādesena nodāhaṭanti āha- ‘vavatthite’ccādi.
anya-e0806n0:1420_0: Tadatthassevāti tassa kriyatthassa. Yo kiriyāsaṅkhāto atto tasseva. Etena ādhārametaṃ
anya-e0806n0:1420_1: kriyatthassāti ñāpeti. Nahiccādinā tadatthasseva visesane kāraṇamāha. Suttaṃvinātiparesaṃviya
anya-e0806n0:1420_2: suttaṃ vinā. Tāpi vattamāneyeva bhavissantīti iminā vattumiṭṭhattāti ettha sesavacanamavabodheti.
anya-e0806n0:1420_3: Evakārenā (ti vattamānassevāti ettha evasaddena.) Tabbivacchāti vattamānavacanicchā.
anya-e0806n0:1421_0: Taṃsamīpassāti ettha tasaddena mahākassapassa subhaddavacanānussaraṇasaṅkhāto maraṇappattihetu
anya-e0806n0:1421_1: dukkhānubhavasaṅkhāto ca kiriyāviseso pariggahito, te vā vattamānakiriyāvisesāti
anya-e0806n0:1421_4: kiriyantaraṃ vattamānaggahaṇena taṃsāmīpyaṃ gayhati, yathā (gaṅgāsamīpo) deso gaṅgāti
anya-e0806n0:1421_5: vuccati tato ‘gaṅgāyaṃ gāvo’ti siyā”ti. Pure iccādinā pakkhantaraṃ viracitaṃ vuttikārena,
anya-e0806n0:1422_1: avasissati. Kiriyā kāleti dīpanamaraṇakiriyākāle. Tassāti dīpanamaraṇassa. Vattamānattāti
anya-e0806n0:1422_2: ettha vattamāneyeva bhavissantīti seso. Anenāti pureccādivuttivacanena. Purepurāsaddehi
anya-e0806n0:1422_3: anāgatakālāvagame sati dippati maratīti ettha dīpanamaraṇakiriyākālo mukhye tadā
anya-e0806n0:1423_0: Vuttiyaṃ kālabyattayoti kālātivattanaṃ, vattamānakālātikkamena anāgatakālepi bāhulakātyādayo
anya-e0806n0:1423_1: hontīti adhippāyo. Tadeva samattheti ‘bhavanteva’iccādinā. Tyādayotīminā sabbesaṃ
anya-e0806n0:1423_2: ākhyātikānaṃ gahaṇaṃ. Lassa dīghoti sambandho. Gacchatīti sakkassa sahabhāvaṃ gamissatīti attho.
anya-e0806n0:1425_0: Paṭijānissantīti vattamāne anāgatavacanaṃ, paṭijānantīti attho. Itarampana bhūte
anya-e0806n0:1425_1: bhavissatīti āsi, karissatīti akari, cete ssasīti cetitā asi, bhuñjissasīti bhuñjitā
anya-e0806n0:1425_2: asi. Anokappanā assaddhā. Amarisanaṃ akkhamā. Imināvāti atthivacane upapade kodhā
anya-e0806n0:1425_3: saddhāsu gammamānesva-satīpi vacanantare imināva sāmaññavacanena siddhanti attho.
anya-e0806n0:1425_4: Garahāvamāti tassa hetuvacanaṃ. Tathāhiccādinā garahāvagamameva samattheti. Atthināma
anya-e0806n0:1425_5: īdisanti atthināmāti (potthake) ābhidosikassa kummāsassa paribhuñjanaṃ vijjate nāmāti
anya-e0806n0:1425_6: attho. Vijjamānampi taṃ asaddahanto amarisanto evaṃ vadati. Natthīti maññeti adhippāyo,
anya-e0806n0:1425_7: tenāha- ‘paccakkhamapī’ti īdisampīti ādi. Yopīti saddassa sopīti tasaddena sambandho
anya-e0806n0:1425_8: veditabbo. Atthīti vijjamānattheti vuttavijjamānattho vakkhamānapakkhattayepi daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0806n0:1426_0: Nanu atthināma tātāti ettake vutte paṭhamo atthinukhoccādiko nisīditvāti saddapariyanto
anya-e0806n0:1426_1: ca, dutiyo atthinukhoccādiko nisīditvāti saddapariyanto ca tatiyo atthimaññeccādiko
anya-e0806n0:1426_2: jigucchaneyyanti saddapariyanto ca vacanappabandho kathaṃ labbhatīti manasi nidhāyāha-
anya-e0806n0:1426_4: sambandho. Vuttaṃ sakkatānusārena. Nissāyanissāyāti yattha bhagavā nisinno taṃ ṭhānaṃ nissāya nissāya.
anya-e0806n0:1428_0: Kiriyārūpeti kiriyāsabhāve, evamaññatrāpīti agami agamitthātīmehi aññatra agamuṃ
anya-e0806n0:1428_1: iccādike agamoccādike ca. Anudarā alomikāti santamapyudarādikaṃ mahattābhāvapaṭipādanāya
anya-e0806n0:1430_2: Aharubhayataḍḍharattaṃ vāti ettha vāsaddo pakkhantare. Aḍḍharattasaddena rattiyā
anya-e0806n0:1430_3: catuttho bhāgo-tra vattumiṭṭho, aho ca tassa aḍḍharattañcāti attho. Imassādhippāyatthamāha-
anya-e0806n0:1430_4: ‘atīteccādi. Ubhayattha adhippāyaṃ vivarati‘aya’miccādinā. Pañcayāmoti atītāya rattiyā
anya-e0806n0:1430_6: aḍḍhādhikasattaghaṭikāparimāṇo eko yāmo ahassa cattāroti pañca yāmā pahārā assāti pañcayāmo.
anya-e0806n0:1435: Agamatthātiādīsu aīssaādīnaṃ sambandhibyañjanassābhāvā na iña. Byāmissepīti ajjatanamissepi bhūte. Nañsamāsanissaye byāmisse yathā pappotīti dassento āha- ‘pariyudāsetāve’ccādi.
anya-e0806n0:1436_0: Ajjatananissayoti byāmisse ajjatanabhāgīnissayo. Atthuti pañhe tu tadaññanissayoti
anya-e0806n0:1436_1: byāmisseyeva tato ajjatanato itarānajjatana nissayo aññatrāti byāmissato aññatra
anya-e0806n0:1436_2: bhūtakāle. Pasaṅgoti ā ñuādīnaṃ pasaṅgo. Ajjahiyyovāti byāmissatādassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
anya-e0806n0:1438_0: Samāsoti chaṭṭhīsamāso kārakasamāso vā. Nipātanatā cāssa visesatoti. Etañcāti parokkheti
anya-e0806n0:1438_1: etañca. Kriyatthassa upādhi visesanaṃ kriyatthopādhi, tassa kriyatthopādhino bhūtā
anya-e0806n0:1438_2: najjatanassa sādhanadvārena visesanaṃ, na tūjukaṃtyattho. Kasmā nojukaṃ visesanaṃ
anya-e0806n0:1439_0: Sādhiyamānāti iminā dhātvatthassāparinipphannataṃ bodheti. Te santi indriyānaṃ. Santo
anya-e0806n0:1439_1: vijjamāno visayo yesaṃ indriyānaṃ te sambhāvo tattaṃ, tasmā. Neti paṭisedhe, sādhanadvārena
anya-e0806n0:1439_2: visesanatte byavacchejjasabbhāvā yathāvuttadoso na bhavatīti attho. Dosā bhāvameva
anya-e0806n0:1439_3: dassetumāha- ‘yassi’ccādi. Yassāti dhātvatthassa. Tatthāti tasmiṃ appaccakkhe dhātvatthe.
anya-e0806n0:1439_4: Kārakānaṃ sattisabhāvattā sāpi apaccakkhā vāti codeti nanuceccādinā. Asattoti asamattho.
anya-e0806n0:1440_0: Attānāma attano paccakkhoti tabbisaye amhakārakassa vidhānamayuttanti manasi nidhāya
anya-e0806n0:1440_1: yaṃ vuttaṃ vuttikārena, tamupadassetumāha- ‘nanuce’ccādi. Attabodhanīyāpi hi kiriyā
anya-e0806n0:1440_2: yadā cittavikkhepato nopalakkhīyate, tadāyaṃ parokkhā bhavati, tenuttamavisayepi
anya-e0806n0:1440_3: parokkhabhāvo tassā bhavatveva. Jāgaratopi yadā madā manobyātaṅgato anupaladdhi,
anya-e0806n0:1440_4: tadāpi bhavatyeveti dassetuṃ vuttaṃ byāsattavacanaṃ. Abhinibbattikāleti kiriyā nibbattikāle,
anya-e0806n0:1440_5: ‘sutto-haṃ kiṃ vilalāpa, matto-haṃ kiṃvilalāpe’ti idamatrodāharaṇaṃ. Citta cikkhepavisayappadassanāyettha suttavacanaṃ.
anya-e0806n0:1442_0: Eyyādotīminā eyyādyattho gahitoti bodhetuṃ yeneccādikaṃ vuttaṃ. Nimittasaddāpekkhāya
anya-e0806n0:1442_1: tanti vattabbe visayasaddāpekkhāyasoti vuttaṃ. Tesanti eyyādīnaṃ. Visayaṃ dasseti
anya-e0806n0:1442_3: kriyātipattiyanti kathaṃ labbhaticcāha- ‘kriyāti pattiya’nti ādi. Kriyātipattiyanti
anya-e0806n0:1443_1: adhikatassa dhātussa visesanattā. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti “atipattiyanti adhikatakriyatthavisesanaṃ,
anya-e0806n0:1443_2: visesanañca hontaṃ nojukaṃ bhavitumarahati kiñcarahi abhidheyyadvārena, tathāhi atipatanaṃ
anya-e0806n0:1443_3: nāma kriyāya hoti, na kriyatthassa ayujjanato, tasmā atipattiyantivuttekriyātipatti
anya-e0806n0:1443_4: yanti idaṃ kriyatthavisesanaṃ hontaṃ abhidheyyadvārena hotīti kriyātipattiyanti vivaraṇaṃ
anya-e0806n0:1444_0: Kāraṇavekallatovāti hetumato phalassa yo hetu tassa vikalattena. Tatretīmassa attho
anya-e0806n0:1444_1: vattamānavisayeti. Kriyātipattiyanti bhūtādi kriyātipattiyaṃ. Liṅgatoti nimittena.
anya-e0806n0:1444_2: Gamakena liṅgena gammāyātipattiyā bujjhanakālaṃ vattamāno kālo na tiṭṭhati atikkamatīti
anya-e0806n0:1445_0: Liṅgenāti ettha pubbe dakkhiṇena gamane sati sakaṭissāpariyā bhavanadassanaṃ dakkhiṇena
anya-e0806n0:1445_1: gamanassa sakaṭāpariyābhavanahetutte liṅgaṃ, dakkhiṇena gamanassātipattiyā aññato
anya-e0806n0:1445_2: gamanādi liṅgaṃ. Sakaṭā kiriyābhavanātipattiyā sakaṭe garubhārāropanādi liṅgaṃ. Paṭhamavaye
anya-e0806n0:1445_3: arahattabhavanaṃ taṃhetubhūtañca pabbajjaṃ paresaṃ paṭhamavaye pabbajjānimittārahattappattiliṅgena
anya-e0806n0:1445_4: viññāya pabbajjāyātipatti gharakammabyāvaṭatādiliṅgena, arahattassātipatti ca pabbajjānimittābhāvena
anya-e0806n0:1445_5: bhāvavirahena (potthake) liṅgenāvasīyateti liṅgena bhūta kriyātipatti pana veditabbā,
anya-e0806n0:1445_6: yadi panevamabhiññālābhī payuñjati tadā paccakkhañāṇeneva sabbaṃ viññāya payuñjatīti
anya-e0806n0:1447_0: Niccabhavanaṃ hetu (tyādinā) hetuphalabhāvoyevettha, nāti pattīti dīpeti. Sabbappaccayodāharaṇavasenāti
anya-e0806n0:1447_1: sabbesaṃ eyyādīnampaccayānaṃ udāharaṇavasena. Hetuphalānaṃ sabbhāvatoti vuttattā
anya-e0806n0:1447_2: hetuphalāni dasseti hananamiccādinā. Evaṃ hetuphalasabbhāvato sabbakāle ca vidhānato
anya-e0806n0:1447_3: ettha vattamānepi pappotīti bhāvo. So ca hetuhetumantabhāvo ca.
anya-e0806n0:1449_0: Pacchimaṃ pacchimaṃ padantiādīsu pañhoti purimaṃ padaṃ, sampucchanāti pacchimaṃ padantiādinā
anya-e0806n0:1449_1: daṭṭhabbaṃ. Samecca aññamaññaṃ pucchanā sampucchanā, yācanaṃ dehī tyādinā yācanamatthaṃ,
anya-e0806n0:1449_3: pīti yojetvā attho daṭṭhabbo. Pattakālaṃ dasseti nimittabhūtassātiādinā. Nimittabhūtassāti
anya-e0806n0:1449_4: taṃtaṃkiccasampajjane kāraṇabhūtassa. Vidhi nāma diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyika nimantaṇāmantaṇājjhesanapesanāni.
anya-e0806n0:1449_5: Ettha ca anuññāpattakālesu ca pañcamī vihitā parehi, diṭṭhadhammikādīsu pañcasu sattamī.
anya-e0806n0:1449_6: Idha pana te dvepi vidhivisesāyevāti vidhimhi antokaritvā eyyādiṃ vidhātuṃ yaṃ vuttaṃ
anya-e0806n0:1449_8: pakāseti ‘evaṃ kareyyāsī”ticcādinā. Anujānantopi dīpentopi kiriyāsu byāpāretiyevāti
anya-e0806n0:1450_0: Pesanepi kesañci byākaraṇaññūnaṃ sattamīvidhicchitotivuttikārena yaṃ vuttaṃ, taṃ
anya-e0806n0:1450_1: dāni vattumāha- ‘pesane pi’ccādi. Samūlatanti kesañci saddikānaṃ sattamīvidhividhānamūlena
anya-e0806n0:1450_3: parassa anujānanaṃ anumati, parikappanaṃ sallakkhaṇaṃ nirūpanaṃ parikappo hetuphalakiriyā
anya-e0806n0:1450_4: sambhavo ca, tasmiṃ anumatyatthe ca parikappatthe ca sattamīvibhatti hotīti attho.
anya-e0806n0:1452: Udāhaṭāti gacchatu gacchantuādinā udāhaṭā. Dadātūti yācane.
anya-e0806n0:1454: Arahatthe cāyameva payogo, tena bhavaṃ khalu rajjaṃ kareyya bhavaṃ arahoti yojetvā daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0806n0:1456_1: attho. Payogānusāritaṃ dīpetī sambandho. Gammamāneti sambhāvemiccādinā bhvādidhātūhi
anya-e0806n0:1456_2: avuccamānepi gamyamāne. Udāhaṭaṃ ‘apipabbataṃ sirasā bhindeyyā’ti. Mahābalatāya hatthihanane
anya-e0806n0:1456_3: alamatthavisaye sambhāvane satyapi alaṃ saddo-trālamattho yuttoti na bhavantetyādayo
anya-e0806n0:1456_4: hanissati. Dhātunāti ettha dhātuggahaṇena bhvādayo gayhante tattha dhātusaddassa
anya-e0806n0:1456_5: ruḷhattā pubbācariyasaññāya vā. Udāhaṭanti bhuñjeyya bhavaṃ tyādinā.
anya-e0806n0:1458_0: Sūti māsūti ettha susaddo. Ettha imasmiṃ udāharaṇe. Nivatteti māsaddoti seso. Āraddhanti
anya-e0806n0:1458_1: iminā vattamānaṃ vanagamanaṃ dasseti. Antobhūtaṇyatthāti ṇippaccayābhāvepi attani
anya-e0806n0:1458_2: antobhūtaṇyattha dhātuto. Īādīnaṃ āādīnañca sakakālonāma bhūto kālo. Dhātusambandho
anya-e0806n0:1459_1: sutte gamanatthasaddena ‘ye gatyatthā te buddhyatthā’ti jānanatthopi gahitoti evaṃ
anya-e0806n0:1459_2: gahitajānanatthavasena gamanatthattāti attho. Abhimatāni pāṇiniyānaṃ. Tathā saddassatthamāha-
anya-e0806n0:1459_3: ‘anantarena gatattha’(nti ana)ntare vuttena karaṇabhūtenāti attho. Abhimatoti pāṇiniyānameva
anya-e0806n0:1459_6: Maṭhādisādhanānambhedenāṭana kiriyāyapi bhedoti attho. Takkiriyāppadhānassāti sā
anya-e0806n0:1459_7: lavanakiriyā padhānamassa kattuno. Yo- yamaññepi niyojento viya kiriyaṃ karoti so
anya-e0806n0:1461_0: Mahāvākyarūpattā pakaraṇassa tadapekkhāya vākyekadesattaṃ “vattamāne tianti, bhavissati”ccādīnaṃ
anya-e0806n0:1461_2: Vidhivākyattamassa dassetvā niyamavākyattaṃ dāni dassetuṃ ‘athavā niyamatthamidantyādīna’ntyāha.
anya-e0806n0:1461_3: Niyamasuttattameva phuṭayati ‘tehi’ccādinā. Tehi tehi suttehīti “vattamāne ti anti”ccādīhi
anya-e0806n0:1461_4: tehi tehi suttehi. Imināti “pubbaparā”dinā iminā suttena. Nanu tumhāmhasesesūti ettake
anya-e0806n0:1461_5: vuccamāne ‘tumhāmhasaddavacanīyesu tadaññasaddavacanīyesu ca kārakesū’ti ayaṃ viseso
anya-e0806n0:1461_6: kuto gamyate yenevaṃ vivaṭaṃtyāha- ‘kattukamme’ccādi. Kattādīsu vidhānañca vakkhati.
anya-e0806n0:1462_0: Kattukammānamevāti iminā bhāvaṃ byavacchindati. Tathā ca vakkhati- ‘tumhāmhasaddavacanīyattābhāvā’ti.
anya-e0806n0:1462_2: Tumhāmhasesesu hontā majjhimuttamapaṭhamā kathaṃ bhāvādīsu viññāyanti kathañca tumhāmhādisaddavacanīyassa
anya-e0806n0:1462_4: yaṃ vuttaṃ vuttiyaṃ taṃdāni vivarantena ‘yadi bhāvādīsu mānādayo na vidhīyante tadāmānādīsu
anya-e0806n0:1462_5: paresu bhāvādīsu kyalādīnaṃ vidhānameva nopapajjatī’ti iminā sāmatthiyena tumhādīsu
anya-e0806n0:1462_6: kārakesu majjhimādīnaṃ bhāvo viññāyati teneva tumhādikārakatthassa tattha vihitenākhyātena
anya-e0806n0:1462_7: saññāpitattā tumhādisaddappayogo nāma na hotīti dassetuṃ ‘tumhādisvi’ccādikamāraddhaṃ.
anya-e0806n0:1462_8: Yajjevaṃ tumhādisaddappayogoyeva na siyā ccāha- ‘yajjeva miccādi. Parihāramāha- ‘sasaddenā’ti.
anya-e0806n0:1462_9: Tumhādisaddena. Brāhmaṇāiccanenābhihitameva bahuttaṃ bahavoti vacanenānujjate. Vacanābhāve
anya-e0806n0:1463_2: na bhavati. Tathāhi tayeccetaṃ kattuvācī paccateccetaṃ kammavācī kamme ākhyātappaccaya vidhānato.
anya-e0806n0:1464_1: Maññatissa payogeti upapadavasena manadhātussa payoge. Dhātumhāti gamiādito. Uttama
anya-e0806n0:1464_2: purisekavacane patteti gamissāmīti patte. Majjhimobhimatoti gamissasītyabhimato.
anya-e0806n0:1464_3: Majjhime patteti maññaseti patte, uttamekavacana miṭṭhanti maññetiṭṭhaṃ. Idaṃ vuttaṃ
anya-e0806n0:1464_4: hoti “maññase tvaṃ rathena gamissāmīti vattabbe maññe tvaṃ rathena gamissasīti bhavatīti
anya-e0806n0:1464_5: (vutta”nti). Ehi maññeccādi na kiñci vuttaṃ vuttiyaṃ. Yathāsavisayevamajjhimuttamā
anya-e0806n0:1465_0: Yadevamabhisambandhoti ‘maññase tvaṃ rathena gacchāmī’ti yadā evamabhisambandho karīyatītyattho.
anya-e0806n0:1465_1: So cevamanugatoti ‘maññe ahaṃ tvaṃ rathena gacchasi’ccevaṃ so ca payogo anugatotyattho.
anya-e0806n0:1467: Tenacāti samāsitattena ca,ssatyādīnamaggahaṇanti yadi tesaṃ gahaṇaṃ siyā āīssādīsūti na samāsena vadeyya.
anya-e0806n0:1469: Katākatappasaṅgīyo vidhi so nicco-niccā balavāti paṭhamaṃ vuka bhavatīti dassetumāha- ‘katākatappasaṅgittā’ccādi.
anya-e0806n0:1473_0: Nanu ca ‘sossā’ti kasmā vuttaṃ “kvaci vikaraṇāna “micceva (5-161) lopo siyāti ‘karassa
anya-e0806n0:1473_1: ku’nti vattabbanti codanamanasi nidhāyāha- ‘kvaci vikaraṇānaṃ tyādi. Aññatrapayogānusaraṇā
anya-e0806n0:1473_2: payogānusaraṇaṃ vinā olopo viññātuṃ na sakkāti sambandho.
anya-e0806n0:1475: Kāriyaṃ āhaṅsaṅkhātamassa atthīti kāriyī, tena aparo kāriyī haññati hiṃsīyatīti attho.
anya-e0806n0:1476_0: Sahossehīti karassa okārena ssena ca saha hāssa ssena sahāti attho. Atha kathaṃ ossehi
anya-e0806n0:1476_2: sahattha(ssa ca) sossa ssenāti kathanasāmatthiyāti attho. Adhippāyaṃ vivarati ‘evaṃ
anya-e0806n0:1476_3: maññate’ccādinā. Evaṃ maññate- ossāna manādesitte iccādinā pāṭhena bhavitabbamiva
anya-e0806n0:1476_4: lakkhīyate… teneva pāṭhenasahavacanasāmatthiyassa patītisabbhāvato. Na tu ‘evaṃmaññateossānamantādesatte
anya-e0806n0:1476_5: hāssacāti vacanamanatthakaṃ siyā hā to cetveva vadetya ossānamanādesitte’ccādinā
anya-e0806n0:1476_7: sossāti visesanachaṭṭhiyāppadhānāya ssenāti sahatthe tatiyāya ca niddiṭṭhattā. Ubhayatthāti
anya-e0806n0:1478: Pubbasaralopoti vikaraṇalopo ākārādese ca dvīsu vāresu pubbasaralopo.
anya-e0806n0:1480: Agāti īmhi lalopo, ākārādese ca pubbasaralopo.
anya-e0806n0:1486: Sutte āti iminā ubhayattha paṭhamapurisekavacanaṃ gahitanti āha- ‘ā’tiādi.
anya-e0806n0:1492_0: Tehevāti heṭṭhā vuttasuttadvayeheva, sahacaritañāyenāti “bhūte ī uṃ”iccādo (6-4)
anya-e0806n0:1492_2: paṭhamapurisekavacana ākārena ca sahacaritākārānameva paccāsattiyā sahacaritā pattivasena
anya-e0806n0:1492_3: pavattañāyena gahaṇanti attho. Gahitattā tvādi sambandhī gayhateti sambandho. Nissayakaraṇaṃ
anya-e0806n0:1500: Kriyatthavihitānampi dhātuvihitānampi aññesaṃ tabbādīnaṃ paccayānaṃ na gahaṇanti sambandho.
anya-e0806n0:1508: Cha ca khā ca cha khā.
anya-e0806n0:1557: Sāmī me gurupuṅgavo vijayate sārīsuto-yaṃ bhuvi.
anya-e0806n0:1559: Rājā vikkamabāhu bāhitaripū tātvassa bhātāssa lokissaro,
anya-e0806n0:1561: Nibbhīto tisūro vijayādibāhu vijayī so āsi laṅkissaro,
anya-e0806n0:1562: Taṃ nissāya phalaṃ cirāya phalatañcetaṃ sataṃ santataṃ.
